1b1(mdo sde): rmagyur skad du/ u drug gnagan rdu 'i drung rgya
1b2(mdo sde): na sUtra/ ded skad du/ 'phrogs pa nam mkha'i mdzo
1b3(mdo sde): da da du/ 'phrogs pa nam ma
1b4(mdo sde): don rdzo/ tri ra/ tre// ku ra/ tredratra tro// / dra/ DAr+ra/
1b5(mdo sde): zhes byang theg pa chen po'i mdo// bam po dang ngo // sangs
2a1(mdo sde): #/ rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad
2a2(mdo sde): bdag gis zlos po'i dus gcig ni/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul rin
2a3(mdo sde): po che bkod pa'i 'khor gyi khyams/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnasu bsod nams chen po'i rgyan gyi
2a4(mdo sde): tshogs bsags pa/ spyod pa chen po'i rgyu 'thun pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par smin
2b1(mdo sde): pas mngon par grub pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i gnas mtha' yas pa nges par bstan pa/ de bzhin
2b2(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i rnam par sprul pa'i byin gyi rlabs mi chags pa'i spyod yul gyi ye shes la 'jug pa/ dga' ba rgya chen po
2b3(mdo sde): rab tu bskyed pa/ dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rtogs pa la 'jug pa/ kun nas ma smad pa/ ye shes kyis rnam par dpyod pa/ de'i
2b4(mdo sde): rang bzhin ma yin pa la 'jug pa/ phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal par mngon du bstod pa/ yon tan gyi tshogs thams cad dpag tu med pa na
2b5(mdo sde): bzhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid ni mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/ chos kyi 'khor lo ni
3a1(mdo sde): #// rab tu bskor/ slob ma shin tu dul ba mtha' yas pa'i tshogs ni mnga'/ chos thams cad la mnga' ni brnyes/ sems
3a2(mdo sde): can thams cad kyi bsam pa'i bya ba ni shin tu mkhyen/ dbang po dam pa'i pha rol tu ni byon/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i bag chags
3a3(mdo sde): kyi mtshams sbyor ba yang dag par 'joms pa la ni mkhas shing / sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa lhun gyis grub pa ni rgyun ma bcad do// dge slong sa ya
3a4(mdo sde): phrag drug gis dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig ste/ thams cad kyang cang shes kyi sems dang ldan pa/ yang dag pa'i shes pas
3a5(mdo sde): sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba yang dag par 'joms pa la brtson pa// de bzhin
3a6(mdo sde): gshegs pa chos kyi rgyal po'i sras/ chos zab mo la gnas par mkhas pa/ dmigs su med pa'i chos las nges par byung ba/ spyod lam
3b1(mdo sde): mdzes pa phun sum tshogs pa/ sbyin pa'i gnas chen por gyur pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' la shin tu zhugs pa sha sdug go/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs nas 'dus pa /
3b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpag tu med/ grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med pa/ gzhal du mang pa/ tshad med brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i
3b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po dang yang thabs cig ste/ thams cad kyang sems kyi skad cig gis sa ng+yas kyi zhing mtha' yas par 'gro ba la mkhas pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la
3b4(mdo sde): mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba la mkhas pa/ chos mnyam pa la mi ngoms par yang dag par tshol ba/ rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed pa la brtson pa/ thab
3b5(mdo sde): dang shes rab dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa/ sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa la rab tu gnas pa/ rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / spros pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ thams
3b6(mdo sde): cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la nye bar gyur pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' glog gi lha zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems
3b7(mdo sde): dpa' rnam par snang mdzad snying po zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam par gnon pa dpa' bo zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' yid gnyis yang dag par 'joms pa zhes bya ba dang / byang
4a1(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' rnam par bsgrags ldan zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnam par lta ba'i mig ces bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' mun pa dang bral zhes bya ba dang /
4a2(mdo sde): de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpag tu med/ tshad med/ grangs med/ bsam gyis mi khyab/ mtshungs pa med/ gzhal du med/ dpag gis mi lang / brjod du
4a3(mdo sde): med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag dang yang thabs cig go// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'dus pa chen po'i le'u zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
4a4(mdo sde): rnams la rab tu ston te/ 'dus pa chen po'i le'u chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod cing bkod pa chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i nang na
4a5(mdo sde): bdag 'dug pa snyam du shes so// khang pa brtsegs pa de dag gi bkod pa de nyid sems can rnams kyi mig sngar snang bar gyur te/ khang pa brtsegs pa na 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
4a6(mdo sde): po rnams dang / nyan thos chen po rnams dang / gzhan yang lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za'i 'khor de dag thams cad ma gtogs par spong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams/
4a7(mdo sde): na gzugs su ldang ba lhag ma gzhan thams cad meng par gyur te/ thams cad kyang nam mkha' lta bur gyur pa snyam du shes so// 'di lta ste/ dper na bskal pas shin tu bsregs te// nam ma
4b1(mdo sde): ba'i duthur ba stong gsum gyi stong chan pa'i 'jig rten gyi lams na gzugs su snang ba gang yang mig sngar snang bar mi 'gyur ba de bzhid du/ de'i tsher gang gzugs su rung ba rnams sems cad dag gi
4b2(mdo sde): sngar ma ldang bar gyur to// 'di ltaste/ dpar na de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che bkod pa gcig pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bkod pa chen pa zhes bya ban// byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi yang pa na
4b3(mdo sde): pa yongs su langs spyod pa de 'dra ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa de na snang ngo // nam mkha' la khang pa brtsegs pa 'dug pa de dag ma gtogs par stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di sa'i
4b4(mdo sde): steng dang gzhi'i bar du thams cad kyang mi sdang ba snyam du rab tu shes te/ ri'i rgyal po ra rab dang / khor yug gi ri dang / khor yug gi ri chen po dag sems car gang gi mig lngar yang mi sdang bar gyur to//
4b5(mdo sde): grong dang / grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rnams kyang mi snang ste/ gzhan du na nam mkha'i dkyil na gnas pa'i khang pa brtsegs par
4b6(mdo sde): dag nyid du shes shing / bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i khrin 'phang du dpag tshad khrir 'phags par rab tu snang ngo // gang la bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa'i seng ge'i khri de'i 'od kyis kyang sto
4b7(mdo sde): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur te/ gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / skar ma dang / ra
5a1(mdo sde): byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba'i 'od de dag thams cad kyang mog mog por byas par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor de dag thams cad kyis
5a2(mdo sde): 'di lta bu'i cho 'phrul ngo mtshar dang rmang du byung ba mthongs nas/ phan tshun du smra ba/ khang pa brtsegs pa 'di'i bkod pa ci 'dra ba de ni/ bdag cag gi tshe'i tshad bskal par 'dug par gyur kyang /
5a3(mdo sde): bdag cag gis rgya cher rnam par dbye ba bstan par slab ma yin te/ de tsam du khang pa brtsegs pa 'di dag gi yon tan bkod pa ni tshad med do zhes 'dzer to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mthun
5a4(mdo sde): gnas brtan shA ri'i bu khang pa brtsegs pa de nas langs nas nam mkha' la 'dug te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud
5a5(mdo sde): dbacom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' la mchis pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa 'di ma lags pa/ gzhan stong gsum gyi stong chen
5a6(mdo sde): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nam mkha' gyur cing / nam mkha'i rang bzhin du gda' ba 'di su'i snga ltas lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu khyod kyis
5a7(mdo sde): khang pa brtsegs pa 'di mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu khyod kyis khang pa brtsegs pa 'di dag gi
5b1(mdo sde): brtags pa sangs su brjod pa'i mtha' shes par nus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag rgan 'chang bas par gyur kyang / khang pa brtags pa 'di dag gi bsngags pa'i mdza
5b2(mdo sde): rtogs par mi nus so// bka' stsal pa/ shA ra'i bu ji ltar 'khor 'di dag thams cad rnam ma'a' la song zhing / khang pa brtsegs pa bkod pa chen por zhugs par snang ba bzhin du/ bkod
5b3(mdo sde): pa chen po'i 'jig rter gyi khams kyi khang pa brtsegs pa de'ang 'di 'dra'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bkod pa chen po 'jig rten gyi khams de gang gi phyogs na mchis/ bcom
5b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu de ni 'di nas shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgyad kyi rdul phra rab kyi rdul gyis yongs su gang ba snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams 'das
5b5(mdo sde): pan+da bkod pa chen po zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che bkong pa gcig pa zhes bya ba da ltan bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to//
5b6(mdo sde): ri'i bu bkod pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na/ byang chub kyi sems rin po che las rin po che gzhan mi 'byung ngo // de bas na de bzhin gshegs pa de rin po che bkod pa gcig pa zhes
5b7(mdo sde): bya'o// rade bzhin gshegs pa de'ang nam byang chub sems dpa' de dag la chos 'chad pa de na seng ge'i khri dang bcas te/ tal bye ba phrag brgyad cu srid kyi nam mkha'i dkyil du mngon par
6a1(mdo sde): 'phags so// byang chub sems dpa' de dag kyang khang ba brtsegs pa bkod pa chen po der nam mkha'i dkyil du mngon par 'phags nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa/
6a2(mdo sde): de la chos nyan te/ de bzhin gshegs pa de'ang nam mkha'i dkyil yongs su dag pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi phyag rgya yang dag par rab tu ston to// shA ri'i bu bkod pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
6a3(mdo sde): khams de na gang byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi khang pa brtseg pa'i yongs su longs spyod pa de ni bskal par yang brjod mi nus so// shA ri'i bu khyod kyis nga'i seng ge'i khri 'di mthong ngam/ gsol
6a4(mdo sde): pa bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che bkod pa gcig de'i seng ge'i khri yang 'di
6a5(mdo sde): 'dra ste/ de la bcom ldan 'das de bzhugs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis la 'jug pa/ nam mkha'i dkyil yongs su dag pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya yang
6a6(mdo sde): dag par rab tu ston to// rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis la 'jug pa nam mkha'i dkyil yongs su dag pa'i chos kyi phyag rgya de gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dngos po meng pas chos thams cad yod pa/
6a7(mdo sde): dang med pa dang bral ba dang / rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid pas/ chos thams cad dngos po med pa dang / snang bar gyur pa med pas chos thams cad rnam par rig pa med pa dang /
6b1(mdo sde): rlung mas pam pas chos thams cadang rung bar gyur pa med du dang / nyabar na ba'i mnyan tad pas/ chos thams cad dmigs pa mang pa dang / gnyis su med pas chos thams sa
6b2(mdo sde): ngar ning dang / so so tha ngad pa med pas chos thams cad gnyis su med pa dang / tshul gcig la zhugs pas chos thams cad tha dad pa med pa dang / ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid da
6b3(mdo sde): bral bas chos thams cad tshul gcig pa dang / dus gsum las yang dag par 'das pas/ chos thams ca dang bcang med pa dang / thams cad la mi gnas pas chos thams cad
6b4(mdo sde): nam mkha'i dkyil dang / thams cad du mi snang bas chos thams cad mi gnas pa'i sgo dang / yul gyi lam las yang dag par 'das pas chos thams cad snang ba med pa dang / rang
6b5(mdo sde): dang phyi rnam par dag pas chos thams cad yul med pa dang / rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin pas/ chos thams cad rnam par dag pa dang / ngo bo nyid kyis
6b6(mdo sde): nye bar zhi bas/ chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa dang / sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa med pas/ chos thams cad nye bar zhi ba dang / gzod
6b7(mdo sde): ma nas ma byung bas/ chos thams cad mtshan nyid med pa dang / nga'i ba med cing yongs su 'dzin pa med pas/ chos thams cad gzod ma nas ma byung ba dang / bdag po med pas/
7a1(mdo sde): chos thams cad 'dab mang cing yongs su 'dzin pa mang byung / rang bzhin gyis bdag med pas rgyas thams cad bdag pa meng pa dang / bzung mnas rnam par/
7a2(mdo sde): pas chos thams cad rang bzhin gyi bdag med pa dang / ldog pa med pas chos thams cad gzong ma nas rnam par bdag pa dang / sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin pas/ chos tham/
7a3(mdo sde): cad ldog pa med pa dang / dngos po med pas chos thams cad snum lta bu dang / dngon par 'du mi byed pa'i mtshan nyid pas/ chos thams cad dngos po med pa dang / sems
7a4(mdo sde): dang lus dben pas/ chos thams cad mngon par 'dus ma byas pa dang / mtshan nyid med cing mtshan nyid kyi gzhi'i mtshan nyid med pas/ chos thams cad dben pa'i mtshan nyid
7a5(mdo sde): dang rang gi mtshan nyid las ma g.yos pas chos thams cad mtshan nyid med pa dang / gnas dmigs su med pas chos thams cad ma g.yos pa dang / dmigs pa med pa'i mtha'
7a6(mdo sde): la rab tu gnas pas/ chos thams cad gnas pa med pa dang / kun gzhi med pas chos thams cad dmigs pa med pa dang / kun gzhi dang bral bas chos thams cad kun gzhi med
7a7(mdo sde): pa ste/ shA ri'i bu de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che bkod pa gcig pa de byang chub sems de dag la rnam pa sum cu rtsa gnyis la 'jug pa nam mkha'i dkyil yongs su dag pa'i chos
7b1(mdo sde): ci rgyas rnasang dag par rab tu ston te/ dathos pas kyang byang chub sems dpa' tshang med pa dag mngon par shes pa rnam par dag pas rnam par shes pa la bzod pa/ chos thams cad/
7b2(mdo sde): la dbang byed pa rjes su 'thob pa// yang shA ri'i bu bkad pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sbyin pas brgyan cing bskal pa grangs med par gtong
7b3(mdo sde): rjes su song ba/ tshul khrims kyis brgyan cing blo shin tu byung ba/ bzod pas brgyan cing sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ brtson 'grus kyis
7b4(mdo sde): brgyan cing sangs rgyas kyis chos kyis chos thams cad kyi tshogs bsags pa/ bsam gtan gyis brgyan cing / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang /
7b5(mdo sde): snyoms par 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pa thams cad kyis rnam par rtsen pa/ shes rab kyis brgyan cing bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad dang bral
7b6(mdo sde): ba/ byams pa chen pos brgyan cing / sems can thams cad yongs su skyob par gnas pa/ snying rje chen pos brgyan cing sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong bar gnas pa
7b7(mdo sde): dga' bo chen pos brgyan cing sems can thams cad dga' ba dang / bad ba dang / rab tu dga' ba las sor 'gong pa'i rgyun mi gcod pa/ btang snyoms blos brgyan cing / sems
8a1(mdo sde): can thams cad mi mtho mi dma' ba la 'god pa rgyun mi gcod par sbyor ba sha stag go// yang shA ri'i bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che bkod pa gcig
8a2(mdo sde): pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rim mkha'i mdzod ces bya ba 'dug ste/ bsod nams kyi gzi brjid kyis shin tu brjid pa/ ye shes mthong ba thog
8a3(mdo sde): pa med pa/ mtshan rnams kyis lus brgyan pa/ dpe byad bzang po rnams kyis byams pa brgyan pa/ spobs pas ngag brgyan pa/ gzugs kyis sems brgyan pa/ thos pas dran
8a4(mdo sde): pa brgyan pa/ nges par sems pas bden pa brgyan pa/ rtogs pas don rtogs pa brgyan po/ bsam pas dam bcas pa brgyan pa/ khyad par du 'gro bas lhag pa'i bsam pa brgyan
8a5(mdo sde): pa sbyor bas brgyan cing chos thams cad la the tsom med par gyur pa/ btang snyoms chen pos brgyan cing mtho dman med pa/ mngon par shes pa chen pos brgyan cing / rdzu phrul gyis
8a6(mdo sde): rnam par rtsen pa thams cad mngon par shes pa/ bsod nams kyis brgyan cing / lag na rin po che gtong ba mngon par grub pa/ ye shes kyis brgyan cing sems can thams cad kyi
8a7(mdo sde): sems kyi bsam pa la zhugs pa/ blos brgyan cing sems can thams cad dge ba'i rtsa ba rtogs par byed pa/ mig gis brgyan cing mig lnga'i yul la shin tu rnam par dag pa/ rna bas brgyan cing
8b1(mdo sde): sgra dang / don thams cad rtogs pa snying po dang ldan pa/ so so yang dag par rig pas brgyan cing / don dang / chos dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa mi zad par ston pa
8b2(mdo sde): stobs kyis brgyan cing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rjes su thob pa/ mi 'jigs pas brgyan cing / pas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis zil gyis minon pa/ yon tan gyis brgyan cing
8b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi yon tan mtha' yas pa thob pa/ chos kyis brgyan cing spu'i bug thams cad nas chos sgrog pa/ so sor rig pa'i rjes su song ba/ snang bas brgyan cing sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad lag
8b4(mdo sde): mthil du thob pa/ 'od kyis brgyan cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cang snang bar byed pa/ kun nas stor pas brgyan cing chad par lung ston pa/ gdams pa dang rjes su bstan pas brgyan cing / de byed
8b5(mdo sde): pa'i chos tshar phyin pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul gyis brgyan cing rdzu 'phrul rnam par dag pas rnam par 'grol ba thams cad ston pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis mngon par bstod pas brgya
8b6(mdo sde): gzhan la rag ma las pa'i ye shes la gnas pa/ tshogs thams cad kyi yon tan gyis brgyan cing sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos 'dul ba'i rjes su zhugs pa ste/ shA ri'i bu gang bkod pa'adi
8b7(mdo sde): lta du kur du snang ba 'di byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyi byin gyi rlabs so// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nim mtha' mdzod dang la blta ba dang 'phyag
9a1(mdo sde): 'tshal ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / 'dus pa chen po'i le'u chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu yongs su gzung ba dang / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa/
9a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag chos kyi dga' ba dang / bde ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba bskyed pa dang / theg pa chen po 'di'ang rab tu yongs su gzung ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
9a3(mdo sde): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos kyang yongs su gzung ba'i phyir nga'i gan du 'ong ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che
9a4(mdo sde): bkod pa gcig pa de la gsol nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bcu gnyis kyis yongs su bskor te/ mdun du bdar nas lhan cig tu mngon du gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mi byed/
9a5(mdo sde): pasangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pas bkod pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur te/ sems kyi skad cig gcig 'byung ba tsam gyis mi mjed kyi 'jig
9a6(mdo sde): rten gyi khams 'dir phyin nas de bar snang la 'dug ste/ bkod pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / phye ma dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal
9a7(mdo sde): mtshan dang / bdan ci 'dra ba de 'dra ba'i char rab tu phab pa 'di lta ste/ zla ba dang / zla ba chen po dang / shin tu mdzes pa'i zla ba dang / nyi ma'i 'od dang / nyi ma rab tu 'bar ba dang / me shel dang /
9b1(mdo sde): mdag mdzes dang / mdog mdzes chen po dang / mngag mdzes par 'dug pa dang / sbal dang / sbal chen po dang / sbrul rab du mdzes pa dang / dri ma med pa dang / kun du drim meng pa dang / rnamangs
9b2(mdo sde): 'od dang / gsar du snang dang / nam mkha' snang dang / reg gyur dang / dri can dkar dang / 'dab brgya pa dang / ze bstong ldan dang / mya ngan gsel dang / dga'abyed dang / lhas bstod dang / klu
9b3(mdo sde): me tog dang / dga' bad kur r+m+ma dang / bsam gtan yan lag dang / dris dga' dang / lus sems chom byed dang // stong gsum dri dang / nad kun ni byed dang / nad kun sel dang / bdag gi gza
9b4(mdo sde): brjid kyis brgyan cing dpag tu med pa'i bsod nams kyis grub pa/ phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpas rig pa de lta bu'i me tog gis stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di kun du khebs
9b5(mdo sde): bar byas pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du me tog pus mo nub tsam du gang bar gyur to// de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des sngon ma thos
9b6(mdo sde): ma mthong ba'i me tog de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu'i me tog blta na sdug pa 'di dag ga las mchis// bcom ldan 'das kyis
9b7(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ skyes bu dam pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i mdzod de bkod pa chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de nas 'dir 'ongs te/ de nam mkha'i dkyil du
10a1(mdo sde): 'dug nas/ 'di lta bu'i me tog gi char rab tu bab bo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i mdzod byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bcu
10a2(mdo sde): po de dag dang lhan cig tu ram mkha'i dkyil de nas babs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
10a3(mdo sde): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che bkod pa gcig pa ni/ bcom ldan 'ang sa la gnod pa chung ngam/ nyam nga ba nyung ngam/ bskyod pa yang ngam/ stobs dang bde bar
10a4(mdo sde): reg pa la gnas sam zhes snyun gsol zhing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag bcu gnyis po 'dus pa chen po'i len
10a5(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs nyan 'tshal ba 'di dag ji ltar chos thams cad la dbang bgyid cing chos chen po dang ldan pas/ slar ldog par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi bka' mtshad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
10a6(mdo sde): mgu bar mdzod cig ces de skad kyang gsung ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i mdzod kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi seng ge'i khri'i steng gi bar snang la dpag tshad stong
10a7(mdo sde): phrag bcu tsam gyi rin po che'i gdugs su byin gyis brlabs nas/ bcom ldan 'das la thal mo sbyar te/ phyag 'tshal nas tshigs su cad pa dag gis mngon par bstod pa/ chos dang don dang /
10b1(mdo sde): yon tan ye shes 'phags pas na// yongs dag rnam dag snga nas dag cing dri ma med// gnas med nam mkha' 'dra bar mi g.yo rab tu bskyes// rab zab kun nas spyod yul min la phyag 'tshal lo//
10b2(mdo sde): rgyal ba chos kyi skus ni rab phye sku mnyam yang // gzugs mdzes ldan zhing gzugs bzang sku yang ston par mdzad// sems can rnams la phan pa'i thugs rje rab bskyed nas// bsod nams
10b3(mdo sde): brgya pa'i mtshan gyi sku yi mchog kyang ston// khyod ni mi gsung rtog med sgra dang tshig kyang med// tshig gis rang bzhin brag cha'i mtshan nyid gzung du med// sgra med rtag med yig med pa mkhyen nas kyang
10b4(mdo sde): byams pa khyod ni snying rje can pas rgyal ba'i chog kyang gsung // sems can kun gyi sems dang sems byung rjes su rig/ khyod ni sems kyi rang bzhin sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid mkhyen// sems
10b5(mdo sde): kyi rgyud kyi rang bzhin ci 'dra rab mkhyen kyang // sems dang yid rnams la ni khyod kyi sems mi gnas// 'gro ba rnams la khyod kyis spyod pa kun bstan te// bde bar gshegs pa'i sku ni 'gyur/
10b6(mdo sde): ba yang ma mchis// gang gi gzugs dang sems dang yon tan ci 'dra bar// mtshan dang spyod lam dag kyang de yi tshul du ston// bde gshegs chos 'di la ni nga yir 'dzin pa med// khyod ni chos
10b7(mdo sde): la gnas pa med cing 'dzin pa med// sems can mang po kun rtog chos kyis 'dul mkhyen nas// khyod ni bla na med pa'i chos rnams rtag tu stan// rgyal ba'i sku la 'khor 'di kur gyis
11a1(mdo sde): bsdus par// gzugs dang mtshan mthu dang skal ba mi mnyam gnas// khyod kyi spun mi 'gyur rtog med mtshan med de// 'khor rnams ji lta'i sems dang bsam bzhin
11a2(mdo sde): tshom par mdzad// chos 'di thams cad rgyu dang rkyen las skyes pa ste// byed med ngo bo nyid med kun tu rtog las skyes// bde gshegs de 'dra'i chos kyi tshul rnams mkhyen nas su// byang chub
11a3(mdo sde): mi 'gyur zhi ba bla na med pa bsnyes// mtha' dang de bzhin dbus bcad rnam par rtog pa med// stong zhing gsog la rang bzhin gsob ste ya ma brla// khyod kyis de 'dra'i chos nyid rnam dag mkhyen
11a4(mdo sde): nas su/ 'gro ba rnams la rgyu dang las dang byed pa ston// chos 'di sems can med cing srog dang gang zag med// nam mkha' mtshungs mnyam pas ni mang yang rnam par dag/ sems can
11a5(mdo sde): gan du nyer gshegs yang dag bdag med pa// mi 'chi 'dus ma byas la sems can mang sad mdzad// brtson 'grus mthu dang stobs kyis byang chub 'di tshol phyir// khyod kyis bskal pa
11a6(mdo sde): pas ma mas bye ba phrag brgyar bshad// sgrub pa med pa'i nin ta mtshan nyid byang chub ste// gang per spyong pa'i dar de rjes su thob par gyur// chos rnams mnyam pa nyid ni mnyam par banag
11a7(mdo sde): mkhyen pas// rab nga 'bring dang tham dag kyang mnyam par mkhyen// mnyam pa nyid la mnyam nyid rtog pazugs rnam mo rtog/ dpyor rgyal ba mnyam par bzhag cing mi 'gyur ba// phung /
11b1(mdo sde): po khabs dang dbang brda ltar sprum bzhir// 'jig rten gsum po chu thA 'dra ste 'pho ba med // sems can rnams rmi lam lta bur dngos med de/ mkhyen pas rmi lam bzhin du rtogs nas
11b2(mdo sde): chos 'di gsung // byang chub mchog rab brgya mi rang bzhin khyod kyis bams// de thob dang mthob pa zhes brjod du med// de ltar byang chub byed kyis de bzhin 'khor la yang // tshul dang du
11b3(mdo sde): min 'jug pa'i mtshan bral rab du bskor// brgal nas sems can mang po bsam yas rab sgrol ba// grol nas bcings pa'i nang na mchis pa shin tu 'grol// theg chen bla meng 'angal 'gro
11b4(mdo sde): dbugs 'byin cing // nges 'byin mnyam pa brnyes pa mya ngan 'das la 'god// gang na'ang sems can nam yang mya ngan 'das ma mchis// sems can gdod nas rnam dag sems can nyid mi
11b5(mdo sde): sgrub / sems can sgyu ma'i mtshan du byang chub sangs rgyas nas// 'di yi mtha' rnams sems can mang po rtogs par mdzad// nam mkha' la ni gzugs rnams nam yang mi sdang bzhin// de ltar 'gro
11b6(mdo sde): kun gyi gzugs ni gzugs nyid mtshungs// chos de gzugs dang gzugs med gzugs min mtshan nyid de// gang gis de ltar dor rnams yang dag dben rtogs pa// ji tsam rgyal ba'i bsngags pa dag gi
11b7(mdo sde): dper bgyis pa// de dag thams cad bsngags pa 'di la mthong chags te// rang gi yon tan rnams kyi 'dren bsngags nam mkha' 'dra// gnyis med bsngags brjod 'din rgyal ba'i bsngags pa'o
12a1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas 'gro bsad par mdzad cing dmigs med pa// sems med sems nyid brnyes pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// ji ltar 'dren pa kun gyis mi yi seng ge bsngags// de ltar du/
12a2(mdo sde): bzhin nyid phyir yang dag yon tan bsngags// sems can thams cad bdag med mtshan nyid ye shes mnyam// thams cad rtogs nas chos dbyings rjes su rig par bgyid// chos kun 'dod chags bral/
12a3(mdo sde): ba'i mtshan gyi tshul shes pa// des ni mnyam pa nyid kyis 'dren pa mchod par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i mdzod kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras ma thag tu/
12a4(mdo sde): nam mkha' la 'dug pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa bkod pa chen po de'ang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos so// bar snang las kyang gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba
12a5(mdo sde): khrag khrig brgya stong du yang dag par bsgrubs pa/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod kyis tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyang
12a6(mdo sde): kyis kun brjod do// byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni rmi lam na'ang mngon par zhen pas dmigs par lta ba mi 'byung ngo // gang dag tshigs su bcad pa'i chos kyi tshul 'di thos nas mos pa dang /
12a7(mdo sde): gang yang thos nas sgrub pa de dag ni/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod da ltar seng ge'i sgra sgrog pa bzhin du de dag kyang seng ge'i sgra sgrog par 'gyur ro zhes de lta bu'i sgra byung
12b1(mdo sde): danas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang
12b2(mdo sde): 'dus pa chen po'i le'u chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming thos nas/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / chos kyi
12b3(mdo sde): rnam grangs 'di la'ang chos snang bar bgyi ba gang cung zad bstan pa'i slad du 'dir mchis so// bcom ldan 'das gang skyes bu dam pa 'di dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la rang rang gi chos la the tsom
12b4(mdo sde): du gyur pa nges par bstan pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa la yongs su zhu ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa nges pa'i blo la rab tu gnas pas de dag gi the tsom thams cad kyang rab tu bsal
12b5(mdo sde): cing sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad snang bar bgyis pa de legs so// bcom ldan 'das gal te de bzhin gshegs pas bdag la skabs phye na// chos rnam par nges pa la 'jug pa'i bka'
12b6(mdo sde): mchid cung zad cig bdag zhu'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das ni mi chags pa'i ye shes can te/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang / mchog ma lags pa mkhyen pa/
12b7(mdo sde): ye shes la mkhas pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni snang ba brnyes pa ste/ mun pa thams cad dang bral ba/ bcom ldan 'das ni don mkhyen pa ste/ tshigs thams cad rab tu dbye ba'i ye shes la mkhas pa/
13a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ni dus mkhyen pa ste/ tshong las mi 'da' zhing phyed par lung ston pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni tshong mkhyen pa ste/ sems can thams cad la so so ci rigs/
13a2(mdo sde): par chos ston pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni rnams par rol pa ste/ mngon par shes pa dang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnam par nges pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni shin tu rnam par
13a3(mdo sde): gzigs pa'i blo dang ldan pa ste/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa phyag mthil du 'jog par kun ston pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni mngon par 'phags pa ste/ spyi gtsug bltar
13a4(mdo sde): mi mthong ba/ bcom ldan 'das ni zil gyis ma non pa ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na dpa' bo gcig po// bcom ldan 'das ni rang byung ba ste/ slob dpon med par
13a5(mdo sde): chos thams cad rang gis mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni 'dren pa ste/ 'dren pa med pa dang lam ngan par zhugs pa rnams la yang dag pa'i lam ston pa/ bcom ldan
13a6(mdo sde): 'das ni sman pa'i rgyal po lnga/ thog ma dang tha ma ma mchis pa'i 'dod pa ste/ nyon mongs pa dang / kun tu sgrib pa dang / shin tu sgrib pa dang / kun nas ldang bas bsgribs pa'i 'jig rten gnas pa
13a7(mdo sde): rnams nang ma mchis pa/ 'chi ba ma mchis pa'i gnas kyi lam la rab tu 'god pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni stobs dang drag shul 'chang ba ste/ gnas dang gnas ma yin pa mkhyen pa la mkhas shing gsum/
13b1(mdo sde): rig pa'i rig pa brnyas pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni mi 'jigs pa chen po brnyes pa ste/ zag pa zang cing mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas ste/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang
13b2(mdo sde): ba mkhyen pa la mkhas pa/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mdun du khyu mchog seng ge'i sgra sgrog pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang ldan pa ste/ dus gsum la thogs pa
13b3(mdo sde): med pa'i ye shes can/ bcom ldan 'das ni sku dang / gsung dang / thugs yongs su dag pa ste/ 'khrul pa dang ca co ma mnga' ba/ snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes
13b4(mdo sde): gzigs pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni byams pa chen po la gnas pa ste/ zhe 'gras pa med pa'i blo dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa/ nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i 'od zer
13b5(mdo sde): gyis gzigs pa'i spyan dang ldan pa/ bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po la gnas pa ste/ legs par byas pa dang / nyes par byas pa dang / bde ba dang sdug bsngal bas mi bskyod pa dang / lag
13b6(mdo sde): sems can thams cad mnyam par 'jug pa'i blo dang ldan pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa ste/ mnyam pa'i ye shes gnyis su med pa la zhugs pa/ bcom ldan
13b7(mdo sde): 'das ni bye brag med pa ste/ nam mkha' lta bur shin tu rnam par dag cing / sems can thams cad la mnyam par sbyor ba/ bcom ldan 'das ni 'dod pa med pa ste/ shes rab kyis ngoms pa
14a1(mdo sde): rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshogs su bcad pa dang bral ba/ bcom ldan 'das ni thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs pa/ spyan lnga'i tshul yongs su dag pa'o// bcom/
14a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan dang / chos dang / ye shes tshad ma mchis pa dang ldan par bdag gis rig nas chos rab tu brjod pa'i sgo yongs su zhu bar 'tshal te/ gus pa dang bcas
14a3(mdo sde): shing chos la gces spras su bgyi ba dang ldan pa ste/ nga rgyal ma mchis shing sems can thams cad chos la sbyor ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par bsgrubs pas chos 'tshal ba'i slad du
14a4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa la yongs su zhu'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i mdzod la 'di skad
14a5(mdo sde): ces bka' stsal to// legs so legs so// skyes bu dam pa ji ltar khyod gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la dris pa rnams lung bstan pa thob pa/ rigs kyi/
14a6(mdo sde): bu khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa de bzhin gshegs pa la dris shig dang / dris pa de dang de nyid lung bstan pas ngas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
14a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po yon tan gyi rgyal po rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba 'khor der 'dus par gyur te/ 'dug pa des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i mdzod la 'di skad ces smras
14b1(mdo sde): so// ci zhig gi phyir rigs kyi bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la zhu bar 'dod/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i mdzod kyis/ byang chub sems
14b2(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po yon tan gyi rgyal po rab tu snang ba la tshigs su bcad pas smras pa/ gang rnams sems dang sems la sems yid mtshungs// shin tu bsams sems ye shes
14b3(mdo sde): mnyam la gnas// sems la sems med par ni zhugs pa'i tshul// de dag don du rgyal la bdag zhu'o// snang ba thob cing mun pa dri ma med// yid gnyis can gyi yid gnyis blo bcod pas// nges
14b4(mdo sde): byas rnam par thar pa lag bzhag pa// de dag ched du bde bar gshegs la zhu// bdag la bdag med shin tu rnam dag yid// sems can don zhugs sems can med la dga'// sems can
14b5(mdo sde): bdag med gnyis las thar byed pa// rnam par nges pa'i chos kyi gtam 'dri'o// cho ga spyod pa brdul zhugs yongs su dag/ bsam pa dag cing sems ni nam mkha' 'dra// lhun po lta bur brtan
14b6(mdo sde): zhing mi gsopa// de dag ched du yon tan mdzad la Ta// blo grogs brtan pa brtson 'grus kun nas bzang // dpa' ba bdud kyi dgra ming rgyal bcom// nyon mongs rab tu tshon mongs ni sbyong ba
14b7(mdo sde): mthong dga'adi dag don du 'bi'u'o// thos sbyin tshul khrims bzod pa brtson 'grus dga'o// bsam gtan rnam thar shes rab mchog tu gyur// mngon shes pasam gtan rnam par grol bar/
15a1(mdo sde): 'o rab dag dri med don du bdag zhu'o// stong pa mtshan ma med cing mi smon gnas// bsams bzhin shi bo dang ni skye ba ston// skyes pa med cing mi gnas 'chi 'pho med//
15a2(mdo sde): dag don du mi yi spyod pa zhu// nyan thos rang rgyal skye bo gzhan dag gis// rtogs par bka' zhing zab mo mthong bka' ba// skye bo kun gyi yid rnams bskul ba yi// chos kyi gtam ni bde bar gshegs la nu/
15a3(mdo sde): legs par byas pa rdzogs pa'i chos la dga'// chos la chos med 'dzin pa gnyis las 'grol// rtag tu mnyam bzhag mchog gi chos la dga'// sems kyang nam mkha' mtshungs pa'i don du zhu//
15a4(mdo sde): gang dag sangs rgyas rigs gnas chos la dga'// rtag tu sangs rgyas bstod pa kun med blo// grags pa mtha' yas 'jig rten gsum du thos// yon tan rgya mtsho de phyir 'di zhu'o// de nas bcom ldan
15a5(mdo sde): 'das la// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dag sbyin pa nam mkha'
15a6(mdo sde): dang mtshungs pa rnams lags/ tshul khrims nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dang / bzod pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dang / brtson 'grus nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dang / bsamo gtan nam ma
15a7(mdo sde): dang mtshungs pa dang / shes rab nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dang / bsod nams nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa dang / ye shes nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa rnams lags/ sangs rgyas kyis
15b1(mdo sde): gnang ba'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang mi 'bral ba rnams lags
15b2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i lha rjes su dran pa dang mi 'bral ba rnams lags/ mya ngan las 'das pa dang mnyam pa thob cing byang chub sems spyod pa'ang spyod de/ sems can thams cad kyis
15b3(mdo sde): spyod pa'i mtshan nyid dang chog shes pa rnams lags/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos dkon mchog gi mdzod 'dzin pa dang / mtshan nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyi chos gang de bzhin gshegs pa
15b4(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i mtshan nyid kyi ngo bo nyid de'i chos thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa dang / thog ma nas sems can rnam par dag pas/ sems can thams cad yongs su smin par
15b5(mdo sde): bgyid pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bsgrub pa'i slad du/ mtshul bzhin du'ang rab tu sbyor ba rnams lags/ mngon par shes pa las ma nyams shing chos thams cad
15b6(mdo sde): la dbang bgyid pa rnams lags/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis shin tu rtogs par dka' ba'i chos kyi tshul zab mo la zhugs pa rnams lags/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung
15b7(mdo sde): ba la 'jug pa'i shes pa la mkhas te/ mtha' gnyis su lta ba thams cad dang bral ba rnams lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab pas de bzhin nyid dbyer med pa shes pa la
16a1(mdo sde): mkhas pa rnams lags// chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul la rab tu zhugs shing chos kyi dbyings thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba rnams lags/ bsam pa rdo rje ltar
16a2(mdo sde): sra zhing mi phyed de theg pa chen po 'di la legs par gnas shing mi g.yo ba rnams lags/ sangs rgyas kyi yul rjes su thob cing rang gi yul yongs su dag pa rnams lags/ gzungs thob pa
16a3(mdo sde): rtag tu mi brjed par spyod pa rnams lags/ spobs pa thogs pa med cing rgyun mi 'chad la rtag tu sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa rnams lags// skye ba dang / 'chi 'pho
16a4(mdo sde): ba dang / 'byung ba rnams la dbang thob pa rnams lags/ bdud bzhi'i lam las yang dag par 'das shing / bdud dang phyir rgol ba thams cad bcom pa rnams lags/ bsod nams kyi
16a5(mdo sde): tshogs tshad med pa bsags shing sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur pa rnams lags/ sangs rgyas rnams ma byung yang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pas sems can rnams la nye bar gnas
16a6(mdo sde): pa rnams lags/ rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin thob cing / sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa la mi chags pa rnams lags/ chags pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das
16a7(mdo sde): pa dang / nam mkha' la rlung mar lta bu'i sems dang ldan pa rnams lags// chos dang spyod pa'i tshul shes pa dang mun pa dang bral zhing snang ba thob pa rnams lags/ gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog cing
16b1(mdo sde): rang byung gi sa shes shin du rtogs pa rnams lags/ myur du theg pa chen po la thams cad ma byed pa'i ye shes 'di thob par 'gyur lags/ dasad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/
16b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i mdzad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// skyes bu dam pa khyod legs so legs so// skyes bu chen po khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di dri
16b3(mdo sde): bar sems pa legs so// 'di lta ste/ khyod ni sems can thams cad kyis gsol ba ma btab pa'i bshes gnyen/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la snang ba thob pa/ byams pa chen po dang snying rje
16b4(mdo sde): chen po'i go cha bgos pa/ bgrang ba las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas la bsnyen bkur byas pa/ rtag tu chos tshol bas mi ngoms pa ye shes kyi mtshon cha can/ nga rgyal gyi rnam pa thams cad las yang
16b5(mdo sde): dag par 'das pa/ rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sems can gyi don la brtson pa/ 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad las yang dag par 'das pa/ nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i sems kyis thams cad
16b6(mdo sde): mkhyen pa'i ye shes yang dag par sgrub pa ste/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyi yon tan rnams kyi mtha' rtogs par sla ba ma yin no// de'i phyir rigs kyi bu khyod legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung
16b7(mdo sde): zhig dang / ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yon tan rnams dang gzhan dag kyang thob par 'gyur ba bshad do// bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsol nas/
17a1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i mdzod bcom ldan 'das kyi lhar nyan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu chos bzhi dang
17a2(mdo sde): ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag rnam par dag pas sems can rnam par dag pa la 'jug pa dang / sems
17a3(mdo sde): can rnam par dag pas sbyin pa rnam par dag pa la 'jug pa dang / sbyin pa rnam par dag pas bsngo ba rnam par dag pa la 'jug pa dang / bsngo ba rnam par dag pas/ byang chub rnam par dag pa la
17a4(mdo sde): 'jug pa ste/ rigs kyi bu chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin no// des rnam par dag pa brgyad kyi sgo nas sbyin pa de sbyin te/ brgyad
17a5(mdo sde): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ngar 'dzin pa rnam par dag par sbyin pa de sbyin/ nga yir 'dzin po rnam par dag par sbyin pa de sbyin/ rgyu rnam par dag par sbyin pa de sbyin/ lta ba rnam par dag par sbyin pa de
17a6(mdo sde): sbyin/ mtshan ma rnam par dag par sbyin pa de sbyin/ tha dad pa rnam par dag par sbyin pa de sbyin/ rnam par smin pa la mi re ba rnam par dag par sbyin pa de sbyin/ nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i
17a7(mdo sde): sems rnam par dag par sbyin pa de sbyin/ rnam par dag pa brgyad po 'di dag gi sgo nas sbyin pa de sbyin no// ji ltar nam mkha' mtha' med pa de bzhin du sems mtha' med par byas te/ sbyin pa
17b1(mdo sde): de sbyin ji ltar nam mkha' rgya che zhing bsgribs pa med pa de bzhin du/ byang chub tu bsngos te sbyin pa de sbyin/ ji ltar nam mkha' la gzugs med pa de bzhin du/ gzugs thams cad la mi
17b2(mdo sde): gnas par sbyin pa de sbyin/ ji ltar nam mkha' la tsher ba med pa de bzhin du tshor ba thams cad dang bral bar sbyin pa de sbyin/ ji ltar nam mkha' la 'du shes med de bzhin du/ 'du shes tham
17b3(mdo sde): cad kyi 'dud pa med par sbyin pa de sbyin/ ji ltar nam mkha' 'dus ma byas pa de bzhin du/ 'dus byas thams can med par sbyin pa de sbyin/ ji ltar nam mkha' mtshan nyid rnam par rig pa
17b4(mdo sde): med pa de bzhin du/ rnam par shes pa mi gnas par sbyin pa de sbyin/ ji ltar nam mkhas sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad khyab pa de bzhin du/ sems can la byams pas khyab par sbyin pa de
17b5(mdo sde): sbyin/ ji ltar nam mkha' mi zad pa de bzhin du/ dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mi zad par bsngo zhong sbyin pa de sbyin/ ji ltar nam mkha' la mun pa med pa de bzhin du/ nyon mongs pa thams cad
17b6(mdo sde): kyi mun pa med par sbyin pa de sbyin/ ji ltar nam mkha' rtag par rab tu snang ba de bzhin du/ sems kyi rang bzhin yongs su dag par sbyin pa de sbyin/ ji ltar nam mkha' sems can thams cad
17b7(mdo sde): kyi go skabs 'byed po de bzhin du/ sems can thams cad nye bar che bar sbyin pa de sbyin/ ji ltar nam mkha' la nga'i ba med pa de bzhin du/ sems can thams cad yid la byed pa thams cad
18a1(mdo sde): dang bral bar sbyin pa de sbyin/ ji ltar sprul pas sprul pa la sbyin pa de sbyin pa lta bur rnam par mi rtog cing / lhun gyis 'grub ste/ sems dang / yid dang / rnam par
18a2(mdo sde): shes pa dang bral zhing chos thams cad la re ba med pa de ltar gnyis dang bral ba'i phyir/ sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid kyi ngo bo nyid rnam par dag par byang chub sems dpas sbyin pa de sbyin te/ rigs kyi
18a3(mdo sde): bu gang de lta bur sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba de ni shes rab kyis ni sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad yongs su 'dor zhing / thabs kyi ye shes kyis ni sems can thams cad mi
18a4(mdo sde): gtong ba ste/ rigs kyi bu de lta bur gtong ba'i sems ni// byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na
18a5(mdo sde): mar me zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' gang dag
18a6(mdo sde): gi sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba 'di 'dra ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang de dag rnam pa med pa ste/ rnam pa
18a7(mdo sde): rnam par dag pa sems can gyi rnam pa ste/ sems can rnam par dag pa chos kyi rnam pa ste/ chos rnam par dag pa ye shes kyi rnam pa ste/ ye shes rnam par dag pa shes rab kyi rnam pa
18b1(mdo sde): ste/ shes rab rnam par dag pa sems kyi rnam pa ste/ sems rnam par dag pa 'jig rten gyi rnam pa ste/ 'jig rten rnam par dag pa/ gzugs med pa gzugs su ston pa dang / ma ston pa'i sa
18b2(mdo sde): shes rnam par dag pa/ mun pa med cing mun pa rab tu sdang bar byed pa/ mtshan ma thams cad rnam par bshig pas mtshan ma med pa'i mthar gyur pa/ mthar phyin pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa
18b3(mdo sde): mi zad pa'i bzod pa dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyis mkhyen pa'i lung bstan pa thob/ mtshams bcad cing byang chub sems dpa'i nges par gyur pa la zhugs pa/ phyir mi
18b4(mdo sde): ldog pa'i phyag rgyas btab cing dbang bskur ba thob pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la yang dag par zhugs shing mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam par spyod pa/ legs par spyod pa la spyad pa/
18b5(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid dang cho ga shes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gi spyod yul te/ skyes bu dam pa de dang de dag ni de lta bu'i sbyin pa sbyin par
18b6(mdo sde): byed do// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' khri drug stong nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i sbyin pa la bzod pa skyes so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i
18b7(mdo sde): tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// dag pa'i sems kyis rtag tu sbyin pa byin// byang chub byor te rnam smin yang mi 'dod// dga' zhing mgu nas rjes su gdung med de// rab tu
19a1(mdo sde): grol nas rtag tu sbyin pa byin// mkhas pas chos rnams sku 'drar shes nas su// lus dang srog la'ang chags par mi 'gyur zhing // de dag la ni nams kyang 'dzin pa/
19a2(mdo sde): med/ de ltar de dag bsam pa byang chub nges// thams cad btang yang mi dgar mi 'gyur zhing // de la zhum pa med de gong ba med// de yis nam mkha' mtshungs par chos rnams bsgoms//
19a3(mdo sde): de bas dga' bar mi 'gyur zhum pa'ang med// bdag gi rang bzhin snga nas rnam par dag/ byang chub rnam par dag pas sbyin pa sbyin// de ni sems kyi rgyud la mi chags par// spros pa med
19a4(mdo sde): par sbyin pa rab tu sbyin// sems mnyam nyid kyang mnyam pas kun tu sbyin pa gtong // rab 'bring tha ma gsum yang med par sbyin// bsam pa yongs dag dri ma med pa yis// thams cad/
19a5(mdo sde): gtong yang rnam por smin mi 'dod// lus dang tshe ni mi rtag sgyu ma 'dra// longs spyod rmi lam glog bzhin snying po med// 'jig rten kun la snying rje brtse bskyed nas// 'jig rten chos
19a6(mdo sde): kyis ma gos sbyin pa sbyin// nyon mongs dag phyir bdag gi nor kun gtong // rgyal po'i tshig gi gnas su 'gyur snyam ste// bdud rnams kyis kyang bdag la glags mi rnyed// de ltar
19a7(mdo sde): brtags nas thams cad gtong ba yin// stobs bcus sbyin pa rtsa ba yin zhes gsungs// de la rab tu gnas dang tshul khrims ldan// tshul khrims yon tan gnas nas bsam
19b1(mdo sde): gtan rnyed// bsam gtan ma chags shes rab rdzogs par byed// sbyin pa dang ni dul bas sems rab tshim// nyon mongs rnams kyang tshig nas phyir mi skye// sbyin pa bdag dang gzhan/
19b2(mdo sde): la phan pa gsungs// phan dang bde ba 'dus byas sbyin pas mgu/ sbyin gtong nyon mongs spangs shing dge ba'i phyir// de na 'dzin pa la ni chags mi 'gyur// pha rol nyon mongs phyir ni
19b3(mdo sde): mi gtong ste// bdag blo rnam dag byang chub phyir gtong ngo // ji lta ji ltar ma zhum sems kyis gtong // de ltar ngas ni byang chub yon tan mthong // ji lta ji ltar byang chub yon tan mthong /
19b4(mdo sde): de lta de ltar sems can brgya tshim byed// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod la bka' stsal pa/
19b5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs brnyan lta bu'i
19b6(mdo sde): lus mnyam pa nyid de dang / brag cha lta bu'i sgra mnyam pa nyid dang / sgyu ma lta bu'i sems mnyam pa nyid dang / nam mkha' lta bu'i blo mnyam pa nyid de/ rigs kyi bu chos bzhi po de dag dang /
19b7(mdo sde): ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu brgyad po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi tshul khrims yongs su dag pa ste/
20a1(mdo sde): brgya dag pa den/ 'di lta ste/ sems rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'dral ba dang / tshad mar gyur pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ nyan thos dang rang sangs/
20a2(mdo sde): rgyas kyi sems med pa dang / dam bcas pa rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ bslab pa thams cad mi 'dor ba dang / smon lam yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ skye ba thams cad du mi 'jug pa dang / mngon
20a3(mdo sde): par 'du mi byed pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir mi lhod pa dang / mtshan ma yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ byang chub tu bsngo ba dang / nyon mongs pa yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ kun nas gdung ba med pa dang /
20a4(mdo sde): byang chub yongs su dag pa'i phyir/ smon lam yongs su rdzogs pa ste/ rigs kyi bu brgyad po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims yongs su dag pa'o// gzhan yang tshul khrims
20a5(mdo sde): yongs su dag pa ni nam mkha' dag pa ste/ tshul khrims de'ang dag pa'o// nam mkha' dri ma med pa ste/ tshul khrims de'ang dri ma med pa'o// nam mkha' zhi ba ste/ tshul khrims de'ang zhi ba
20a6(mdo sde): nam mkha' mi mtho ba ste/ tshul khrims de'ang mi mtho ba'o// nam mkha' mi dma' ba ste/ tshul khrims de'ang mi dma' ba'o// nam mkha' gzung du med pa ste/ tshul khrims de'ang gzung
20a7(mdo sde): du med pa'o// nam mkha' gnas med pa ste/ tshul khrims de'ang gnas med pa'o// nam mkha' med pa med ma yin te/ tshul khrims de'ang med pa ma yin pa'o// nam mkha' rtag pa ste/
20b1(mdo sde): tshul khrims de'ang rtag pa'o// nam mkha' mi zad pa ste/ tshul khrims de'ang mi zad pa'o// nam mkha' mtshan ma med pa ste/ tshul khrims de'ang mtshan ma med pa'o// nam mkha' rtsub
20b2(mdo sde): med pa ste/ tshul khrims de'ang rgyu ba med pa'o// nam mkha' spros pa med pa ste/ tshul khrims de'ang spros pa med pa'o// nam mkha' zag pa med pa ste/ tshul khrims de'ang zag pa
20b3(mdo sde): med pa'o// nam mkha' 'dus ma byas pa ste/ tshul khrims de'ang 'dus ma byas pa'o// nam mkha' mi 'gyur ba ste/ tshul khrims de'ang mi 'gyur ba'o// nam mkha' rnam par mi rtog
20b4(mdo sde): pa ste/ tshul khrims de'ang rnam par mi rtog pa'o// nam mkha' thams cad du song ba ste/ tshul khrims de'ang thams cad du song ba'o// nam mkha' mi chod mi phyed pa ste/ tshul khrims
20b5(mdo sde): de'ang mi chod mi phyed pa'o// nam mkha' mtshungs par sbyor ba ste/ tshul khrims de'ang mtshungs par sbyor ba'o// nam mkha' rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa can ma yin pa ste/
20b6(mdo sde): tshul khrims de'ang rang bzhin gyis kun ras nyon mongs po can ma yin pa'o// rigs kyi de ltar gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin no//
20b7(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces gsungs so// sems zhi tshul khrims dri med srung zhing gdung ba med// lus dang sems kyang
21a1(mdo sde): rnam dag ngag yid thams cad bsdams// mkhas pa rtag tu nang ni tshul khrims dregs mi snyems// blo 'chang sems la mi gnas byang chub sems la rton// las gang ma byas/
21a2(mdo sde): ma bsams de bzhin ma brtags te// de ni dmar sngo ser min kha dog gzugs mi gnas// gzung med mi bden mi g.yo dben pa nam mkha' bzhin// tshul khrims lta ba gnas med mkhas pa kun
21a3(mdo sde): gyis bsngags// tshul khrims de ni rab zhi zhi byed nyon mongs ni// zhi gnas lhag mthong dag gi mthar phyin mthar ston pa// gang su bcings las grol ba de dag tshul khrims bsnyen// de bas
21a4(mdo sde): tshul khrims thar byed byang chub rtsa ba'i gzhi// gang su sbyangs pa dgon gnas 'dod nyung chog shes pa// yo byad bsrungs shing bsam gtan dben tshogs sems sbyangs pa// tshul khrims
21a5(mdo sde): de yi gnas nges sems rkang thar pa'i rten// de phyir tshul khrims brgyan pa lam bde thams cad sgrub// g.yo ba rlom sems kun bral lta ba'i nyon mongs gcod// nam mkha' mtshungs mnyam byams
21a6(mdo sde): pas khyab cing mthar 'dzin skyong // byang chub phyir nges mi gtong byang chub kun mi rtog/ gang mkhas chog shes de 'dra tshul khrims pha rol phyin// bam po
21a7(mdo sde): gnyis po// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu chos bani dang ldan na// byang chub sems dpa' bzod
21b1(mdo sde): kha nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ tshig nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i phyir/ gshe yang slar mi ga she ba dang / lus nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i phyir brdegs
21b2(mdo sde): kyang sar mi rdeg pa dang / sems nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i phyir/ smyos kyang slar mi spyo ba dang / bsam pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i phyir/ khros kyang slar mi khro ba ste/ rigs kyi bu
21b3(mdo sde): chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na// byang chub sems dpa' bzod po nam mkha' ding mtshungs po yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa
21b4(mdo sde): yongs su dag pa 'di brgyad de/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nam mkha' la zhe 'gras pa med de/ sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa med pa'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang / nam
21b5(mdo sde): mkha' la rjes su chags pa med de/ rnyed pa dang bkur sti la rjes su chags pa med pa'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang / nam mkha' ni mnyam par sbyor ba ste/ sems can thams cad la
21b6(mdo sde): sems mnyam pa'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang / nam mkha' nem snang ma nyams pa ste/ lus dang sems zad pas nyams pa med pa'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang / nam mkha' ni
21b7(mdo sde): bag la nyal thams cad spangs pa ste/ bag la nyal med pa'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang / nam mkha' ni yid dang dmigs pa med pa ste/ yid dang dmigs pa med pa'i bzod pa yongs
22a1(mdo sde): su dag pa dang / nam mkha' ni ma skyes ma byung ba ste/ ma skyes ma byung ba'i bzod pa can gyi bzod pa yongs su dag pa dang / nam mkha' ni gzugs dang / gzugs med pa
22a2(mdo sde): thams cad la khyab pa ste/ byams pas khyab pa'i bzod pa yongs su dag pa'o// rigs kyi bu brgyad po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa yongs su dag pa nam mkha' dang
22a3(mdo sde): mtshungs pa'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos la nges par rtog pa'i bzod pa ni 'di brgyad de/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid la bzod
22a4(mdo sde): kyang lta ba gzhig pa'i phyir ma yin pa dang / mtshan ma med pa la bzod kyang mtshan ma sel ba ma yin pa dang / smon pa med pa la bzod kyang / byang chub tu smon pa med pa med pa ma yin pa dang /
22a5(mdo sde): mngon par 'du mi byed pa la bzod kyang / 'dus byas rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir ma yin pa dang / skye ba med pa la bzod kyang / 'dus ma byas kyi mtshan nyid kyis ma yin pa dang / 'byung ba med
22a6(mdo sde): pa la bzod kyang / skye ba dang gnas pas ma yin pa dang / sems can med pa la bzod kyang / dngos po rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir ma yin pa dang / ji lta ba bzhin du bzod kyang dus rnam par
22a7(mdo sde): gzhig pa'i phyir ma yin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu brgyad po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos la nges par rtog pa'i bzod pa'o// bzod pa zhes bya ba ni 'di dag/ bdag la ga she'ang
22b1(mdo sde): babadang rnam pa dang yir 'dzin pa'i bzod pa// 'do nam ma pa 'dang madrangs pa 'thod pa ma yin no/ 'di ngag ma shi bdag mis bzod par byar mam pa de ning 'dzin pa'i bzod pa/
22b2(mdo sde): demi rnam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i bzod pa ma yin no// 'di dag ni mi ge skor ba'o snyam pa de ni skra dang sad kyi bzod pa ste// de ni rnam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i bzod pa ma yin no// 'di 'ang stong pa
22b3(mdo sde): bdag kyang stong pa'o snyam pa de ni yid la byed pa sbyor ba'i bzod pa ste/ de ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i bzod pa ma yin no// bdag gis bzod pa bya'o snyam pa de ni rnam par rig pa'i bzod pa ste/
22b4(mdo sde): de ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i bzod pa ma yin no// 'di lta ste/ dper na shing sA la chen po rig la yod par la la zhig 'ongs te/ shing sA la bcang na/ de la shing sAl
22b5(mdo sde): bcad pa'i lhag ma rnams 'di snyam du 'di dag ni bcad do// bdag ni ma bcad do snyam du mi sems te/ de dag la rjes su chags pa'ang med/ khong khro ba'ang med de/ mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog
22b6(mdo sde): yongs su mi rtog pa de bzhin du/ gang bzod pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i bzod pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yongs su dag pa'i mchog go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i
22b7(mdo sde): tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// zad pa shes pa bzod pa mi zad gtsang // yid ni yul la ma chags shin tu bsgoms// phyi nang shin tu rnam dag mi gnas pa/ nam mkha' mdzu/
23a1(mdo sde): mnyam sems mchog bzod pa'o// lus 'di gzugs brnyan rtsi shing rtsig pa 'dra// sems kyang gzugs med mi snang sgyu ma 'dra// chos 'di lta ba'i gnas med nam mkha'/
23a2(mdo sde): bzhin// lus kyang mi 'gyur yid la khro ba med// bkur sti byed la dga' dang zhe dang med// mtho dang dma' bar rnam par rtog pa med// theg pa gang 'dra sa ltar sbyor ba de// sems can dag pa
23a3(mdo sde): bstan 'dir bzod smra yin// srog med gang zag bdag med sems can med// chos 'di thams cad stong par gang bzod cing // rgyu dang rkyen dang byed dang 'gal mi byed// de ni bstan 'dir bzod
23a4(mdo sde): mchog yang dag nyid// kha ngan zer ba'i tshig zos mi gshe zhing // byed pa med pa nam mkha'i sprin sgra bzhin// bdag rnam bsal yid stong pa'i mchog mthong ngo de// bstan 'dir sems can
23a5(mdo sde): gtsang ma bzod smra yin// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa'
23a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la rtsom yang chos thams cad yongs su ma grub par rab tu shes
23a7(mdo sde): pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod pa dang / rim gro bya ba mngon par 'du byed kyang / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams chos kyi sku mnyam par yang dag par rjes su mthong ba dang
23b1(mdo sde): sems can yongs su smin par byed kyang / sems can rnam par dag pas sems can mi dmigs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin kyang / 'dod chags dang /
23b2(mdo sde): bral bar bya ba'i chos yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba ste/ rigs kyi bu chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa
23b3(mdo sde): yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus yongs su dag pa 'di brgyad de/ brgyad gang zhe na/ brtson 'grus gang gis lus brgyan pa'i lus de gzugs brnyan
23b4(mdo sde): lta bur rig pas mi dmigs pa dang / brtson 'grus gang gis tshig mngon par 'du byed pa'i tshig de ya ma brlar rnam par brtags te mi dmigs pa dang / brtson 'grus gang gis sems
23b5(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin gyi gnas su 'jog pa'i sems kyi chos nyid kyis rnam par brtags te mi dmigs pa dang / brtson 'grus gang gis pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyogs thams cad rab tu sdud par byed
23b6(mdo sde): kyang de gcig nas gcig tu sems zad pa'i chos nyid kyis shin tu brtags te mi dmigs pa dang / brtson 'grus gang gis byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad yang dag par sgrub kyang
23b7(mdo sde): byang chub de dngos po'i mtshan nyid du rnam par brtags te yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba dang / brtson 'grus gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong bar byed pa'i zhing de'ang nam mkha'
24a1(mdo sde): dang mtshungs pas rnam par brtags te mi dmigs pa dang / brtson 'grus gang gis thos pa thams cad 'dzin par byed pa de sgra brag cha dang mtshungs par yang dag par rjes
24a2(mdo sde): su mi mthong ba dang / brtson 'grus gang gis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rab tu sgrub pa de'ang chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa'i mtshan nyid du rnam par brtags nas mi dmigs pa ste/
24a3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu brgyad po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus yongs su dag pa'o// rigs kyi bu 'di gnyis ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus te/ gnyis
24a4(mdo sde): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus dang / yongs su chad pa'i brtson 'grus so// de la sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus ni/ lus dang / ngag dang / sems dang rab tu ldan pa'o//
24a5(mdo sde): yongs su chad pa'i brtson 'grus ni len pa meng po/ 'dor ba med pa/ gnas pa med pa ste/ nam byang chub sems dpa' lus dang / ngag dang / sems sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus rtsa ba nas mi
24a6(mdo sde): gnas par shin tu brtags nas/ mi dmigs shing yongs su chad pa'i brtson 'grus ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rjes su 'jug pas rjes su 'gro ba ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus
24a7(mdo sde): nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin no// ji ltar nam mkha' gzugs med cing sems can thams cad rab tu rgyu ba de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus de'ang chos thams cad
24b1(mdo sde): la mi gnas shing sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed do// ji ltar nam mkha' gzugs thams cad la go skabs 'byed cing bla gab med pa de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams
24b2(mdo sde): kyi brtson 'grus de'ang sems can thams cad la go skabs 'byed cing lta ba thams cad dang bral ba'o// ji ltar nam mkha' las rtswa dang / nags tshal dang / lo tog skye'ang rtsa ba med cing
24b3(mdo sde): gnas med pa de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus de'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad skyed kyang 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rtsa ba la gnas pa med do// ji ltar nam
24b4(mdo sde): mkha' thams cad du song yang 'pho ba'i mtshan nyid ma yin pa de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus de'ang dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi rjes su song yang 'pho ba'i mtshan nyid ma yin/
24b5(mdo sde): no// ji ltar nam mkha' mtshungs par sbyor zhing / gzugs tha dad par ston pa de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus de'ang sems can thams cad la chos thams
24b6(mdo sde): cad mtshungs par sbyor zhing spyod pa sna tshogs kun tu ston to// nam byang chub sems dpa' gang kun tu sgrub par byed pa de mnyam pa nyid pas yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhi gang la rtsom pa
24b7(mdo sde): de'ang rnam par brtogs na mi dmigs te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshig
25a1(mdo sde): su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// brtson 'grus ngag gi stobs kyis mthu bskyed nas// lus dang srog la'ang 'phangs par mi byed cing // bdag nyid chen po byang chub spyad
25a2(mdo sde): pa spyod// sems can phan pa'i don byed pa na sems pa// sngon gyi srid par 'dus byas ji srid pa// byang chub yon tan phyir ni de srid 'khor// de dag skyo bar 'gyur ba'ang yong med de// phyi phyir/
25a3(mdo sde): brtson 'grus dag ni rab tu skyed// sems can bsam mi khyab pa 'grol bar brtson// sangs rgyas bsam mi khyab pa mchod par brtson// zhing rnams bsam gyis mi khyab blta bar brtson//
25a4(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab bdud rnams gdul bar brtson// sbyin pa bsam gyis mi khyab gtong bar brtson// tshul khrims bsam gyis mi khyab bsgom par brtson// bzod pa bsam gyis mi khyab bsgom
25a5(mdo sde): par brtson// brtson 'grus bsam gyis mi khyab dge bar brtson// bsam gtan bsam gyis mi khyab sems par brtson// shes rab bsam gyis mi khyab bsgom par brtson// byams pa
25a6(mdo sde): bsam gyis mi khyab bsgom par brtson// don dang yon tan sgrub par rab tu brtson// srog dang lus kyang mi 'phangs brtson par byed// nyon mongs thab kun las rnam par grol// stong pa nam
25a7(mdo sde): thar bdag med mngon par brtson// bdag la bdag med che bo'i bdag nyid brtson// lta bas rnam grol byang chub phyir yang spyod// sgyu ma smig rgyu'i ngo bo nyid du brtson// sems med sems kyang
25b1(mdo sde): sems ma yin pa thob// g.yo ba med pa'i chos rnams ston par brtson// 'gro ba kun tu spyod cing rnam par grol// bshad cing klog pa la ni rab tu brtson// chos dang chos min gnyis las
25b2(mdo sde): shin tu 'das// sgra dang yi ge'i ngo bo nyid la brtson// 'gro ba rnams la mdo sde stong rnams smra// sangs rgyas yon tan rnams ni mtha' yang med// sems can spyod pa rnams la'ang mtha'
25b3(mdo sde): med de// mkhas pa de la rtag tu brtson 'grus sbyor// sems can spyod mtha' me la rab tu 'jug/ chos 'di rnams ni skye med 'gog med de// mkhas pa de dag sems kyang mi zhum zhing /
25b4(mdo sde): phyi phyir brtson 'grus rlabs chen rab bskyed de// 'di 'dra'i chos la sems can bsgom du btsung // rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan nam mkha' dang mtshung
25b5(mdo sde): pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems nang du yang dag 'jog la/
25b6(mdo sde): nang du sems gnas par yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba dang / sems phyi rol nas kyang bzlog la/ phyi rol tu sems rgyu ba mi dmigs pa dang / bdag gi sems mnyam pa nyid kyis
25b7(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyi sems kyang mnyam pa nyid du snyoms par 'jug pa dang / sems mnyam pa nyid de'ang sems sgyu ma'i chos su mnyam pa nyid du snyoms par 'jug pa ste/ rigs kyi bu
26a1(mdo sde): chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan yongs su
26a2(mdo sde): dag pa ni 'di brgyad de/ brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bsam gtan byed kyang phung po la gnas te/ bsam gtan mi byed pa dang / bsam gtan byed kyang khams la gnas te/ bsam gtan mi
26a3(mdo sde): byed pa dang / bsam gtan byed kyang skye mched la gnas te/ bsam gtan mi byed pa dang / bsam gtan byed kyang 'jig rten 'di la gnas te/ bsam gtan mi byed pa dang / bsam gtan byed//
26a4(mdo sde): kyang 'jig rten pha rol la gnas te/ bsam gtan mi byed pa dang / bsam gtan byed kyang 'dod pa'i khams la gnas te/ bsam gtan mi byed pa dang / bsam gtan byed kyang gzugs kyi khams
26a5(mdo sde): la gnas te/ bsam gtan mi byed pa dang / bsam gtan byed kyang gzugs med pa'i khams la gnas te/ bsam gtan mi byed pa ste/ rigs kyi bu brgyad po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'
26a6(mdo sde): rnams kyi bsam gtan yongs su dag pa'o// gzhan yang nges par rtog pa'i sems ni bsam gtan yongs su dag pa ste/ de la nges par rtog pa'i sems nyid gang zhe na/ gang chos rnams la mi
26a7(mdo sde): mtho mi dma' ba/ mi stong mi smod pa/ 'gyur ba med pa/ rnam par mi rtog pa/ sogs pa med pa/ 'bri ba med pa/ 'dzin pa med pa/ gtong ba med pa/ mun pa med pa/ snang ba med pa/ rtog pa
26b1(mdo sde): med pa dang / rnam par rtog pa med pa/ 'du shes med pa/ yid la byed pa med pa/ gcig pa'ang ma yin/ gnyis pa'ang ma yin// gnyis pa yin pa'ang ma yin pa/ g.yo ba med pa/ rlom sems med pa/
26b2(mdo sde): spros pa med pa/ sogs pa med pa/ phri ba med pa/ sgom pa med pa/ 'jig pa med pa ste/ gang mtshan ma dang / dmigs pa thams cad la mi gnas pa'o// gang sems mi gnas pa de ni sems nges par
26b3(mdo sde): rtog pa'o// sems nges par rtogs pa ni gzugs rnams la mi rgyug ste/ mig dang / gzugs dang / rnam par shes pa rig cing rang gi mtshan nyid rnam par dag par bsam gtan byed do// sems nges
26b4(mdo sde): par rtog pa ni sgra rnams la mi rgyug ste/ rna ba dang / sgra dang / rnam par shes pa rig cing rang gi mtshan nyid rnam par dag par bsam gtan byed do// sems nges par rtog pa ni dri rnams la mi rgyug ste/
26b5(mdo sde): sna dang / dri dang / rnam par shes pa rig cing rang gi mtshan nyid rnam par dag par bsam gtan byed do// sems nges par rtog pa ni ro rnams la mi rgyug ste/ lce dang / ro dang / rnam par shes pa rig cing
26b6(mdo sde): rang gi mtshan nyid rnam par dag par bsam gtan byed do// sems nges par rtog pa ni reg pa rnams la mi rgyug ste/ lus dang / reg pa dang / rnam par shes pa rig cing rang gi mtshan nyid rnam par
26b7(mdo sde): dag par bsam gtan byed do// sems nges par rtog pa ni chos rnams la mi rgyug ste/ yid dang / chos dang / rnam par shes pa rig cing / rang gi mtshan nyid rnam par dag par bsam gtan byed do/
27a1(mdo sde): rigs kyi tha 'das/ dpar na bskal pas bsreg pa nan ma mtha' ma 'dzig cing / dus 'jig pa nanam mkha' gshe par mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ byang chub sems
27a2(mdo sde): dpa'i bsam gtan nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'ang nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi 'tshig cing / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams
27a3(mdo sde): cad la'ang ma chags pa yin no// mnyam par bzhag pa'ang yin la/ sems rnam par g.yengs pa'i sems can rnams kyang shin tu 'god do// mnyam par bzhag kyang dga' ba med la/ lang
27a4(mdo sde): nas kyang khong khro ba med pa yin no// 'phags pa'i skye bo rnams la zhi ba nye bar ston kyang 'phags pa ma yin pa'i skye bo rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ brtson 'grus rab tu 'bar bar
27a5(mdo sde): yang byed do// mnyam par bzhag cing mnyam pa'ang yin la/ mi mnyam par spyod pa rnams la tha dad par ston pa'ang rab tu ston to// mnyam pa nyid kyis mi mnyam pa'ang mi mthong la/ mi
27a6(mdo sde): mnyam pas mnyam pa nyid dang 'gal bar yang mi byed do// de ni mi 'gal zhing 'gal ba med pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'i sems kyi bsam gtan pa zhes bya'o// shes rab che ba'i bsam
27a7(mdo sde): gtan pa zhes bya'o// rnam par shes pa rab tu mi gnas pa'i bsam gtan pa zhes bya'o// gang gis bsam gtan de ltar mngon par rtogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de bsam gtan
27b1(mdo sde): nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa ste/ mi gnas pa'i bsam gtan yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// bsam gtan rnams dbang po sa
27b2(mdo sde): su dag/ dran pa rtse gcig yid ni mnyam par gzhag/ gnas rnams thams cad la yang mi gnas shing // 'gro ba kun la mnyam nyid snyoms par bzhag/ nang dang phyi rol dag na gnas pa yi//
27b3(mdo sde): phung po skye mched khams la mi gnas shing // nye bar zhi ba dben pa spyod yul te// mkhas pa de dag rtag tu mnyam par gzhag/ mnyam pa nyid kyis rtag tu mnyam bzhag pa// chos kyi dbyings
27b4(mdo sde): dang mnyam zhing mtshungs pa'i yid// shin tu dben pa'i sems kyang ston byed cing // mkhas pa bsam gtan kun la'ang mi chags so// 'gro ba rnams kyang yongs su smin bya'i phyir// 'chi
27b5(mdo sde): 'pho skye ba 'chi ba nyer ston kyang // ting nge 'dzin las de dag mi nyams te// de ni sems rtogs dbang gis de 'dra'o// gzugs med ting nge 'dzin kyang spyod yul la// sems can rnams ni
27b6(mdo sde): yongs su smin bya'i phyir// 'dod pa'i khams su'ang rab tu snang byed do// de dag bdag dang sems can mi gnas so// nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs pa'i spyod yul te// sgyu ma dang yang mtshungs
27b7(mdo sde): shing smig rgyu 'dra// rmi lam chu zla sprin gyi mtshan nyid du// chos rnams shes nas rtag tu mnyam par bzhag/ 'gro ba kun gyi shes pa'i spyod yul du// 'gro ba rnams la sems dang bri
28a1(mdo sde): 'jug cing // sems rgyud la ni bsgribs pa med ste// rang gi sems kyi rgyud kyang rab tu shes// bsam gtan rdzu 'phrul mngon shes mkhas pa yis// ning rnams mang
28a2(mdo sde): po bye bar de 'gro zhing // mi shes nyon mongs thams cad spangs pa yi// rgyal ba bsam mi khyab la mchod par byed// dbang po rnams ni dul zhing zhi ba'i yid// zhi gnas pha rol phyin cing mi rtog
28a3(mdo sde): pa/ de ni 'gro ba rnams la zhi ba'i yid// rtag tu ye shes stobs la mnyam par bzhag/ mnyam pa nyid dang mnyam pa'ang yong med la// mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba mtshan med de// mnyam nyid
28a4(mdo sde): de la gang dag rab gnas pa// de dag rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa yin// rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin zhe na/ rigs
28a5(mdo sde): kyi bu chos bzhi dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nam mkha' rnam par dag pas sems can
28a6(mdo sde): thams cad rnam par dag par 'jug pa dang / ye shes rnam par dag pas/ rnam par shes pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'jug pa dang / chos kyi dbyings rnam par dag pas bdag dang / sems
28a7(mdo sde): can dang / srog dang / gang zag rnam par dag par 'jug pa dang / don rnam par dag pas/ yi ge thams cad rnam par dag par rab tu rtogs pa ste/ rigs kyi bu chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/
28b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' shes rab nam mtha' dang mtshungs pa yin no// rigs kyi pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab yongs su dag pa ni 'di brgyad de/ brkyang gang zhe na/ 'di wA ste/ dag/
28b2(mdo sde): ba'i chos thams cad yang dag par sgrub kyang rtag par lta bar mi sbyor ba dang / mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spong bar brtson 'grus rtsom yang chad par lta bar mi ltung ba dang / rten cing 'brel par
28b3(mdo sde): 'byung ba la 'jug kyang mi skye ba'i bzod pa dang 'gal bar mi byed pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa pa ni shes par snang yang / nges pa'i tshig gi spobs pa la mi chags pa dang / chos kyi sdom
28b4(mdo sde): bzhi'ang ston la mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba nyid du dngos po yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba dang / las dang bya ba la 'jug pa rab tu ston kyang las med cing rnam
28b5(mdo sde): par smin pa med pa las kyang mi g.yo ba dang / spros pa med pa'i chos shes pa la gnas pa yin yang / chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu dbye ba nges par bstan pa rab tu ston pa dang / chos thams cad
28b6(mdo sde): kyi snang ba rab tu rnyed pa yin yang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba'ang sems can rnams la rab tu ston pa ste/ rigs kyi bu brgyad po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes
28b7(mdo sde): rab yongs su dag pa'o// yang shes rab ces bya ba 'di ni/ rnam par rtog pa kun nas 'bar ba med pa'i phyir/ nye bar zhi ba'i tshig go// rang gi mtshan nyid kyis rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'di ni mi
29a1(mdo sde): 'gyur ba'i tshig go// gnas med pa'i phyir 'di ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i tshig go// yang dag pa 'di ji lta ba'i phyir 'di ni ji lta ba bzhin gi tshig go// 'gyur ba ma yin pa'i phyir
29a2(mdo sde): 'di ni bden pa'i tshig go// ma rung bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir 'di ni yang dag pa'i tshig go// bcings pa yang dag par gcod pa'i phyir 'di ni yid rno ba'i tshig go// 'phags pa'i yon tan gyi phyir 'di ni/
29a3(mdo sde): ngoms pa'i tshig go// shin tu brtags pa'i phyir 'di ni nges par 'byed pa'i tshig go// brjod du med pa'i phyir 'di ni don gyi tshig go// khyad par med pa'i phyir 'di ni mtshungs pa'i tshig go// mi shig
29a4(mdo sde): pa'i phyir 'di ni snying po'i tshig go// mi gnas pa'i phyir 'di ni ma g.yos pa'i tshig go// rab tu 'bigs pa'i phyir 'di ni rdo rje'i tshig go// byed pa byas pa'i phyir 'di ni sgrol ba'i tshig go// rang
29a5(mdo sde): bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i phyir 'di ni rnam par dag pa'i tshig go// snang ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ 'di ni mun pa med pa'i tshig go// sgro brtags pa med pa'i phyir 'di ni gnyis
29a6(mdo sde): su med pa'i cho ga go// shin tu zab cing byung ba'i phyir 'di ni zad pa'i tshig go// 'dus ma byas pas phyir 'di ni mi zad pa'i tshig go// sbyar ba med pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas kyi tshig go// shin tu
29a7(mdo sde): rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ 'don nam mkha'i tshig go// bsgribs med pa'i phyir 'di ni nam mkha'i tshig go// gnas pa'i gnas kyi phyir 'dzin kun nas gsal byed kyi tshig go// ngo bo nyid meng pa'i phyir
29b1(mdo sde): 'di ni mi dmigs pa'i tshig go// rnam par shes pa dang ye shes gnyis su med pa'i phyir 'di ni ye shes kyi tshig go// gnyen po med pa'i phyir 'di ni mi brdzi ba'i tshig go// mngon par ma grub pa'i phyir
29b2(mdo sde): 'di ni lus med pa'i tshig go// kun tu rtog pa'i sdug bsngal gyi phyir/ 'di ni yongs su shes pa'i tshig go// sred pa'i bag la nyal yang dag par bcom pa'i phyir/ 'di ni kun 'byung spangs pa'i
29b3(mdo sde): tshig go// rab tu ma byung ba'i phyir/ 'di ni 'gog pa'i tshig go/ gnyis su med pa'i lam la rab tu 'jug pa'i phyir/ 'di ni sgom pa'i tshig go// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pas rab tu phye ba'i phyir//
29b4(mdo sde): 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi tshig go// rab tu 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyir/ 'di ni chos kyi tshig ste/ gang de lta bu'i tshig la 'jug pa'i ye shes snang ba gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog pa 'di ni shes rab ces bya'o/
29b5(mdo sde): gang nges par bstan pa thams cad nam mkha' dang mtshungs par bstan pa'i rjes su 'gro ste/ rjes su 'gro bas chos chung ngu la'ang mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi
29b6(mdo sde): pha rol tu phyin pa nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// shes rab lha dang mun pa nyon mongs gcod// rtag tu bag chag
29b7(mdo sde): nyon mongs rab bsal cing // rgyu dang rkyen dang byed pa nges par ston// mtha' rnams thams cad yongs su gcod par byed// bdag dang sems can la yang mi gnas shing // gang zag srog
30a1(mdo sde): la'ang rtag tu gnas pa med// dngos dang dngos med gnyis las zar byed de// shes rab pha rol 'gro bar rab tu bstan// shes rab bdud las rgyal te nyon mongs med/
30a2(mdo sde): shes rab chu bo las bsgral rab tu sgrol// shes rab ye shes byed cing rnam par sbyong // shes rab thar pa bde ba'i mchog kyang ston// shes rab kyis ni sgrib pa'i rtsa ba sbyong // phung po khams ni yong
30a3(mdo sde): su shes pa'i mtshan// mtshan dang mtshan gzhi mtshungs mtshan grol byed pa// shes rab thob pa srid pa gsum na mdzes// yongs su dag spyod shes rab ces bya ste// 'jig rten thams cad kyis
30a4(mdo sde): ni mi gos spyod// spyad pa spyod pa rab tu rtogs par spyod// shes rab dag pa'i mi ni rnam par mdzes// mig lnga dag ni yongs su dag byed cing // dbang po lnga ni rab tu snang bar byed// 'gro ba lha
30a5(mdo sde): rnams rab tu gcod por byed// phung po lnga ni zad phyir chos ston to// pha rol tshu rol rtag tu mi gnas shing // chos kyi dbyings gnas gnas la shin tu gnas// bar snang dang ni mtshungs mnyam 'dra
30a6(mdo sde): ba ste/ sangs rgyas ye shes rjes su 'thun zhing 'phags// rnyed dang ma rnyed gnyis ka'i mtha' las grol// dbus la rtog pa kun rtog mi rtog pa// gang na 'phags pa thams cad song ba yi//
30a7(mdo sde): 'chi ba med pa'i lam du 'jug pa ston// sdug bsngal shes shing de bzhin sred pa spangs// lam rnams ston cing 'gog pa'ang rab tu 'chad// bden pa shes pas shes rab 'di 'jug ste//
30b1(mdo sde): des ni sngon gyi mtha' yang rab tu gcad // zhing rnams thams cad zhing mtshungs zhing ma yin// chos rnams thams cad chos mtshungs rab tu dben// sems can thams cad bdag med sems can
30b2(mdo sde): mtshungs// shes rab blo spyod pas ni 'di shes so// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsod nams nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu sangs
30b3(mdo sde): rgyas kyi chos ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs ste/ de dag ni byang chub kyi sems kyi sa bon de'ang nam mkha' dang mtshungs so// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams ji snyed mngon par
30b4(mdo sde): 'du bya ba mngon par 'du byed pa de'ang byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags shing bsags pa de dag kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du skyo bar byed cing / de dag thams
30b5(mdo sde): cad kyang nam mkha' dang mtshungs par tshad med par rab tu gnas so// de la byang chub sems dpas 'di ltar nam mkha' tshad med pa'i phyir/ bdag gis bsod nams tshad med pa mngon par
30b6(mdo sde): 'du bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshad med par brtsams pas tshad med pa'i don 'phel ba yin te/ de la byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams kyi tshogs tshad med
30b7(mdo sde): pa la brtson par bya'o// rigs kyi bu tshad med pa bcu po 'di dag ni/ gang byang chub sems dpas bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis yongs su rdzogs par bya ba ste/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
31a1(mdo sde): mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs pas/ lus kyi rgyan tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i dbyangs kyi dkyil
31a2(mdo sde): 'khor rnam par dag pas/ ngag gi rgyan tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rjes su 'jug pas/ sems kyi rgyan tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs par
31a3(mdo sde): bya ba dang / spyod pa dang / ye shes dang / spyod lam tshad med pas sems can yongs su smin par bya ba tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / rnam pa tshad med pa rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs
31a4(mdo sde): su dag pa tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / bsod nams dang sems nges par rtog pa dang / spyod pa tshad med pas/ sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / rgyan
31a5(mdo sde): bkod pa thams cad dang / spyod pa thams cad kyis byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / gtan pa med pa'i mchod spyir yongs su rdzogs pas mdzod spu yongs su
31a6(mdo sde): byang ba tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang bla ma la rim gro byed cing 'dud pa tshad med pa dang / nga rgyal bcom pa tshad med pas/ dbu'i gtsug tor spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba tshad med pa
31a7(mdo sde): yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / sku dang g.yo med par 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang 'thun par 'dzin pas don yod par rnam par gnon pa tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba ste/ rigs kyi bu tshang
31b1(mdo sde): med pa bcu po de dag ni byang chub sems dpas bsod nams kyi tshogs kyis yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu nam byang chub sems dpa' sems nam mkha' dang mtshungs par gyur
31b2(mdo sde): bden pa nam mkha' tshad med pas/ de'i rtsom pa thams cad kyang tshad med pas kun tu gnas te/ de bas na bsod nams nam mkha' dang mtshungs zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang
31b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' ye shes nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa yin zhe na/ gang sems can thams cad kyi sems la ye shes nges khyab par byed cing / sems can thams cad kyi sems 'dod chags dang
31b4(mdo sde): bcas pa'i sems kyang 'dod chags bcas pa'i sems su yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems kyang zhe sdang dang bcas pa'i sems su yang dag pa
