31b5(mdo sde): ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems kyang gti mug dang bcas pa'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i
31b6(mdo sde): sems kyang des nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i sems su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// nges bdag 'dod chags med pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin las ma g.yos par sems can
31b7(mdo sde): gzhan rnams dang / gang zag gzhan dag la 'dod chags 'dul ba'i phyir chos 'chad do// de bdag nyid zhe sdang med pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin las ma g.yos par sems can gzhan rnams dang / gang
32a1(mdo sde): zag gzhan dag la zhe sdang 'dul ba'i phyir chos 'chad do// de bdag nyid gti mug med pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin las ma g.yos par sems can gzhan rnams dang / gang
32a2(mdo sde): zag gzhan dag la gti mug 'dul ba'i phyir chos 'chad do// des bdag nyid nye ba'i nyon mongs pa med pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin las ma g.yos par sems can gzhan rnams dang / gang zag gzhan
32a3(mdo sde): ngag la nyon mongs pa thams cad 'dul ba'i phyir chos 'chang ngo do// des 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi nyon mongs pa rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir chos 'chad do// 'dod
32a4(mdo sde): chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nye ba'i nyon mongs pa'i sems la dman par yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nye ba'i nyon
32a5(mdo sde): mongs pa med pa'i sems la mchog tu yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' de gnyis su med pa'i mtha'i sgo nas chos kyi dbyings yod
32a6(mdo sde): su shes te/ chos kyi dbyings grang yod pa 'dod chags kyi dbyings/ chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa de zhe sdang gi dbyings pa chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa gti mug gi dbyings/ chos kyi phyi
32a7(mdo sde): gang yin pa de nyon mongs pa'i dbyings so// de bas na chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings su yang dag par 'dra'o zhes bya ste/ chos kyi dbyings ni gar yang 'gro ba'ang med// mi 'gro ba'ang med do//
32b1(mdo sde): chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rjes su song ste/ gang bdag gi dbyings shes pa des chos kyi dbyings kyang shes so// de ltar na chos kyi dbyings dang bdag gi dbyings de dag mi gnyis so//
32b2(mdo sde): ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag rnam par dag pas chos kyi dbyings kyang rnam par dag go// de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang rnam par dag pa ste/ gang rnam par dag pa de rab tu snang ba'o// gang rab tu snang
32b3(mdo sde): bde bla gab med pa'o// gang bla gab med pa de la mtshan ma thams cad kyi skabs med do// gang mtshan ma med pa de la gnas pa gang yang med de/ mi gnas pa ni nam mkha' 'o// gang de ltar ye
32b4(mdo sde): shes kyi rjes su 'gro zhing ye shes des chos thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i sangs
32b5(mdo sde): rgyas kyis gnang ba'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa gang zhe na/ gang tshul khrims las sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing / zag pa med pa'i tshul khrims las kyang mi nyams pa'o// ting nge 'dzin las
32b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing / chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa thams cad las kyang mi 'gyur ba'o// shes rab las sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing / chos thams cad rgyu ba med par yang rnam par
32b7(mdo sde): mi rtog pa'o// rnam par grol ba las sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing / sems gnyis la'ang mi gnas pa'o// rnam par grol ba ye shes mthong ba las sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing shes pa
33a1(mdo sde): thams cad la'ang mi chags pa'o// stobs las sangs rgyas rjes su drar zhing / dus gsum mtshungs pa'i ye shes las kyang mi g.yo ba'o// mi 'jig pa las sangs
33a2(mdo sde): rgyas rjes su dran zhing / zag pa thams cad dang lhan cig tu'ang mi gnas pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang sangs rgyas rjes su dran zhing / chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid du'ang rnam par mi rtog
33a3(mdo sde): pa'o/ gzhan yang sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa ni gang / gzugs las sangs rgyas yang dag pa rjes su mi mthong la/ gzugs kyi ngo bo nyid shes pas/ drar pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su'ang 'gro ba'o//
33a4(mdo sde): de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa las sangs rgyas yang dag pa rjes su mi mthong la/ rnam par shes pa'i ngo bo nyid shes pas dran pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su'ang
33a5(mdo sde): 'gro ba'o// phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams las sangs rgyas yang dag par rjes su mi mthong la/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched kyi ngo bo nyid shes pas/ dran pa'i ye shes
33a6(mdo sde): kyi rjes su'ang 'gro ba'o// gang yang chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid shes pas/ shes rab che ba'i dran pa de ni yid la byed pa thams cad med de/ lto ba thams cad kun nas ldang ba med pa'o// gang de
33a7(mdo sde): lta bu'i rlig pa med pa'i dran pas/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa shes pa de ni/ sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa ni/ gang spyod
33b1(mdo sde): lam thams cad du sangs rgyas la mngon par chags par mi byed/ 'greng ba dang / 'chag pa dang / 'dug pa dang / nyal ba dang / 'gro ba dang / 'ong ba dang / smra ba dang / mi sba bar yang sangs rgyas la
33b2(mdo sde): mngon par chags par mi byed do// de mngon par ma chags pas dran pa'ang dran par mi byed/ mi dran pa'ang dran par mi byed do// de dran pa yid la mi byed pas/ gzugs dang / mtshan dang / chos nyid
33b3(mdo sde): du'ang sangs rgyas rjes su mi dran no// rigs kyi bu 'di ni sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa ste/ gang la mtshan ma dang dmigs pa thams cad kun tu sbyod ba med pa'o//
33b4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i chos rjes su dran pa gang zhe na/ chos zhes bya ba ni 'dod chags med pa'o// de la gang chos ci la chags kyang rung //
33b5(mdo sde): de dag la chos rjes su dran pa gang yang med do// chos zhes bya ba ni kun gzhi med pa'o// de la gang chos gang la sbyor ba de dag la chos rjes su dran pa gang yang med do// chos zhes bya ba ni nye bar
33b6(mdo sde): zhi ba ste/ gang sems dang yid 'bar bar byed pa de dag la chos rjes su dran pa gang yang med do// chos zhes bya ba ni mtshan ma med pa ste/ gang mtshan ma'i rjes su 'brang ba'i rnam par shes pa de dag
33b7(mdo sde): la chos rjes su dran pa gang yang med do// chos zhes bya ba ni 'dus ma byas pa ste/ gang 'dus byas su rab tu bzhag pa la gnas pa de dag la chos rjes su dran pa gang yang med do// yang chos
34a1(mdo sde): rjes su dran pa ni gang gis 'du byed thams cad skye ba med par mthong ste/ yang dag pa nyid skyon med pa la 'jug pa'o// byang chub sems dpas chos thams cad rang bzhin
34a2(mdo sde): gyis ma skyes par rig nas/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu 'thob bo// gang de lta bu'i gnas ni yang dag pa'i chos kyis gnas so// gang gis de ltar mngon par rtogs pa de ni/ chos
34a3(mdo sde): thams cad mngon par rtogs pa ste/ 'di ni slob pa dang / mi slob pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis mngon par
34a4(mdo sde): rtogs pa'o// de ltar mnyam par bzhag pa ni/ 'phags pa thams cad kyi rnam par grol ba ste/ de la chos gang yang kun tu spyod pa med do// chos gang yang kun tu spyod pa med de ni/ sangs
34a5(mdo sde): rgyas kyis gnang ba'i chos rjes su dran pa'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i dge 'dun rjes su dran pa gang zhe na/ dge 'dun zhes bya ba ni 'dus ma
34a6(mdo sde): byas pa skyed de/ mngon par 'du byed pas rjes su dran par mi nus so// gang na lus kyi las dang / ngag gi las dang / yod kyi las kun tu spyod pa med pa de ni mngon par 'du mi byed pa zhes
34a7(mdo sde): bya'o// da la 'dus byas zhes bya ba ni gdags pa dang tha snyad do// 'dus ma byas pa ni gdags pa thams cad yang dag par 'dzem pa'o// tha slong thams cad las yang dag par 'das brtse
34b1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi gnang ba'i dge 'dun rjes su dran pa'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i gtong ba rjes su dran pa gang zhe na/ gtong
34b2(mdo sde): ba zhes bya ba ni phung po thams cad 'dor zhing rab tu gtong ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ des chos gang yang btang ba med do// 'di ltar de la gang gtong ba'i chos gang yang snang bar mi 'gyur te/
34b3(mdo sde): 'di la gang chos thams cad mi 'dzin pa de ni gtong ba'i mchog go// gang 'dzin pa de ni mi gtong ngo // gang mi gtong ba de ni mi skems so// gang mi snyems pa de ni dmigs par mi byed do//
34b4(mdo sde): dmigs par mi byed pa de la sems rgyu ba med do// rgyu ba med pa ni sems kyis rnam par rig pa med pa'o// gang la sems kyis rnam par rig pa med pa de ni rnam par shes pa mi gnas pa'o// /
34b5(mdo sde): rnam par shes pa mi gnas pa de na sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i gtong ba rjes su dran pa'o// gang yang byang chub sems dpa'i gtong ba de ni thams cad mkhyen par bsngos pa ste/ gang thams
34b6(mdo sde): cad mkhyen pa ni chos thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid do// gang mnyam pa nyid la gnas pa ni rab tu gtong zhing byang chub tu'ang sngo ste/ de rjes su dran yang chos gang yang rjes su dran pa med do//
34b7(mdo sde): ci'i phyir zhe na/ thams cad mkhyen pa ni chos dang chos ma yin pa gnyis dang ldan pa ma yin te/ gang 'di gnyis su med pa de la yid la byed pa ci'ang med do// rigs kyi bu de ltar chos shes pa la
35a1(mdo sde): rab tu sbyor ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i gtong ba rjes su dran pa yin no// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i
35a2(mdo sde): tshul khrims rjes su dran pa gang zhi na/ tshul khrims zhes bya ba ni 'dus ma byas pa ste/ zag pa med pa/ smon lam med pa/ lhun gyis grub pa/ brtul zhugs grub pa/ brtul zhugs thams
35a3(mdo sde): cad yongs su rdzogs pa ste/ rnam par rig pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin no// ting nge 'dzin gyi gnas te/ sems kyi dmigs pa'i gnas ma yin no// shes rab kyi rtsa ba ste/ spros pa'i mtshan nyid
35a4(mdo sde): ma yin no// rnam par grol ba'i rgyu 'thun pa ste/ gnyis kyi rab tu phye ba ma yin no// mkhas pas rab tu bsngags pa ste/ gzugs snang ba ma yin no// nyon mongs bzhi pa ste/ so so rnam par
35a5(mdo sde): rig pa'i mtshan nyid ma yin no// bde ba thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro zhing gnyen pos bskyed pa ma yin te/ gang de lta bu'i tshul khrims rjes su dran zhing dran pa la rnyog pa med pa de ni rigs kyis
35a6(mdo sde): gnang ba'i tshul khrims rjes su dran pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i lha rjes su dran pa gang zhe na/ lha'i ris gnyis rjes su dran par bya ste/
35a7(mdo sde): gnyis gang zhe na/ gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha dang / skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gnas na 'khod pa rnams so// de la byang chub sems dpas gnas gtsang
35b1(mdo sde): ma'i ris kyi lha rnams rjes su dran no// yang skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dga' ldan gnas na gang dag 'khod pa de dag ni spyi bo lta bu bcus rjes su dran te/ bcu gang
35b2(mdo sde): zhe na/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi nang na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyi bor gyur pa dang / mngon par shes pa thams cad kyi nang na/ mi nyams pa'i mngon par shes pa dang / sa thams
35b3(mdo sde): cad kyi nang na dbang bskur ba'i sa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos thams cad kyi nang na/ yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / ting nge 'dzin mi nyams pa dang / so so yang dag pa'i nang na don dang / spobs pa
35b4(mdo sde): rgyun mi 'chang pa dang / shes pa thams cad kyi nang na/ chags pa meng pa'i ye shes la 'jug pa dang / dbang po thams cad kyi nang na rab 'bring tha ma la 'jug pa shes pa dang / stobs dang mi 'jigs pa
35b5(mdo sde): la snang ba'i ye shes rjes su 'gro ba dang gaspyan thams cad kyi nang na/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan kun tu gzigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad 'di dag gi lag mthil du song ba ltar 'dug pa
35b6(mdo sde): dang rnga byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug nas sems kyi skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'o zhes spyi bo'o// chos rnam pa bcu po de dag gis rjes su dran no//
35b7(mdo sde): de'i dran pa de ni lta bas ma 'khrugs/ bag la nyal dang / kun nas ldang bas ma 'khrugs/ yid la byed pas ma 'khrugs/ spros pas mi 'khrugs pa stegade lta bu'i dran pa rnyog pa med pas/
36a1(mdo sde): lha rjes su dran pa 'di ni rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi gnang ba'i lha rjes su dran pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mya ngan las 'das pa dang
36a2(mdo sde): mnyam pa nyid thob kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa'ang spyod pa yin zhe na/ mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu zhi ba ste/ tshor ba thams cad rgyun bcad pa/ dmigs
36a3(mdo sde): pa thams cad zhi ba/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams kyi nying mtshams sbyor ba med pa ste/ skyes bu dam pa de mya ngan las 'das pa dang mnyam pa nyid thob cing sngon gnas bcas pa'i snying
36a4(mdo sde): rje chen po dang / thabs dang / shes rab dang / ye shes kyis ni rnam par rol/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis shin tu byin gyis brlabs shes rab dang ye shes ni shin tu bsgoms/ sngon
36a5(mdo sde): gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis ni bsam pa yongs su dag pa/ rgyu mas rnam par rol pa'i ting nge 'dzin la ni gnas te/ nyon mongs pa gang gis 'khor ba rab tu bskyed pa'i 'khor bar 'ching ba de dag rab tu
36a6(mdo sde): spangs shing / ye shes gang gis mya ngan las 'das par ston pa de la dbang thob pas mi skye ba las skye zhing mi 'byung ba las 'byung ba ste/ mya ngan las 'das pa dang mnyam pa nyid du yang dag par
36a7(mdo sde): zhugs kyang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'ang mi 'chad do// de ni rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi phrugs su tshang ba zhes bya ba'i ye shes kyi sgo ste/ ye shes kyi sgo gang la
36b1(mdo sde): gnas pas/ byang chub sems dpa' mya ngan las 'das pa dang mnyam pa nyid thob kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'o// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can
36b2(mdo sde): thams cad kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid dang / cho ga shes pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu sems can rnams kyi spyod pa ni brgyad khri bzhi stong ste/ 'di ni sdom gyi rtsa ba'i tshig go// gang yang sems can thams
36b3(mdo sde): cad kyi spyod pa tshad med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ brjod du med pa de sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis mkhyen te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis mi rig/ byang chub sems dpa'i ye
36b4(mdo sde): shes kyis mi rig pa de la/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang // rang gi shes pas sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi rjes su rab tu 'jug ste/ spyod pa de'i
36b5(mdo sde): gang ngo bo nyid dam/ gang mtshan nyid kyang rung ste/ rgyu'i mtshan nyid dam/ rkyen gyi mtshan nyid dam/ byed rgyu'i mtshan nyid dam/ tshogs pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ mi 'dra/
36b6(mdo sde): ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ 'dod chags kyi mtshan nyid dam/ zhe sdang gi mtshan nyid dam/ gti mug gi mtshan nyid dam/ skal ba mnyam pa'i mtshan nyid dam/ sems can dmyal ba'i mtshan nyid dam/
36b7(mdo sde): dud 'gro skye gnas kyi mtshan nyid dam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi mtshan nyid dam/ lha'i mtshan nyid dam/ mi'i mtshan nyid dam/ nyan thos kyi nges par 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ rang sangs
37a1(mdo sde): rgyas kyi nges par 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ sangs rgyas kyi nges par 'gyur ba'i mtshan nyid dam/ ring po'i rgyu'i mtshan nyid dam bar pa'i rgyu'i mtshan nyid dam
37a2(mdo sde): ba'i rgyu'i mtshan nyid kyang rung ste/ spyod pa de dag thams cad kyi mtshan nyid yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ ye shes thams cad la kha na ma tho ba med pa yin ni// rigs kyi bu de ltar na
37a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid dang cho ga shes pa yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bdag gi chos dkon
37a4(mdo sde): mchog gi mdzod 'dzin pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bdag gi chos dkon mchog gi mdzod ni mi zad pa ste/ sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid la rab tu
37a5(mdo sde): 'jug pa ji snyed pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos dkon mchog gi mdzod la gzung pa'i ye shes la 'jug pa'ang de snyed do// ji ltar sems can gyi spyod pa mi zad cing mtha' med pa
37a6(mdo sde): de bzhin du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos dkon mchog gi mdzod kyang mi zad cing mtha' med pa'o// chos dkon mchog gi mdzod ces bya ba ni/ gang gi nub mo de bzhin gshegs
37a7(mdo sde): pas byang chub brnyes pa nas/ gang gi rub mo yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa de'i bar du/ de bzhin gshegs pas bshad pa dang / 'chang pa dang / 'chad par 'gyur ba de thams cad ni de bzhin
37b1(mdo sde): no ma nor ba de bzhin no// gzhan ma yin pa'o// ci'i phyir de bzhin zhes bya zhe na/ de bzhin nyid zhi ba la yang dag par zhugs pas de'i phyir de bzhin zhes bya'o// ci'i phyir nam nor ba de bzhin
37b2(mdo sde): nyid ces bya zhe na/ don dam pa'i bden pa la yang dag par zhugs pa de'i phyir ma nor ba de bzhin zhes bya'o// ci'i phyir na gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid ces bya zhe na/ de dag gi ngo bo nyid ma yin par
37b3(mdo sde): gzhan du mi btsal te/ de'i phyir gzhan ma yin pa'o// yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos dkon mchog gi mdzod ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
37b4(mdo sde): gtogs pa'i sems can rnams mang du thos pa kun dga' bo lta bur gyur kyang / de dag thams cad kyis bskal pa bye ba phrag stong du'ang yi ge khong du rung bar mi nus so// yang don gcig tu bstan
37b5(mdo sde): terdzaji lta ba bzhin du bstan pa 'di lta bu ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos dkon mchog gi mdzod do// de byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'dzin te/ ji ltar yi ge thams cad mi
37b6(mdo sde): brjed cing / don thams cad mi nyams par sems can thams cad mgu bar byed/ sangs rgyas thams cad rab tu mnyes par byed/ bdud thams cad pham par byed/ mu stegs can gzhan
37b7(mdo sde): thams cad tshar gcod/ nyon mongs pa thams cad zhi bar byed cing de dag la chos dkon mchog rab tu sgrog pa de ltar 'dzin to// rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas
38a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos dkon mchog gi mdzod 'dzin pa yin no// yang rigs kyi bu chos gang gi ngo bo nyid du ngas chos rnams mngon par sangs rgyas pa de'i ngo
38a2(mdo sde): bo nyid du/ byang chub sems dpas chos rnams gzung bar bya'o// yang ji lta bur de bzhin gshegs pas chos rnams mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas she na/ yongs su ma grub pa'i
38a3(mdo sde): tshul gyis sgyu ma'i ngo bo nyid dang / yul las shin tu 'das pa'i tshul gyis rmi lam gyi ngo bo nyid dang / shin tu skye ba med pa'i tshul gyis smig rgyu'i ngo bo nyid dang / mi 'pho ba'i tshul gyis mig
38a4(mdo sde): yor gyi ngo bo nyid dang / rang bzhin med pa'i tshul gyis gzugs brnyan gyi ngo bo nyid dang / rag las pa'i tshul gyis stong pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / rnam par mi rtog pa'i tshul gyis mtshan ma med pa'i
38a5(mdo sde): ngo bo nyid dang / sems chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis smon pa med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / 'dod chags thams cad dang bral ba'i tshul gyi 'dod chags pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / grangs thams cad
38a6(mdo sde): las 'das pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / de ltar rigs kyi bu tha snyad du gzhan gyi rnam par rig pa la brten nas/ de 'dra bar chos de ngas mngon par rdzogs par
38a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas te/ gang chos de'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid de ni tshig gis brjod par mi nus so// de la chos rnams 'dzin par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpas de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid kyi chos
38b1(mdo sde): rnams mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par byas te/ yi ge dang nges pa'i tshig gis kyang sems can gzhan rnams dang / gang zag gzhan dag la bstan par bya'o// rigs kyi du de la
38b2(mdo sde): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' thog ma nas sems can rnam par dag pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed ce na/ rigs kyi bu sems can gyi khams ni thog ma nas rnam par dag pa
38b3(mdo sde): sten de la sems can rnams kyi rtsa ba'i dngos po med de/ byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad kyi rtsa ba yongs su chad par rig nas/ sems can gang rnams yongs su smin par byed pa de la
38b4(mdo sde): bdag tu lta bar mi 'gyur/ sems can du lta bar ma yin/ srog tu lta bar ma yin/ gang zag tu lta bar yang mi 'gyur ro// de'ang 'di snyam du sems te/ sems can zhes bya ba 'di ni phyin ci log
38b5(mdo sde): ste/ rgyur lta ba'i kun nas dkris pa dang / ma rig pa dang / srid pa dang / sred pa 'dus pa dang / yang dag pa ma yin pa kun du rtog pa las sems can zhes brjod snyam mo// de la byang chub sem
38b6(mdo sde): dpas med pa phyin ci log las byung ba'i nyon mongs pa rab tu spang ba'i phyir/ sems can rnams la chos ston te/ dngos po gang yang chud mi gzon to// sems can med cing sems can dben
38b7(mdo sde): pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed de/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' thog ma nas rnam par dag pas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do// rigs kyi bu de ji ltar na byang chub
39a1(mdo sde): sems dpa' tshul bzhin la rab tu sbyor bas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par grub ce na/ tshul bzhin zhes bya ba ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug pa'o//
39a2(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyu dang rkyen ci 'dra ba de 'dra bar 'bras bu mngon par grub bo// sbyin pa ni longs spyod chen po'i rgyu ste/ de la byang chub sems dpa' gang gtong ba de'ang thams cad mkhyen par bsngo
39a3(mdo sde): nasasbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// tshul khrims ni lha dang mir skye ba'i rgyu ste/ lha dang mir skyes nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnams tshul khrims
39a4(mdo sde): la rab tu 'dzud de/ tshul khrims yang dag par bzung ba de'ang thams cad mkhyen par bsngos nas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// bzod pa dang nges pa ni
39a5(mdo sde): lus dang / ngag dang / sems kyi rgyan gyi rgyu ste/ lus dang / ngag dang / sems brgyan pas/ byang chub sems dpa' bdag la phan pa dang / gzhan la phan par zhugs pa yin te/ pan
39a6(mdo sde): par 'dod pa/ bzod pa'i gnas de'ang thams cad mkhyen par bsngos nas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// brtson 'grus ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad
39a7(mdo sde): sdud pa'i rgyu ste/ byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus brtsams nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par sgrub cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par sgrub pa'i brtson 'grus
39b1(mdo sde): de'ang thams cad mkhyen par bsngos nas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// bsam gtan ni sems dga' dang cang shes pa'i rgyu ste/ byang chub sems
39b2(mdo sde): dpa' sems dga' ba dang cang shes pas zhi gnas kyi tshogs kun tu skong ste/ zhi gnas kyi tshogs de'ang thams cad mkhyen par bsngos nas/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs
39b3(mdo sde): par byed do// thos pa ni shes rab chen po'i rgyu ste/ byang chub sems dpa' shes rab chen po ni dmigs par lta ba mi 'dzin cing / dmigs pa med pa'i thos pa de'ang thams cad mkhyen par
39b4(mdo sde): bsngos nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// de bzhin du dge ba'i chos thams cad de/ dge ba'i chos kyi rgyu gang dang gang bsags pa de dang de'i 'bras bu ldan
39b5(mdo sde): gyis grub pas mngon par skye bar 'gyur te ga rgyu dang rkyen de ni tshul bzhin yid la byed pa zhes bya'o// gzhan yang tshul bzhin zhes bya ba la chos thams cad kyi tshul bzhin ni bdag yin te/
39b6(mdo sde): ji ltar bdag med pa de bzhin du/ sems can thams cad la bdag med do// ji ltar bdag stong pa de bzhin du/ chos thams cad stong ngo // ji ltar bdag ming du btags pa tsam du zad pa de bzhin
39b7(mdo sde): durngachos thams cad kyang ming du btags pa tsam du zad do// de ltar tshul gzhin la rab tu sbyor ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni chos thams cad mnyam par sbyor ro// gang chos thams cad
40a1(mdo sde): mnyam pa nyid de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid de/ de ltar tshul bzhin la sbyor ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yang dag par sgrub bo//
40a2(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pa las ma nyams shing // chos thams cad la dbang byed pa yin zhe na/ de la rigs kyi bu dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'jig tshogs la/
40a3(mdo sde): lta ba ma bcom pas mngon par shes pa bskyed pa de dag ni// mngon par shes pa rnams las nyams par yang 'gyur ro// yang byang chub sems dpa' ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rtsa ba las byung
40a4(mdo sde): ba'i lta bar gyur pa drug cu rtsa gnyis yang dag par bcom nas/ lta ba dang len pa thams cad med par mngon par shes paskyed de/ ye shes dang ldan/ shes rab dang ldan/ blo dang ldan
40a5(mdo sde): bzod pa dang ldan// tshul khrims dang ldan te/ ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs shing / lus dben/ sems dben to// 'di 'dra ba'i ye shes kyi sa nang nye bar zhi zhing phyi rol du mi rgyu ba
40a6(mdo sde): yul med pa'i yul can/ cang shes pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ dga' ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ shin tu brtags pas brtags pa/ rab tu dkar ba'i blo// nyon mongs pas ma 'khrugs pa
40a7(mdo sde): snang ba thob pa/ ye shes rab rib med pa/ bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags pa/ ye shes kyi tshogs bsags pa/ zhi gnas kyi tshogs bsags pa/ lhag mthong gi tshogs bsags pa/
40b1(mdo sde): sbyin pas bstan pa/ tshul khrims kyis brgyan pa/ bzod pa'i ga gyon pa/ brtson 'grus kyi yalang bgos pa/ bsam gtan la gnas pa/ shes rab shin tu bsgoms pa'i blo dang ldan pa/
40b2(mdo sde): byams pas rjes su 'thun pa/ snying rje la rab tu gnas pa/ thabs kyis mngon par bsgrubs pa de lta bu'i chos dang ldan pas mngon par shes pa skyed de/ byang chub kyi snying po'i bar du mngon
40b3(mdo sde): par shes pa de dag gis shin tu 'phags shing / de mngon par shes pa de dag gis chos thams cad la dbang byed pa yin te/ gzugs thams cad mthong / sgra thams cad thos/ sems
40b4(mdo sde): can thams cad la 'jug cing bskal pa grangs med pa rjes su dran te/ rdzu 'phrul thams cad kyis rnam par 'phrul/ zag pa zad pa'i bde ba rnyed cing yid kyi rnam par rtog pa ji snyed pa la rnam par
40b5(mdo sde): rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa thams cad la dbang byed pa yin te/ des chos thams cad la de bzhin du lhun gyis grub par gnas so// rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mngon par
40b6(mdo sde): shes pa las mi nyams shing chos thams cad la dbang byed pa yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi tshul zab mo la rab tu zhugs shing / nyan thos dang rang
40b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rtogs par dka' ba yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu zab mo zhes bya ba ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'o// rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i tshul ni 'di lta ste/ ma rig
41a1(mdo sde): pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed/ 'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/ rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs// ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug/ skye
41a2(mdo sde): mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/ reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ka tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/ sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/ len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/ srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye bo/ skye ba'i rkyen gyis
41a3(mdo sde): rga shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'di 'ba' zhig 'byung
41a4(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro// sems can rnams kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba'i rgyu dang rkyen gang yin pa de la byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes rab tu 'jug ste/ de ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba kun
41a5(mdo sde): 'byung ba'i tshul zhes bya'o// de la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'gog pa'i tshul gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ ma rig pa 'gas pas 'du byed 'gag/ 'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag
41a6(mdo sde): rnam par shes pa 'gogs pas ming dang gzugs 'gag/ ming dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag/ skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag/ reg pa 'gags pas tshor ba
41a7(mdo sde): 'gag/ tshor ba 'gags pas sred pa 'gag/ sred pa 'gags pas len pa 'gag/ len pa 'gags pas sred pa 'gag/ srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag/ skye ba 'gags pas rga
41b1(mdo sde): shi dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrugs pa rnams 'gag ste/ de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'di 'ba' zhig 'gag par
41b2(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// de ni rigs kyi bu rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'gog pa'i tshul zhes bya'o// sems can rnams rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i rgyu gang rkyen gang yin pa de la byang chub sems dpa'i ye
41b3(mdo sde): shes rab tu 'jug ste/ de ni chos kyi tshul zab mo la 'jug pa zhes bya ste/ gang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sa ma yin pa'o// de ci'i phyir nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
41b4(mdo sde): thams cad kyi sa ma yin zhe na/ sems can thams cad kyi kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba shes pa ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yul lo// rang gi ye shes
41b5(mdo sde): dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byang chub sems dpas kyang de'i mtshams sbyor ba shes so// gzhan yang zab mo zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig tshogs dang / bdag rnam par dag pa dang /
41b6(mdo sde): chos thams cad rnam par dag pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig tshegs ni kun tu btsal kyang mi dmigs so// gang mi dmigs pa de ni zab mo'o// bdag ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis
41b7(mdo sde): kyang ma brnyes so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag thog ma nas kyang rnam par dag ste/ ji ltar bdag rnam par dag pa de bzhin du/ chos thams cad rnam par dag go// de ci'i phyir rnam par
42a1(mdo sde): dag pa zhes bya zhe na/ de la chos gang yang ma skyes ma bskyed/ mi 'gag/ ma 'gag pa ste/ de bas na rnam par dag pa zhes bya'o// mun pa med pa/ snang ba med pa/ kun
42a2(mdo sde): gzhi med pa/ rab rib med pa/ don dam pa zab mo gang la mig med cing mig 'gog pa med pa nas/ yid kyi bar du med cing yid 'gog pa med pa ste/ de ni yul du bgrang ba ma yin no// gang yul
42a3(mdo sde): ma yin zhing yul med pa de ni don dam pa ste/ de'i phyir zab mo zhes bya'o// de la sems dang yid 'dzin pa med de/ rtogs dka' ba/ mthong bar dka' ba/ khong du chud par dka' ba de lta bu'i chos
42a4(mdo sde): kyi tshul zab mo la ye shes gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog cing / sems can gzhan la'ang rab tu ston te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi tshul zab mo la rab tu zhugs pa/ nyan thos
42a5(mdo sde): dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sa gting dpag dka' ba yin no// / bam po gsum pa// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems
42a6(mdo sde): dpa' rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug pa'i shes pa la mkhas te/ mtha' gnyis su lta ba thams cad dang brel ba yin no na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 'di snyam du sems te/
42a7(mdo sde): gang brten pa de ni ci'ang ma yin pa/ gang brten pa de ni dngos po med pa/ gang brten pa de ni yongs su ma grub pa/ gang brten cing 'brel par 'byung ba de ni mi rtag pa/ sdug bsngal ba/ bdag med
42b1(mdo sde): pa zhi ba/ gang brten pa de la ni bdag med/ sems can med/ srog med/ gsob med/ skyes bu med/ gang zag med/ gang las skyes med/ shed bu med/ gang brten pa de la ni yang dag
42b2(mdo sde): par 'byung ba gang yang med/ gang brten pa de la ni ci'ang med pa/ rtsol ba med pa/ stong pa/ mtshan pa med pa/ dben pa// rgyu ba med pa/ ma spros pa/ spros pa med pa ste/ de'i phyir skye ba na
42b3(mdo sde): chos khon skye/ 'gag pa na chos kho na 'gag ste/ 'di la bdag gam/ sems can nam/ srog gam/ gso ba 'am/ skyes bu 'am/ gang zag gam/ sheng las skyes sam/ shang bu med ces
42b4(mdo sde): bya'o// chos gang dag rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba de dag la ni skye ba ci'ang med cing bdag po med de/ de'i phyir chos thams cad ni rtswa dang / shing dang / rtsig pa dang / lam dang / mig yor lta bu
42b5(mdo sde): zhes bya ste/ ji ltar phyi rol gyi dngos po rnams skye ba na/ skyed par byed pa med/ 'gag pa na'ang 'gog par byed pa med pa de bzhin du// nang gi chos rnams skye ba na'ang skyed par byed pa med
42b6(mdo sde): 'gag pa na'ang 'gog par byed pa med de/ gzhan du na rkyen rnams yod na 'byung gi/ rkyen mtshad na 'gog go snyam du sems te/ de ltar shes pa la sbyor ba ni mthar lta ba thams cad rab tu spong ngo //
42b7(mdo sde): de la mthar lta ba gang zhe na/ mtha' zhes bya ba ni chad pa dang rtag pa ste/ gang de mi skyed cing rnam par mi 'jig pa ni chad pa dang / rtag pa dang bral ba s+ho/ de'i phyir dag pas na mthar lta ba thams
43a1(mdo sde): cang rnam par dag pa ste/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la 'jug pa'i shes pa la mkhas te/ mthar lnga ba thams cad dang bral ba
43a2(mdo sde): yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab pas/ de bzhin nyid du dbyer meng pa shes pa la mkhas pa yin zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
43a3(mdo sde): phyag rgyas btab pa zhes bya ba la de bzhin nyid dbyer med pa de ni phyag rgya ste/ phye ba med pa/ 'jug pa med pa/ mngon par zhen pa med pa/ mi bskyod pa/ bskyod par bya ba ma yin pa ste/ lha dang / mi dang /
43a4(mdo sde): lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bskyod par mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten ni phyag rgya des btab pa nyid do// de bzhin gsheg
43a5(mdo sde): pa'i phyag rgya de ni shin du mi skye ba'i phyag rgya/ shin tu stong pa nyid kyi phyag rgya/ shin tu mtshan ma med pa'i phyag rgya / shin du smon pa med pa'i phyag rgya/ shin tu 'dus ma byas pa'i phyag rgya/ shin tu
43a6(mdo sde): 'dod chags dang bral ba'i phyag rgya/ shin tu de bzhin nyid kyi phyag rgya/ shin tu yang dag pa'i mtha'i phyag rgya/ shin tu nam mkha'i phyag rgya ste/ dper na nam mkha' la rgya mi snang ba de bzhin du/
43a7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya de'ang spyan lnga la mi snang ste/ rang gi mtshan nyid kyi phyag rgyas btab pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi tha snyad ji snyed du 'dogs pa de dag thams cad ni de
43b1(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab bzhin du tha skad 'dogs so// de la gang dag rnam par shes pa'i spyod yul ba de dag ni chos rnam par 'jog par byed do// gang dag rnam par shes pa la mi
43b2(mdo sde): gnas pa de dag ni chos rnam par 'jog par mi byed// chos tha dad du mi byed do// de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab pas na/ de dag de bzhin nyid 'byed par mi byed do// de la de bzhin
43b3(mdo sde): nyid tha dad pa gang zhe na/ gang dag tha ma dang / 'bring dang / rab kyi chos rnams su rnam par rtog pa'o// gang dag chos thams cad la mi rtog cing rnam par mi rtog pa de bzhin nyid tha dad du mi byed do//
43b4(mdo sde): gang ji snyed mang por brtags shing rnam par brtags kyang de bzhin nyid dbye bar mi nus te/ dper na sems can thams cad ni nam mkha' la rnam par rgyu yang nam mkha'i khams ni 'dres par
43b5(mdo sde): yang mi byed do// de bzhin du sems can thams cad de bzhin nyid la rnam par rgyu yang de bzhin nyid ni 'dres par mi byed do// gang 'dir de lta bu'i chos rnams shes pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
43b6(mdo sde): de lta bu ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa yin te/ de bzhin nyid kyang 'dres par mi byed do// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul la zhugs
43b7(mdo sde): shing / chos kyi dbyings thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba yin zhe na/ chos kyi dbyings zhes bya ba ni rdul thams cad bral ba'i phyir/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i dbyings so// yang dag par
44a1(mdo sde): bsgrubs pa med pa'i phyir ma skyes pa'i dbyings so// ma byung ba'i phyir mi 'gog pa'i dbyings so// 'gro ba med pa'i phyir mi 'gro ba'i dbyings so// rga ba med pa'i phyir
44a2(mdo sde): 'ong ba med pa'i dbyings so// 'byung ba med pa'i phyir gnas med pa'i dbyings so// dus gsum mnyam pa'i phyir ji lta ba bzhin gyi dbyings so// gzod ma nas rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ bdag gi
44a3(mdo sde): dbyings so// don dam pa yin pa'i phyir gang zag med pa'i dbyings so// gnas med pa'i phyir rnam par rig pa med pa'i dbyings so// 'dre ba med pa'i phyir kun gzhi med pa'i dbyings so/
44a4(mdo sde): nges par gyur pa'i phyir skye ba med pa'i dbyings so// rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i phyir nam mkha'i dbyings so// gnyen po med pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings te/ 'di ni chos
44a5(mdo sde): kyi dbyings kyi tshul la 'jug pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu chos thams cad de ltar zhugs pas de la/ byang chub sems dpa' de ltar chos kyi tshul la zhugs pa'i gang ci smra ba dang / rjod pa dang /
44a6(mdo sde): ston pa de thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings su yang dag par gzhol ba nyid do// chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul la zhugs pa de 'dod chags kyi khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag gnyis su med par rab tu
44a7(mdo sde): shes so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dod chags ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no// zhe sdang gi khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyis su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ zhe sdang ni chos
44b1(mdo sde): kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no// gti mug gi khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyis su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gti mug ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no// nyon mongs
44b2(mdo sde): pa'i khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyis su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyon mongs pa ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no// 'dod pa'i khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni
44b3(mdo sde): gnyis su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'dod pa'i khams ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin no// gzugs kyi khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyis su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
44b4(mdo sde): gzugs kyi khams ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no// gzugs med pa'i khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyis su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs mong pa'i kham
44b5(mdo sde): ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no// mig gi khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyis su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mig ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no// gzugs
44b6(mdo sde): kyi khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyis su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no// mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / chos
44b7(mdo sde): kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyis su meng de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ mig gi rnam par shes pa ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no// yid kyi bar gyi khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyis
45a1(mdo sde): su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid kyi khams ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no// yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyis
45a2(mdo sde): su me nga / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no// phung po'i khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyis su med do// de ci'i phyir na na/
45a3(mdo sde): phung po'i khams ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no// sa'i khams dang / chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyis su med de/
45a4(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can no// chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong dang spyod pa brgyad khri bzhi stong dang / chos thams
45a5(mdo sde): cad kyi bar dang / chos kyi dbyings de dag ni gnyis su med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can to// byang chub sems dpa' gang chos mnyam pa
45a6(mdo sde): nyid 'di la zhugs pa de ni chos kyi dbyings thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'i phyir/ chos thams cad rab tu shes pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbying
45a7(mdo sde): kyi tshul la zhugs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa rdo rje ltar sra zhing mi phyed de/ theg pa chen po 'di la legs par gnas shing mi g.yo ba yin na na/
45b1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa rdo rje ltar sra ming mi byed pa bcu gnyis kyis na/ lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mi phyed pa yin te/ bcu gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang
45b2(mdo sde): chub kyi sems mi byed pa/ bsam pa dang lhag pa'i bsam pas sbyor ba mi byed pa dang / sbyin pa mi byed pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang
45b3(mdo sde): shes rab mi byed pa dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po mi byed pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po mi phyed pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mi phyed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi
45b4(mdo sde): zhing yongs su dag pa mi byed pa dang / 'khor bas yongs su mi skyo ba mi byed pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa bas mi ngoms pa mi byed pa dang / mtshan dang dpe bya bzang po'i phyir gtan pa med pa'i
45b5(mdo sde): mchod sbyin byed pa mi phyed pa dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir lus dang srog 'dor ba mi phyed pa dang / sems can gzhan dang / gang zag gzhan gyi phyir dge ba'i rtsa ba
45b6(mdo sde): bsngo ba mi byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par bsgrub pa mi phyed pa ste/ rigs kyi bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos 'di lta bu 'di dag lasu mi byed pa de'i
45b7(mdo sde): tshe/ bsam pa rdo rje ltar srang zhing mi phyed pa yin no// 'di lta ste/ dper na nor bu rin po che rdo rje ni nor bu rin po che thams cad 'bigs kyang bdag nyid ni mi 'bigs so// de bzhin
46a1(mdo sde): du byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa rdo rje ltar srang zhing mi phyed pa'ang sems can thams cad kyi bag la nyal dang / nyon mongs pa kun nas ldang ba dang / lbu bar gyur pa
46a2(mdo sde): rnams sel kyang / bdag nyid ni theg pa chen po 'di las mi byed do// rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa rdo rje ltar srang zhing mi byed de/ theg pa chen po 'di la legs par
46a3(mdo sde): gnas shing mi g.yo ba yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi yul rjes su thob cing rang gi yul yongs su dag pa yin zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi yul zhes bya/
46a4(mdo sde): ba ni yul ma yin pa/ yul med pa/ yul thams cad yongs su dag pa'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yongs su dag pas/ rang gi yul yongs su sbyong ste/
46a5(mdo sde): de 'di snyam du mig gi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin yang / sangs rgyas kyi yul ni su dang yang nye ba'am/ ring ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni dben pa'i
46a6(mdo sde): yul yin pa'i phyir te/ dben pa'i yul la ni mig gi yul gang yang med do// rna ba'i yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin yang / sangs rgyas kyi yul ni su dang yang nye ba 'am ring ba ma yin no//
46a7(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe no// sangs rgyas kyi yul ni dben pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir te/ dben pa'i yul la ni rna ba'i yul gang yang med do// rna'i yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin yang / sangs rgya
46b1(mdo sde): kyi yul ni su dang yang nye ba 'am ring ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni dben pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir te/ dben pa'i yul la ni sna'i yul gang yang med do// lce'i
46b2(mdo sde): yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin yang / sangs rgyas kyi yul ni su dang yang nye ba'am ring ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni dben pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir te ka dben
46b3(mdo sde): pa'i yul la ni lce'i yul gang yang med do// lus kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin yang / sangs rgyas kyi yul ni su dang yang nye ba 'am ring ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas
46b4(mdo sde): kyi yul ni dben pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir te/ dben pa'i yul la ni lus kyi yul gang yang med do// yid kyi yul ni sangs rgyas kyi yul yin yang / sangs rgyas kyi yul ni su dang yang nye ba
46b5(mdo sde): 'am ring ba ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi yul ni dben pa'i yul yin pa'i phyir te/ dben pa'i yul la ni yid kyi yul gang yang med do// phung po rnams dang / khams rnam
46b6(mdo sde): dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis pa la'ang de bzhin no// rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi yul dben pa nyid kyis
46b7(mdo sde): yul thams cad dben par 'jug go// rang gi zhing yongs su dag par sangs rgyas kyi zhing la zhugs pa de ni chos gang dag de'i dbang po drug la snang bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi/
47a1(mdo sde): yul dben pas 'jug go// ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul chags pa med cing thogs pa med pa de bzhin du / de yul thams cad la'ang mi chags mi thogs te/
47a2(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi yul la rjes su zhugs shing rang gi yul yongs su dag pa yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gzungs
47a3(mdo sde): thob pa rtag tu mi brjed par spyod pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gzungs yongs su sbyang ba bya bas gzungs thob par 'gyur te/ de la gzungs yongs su sbyang ba byed pa
47a4(mdo sde): gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di dag ni gzungs yongs su sbyang ba byed pa ste/ sum cu rtsa gnyis po gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos 'dod pa dang / chos don du gnyer ba dang / chos
47a5(mdo sde): kyi kun dga' la mos pa dang / chos la mos pa dang / chos la bab pa dang / chos la 'bab pa dang / mang du thos pa rnams la sten cing bsnyen la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / slob dpon
47a6(mdo sde): dang rnga mkhan po rnams la nga rgyal med cing btsun par gus par byed pa dang / chos yongs su tshol bas mi ngoms pa dang / rjes su bstan pa rnams la bka' blo bang zhing 'thun par 'dzin pa
47a7(mdo sde): dang / chos smra ba'i gang zag rnams la ston pa tsam du shis shing 'khrul pa mi tshol ba dang / kun 'dzin pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / ston pa la le lo med pa dang / chos la slob
47b1(mdo sde): dpor gyi dpe mthung med cing zang zing med par chos sbyin pa dang / shes rab kyi rtsa ba'i gnas zos pa dang / tshul bzhin gyi chos la sbyor ba dang / ji ltar thos pa'i chos la so sor brtag pa'i phyir
47b2(mdo sde): mang du zos pa mu med pa byas pa dang / tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa mu med par bcas pa dang / rtag tu dben pa la sems gzhol ba dang / rjes su dran pa drug rjes su dran pa dang / yang
47b3(mdo sde): dag par chags par 'gyur ba drug mi 'dor ba dang / gus par bya ba'i gnas drug yongs su mi gtong ba dang / sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa'i sems kyis chos la sbyor ba
47b4(mdo sde): dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang mi 'gal ba'i las dang bya ba la 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum la sems nges par rtogs pa la mi skrag pa dang 'phags pa'i rig
47b5(mdo sde): dang rnga sbyangs pa'i yon tan kun 'dzin pas yongs su yi mi 'chad pa dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba la sems zhum pa med pa dang / sems can la lta bas snying rje che ba dang / chos
47b6(mdo sde): la lta bas lus dang srog 'dor ba dang / ye shes la lta bas rtag tu nga rgyal med pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la yongs su mi skyo ba ste/ 'di ni gzungs yongs su sbyang ba byed/
47b7(mdo sde): pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu de la gzungs gang zhe na/ gang kun bzung ba'i chos rnams mi brjed pa dang / ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams mi brjed pa dang / dran pa rjes su dran pa dang / rtogs
48a1(mdo sde): par khong du rud pa dang / blo gros 'dod pa dang / yi ge mi zad pa dang / nges pa'i tshig dang skad la 'jug pa shes pa dang / spobs pa bstan pa thogs pa med cing rgyun mi 'chang
48a2(mdo sde): ba dang / nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde rtogs pa la 'jug pa shes pa dang / drang ba'i don gyi mdo sde rtogs pa la 'jug pa shes pa dang / kun rdzob mi zad pa bstan pa shes pa dang / don dam pa dbyer
48a3(mdo sde): med pa'i de kho na bstan pa shes pa dang / bden pa la 'jug pa nges par shes pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i rjes su 'jug pa shes pa dang / yang dag par spong ba'i brtson 'grus mi 'god
48a4(mdo sde): ba rishes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pas rnam par rol pa shes pa dang / dbang po'i rim pa shes pa dang / stobs la gnas pa mi bskyod par shes pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rtogs pa
48a5(mdo sde): dang 'thun pa shes pa dang / lam la 'jug pa'i gnas shes pa dang / zhi gnas kyis sems gnas par shes pa dang / lhag mthong gis chos sgrol bar shes pa dang / rig pa dang rnam par
48a6(mdo sde): grol ba'i rjes su 'thun pa shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa la 'jug pa shes pa dang / mngon par shes pa'i ye shes skyed pa shes pa dang / pha rol du phyin pa drug la 'jug pa
48a7(mdo sde): shes pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po bani so so ci rigs par shes pa dang / sgra skad dang ngag gi lam la 'jug pa shes pa dang / chos kyi brda ston pa shes pa dang / don dbyer med par shes
48b1(mdo sde): pa dang / tshig 'bru mi zad par shes pa dang / sems can thams cad tshim par bya ba shes pa dang / so so ci rigs par chos ston pa shes pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsungs pa dran
48b2(mdo sde): pas 'dzin pa shes pa dang / tshig dang yi ge thams cad mtshams sbyar ba'i nges pa'i tshig la 'jug pa shes pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
48b3(mdo sde): du rtogs pa shes pa dang / rgyu dang bya ba la 'jug pa shes pa dang / chos thams cad la snang ba rab rib med par shes pa ste/ 'di ni gzungs zhes bya'o// lus dang / ngag dang / sems
48b4(mdo sde): dang 'dra ba'i chos kun tu 'dzin pa gang yin pa de ni mi zad pa ste/ chos kyi char 'bebs pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rnam par
48b5(mdo sde): skyed pa 'di ni/ gzungs kyi tshul la 'jug pa yin te/ gzungs thob pa sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la mi brjed par spyod pa zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
48b6(mdo sde): gzungs thob pa rtags tu mi brjid par spyod pa yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa thogs pa med cing rgyun mi 'chang la/ rtag tu sangs rgyas kyi
48b7(mdo sde): rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yino zhe na/ rigs kyi bu nyi shu rtsa bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa yin ste/ nyi shu rtsa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste//
49a1(mdo sde): dubya/ spobs pa myur ba dang / spobs pa mgyogs pa dang / spobs pa thogs pa med pa dang / spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad pa dang / shin tu nges pa'i tshig lnga spobs pa dang /
49a2(mdo sde): zab mo la spobs pa dang / sna tshogs la spobs pa dang / legs par rgyan pa'i spobs pa dang / zhum pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / 'jigs pa med pa'i spobs pa dang ga tshigs su bcas
49a3(mdo sde): pa sna tshogs bstan pa'i nges pa'i tshig la spobs pa dang / mdo dang rtogs pa brjod pa dang / sngon byung ba la spobs pa dang / mi thul ba'i spobs pa dang / tshig rab tu dbye ba bstan pa mi zad
49a4(mdo sde): pa la spobs pa dang / spobs pa shin tu gsal zhing shin tu mdzes pa dang / cho ga btsun zhing gzung ba'i spobs pa dang / chos ston pa 'bras bu yod pa'i spobs pa dang / lha'i 'khor gyi rgyan
49a5(mdo sde): gyi spobs pa dang / the tsom thams cad gcod pa'i spo bas pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos la spobs pa dang 'khrul pa med pa'i spobs pa dang / 'khor
49a6(mdo sde): la byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms kyi spobs pa dang / skye ba dran pa mngon par shes pa'i spobs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs
49a7(mdo sde): pa'i spobs pa yin te/ rigs kyi bu nyi shu rtsa bzhi po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa yin no// de dag kyang yongs su sbyang ba bya ba nyi shu rtsa bzhis 'grub ste ni
49b1(mdo sde): shu dz+nyA ba ni gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste ka bla ma'i ngag mi gcog pas myur ba'i spobs par 'gyur ro// tshur shog ces bya ba dang / song zhes bya ba la g.yo med pas spobs pa mgyogs par 'gyur
49b2(mdo sde): ro/ nyon mongs pa thams da la chags pa med pas skyobs pa thogs pa med par 'gyur ro// de la ma chags par gnas pas spobs pa rgyun mi 'chad par 'gyur ro// phra ma'i tshig
49b3(mdo sde): med pas shin tu nges pa'i tshig la spobs par 'gyur ro// rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rtogs pas zab mo la spobs par 'gyur ro// sbyin pa sna tshogs bsags pas sna tshogs la
49b4(mdo sde): spobs par 'gyur ro// chung ma legs par brgyan te/ rab tu byin pas legs par brgyan pa'i spobs par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems las mi nyams pa'i zhum pa med pa'i
49b5(mdo sde): spobs par 'gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi phung po legs par kun tu gsungs pas 'jigs pa med pa'i spobs par 'gyur ro// gdugs dang / rgyul mtshan dang / ba dan dang
49b6(mdo sde): dril bu sna tshogs byin pas tshigs su bcas pa sna tshogs bstan pa'i nges pa'i tshig la spobs par 'gyur ro// sbyin pa dang ldan pa dang / rim gro byed pa dang / bsnyan bkur byed pa
49b7(mdo sde): sngon du 'gro bas mdo dang rtogs pa brjod pa dang / sngon byung ba la spobs par 'gyur ro// sdug bsngal ba dang / dbul ba dang / mgon med pa la mau brnyas pas mi thul ba'i spobs
50a1(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro// gter mi bdu ba sbyin pa dang / pha rol chos la sbyor bas tshig rab tu dbye ba mi zang pa la spobs par 'gyur ro// tshig bden pa dang / thabum
50a2(mdo sde): pa dang / ngag rtsub po med pa'i ngag gi las dang ldan pas spobs pa shin tu gsal zhing mdzes par 'gyur ro// blam+bu'i tshig byung du mi gsod pa dang / gnan g+hi tshig mi gcog pas tshig
50a3(mdo sde): btsun zhing gzung ba'i spobs par 'gyur ro// rang gi yon tan gyi chos sgrub pas chos brtson pa 'bras bu yod pa'i spobs par 'gyur ro// bdag la mi stong pa dang / gzhan la mi
50a4(mdo sde): smod pa dang / 'phags pa'i dngos po yongs su gtong bas lha'i 'khor gyi rgyan spobs par 'gyur ro// chos la slob dpon gyi dpe mkhyud med pa dang / chos ji ltar thos pa bzhin du ston pas
50a5(mdo sde): the tsom thams cad gcod pa'i spobs par 'gyur ro// bstan chos thams cad shes pa dang / gzhan la mi gnod pa dang / nang pa rnams kyi nang g.yog byed pa dang / sman rab tu sbyin pas
50a6(mdo sde): 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos thams cad la spobs par 'gyur ro// pha rol la 'khrul pa'i skabs mi tshol ba dang / gzhan dag gi ltung ba mi gleng ba dang
50a7(mdo sde): 'khrul pa la mi rtogs pas 'khrul pa med pa'i spobs par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa dang / sems can thams cad la mtshungs par sbyor ba dang /
50b1(mdo sde): ngan las 'das pa'i lam la 'god pa dang / rnyed pa dang / bkur sti dang / tshigs su bcad pa thams cad don du mi gnyer bas/ 'khor la byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang
50b2(mdo sde): btang snyoms kyi spobs par 'gyur ro// dka' blo bde ba dang / nges pa dang / ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed pa dang / sems dga' ba dang / gzhan gyi rgyud 'khrug par mi byed pas/ skye ba
50b3(mdo sde): dran pa'i mngon par shes pa'i spobs par 'gyur ro// theg pa chen po las mi nyams pa dang / theg pa dman pa mi 'dod pa dang / sems can la snying rje ba dang / thams cad nan tan la
50b4(mdo sde): 'god pas sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i spobs par 'gyur ro// sems cad gzhan la go bar byed pas de'i phyir spobs pa zhes bya'o// sems can gzhan la nan tan du bya ba ston
50b5(mdo sde): pas de'i phyir spobs pa zhes bya'o// gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud tshim par byed pas/ de'i phyir spobs pa zhes bya'o// sems can gzhan gyi sems dang 'thun par ston pas de'i phyir spobs par
50b6(mdo sde): zhes bya'o// rigs kyi bu chos dang / yon tan dang / ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni spobs pa thogs pa med cing rgyun ma 'chang la/ rtag tu sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs
50b7(mdo sde): kyis byir gyis brlabs pa yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' skye ba dang / 'chi 'pho dang / 'byung ba rnams la dbang thob pa zhe na/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu gnyis dang ldan
51a1(mdo sde): nang byang chub sems dpa' skye ba dang / 'chi 'pho dang / 'byung ba rnams la dbang thob pa yin te/ bcu gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sdig pa'i grogs po yongs su
51a2(mdo sde): spangs shing rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen la sten pa dang / lta ba shin tu yongs su dag pa dang / sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba'i tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su dag pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang /
51a3(mdo sde): snyoms par 'jug pa dang / ldang ba shes pa dang / shes rab dang / thabs zung du 'brel ba dang / mngon par shes pa ma nyams pa 'thob pa dang / ma skyes pa dang / ma byung bar so sor rtog pa
51a4(mdo sde): dang / bsams bzhin du skye ba dang / smon lam yongs su rdzogs pa dang / sems can la lta ba'i byams pa la sbyor ba dang / snying rje chen po la nges par sems pa dang / chos la sgyu ma lta/
51a5(mdo sde): bur rtog pa dang / 'chi'i pho mang mar 'pho zhing skye ba dang / chos kyi mtshan nyid rmi lam gyi ngo bo nyid kyi chos la 'jug pa dang / phyin ci log gi chos la yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtog pa dang
51a6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs nas skye ste/ 'pho zhing 'byung la skye ba dang / 'pho ba dang 'byung bar yang mi sems pa'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gang
51a7(mdo sde): dang gang du skyes nas/ sems can gyi don byeng ba'i skyes pa'i rabs bstan pa tshad med grangs mod pa'i skyes pa'i rabs dag thams cad ni rtsa ba gnyis la gnas pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ mngon
51b1(mdo sde): par shes pa'i ye shes la gnas pa dang / snying rje chen po'i rtsa ba la gnas pa'o// rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' skye ba dang / 'chi 'pho dang / 'byung ba rnams la dbang thob pa
51b2(mdo sde): yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bdud bzhi'i lam las yang dag par 'das shing bdud dang phyir rgol ba thams cad yang dag par bcom po yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu
51b3(mdo sde): 'di la byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur shes shing rtogs pas phung po'i bdud las yang dag par 'da' 'o// ji ltar thos pa'i chos la tshul bzhin so sor rtogs pa'i don
51b4(mdo sde): mongs pa'i bdud las yang dag par 'da' 'o// rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rtogs pras 'chi bdag gi bdud las yang dag par 'da' 'o// byang chub kyi sems las mi nyams pas lha'i
51b5(mdo sde): bu'i bdud las yang dag par 'da' 'o// yang des bdud kyi las rnams bcom pa yin te/ des bdud kyi las rnams bcom pa gang zhe na/ gang dag gis byang chub sems dpa' la bdud
51b6(mdo sde): kyis glags mi rnyed pa ste/ theg pa dman pa 'dod pa bdud kyi las dang / byang chub sems mi srung ba bdud kyi las dang / sems can tha dad par sbyin pa bdud kyi las dang / skye ba la gnas
51b7(mdo sde): ba'i tshul khrims bdud kyi las dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ gzugs su bsngos pa'i bzod pa dang / 'jig rten gyi bya ba la brtson pa'i brtson 'grus dang / de la chags shing ro myang ba'i
52a1(mdo sde): bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyis chos ngan pa la smod pa bdud kyi las dang / 'khor bas yongs su skyo ba bdud kyi las dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su mi sngo ba
52a2(mdo sde): bdud kyi las dang / nyon mongs pa la smod pa bdud kyi las dang / ltung ba 'chab pa bdud kyi las dang / byang chub sems dpa' bo la sdang ba bdud kyi las dang / dam pa'i chos spong ba bdud
52a3(mdo sde): kyi las dang / byas pa rgyun gcod pa bdud kyi las dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yongs su mi tshol ba bdud kyi las dang / dam pa'i chos mnyan par mi 'dod pa bdud kyi las dang / chos la slob
52a4(mdo sde): dpon gyi dpe mkhyud byed pa bdud kyi las dang / zang zing dang 'brel bar chos ston pa bdud kyi las dang / thabs dang bral bas sems can yongs su smin par byed pa bdud kyi las dang / bsdu
52a5(mdo sde): ba'i dngos po 'dor ba bdud kyi las dang / tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams la khong khro ba bdud kyi las dang / tshul khrims dang ldan pa rnams la mi gus pa bdud kyi las dang / nyan thos kyi bslab/
52a6(mdo sde): pa'i rjes su 'thun pa bdud kyi las dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa can gyi rjes su 'jug pa bdud kyi las dang / dus ma yin par sgrub 'dod pa bdud kyi las dang / snying rje chen po bor nas
52a7(mdo sde): rigs la rtogs pa bdud kyi las dang / 'dus ma byas 'dod pa bdud kyi las dang / 'dus byas la spong ba bdud kyi las dang / sems can gyi ci byil cag la g.yel ba bdud kyi las dang /
52b1(mdo sde): nga rgyal la gnas shing mi bdud pa dang / lce gnyis smra ba dang / g.yo skya dang ldan pa dang / bcos ma la dga' ba dang / mi drang ba dang / rtsub cing badrang ba dang / sdig pa la mi spong ba dang / chos kyi/
52b2(mdo sde): rmyangs 'byin pa dang / zas pa cung zad cam gyis chog par 'dzir pa dang / chos ma yin pa don du ga tu ba dang / chas ma yin pa 'dod pa da // sgrib pa dang / tshang pa dang / kun nas ldang ba rnam pan
52b3(mdo sde): mi gnod pa bdud kyi las dang / sems kyi dri ma mi rdeg pa bdud kyi las dang / dge sbyong gi dri la mi mjed pa bdud kyi las te/ rigs kyi bu ji tsam du mi dge ba'i chos la 'jug pa dang / dge
52b4(mdo sde): ba'i chos 'dor ba de thams cad ni bdud kyi las so// chos pa nas ni bdud kyi las 'di dag las shin du 'da' ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems ma brjed pa'i pha rol tu phyin/
52b5(mdo sde): pa drug po dag dang / dang pa dang / brtson 'grus la gnas pa'i bag yod pa dang / thabs mkhas pa la gnas te/ sems can yongs su smin par byeng ba dang / chos kyi tshul zab mo la
52b6(mdo sde): brdas te/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pas so// rigs kyi bu de ltar chos la sbyor ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni bdud ba ni'i lam las yang dag par 'das shing / bdud dang phyir rgol pa
52b7(mdo sde): thams cad bcom pa yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji skar na byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams tshad med pa bsags shing sems can thams cad 'tsho bar gyur pa yi mnan/ rigs kyi bu /
53a1(mdo sde): la byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can rnams la byams pas gnas pa yin/ 'byung po rnams la snying rje bar gnas pa yin// bsam gtan rnams la de la ma chag
53a2(mdo sde): par gnas pa yin/ slong ba rnams la bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba yin/ bsod nams ngag gis longs spyod mi zad pa yin/ bsam pa dag pas lag na rin po che yin
53a3(mdo sde): mtho dman gyi yid med pas sems dang mtshungs pa yin/ tshul khrims yongs su dag pas bsam pa 'byor pa yin// mchod sbyin thams cad sgrub pas sems grol zhing sgo bsgribs pa
53a4(mdo sde): med pa yin/ chos rnam par 'byed pas gzungs dang spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing tshad med par 'gro bas mngon par shes pa'i ye shes la gnas pa yin no//
53a5(mdo sde): ji ltar phyi rol gyi 'byung ba chen po bzhi po 'di dag sems can thams cad kyi 'tshe bar gyur pa de bzhin du/ bdag gi nang gi 'byung ba chen po 'di dag kyang sems can thams cad kyi 'tshe bar
53a6(mdo sde): gyur cig/ bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang / chos shes pa la mkhas pa gang yin pa de sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho ba ma yin par ma gyur cig ces de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams kyang yongs su/
53a7(mdo sde): bsngo ste/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams tshad med pa bsags shing // sems can thams cad kyi 'tsho bar gyur pa yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
53b1(mdo sde): sangs rgyas rnams ma byung yang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pas sems can rnams la nye bar gnas pa yin zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni gnas dang gnas ma yin pa'i bya ba
53b2(mdo sde): shes pas stobs bcu yongs su sbyang bar bya ba tshar phyin pa yin/ zag pa zad pa'i bya ba shes pas mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su sbyang bar bya ba tshar phyin pa yin/ dus gsum la chags pa med
53b3(mdo sde): pa'i ye shes kyi bya ba shes pas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su sbyang bar bya ba tshar phyin pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan snang ba thob pas/ spyan lnga yongs su sbyang bar bya ba
53b4(mdo sde): tshar phyin pa yin ka byang chub kyi snying por 'gro ba thob pas/ mngon par shes pa thams cad yongs su sbyong bar bya ba tshar phyin pa yin/ nyon mongs pa'i bag chags yang dag par bcad pas/
53b5(mdo sde): dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su bskang ba tshar phyin pa yin/ bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad bsags pas lus dang / ngag dang / sems dang / mtshan dang / dpe byad bzang po'i rgyan
53b6(mdo sde): yongs su sbyang bar bya ba tshar phyin pa yin/ dbang bkur ba thob pas sa bcu yongs su sbyang bar bya ba tshar phyin pa yin/ ye shes kyi tshogs bsags pas sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs
53b7(mdo sde): su sbyang bar bya ba tshar-i phyin te// rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas rnams ma byung yang sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pas sems can rnams la nye bar gnas pa yin no// rigs
54a1(mdo sde): kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin thob cing sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa la mi chags pa yin zhe na// rigs kyi bu
54a2(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ dper na 'dzam bu'i gling na sems can rnams kyi gzugs snang ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad dang 'dra ba'i phyag rgya rgya mtsho chen po la yod do/ de'i phyir rgya mtsho chen po zhes bya'o// de bzhin
54a3(mdo sde): du sems can thams cad kyi sems su snang ba 'am/ gzugs su snang ba 'am/ sgrar snang ba ji snyed pa de dag thams cad rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sems
54a4(mdo sde): kyi snang ba gcig la snang bar 'gyur te/ de'i phyir rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o// 'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni ro gcig pa yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang
54a5(mdo sde): chos la rnam par grol ba'i ror shes pas ro gcig pa yin no// 'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni dus las mi yol ba yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang dus dang dus ma yin/
54a6(mdo sde): pa la so sor rtog pas/ byang chub kyi snying po'i dus las mi yol lo// 'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni shi ba'i ro dang lhan cig mi gnas so// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
54a7(mdo sde): yang bag chags kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems can thams cad dang lhan cig mi gnas so// 'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni chu
54b1(mdo sde): thams cad zad pas bri ba 'am/ gang ba med do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang chos thams cad zed pas chos kyi dbyings bri ba 'am gang bar mi byed do// 'di lta ste/ dper
54b2(mdo sde): na rgya mtsho chen po na kha tshon tshad med do// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang shes rab kyis tshad med do// 'di lha ste/ dper ni rgya mtsho chen po ni zab cing gting dpag dka' ba yin no//
54b3(mdo sde): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang zab cing nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gting dpag dka' ba yin no// 'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtsho chen po ni sems can tshad med
54b4(mdo sde): pa'i gnas yin no// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems can yongs su smin par bya ba tshad med pa'i gnas yin no// 'di ni rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pa yin te/
54b5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de ltar zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can thams cad kyi sems dang po spyod pa la mi chags pa yin no// rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chags
54b6(mdo sde): pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa yin zhe na/ chags pa zhes bya ba ni gang chos rnams la lta ba kun nas ldang ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' ni lta ba kun nas ldang ba thams cad dang bral
54b7(mdo sde): bas chags pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa yin no// 'di lta ste/ dper na rlung dmar ni nam mkha'i dkyil la ma chags so// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rlung dmar
55a1(mdo sde): lta bu'i sems dang ldan pa'ang sems can thams cad la mi chags so// yang skyes bu dam pa de dag ni spyad pa dang / cho ga'i tshul shes pa yin te/ de la cho ga ni dran
55a2(mdo sde): pa'o// spyad pa ni rnam par mi g.yeng ba'o// de dag ni mun pa dang bral zhing snang ba thob pa'ang yin te/ de la mun pa zhes bya ba ni gong chos rnams la mi shes pa'o// snang ba zhes bya ba ni gang tshe
55a3(mdo sde): rnams la ye shes thogs pa med pa ste/ de'i phyir de dag mun pa dang bral zhing snang ba thob zhes bya'o// skyes bu dam pa de dag ni ye shes gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog cing rang gis ye shes thob pa yin
55a4(mdo sde): te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag rang byung gi ye shes la mngon par gnas shing sems can gzhan ye shes 'dod par byed pa yin no// gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos gtan la 'bebs
55a5(mdo sde): ba'i ye shes bstan pa 'di la gzhan gyi dring la mi 'jog cing rang gi sa ye shes thob par gyur pa de'i tshe/ myur du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan
55a6(mdo sde): 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so// gang zhig lta ba kun las sems dben zhing // mkhas pa bskyod nams tshogs ni rab byed la// mtshan ma ldang ba yongs
55a7(mdo sde): su spangs nas su// byang chub phyir bsngos de ni zad mi 'gyur// nga rgyal las kyang nga rgyal kun spangs nas// de ni ye shes tshogs rnams tshol bar byed// mtha' yas blo ldan nam
55b1(mdo sde): mkha'i ngo ba nyid// kun mkhyen ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed// rgyal ba'i sras de sangs rgyas rjes dran pa// gzugs dang mtshan gyis chos su ma yin te// nang na sems
55b2(mdo sde): dang yid ni mi rgyu ba// de ni 'thun par sangs rgyas rjes su dran// chos ni 'dod chags bral zhing rang bzhin dben// ne zhing rab ni rtag du mtshan ma med// gang zhig dmigs pa thams
55b3(mdo sde): cad bra gyur pa// de 'dir chos ni rjes su dran pa yin// 'phags pa'i dge 'dun shin du 'dus ma byas// stong pa mtshan med smon lam rnam par grol// de la sems med dran
55b4(mdo sde): dang 'jug pa med// de ni dge 'dun rjes su dran pa yin// phung po yongs su gtang ba thams cad gtong // nyon mongs dngos po thams cad legs par 'dor// skems pa med
55b5(mdo sde): cing rtogs dang rnam rtog dag/ 'di ni gtong ba legs par rjes su dran// tshul khrims zag pa med cing 'dus ma byas// lus dang ngag dang yid kyis 'jug pa med// 'byung ba
55b6(mdo sde): med cing srid gsum mi gnas pa// de ni tshul khrims rjes su dran pa yin// lha gang dag cing dri med nyon mongs med// dga' ldan gnas pa dbang bskur thob gyur pa// sems can
55b7(mdo sde): dag pa de dag 'dir dran zhing // bdag kyang myur du de 'drar 'gyur snyam sems// de bzhin gshegs kyi dam chos 'dzin pa ni// nyon mongs dngos po thams 'dzin mi byed// chos
56a1(mdo sde): dang chos min gnyis las rnam par grol// de 'dra de ni rgyal ba'i chos 'dzin yin// rgyal ba'i byang chub mtshan nyid gang gnyis pa// chos kyi mtshan nyid de ni songs
56a2(mdo sde): 'dzin cing // gang gis rdul med mtha' 'di rab shes pa// de ni sangs rgyas kun gyi chos 'dzin yin// bdag ni rab tu dag pas sems can dag/ chos kun dag par mkhas pa sus rtog pa// /
56a3(mdo sde): de ni sems dag rang bzhin 'od gsal te// sems can gdon phyir rtag tu yongs smin byed// sems can khams rnams ma rung mi byed cing // de ni bri zhing gang bar mthong ba med// lta ba nor pa
56a4(mdo sde): rab tu spang bar ston// de 'dra de ni sems can mang po sbyong // 'jig rten yul kun rab tu gang ston pa// des ni sangs rgyas yul yang rab tu bstan// sangs rgyas yul ni nam mkha' mtshung
56a5(mdo sde): pa ste/ de bzhin 'jig rten yul yang rab tu shes// sgra skad dbyangs dang yi ge thams cad ni// brag cha 'dra ba de yis rab mthong zhing // de la nyan pa'ang shin du yod min par// de ltar rab
56a6(mdo sde): tu shes pa gzungs 'thob bo// kun tu 'dzin dang 'dzin cing klog pa dang // chos rnams bstan pa'i rnam par rab bshad kyang // bdag dang sems can chos su rloms sems med// de ni
56a7(mdo sde): gzungs la rab tu gnas pa yin// rgyal ba kun gyis gsungs pa 'dzin byed cing // legs par gsungs pas sems can tshim byed pa// dran dang ting nge 'dzin dang bral mi 'gyur/
56b1(mdo sde): bzungs langs pas san tan 'di dgapa tshas na rnam pa ga tu bas gas med pas// rgyas lam 'dra' bras pa myeng pa bang mam// da na myu du rnan yabs pa// hA/
56b2(mdo sde): yang chos kyi char pa 'bebs// yon tan 'byung gnas rnams kyi spobs pa ni// thogs med rgyun chags rgyun chang mi 'gyur bar/ mdo lnga sbyong phrag bye bo rab tu 'chang // sems can dang
56b3(mdo sde): por sems can 'du shes med// sangs rgyas mthu yis bskal pa bye stong du// rgyun mi 'chad par chos ni rab ston cing // bsam pa ji bzhin sems can tshim par byed// spobs pa'i
56b4(mdo sde): tshul gyis sangs rgyas yon tanA gnas// chos 'di thams cad nam mkha' 'dra ba nas// gang gis chos rnams kun gyi tshul shes la// sems can srog dang gang zag mi 'dzin pa// de ni/
56b5(mdo sde): rgyal ba rnams kyi dam chos 'dzin// sems can thams cad shin tu mya ngan 'das// de dag de ltar kun du skye ba med// su yi bzod 'di dri med 'od gsal ba// de ni bstan pa 'di la
56b6(mdo sde): bag yod yin// phung po yang dag sgyu ma lta bur mthong // chos dbyings ci 'dra de bzhin khams rnams shes// dbang po drug ni grong stong 'drar mthong ba// de ni phung po'i bdud las yang
56b7(mdo sde): dag 'da'// sprin brtsegs phung po lta bur nyon mongs rnams// bag yod tshul bzhin rab tu rtog byed cing // chos la mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa// de ni nyon mongs bdud las yang dag
57a1(mdo sde): 'da' gang zhig skye ba rtag tu skye med shes// 'di la gang yang 'pho med 'gro ba med// chos rnams 'ongs med song ba med shes pa// de ni 'chi bdag bdud kyi
57a2(mdo sde): dbang mi 'gro// gang zhig g.yo dang rlom sems mi byed cing // byang chub gnas kyang byang chub 'du shes med// bdag dang sems can med kyang snying rje 'jug/ de ni dpung dang bcas pa'i bdud
57a3(mdo sde): 'dul lo// rnam shes ye shes gnyis ni mnyam par mthong // 'dus byas mi gnas 'dus ma byas la min// 'gro ba'i sems ni sgyu ma 'drar mthong ba// de ni sems pa'i rdzib med pa
57a4(mdo sde): yin// pha rol tshu rol gang la'ang mi chags la// chos ldan gru ni yang dag su sbyor zhing // sems can sgrol yang sems can 'du shes med// mnyam pa zhes bya byang chub sems dpa' de
57a5(mdo sde): srid pa gsum po 'brog dgon 'dra ba dang // stong pa 'gyur ba med par rab shes shing // lam gyi rim gyis rtag tu sems can sgrol// de ni ded dpon bdud rtsi lam ston pa// mdzad
57a6(mdo sde): pa de ni tshul dang tshul mi mkhas// chos rnams 'dod nas stong par rab tu shes// tshul dang rigs pas mya ngan 'das la 'dzud// byang chub sems dpa' de ni 'dren ces bya// sems
57a7(mdo sde): kyi rgyud ni gzhan dang gzhan du 'gyur// sems ni sems la rnams kyang mtshams mi sbyor// 'gro ba'i sems rgyud de dag rab shes pa// byang chub sems dpa' yongs su 'dren
57b1(mdo sde): ces bya/ rnam mapa'i nga ba cang dang chu ba ltar// chos rnams thams cad dag cing nam dag ces// nyon mongs kun dang 'dre bar mi byed pa// sems can dag pa de ni ma sma ba// ngan
57b2(mdo sde): zhig chos gcig gis ni chos rnams kun// sgyu ma smig rgyu 'dra bar gzung med dang // gsog dang brdzun dang rtag pa med par shes// de ni byang chub snying por myur du 'gro// chos gtan/
57b3(mdo sde): la 'bebs pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na// lga dang / mau dang / lha ma yin dang / mi 'am tsuM dang / lce'i phye chen po'i srog chags khrag khrig phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis bla na med pa yang dag par
57b4(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// byang chub sems dpa' sum khri nyis stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
57b5(mdo sde): 'di'ang rnam pa drug du rab tu g.yos so// snang ba chen pos kyang 'jig rten gyi khams khyab par gyur to// lha brgya stong dag kyang me tog gi char rab tu 'bebs shing sil snyan dag kyang dkrol
57b6(mdo sde): nas 'di skad ces gang dag bstan pa 'di thos nas mos pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / nan tan byed pa'i sems can de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi yul du rjes su drong ba yin no// gang du sangs rgyas
57b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rnams byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di thams cad mkhas pa rnams kyis rgyan gyis legs par brgyan pa byas te phyag bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas byung bar gyur/
58a1(mdo sde): bya/ na/ chos 'di lta bu 'di rab tu ston par 'gyur ro// skyes bu dam pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro/ zhe ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do/ des/
58a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis zhus pa lung bstan pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod mngon du rangs par mdzad pas mu tig gi dra ba 'od dri ma med cing rnam par dag pa
58a3(mdo sde): stong gsum yongs su gang ba ri ba bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la mngon par gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ye shes ni/
58a4(mdo sde): chags pa mi mnga' zhing sgrib pa mi mnga' ba/ bstan pa ni rgyan mi 'chad pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can thams cad kyi sems la gzigs shing dbang po mchog dang mchog ma/
58a5(mdo sde): yin pa mkhyen pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di 'dra ba'i chos kyi tshul gyi rnam pa bstan pa des 'khor thams cad kyi sems tshim par gyur to// theg pa chen po
58a6(mdo sde): 'di'ang rgyas par brjod pa mdzad par gyur to// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag la'ang chos kyi snang ba chen pos rgyas par mdzad par gyur/
58a7(mdo sde): to/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas bdag la'ang chos 'byung ba'i sgo bstan pas chos 'byung ba'i sgo des chos 'byung ba'i sgo tshad ma mchis pa bstan par bgyi'o// /
58b1(mdo sde): bam po bzhi pa/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur bar spobs pa zhes bya ba de 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des
58b2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu gang khyod kyi ming nam mkha' mdzod ces bya ba de// ci nam mkha' khyod kyi mdzod dam/ smras pa// rigs kyi sra
58b3(mdo sde): de bzhin te/ nam mkha' ni kho bo'i mdzod do// myur bar spobs pas smras pa/ rigs kyi bu nam mkha'i mdzod kyi bye brag bdag cag gis kyang blta'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub
58b4(mdo sde): sems dpa' nam mkha'i mdzod la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis nam mkha' mdzod kyi khyab par ston cig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i mdzod kyis/ byang chub sems
58b5(mdo sde): dpa' myur bar spobs pa la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyi yid la gang 'dod pa de kho bos nam mkha' las char dbab bo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' myur bar spobs pa 'di
58b6(mdo sde): snyam du sems te/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che ut+pa la'i dpal gyi 'jig rten gyi khams pad+ma bkod pa zhes bya ba na/ 'od thams cad rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i pad+ma rgya ni rgyang grangs kyi tshad/
58b7(mdo sde): 'dab ma bye ba stong phrag mang po 'jam zhing gnon pa/ gos ka tsa lin di ka ltar reg na bde ba/ dris ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing khyab pa/ kha dog mang po brgya stong dang ldan pa/ mthong na yid du 'ong zhing
59a1(mdo sde): chog mi shes pa/ pad+ma de mthong ba dang dri bsnams pas byang chub sems dpa' de dag ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ba de dag gis mthong ste/ 'khor 'dir de 'dra ba'i pad+ma'i
59a2(mdo sde): char po ba cig snyam pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' myur bar spobs pas bsams ma thag tu/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis nam mkha'i ngos las de 'dra//
59a3(mdo sde): ba'i pad+ma'i char mngon par phab ste/ de na 'khor de dag thams cad pad+ma de dag gi dri tsher zhing mthong bas dga' ba'i zas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// 'khor de thams cad
59a4(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin las langs te/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i mdzod la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces 'dzer to// skyes bu dam pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / ye shes kyi stobs legs so/
59a5(mdo sde): legs so// sems can thams cad kyang 'di 'dra ba'i byin gyi rlabs thob par gyur cig/ de na byang chub sems dpa'i rin chen bkod ces bya ba 'du bar gyur te 'dug pa des/ byang chub sems
59a6(mdo sde): dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis nam mkha' las gser phye'i char phob cig/ byang chub sems dpa' rin chen bkod kyis tshig de skad ces smras
59a7(mdo sde): ma thag tu/ de'i meng la nam mkha' las gser phye'i char mngon par bab bo// de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' rin chen bkod kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di
59b1(mdo sde): gang ces smras sa// rags kyi bu byang kyis nam mkha' las rin pa rnathams cad kyi char babaca/ tshig gad ces sbas mthag tu/ de'i mong la phyogs brnyan dza ma rab rlagrangs med
59b2(mdo sde): dpag tu med pa ming tha dad pa kha dag tha dad pa yod pa de dag gi char chen po mngon par bab pa 'di lta ste/ gser dang / dngul dang / shel dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / rdo'i snying po dang / mu tig dmar po
59b3(mdo sde): dang / spug dang / dpal gyi snying po'i ze ba can dang / dri med dang / rin chen b+ha ru dang / zla ba'i 'od dang / me shel dang / snang byed dang / 'od mchog dang / 'dzam gling 'od dang / me 'od dang /
59b4(mdo sde): dung dang / man shel dang / b+hu ru dang / an+da rnyil dang / yon tan 'byung gnas dang / rab tu zhi ba'i 'od dang / chu 'od dang / chu mdog dang / chu drang bar byed dang / sa'i 'od dang / mi byed/
59b5(mdo sde): pa'i gnas dang / mig mi bzod pa dang / brgya byin thogs pa dang / rgyal ba dang / cher rgyal ba dang / gzi brjid 'brar dang / dpal gyi snying po'i rgyal po dang / rdo rje'i ze bcan dang /
59b6(mdo sde): rten snang byed dang / skar ma dga' dang / 'od 'dzin dang / zla gam dang / 'dzam bu'i chu 'od dang / 'dzam bu'i gling gi 'od dang / 'od stong ldan dang / skar mda'i sgo dang / me'i 'od dang /
59b7(mdo sde): rgyal bas brgyan pa dang / tsha bzhi byed dang / gdung ba med pa dang / nad sel ba dang / mig sbyong dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid skyong dang / yan lag rnam par sna
60a1(mdo sde): ba dang / rnam par snang ba'i 'od dang / 'od sngon po dang / 'od ser po dang / dkar po dang / shel gyi kha dog dang / rin po che'i dra ba dang / rin po che thams cad yang
60a2(mdo sde): dag par bsdus pa dang / ming de lta bu dang / ming de ma yin pa'i rin po che'i char rab tu bab ste/ nor bu rin po che de dag gi ming bskal par yang zad par smra ba ma yin no// de nas byang chub sem
60a3(mdo sde): dpa' dus kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba des/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can sdug bsngal
60a4(mdo sde): zhing dbul ba zos dang skom med pa/ gcer bu gos med pa/ gos ral po gyon pa dang / yi dgas rnams bkres shing skom pas yongs su zin pa/ gcer bu rang gi sgras yog pa/
60a5(mdo sde): mchil ma dang / ngar snabs dang / khrag dang / rnag za 'dod pa de lta bu'i sems can de dag bskyab pa'i phyir/ zas dang / skom dang / gos kyi char khyod kyis phob cig/ de nas de ma
60a6(mdo sde): thag du byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/ bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / myang ba dang / bldag pa sna tshogs kyi char rab tu phab ste/ ro brgya dang ldan pa
