60a7(mdo sde): khu ba dang bdung ba thams cad kyi char gyi rgyun shing rta'i srog shing tsam gyi char mngon par phab bo// gos kha dog du ma dang / kha dog tha dad pa dang / kha dog brgya stong du maM dang / phra zhing
60b1(mdo sde): 'jam pak+Sha tsa lin da ka wAr reg na bde ba'i char rab tubapa ste// de nas skyong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bkren pa dang / dbul po thams cad dang / sri dgas rnams
60b2(mdo sde): cad kun tshim par byas so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sman pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba des/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so// ribs kyi bu sa
60b3(mdo sde): can nab g.yog med pa dang / nang du mos reg pa yod pa de dag gi don du/ sman chen po'i char gang gis na ba de dag thams cad nad las yongs su thar bar 'gyur ba thob cig/ de na
60b4(mdo sde): de ma thag tu bar snang las bdud rtsi'o sman gyi char mngon par rab tu phab ste/ des nad thams cad las yongs su thar par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' ngan song spong zhes/
60b5(mdo sde): bya ba des/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis ngan song gsum zhi bar gyis shig/ de nas de ma thag tu bar snang las 'od
60b6(mdo sde): rab tu btang ste/ sems can dmyal ba pa dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas pa dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can rnams 'od des reg pa de dag thams cad bde ba dang rab tu
60b7(mdo sde): ldan par gyur te/ ngan song gsum po thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur te/ 'di ltar sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba la rab tu sbyor ba'i bar du me tog dang / 'phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug par
61a1(mdo sde): phye ma dang / chos gos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang ba dan la sogs pa dang / rol mo sna lnga dang ldan pa dang / glu'i dmangs dang / bran po dang /
61a2(mdo sde): bran mo dang / chung ma dang / khye'u dang / bu mo dang / slas dang rta dang / bal glang dang / shing rta dang / dpung bu rlung dang / bzhon pa dang / khyim dang / grong dang / grong khyer dang /
61a3(mdo sde): grong rdal dang / ljongs dang yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor dang / skyed mos tshal dang / yang thog dang / khang pa brtsegs pa dang / khang bzang dang / rta babs dang / skar
61a4(mdo sde): khung dang / zla ba kham pa lta ba dang / khri dang / khyogs dang / glang bzhi pa dang / gling bcu drug pa nas/ rta cang shes stong gis drang ba dang ldan pa'i shing rta'i bar gyi char bar snang las
61a5(mdo sde): mngon par rab tu bab po// de nas byang chub sems dpa' ram mkha' mdzod kyis de lta bur byin gyis brlabs nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po la smras pa/ rigs kyi bu dag
61a6(mdo sde): 'di dag long la byin cig/ yongs su gtong bar gyis te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par gyis shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi rgyun ces bya ba des//
61a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i cha ra~M ni phab na/ da'ang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i char
61b1(mdo sde): phob cig/ des tshig de skad ces smras mthag tu/ phyogs bcu na sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams tshul khrims kyi yon tan gyi rgyan gyi bsngags pa ji snyed brjod pa de skad kyi
61b2(mdo sde): tshul khrims kyi yon tan dang bsngags pa'i smra bar snang las byung ngo // de bzhin du bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi yon tan gyi sgra yang ji tsam
61b3(mdo sde): phyogs bcu na sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams yi ge dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / brda dag gis chos kyi sgo brgya stong ston pa'i chos kyi sgra de dag thams cad ma chad ma lhag
61b4(mdo sde): khyud ma zhugs par bar snang las mi lus par rdzogs par byung ngo // chos kyi sgra des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad go bar byas so// de na tshad med grang
61b5(mdo sde): med pa'i sems can theg pa gsum la yongs su smin par byas par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun du snang ba zhes bya ba de 'di snyam du sems so// byang chub sems
61b6(mdo sde): dpa' nam mkha' mdzad kyis bkod pa 'jig rten 'di 'ba' zhig na 'am/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag na'ang yod skam pa dang / de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod
61b7(mdo sde): kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu snang ba'i sems kyi kun du rtog pa sems kyis shes so// shes nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' kun tu snang la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs
62a1(mdo sde): kyi bu khyod shin du dri ma med cing shing du rnam par dag pa'i lha'i mig rnyed na/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyi phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su ci mthong ltos shig
62a2(mdo sde): de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun du snang bas lha'i mig gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnams su bltas na/ des phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med dpag tu med pa dag
62a3(mdo sde): naji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir rin po che thams cad kyi char rab tu phab pa dang / chos kyi sgra thams cad grag pa de bzhin du/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na'ang ma chad ma lhag khyad ma zhugs
62a4(mdo sde): par 'di lta bu'i bya ba rnams rab tu 'byung bar mthong ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu snang ba ngo mtshar du gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyi smon lam gyi byin gyi
62a5(mdo sde): rlabs pa de ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ ga lar yang cig car sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du skyes bu dam pas 'di 'dra ba'i char ston par rab tu phab po zhes ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do//
62a6(mdo sde): de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des gang du rin po che'i char dang / chos kyi char rab tu 'bab pa'i
62a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag mthong ngo // yang byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis// rin po che'i char dang / chos kyi char gyi cho 'phrul 'di bstan pas bgrang ba las 'das pa'i sems
62b1(mdo sde): can rnams byang chub tu sems skyes so// de nas rgyal po'i khab nas bud med yugs mo lnga brgya byung nas/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod ga la ba der dong ste lpags nas// byang chub
62b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so// skyes bu dam pa khyod sems can thams cad kyi 'dod pa rdzogs par mdzad na/ bdag cag la'ang khyo stsol cig/ de nas dam
62b3(mdo sde): thag tu byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis bud med de dag gi sngon gyi khyo nyid kha dog dang / mtshan ma dang / dbyibs ci 'dra ba de lta bu'i skyes pa lnga brgya nam mkha'
62b4(mdo sde): las babs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyi mdun na 'khod do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis/ bud med de dag la 'di skad ces smras so//
62b5(mdo sde): sring mo dag bdag bdag gi khyo ji lta ba bzhin du khrid cig/ de nas bud med de dag gis ji lta bur rang rang gi khyo gang yin pa khrid nus dga' mgu rangs shing rab tu dga' ste/ yid bde ba skyes nas
62b6(mdo sde): rang rang gi khyim du dong ngo // de nas sprul pa'i skyes bu de dag gis zhag bdun du bud med de dag ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa de lta de ltar smin par
62b7(mdo sde): byas so// de nas yang bud med lnga brgya po de dag byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyi thad du lhags nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces smras so// chos kyi rang bzhin stong pa sgyu ma
63a1(mdo sde): 'dra chos kyi mtshan nyid de ni sngon ma 'tshal// de phyir khyod kyis sprul pa'i khro stsal te// bdag cag theg pa'i mchog la des smin bgyis// chos 'di thams
63a2(mdo sde): cad yang dag sprul pa ste// g.yo ba med cing byed med snga nas stong // zag med ye shes dag gis rab rtogs te// slan chad nyon mongs dbang du myi mchi'o// byang chub mchog gi sems ni
63a3(mdo sde): bskyed par bgyi// sems can thams cad mgron du gnyer bar bgyi// sems can rgya chen khyod kyis phab pa bzhin// bdag cag gis kyang chos mchog char pa dpag// 'dren mchog
63a4(mdo sde): thub pas de dag lung bstan pa// khyed cag ma 'ongs dus na 'gyur ba ni// spyad pa spyad nas rgyal ba'i dbang po dag shin tu dul zhes bya ba'i bde gshegs 'gyur// yang de'i tshe na mi
63a5(mdo sde): lnga brgya gsad par chud de gsang du khrid pa las/ de dag gis bar snang las sems can rnams byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod ces bya ba gang 'jigs pa'i sems can rnams
63a6(mdo sde): la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa zhig yod kyis/ de la khyed cag phyag tso la cig dang / gsad pa 'di las thar par 'gyur ro zhes sgra zhig thos so// de nas de dag thams cad shi bas 'jigs
63a7(mdo sde): skrag pas sgra skad gcig du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod la phyag 'tshal lo zhes tshig de skad smras so// tshig de skad ces smras ma thag tu/ skad cig/
63b1(mdo sde): de nyid la bar ldang la mi lnga brgya babs te der lhags nas/ gshed ma mi de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// khyed cag gis mi dbul po 'di dag gsad de ci rung / nged cag gi gos dang
63b2(mdo sde): rgyun rnams khyer la/ nged cag gi srog tshong de mi 'di dag bye zhig/ de dag chags pas non pa'i phyir/ gsad par chang pa'i mi lnga brgya po de dag btang ste/ sprul pa'i skyes bu de dag gsad/
63b3(mdo sde): ro// de nas mi gsang pa las btang ba de dag gsad pas 'jigs shing skrag pa las dbugs 'byin pa rnyed pas/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod ga la ba der dong ste lhags
63b4(mdo sde): nas rngabacom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la'ang mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la'ang thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to//
63b5(mdo sde): skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis bdag gi srog dang / dbugs 'byin pa rnyed par bgyis na bdag cag chos gang l+ya nAn tan du bgyis pas bdag la sman pa dang // gzhan la sman pa la zhugs
63b6(mdo sde): por 'gyur ba'i chos bstan pa bdag cag la sAl du gsol/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis smras pa/ rigs kyi bu khyed cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
63b7(mdo sde): byang chub tu sems skyed cig dang / 'di ltar khyed rnams bdag la phan pa dang / gzhan la phan par zhugs par 'gyur ro// de dag la de skad ces smras pa dang / bla na med pa yang
64a1(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de dag la byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis brgya stong ri ba'i ras bcos bu zung gcig byin te/ grogs
64a2(mdo sde): po dag ras bcos bu zung 'di de bzhin gshegs pa la gsol cig/ de dag thams cad kyis ras bcos bu zung de de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la mngon par gsol te/ de dag thams cad bcom
64a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bskal pa bgrang ba las 'das pa na byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams yang dag par bsgrubs nas mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten du 'byung
64a4(mdo sde): zhes lung bstan to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis gang mi skam mi zad ma dengs pa'i
64a5(mdo sde): nam mkha' la mdzad bzhag nas ji srid lo na/ nam mkha' mdzod kyis smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ ci nam mkha' skam pa 'am/ zad pa yod dam/ dengs par
64a6(mdo sde): 'gyur ram/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de lta ma yin no// smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du/ byang chub de ni nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid de/ de la bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams
64a7(mdo sde): der bsngos pas/ de bas na nam mkha' la mdzod mi sems mi zang mi dngas so// yang khyod kyis nam mkha' la mdzod bzhag nas ji srid lon zhes zer ba ni// kho bos byang chub tu sems
64b1(mdo sde): bskyeng nas ji srid lon pa de srid do// smras pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis byung chub du sems bsgred nas ji sring lon/ smras pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen pas mabyed do// de nas
64b2(mdo sde): gnas brtan shA ri'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'ongs byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis byang chub du sems bskyed nas ji sring
64b3(mdo sde): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu gal te de bzhin gshegs pas gnas 'di bstan na lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten rnams myos par 'gyur ro// gsol
64b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das 'khor 'di na sems can gang rnams rtog pa mang zhing dad par 'gyur ba dag mchis kyi sa bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu 'di
64b5(mdo sde): lta ste/ dper na gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams na/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma skyed pa de skad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rdul phrag rab kyi rdul skad kyis yongs su gang bar gyur te/
64b6(mdo sde): rdul phrag rab kyi rdul de dag ji srid yod pa de snyed kyi bskal pa brgya stong zhing rdul phrag mo gcig bzhag la/ de lta bur bgrang ba dang mtshan mar banag pas de skyed kyi rdul phrag ma tham
64b7(mdo sde): cad ni zad par 'gyur gyi/ ji srid nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i bskal pa grangs med/
65a1(mdo sde): pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong de dag la zad pa gang yang med do// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang gi thad nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'
65a2(mdo sde): mdzod kyis dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan tsi zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yang shA ri'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rin po che bkod pa
65a3(mdo sde): zhes bya ba'i bskal pa la sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad ston pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan
65a4(mdo sde): pa rna bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das smon lam thams cad las//
65a5(mdo sde): shin tu byung ba/ rin po che'i gzi brjid 'phags pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ yang shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yod pa de
65a6(mdo sde): ngag gi tshe'i tshad bskal par gnas kyang bshad par sla ba ma yin no// shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa de'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor ni 'jig rten gyi khams skyong gi tshad du gyur te/ byung
65a7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun ni bgrang ba las 'das pa zhig byung ngo // shA ri'i bu de'i dus na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der stong gsum gyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po lha thams cad kyis/
65b1(mdo sde): dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba zhig byung ste/ rin po che'i mdzod bsam gyis mi khyab bo// de'i bu rdzus te skyes pa rang gi gzi brjid kyis mngon par grub pa sum khri drug stong yo // de ci'i phyir/
65b2(mdo sde): zhen/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni bud med kyi ming yang med do// shA ra'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa de'i tshwa'i tshad kyang bskal pa stong phrag brgya thub pa// de nas rgyal po lha thams cad kyis
65b3(mdo sde): dbang bskur bas/ rab kyi bskal pa bzhi bcur bcom ldan 'das de la bsnyen bkur dang rim gro byas te/ nyin gcig la 'god pa yang ri rab bye ba stong skad kyi rin po che'i phung po
65b4(mdo sde): zad par gyur pa de lta bus bsnyen bkur dang rim gro byas so// de nas rgyal po de bsod nams kyi sa brtan pas bu'i tshogs dang / grong gi mi rnams dang / 'khor rnams dang bcas
65b5(mdo sde): te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// shA ri'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po lha thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba de
65b6(mdo sde): gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod sems na/ de de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod de'i tshe de'i dus na/ skyong gsum gyi 'khor lo
65b7(mdo sde): ba'i rgyal po lha thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba zhes bya bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to//
66a1(mdo sde): ma byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod 'dis bsam gyis mi khyab po cha bgos te/ bcom ldan 'das de srid nas theg pa la rab tu zhugs pa ngo mtshar to// bcom/
66a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das de 'dra ba'i spyod pas 'di 'dra ba'i chos kyi mthu chen po rnyed par rus so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod 'di gang+gA'i
66a3(mdo sde): klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim gro dang bsti stang byas te/ byang chub kyi sems yongs su sbyangs so// gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi byang chub kyi sems yongs su
66a4(mdo sde): dag pas bsam pa yongs su sbyangs te/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bsam pa yongs su dag pas sbyor ba yongs su sbyangs / gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sbyor ba yongs su dag pas lhag pa'i
66a5(mdo sde): bsam pa yongs su sbyangs// gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma skrod kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pas sbyin po'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyangs/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
66a6(mdo sde): yongs su dag pas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyangs/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma skyed kyi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs
66a7(mdo sde): su sbyangs/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyangs// gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi brtson 'grus kyi pha
66b1(mdo sde): rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pas/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyangs/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pas/ shes rab kyi ga
66b2(mdo sde): rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyangs/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pas/ thabs kyi rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyangs/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma med kyi
66b3(mdo sde): thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pas/ sems can thams cad la khong khro bo med pa'i sems dang / theg pa pa med pa'i 'od zer yongs su sbyangs// gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis ma/
66b4(mdo sde): can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa'i sems dang thogs pa med pa'i 'od zer yongs su dag pas/ byams pa chen po yongs su sbyangs pa nas/ snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang /
66b5(mdo sde): btang snyoms chen po dang / mngon par shes pa chen po'i ye shes kyi bar du yongs su sbyangs so// de bzhin du lus yongs su dag pa dang / ngag yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs su
66b6(mdo sde): dag pa ste/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems yongs su dag pas// skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gcig yongs su sbyangs so// de bzhin du sbyar te/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis
66b7(mdo sde): thams cad nas/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan thams cad yongs su dag po'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bar bar du nges gang+gA'i'o klung gi bye ma snyed las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su dge bas
67a1(mdo sde): nam mkha'i mdzod 'di yongs su dag par byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod 'dis yongs su sbyangs so// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'
67a2(mdo sde): mdzod 'dis nam mkha' las byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad ston te/ shA ri'i bu ji ltar nam mkha' la zad pa med pa de bzhin du ni rigs kyi bu 'di'i smon lam dang spyod pa thams
67a3(mdo sde): cad yongs su dag pas gang la'ang zad pa med do// des na 'di nam mkha'i mdzod ces bya'o// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na byang chub sems dpa' khri longs spyod mi zad pa dang / lag
67a4(mdo sde): na rin po che dang / nam mkha' mdzod kyi smon lam yongs su bskang ba'i bzod pa skyes so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba dris/ byang chub sems dpa' nam
67a5(mdo sde): mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu bdag cag gis nam mkha' las chos bsgrog pa'i mdzod mnyan to// nam mkha' mdzod kyis smras pa ka de'i phyir rigs kyi bu
67a6(mdo sde): gus pa dang bcas shing zhe sa dang bcas par 'dug la/ nam mkha' 'di la ston par 'du shes skyed cig dang / chos mnyan pa'i mdzod thos so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos
67a7(mdo sde): kyi rgyal po dang 'khor de dag thams cad thal mo sbyar nas nam mkha la phyag 'tshal te 'khod do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i mdzod kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi bar snang las tshig
67b1(mdo sde): su bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo // nam mkha' 'dra ba'i yid rnams kyis// thams cad chos kyi tshul gang yin// de la 'jug par rab bstan gyis// khyed cag mthar gyis mnyan par gyis
67b2(mdo sde): nam mkha' la ni mtho ba med// dma' ba'ang yod pa ma yin te// gang gis chos nyid mtho dman med// de la 'dud pa ga la yod// nam mkha' la ni skye ba med// 'gog pa dag kyang
67b3(mdo sde): ma dmigs so// ma skyes pa yi chos rnams la// de la rnam par 'jig pa med// nam mkha' la ni 'bri ba meng // gang ba dag kyang mi dmigs so// chos rnams gang med 'bri
67b4(mdo sde): med de// nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs mnyam mo// nam mkha' la ni mun pa med// de ni de yis skon mi mongs// sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal bas// de bas nams kyang ston
67b5(mdo sde): mongs med// nyi bla yi ni 'od zer gyis// nam mkha' dga' bar mi 'gyur te// nam mkha' 'dra ba'i sems rnams kyang // gang la'ang dga' bar 'gyur ba med// mdung thung rtsa
67b6(mdo sde): gnyis 'bab pas kyang // nam mkha' la ni skyon mongs med// de bzhin sdug bsngal sgo kun gyis// rgyal ba'i sras ni skon mi mongs// bdud rtsi dus kyi char pa yis// rnam
67b7(mdo sde): mkha' la ni dga' 'gyur med// rnyeng dang bsti stang thams cad kyis// byang chub sems dpa' dga' mi byed// bstod pa dang ni smad pa la// nam mkha' yongs su mi rtog ste/
68a1(mdo sde): de bzhin bde dang sdug bsngal la// byang chub sems dpa' brtan mi g.yo// sa bdag g.yos par gyur kyang ni// nam mkha' nam yang g.yo ba med// 'jig rten/
68a2(mdo sde): 'di dag g.yo 'khrug kyang // byang chub sems dpa' 'khrug pa med// bsreg pa'i bskal pa 'byung ba na// ji ltar nam mkha' mi 'tshig pa// de bzhin nyon mongs thams cad kyis//
68a3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' brtan mi gdung // skye ba med cing 'dul ba'ang med// ji ltar nam mkha' gnas pa bzhin// chos rnams 'od med 'gro ba'ang med// chos kyi dbyings la de dag gnas
68a4(mdo sde): gzugs su snang ba ji snyed pa// nam mkha'i las ni thams cad 'byung // chos su snang ba ji snyed pa// de dag chos kyi dbyings la 'byung // mtshan ma med cing gzugs med pa// nam mkha'
68a5(mdo sde): ltar yod ma yin te// de ltar sems rnams rab shes na// nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs mnyam mo// ming tsam pa ni nam mkha' ste// de la kha dog dbyings kyang med// sems dang yid dang
68a6(mdo sde): rnam shes kyang // ming gis yongs su bstan pa'o// ji ltar nam mkha' mtha' med cing // thams cad du yang gzung du med// de bzhin ye shes mthu chen kyang // nam mkha' dang ni mnyam nyid
68a7(mdo sde): mtshungs// sems can nam mkhar 'gro mod kyi// de la 'gro ba'i rjes kyang med// sems can byang chub phyir spyod kyang // de ni spyod pa'i mtshan ma min// ji ltar sngon gyi mtha' yi lus//
68b1(mdo sde): nam mkha' dang ni mtshungs 'dra ba// de bzhin phung po'ija ba nyid// nam mkha' dang ni mnyam zhing mtshungs// khams bzhi dag kyang nam mkha' dang // mtshungs shing 'dra bar rab tu gsungs/
68b2(mdo sde): 'di ltar bsreg pa'i bskal pa la'ang // nam mkha' dang ni khams 'di mtshungs// ji ltar sems can thams cad kyis// rnams kyang yongs su gang mi nus// de bzhin yul rnams kun gyis
68b3(mdo sde): kyang sems kyi rgyud ni mi gang ngo // tshig chen seng ge'i sgra dag gis// 'jig rten mgon gyis gsungs pa ni// 'jig rten 'das pa'i shes rab gang // de dag bstan pa 'di la ngoms//
68b4(mdo sde): ji ltar nam mkha' rgya che bas// mtha' ma dmigs par mi 'gyur te// de bzhin sangs rgyas chos rnams kyang // mtha' ma dmigs par mi 'gyur ro// chos rnams thams cad sangs rgyas chos
68b5(mdo sde): gang gis yang dag nyid shes na// de dag dngos po mi 'jig cing // dngos po dag la'ang mi gnas so// dngos dang dngos med rnams shes shing // yang dag mtha' la gang gnas pa// dngos
68b6(mdo sde): po dang ni dngos med par// lta ba mkhas pas mi 'dzin to// stong pa nyid ni sgra yis bsgrags// sgra la stong pa nyid med de// de ni sgra med brjod pa med// de phyir stong pa nyid ces bya// sangs rgyas
68b7(mdo sde): kun gyis bshad kyang ni// stong pa nyid ni brjod du med// gang de stong zhes bya ba yang // de yi don ni brjod du med// sgyu ma smig rgyu rmi lam dang // mig yor dang ni brag cha rnams// de la sog/
69a1(mdo sde): pa bshad pa yis// 'dren pa rnams ni chos ston to// sems can rnams ni drang ba'i phyir// dpe rnams shin tu kun bstan te// rab tu zhi ba'i chos rnams la/
69a2(mdo sde): gnyen po rnams ni mi dmigs so// mtshan nyid med pa'i chos kun kyang // mtshan nyid du ni rab tu bstan// mtshan gzhi mtshan gzhi med pa dag/ chos kyi dbyings la mi dmigs so// mtshan
69a3(mdo sde): gzhi nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de// nam mkha' mtshan nyid med pa yin// gang gis tshul 'di rab rtogs pa// de dag byang chub sems dpa' yin// chags pa med cing bcings pa med//
69a4(mdo sde): shin du cung zad med pa ste// spros med spros dang bral ba de// byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o// sems can las ni de ma grol// sems can la yang mi gnas shing // sems can//
69a5(mdo sde): rang bzhin ye shes kyis// byang chub sems dpa' zhes de bya// sems can rab tu mya ngan 'das// thos nas dngang par mi byed de// gang de byang chub rab zhugs pa// dpa' bo dag gi ge/
69a6(mdo sde): cha 'di// sgyu ma byed pa sems can dag/ mang du sprul nas der gsad kyang // de la gsad pa gang yang med// sems can mtshan nyid de bzhin no// sgyu ma dang ni sems can dang // mya
69a7(mdo sde): ngan 'das dang sangs rgyas kun// rnam pa kun du rang bzhin gcig/ rang bzhin rang bzhin med par rtogs// nam mkha' las ni nam mkha'i mdzod// mi zad pa yi mdzod grub ste//
69b1(mdo sde): sems can thams cad mgu byed cing // mdzod de zad par mi 'gyur ro// tshad med bsod nams chu bos ni// mdzod 'di rnam par sbyangs pa ste// chos rnams la sang 'ab med par// chos/
69b2(mdo sde): rnams chos nyid blta bar bya// rgyu la brten te byung ba yi// chos rnams thams cad rab shes na// de yi mdzod ni mi zad de// chos kyi mdzod ni bsam mi khyab// chos bzhi 'di dag mi zad
69b3(mdo sde): par/ 'jig rten mgon pos rab gsungs te// sems can nam mkha' byang chub sems// de bzhin sangs rgyas chos rnams so// de ste de dag rdzas yin na// de dag yongs su zad
69b4(mdo sde): 'gyur gyi// de dag med pas mi zad ces// de bas de ni mi zad gsungs// chos ni rab tu skad cig pa// zad pa chos ni mi zad de// mi zad de la zad pa med// de phyir mi zad pa zhes
69b5(mdo sde): bya/ byang chub sems dpa' gang zhig gis// chos bstan 'di ni rab shes na// de ni byang chub rnyed mi dka'// byang chub nyid la yang dag zhugs// tshigs su bcad pa bstan pa 'di byung ba
69b6(mdo sde): ni/ byang chub sems dpa' brgyad stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo// lha'i bu nam mkha'i dkyil na 'khod pa khro nyis stong ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
69b7(mdo sde): bskyed do// de nas 'khor de nyid du byang chub sems dpa' ltad mo can zhes bya ba 'dus par gyur te/ 'dug pa des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
70a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das sgra 'di ga las byung snyam du bdag ngo mtshar du gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod
70a2(mdo sde): la dris shig dang // 'dis khyod la lan ston no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' lhud mo can gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi
70a3(mdo sde): bu sgra 'di ga las byung snyam du bdag lhad mor 'dzin par gyur to// nam mkha' mdzod kyis smras pa// rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/ brag cha'i sgra ga las byung / smras pa/
70a4(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu pha rol gyi sgra'i rnam par rig byed las brag rwa'i sgra 'byung ngo // smras pa/ rigs kyi bu brag cha la lus sam/ sems sam/ gzugs sam/ kha dog gam
70a5(mdo sde): dbyibs gang yang yod dam/ smra sa pa rigs kyi bu de ni med do// smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no// ji ltar brag cha yongs su ma grub kyang sgra skad go bar byed pa de bzhin
70a6(mdo sde): nam mkha' yongs su ma grub ste/ sgra dang skad go bar byed par 'gyur ro// smras pa/ rigs kyi bu sgra 'di go bar byed pa su gang nas dbyangs 'di 'byung / smras pa/ rigs kyi bu ye shes
70a7(mdo sde): kyi so sor rnam par rig pa bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ kho bos yid kyi sems pas gang bsam pa de bar snang 'di las byung yang / sems de der 'gro ba'ang med// de 'dir 'ong ba'ang/
70b1(mdo sde): med mod kyi gasgra'i sgra brnyan yang 'byung ngo // rigs kyi bu rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ji tsam du bad pa la ltos/ gang rgyu la 'bras bu 'byung yang / rgyu 'bras bu 'grub pa mi 'bo la/
70b2(mdo sde): rgyu med pa las kyang 'bras bu 'byung ba ma yin no// 'di lta ste/ rgyu dang rkyen las 'bras bu mngon par 'grub pa'i chos 'di gnyis ka la'ang g.yo ba med cing byed pa med do// gang de lta bu'i
70b3(mdo sde): 'du shes pa de dag ni bral ba ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang glang kun nas nyon mongs pa shes pa de nyid de'i rnam par byang ba zhes gsungs so// kun nas nyon mongs
70b4(mdo sde): babasal bas rnam par byang ba ma yin te/ gang kun ras nyon mongs pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid de ni rnam par byang ba'o// 'di lta ste/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba zhes
70b5(mdo sde): bya ba 'di gnyis ka yang brda'i tshig go/ don dam pa'i mtha' la kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba'ang dmigs su med do// don dam pa'i mtha' ni mtha' ma yin te/
70b6(mdo sde): 'di mtha' ma yin pa ni yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya'o// gang yang dag pa'i mtha' de stong pa nyid kyi mtha' 'o// gang stong pa nyid kyi mtha' de bdag gi mtha' 'o// gang dag gi mtha'
70b7(mdo sde): de ni chos thams cad kyi mtha' 'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad de'i mtha'// stong pa nyid kyi mtha'// nye bar zhi ba'i mtha' ste/ gang mtha' de gsum gyi sgo la mi chags pa de ni tshe
71a1(mdo sde): thams cad la mi chags pa'i ye shes rnyed do// de nas gnas brtan shA ri'i bus/ byang chub sems dpa' ltung mo can la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi rtsa
71a2(mdo sde): khyod ldad mo can zhes ming sus brtags/ smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod gang dang gang du chos la 'dun pa dang / brtson pa de dang der ltad mor mi 'gyur ram/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu
71a3(mdo sde): de de bzhin no// smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du kho bo chos thams cad la 'dun cing brtson pa de dang der kho bos nam sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur
71a4(mdo sde): snyam du ltad mo dang ldan te/ de'i phyir kho bo ltad mo can zhes bya'o// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad la kho bo ltad mor gyur te/ sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa
71a5(mdo sde): la 'jug pa shes pa la kho bo ltad mor gyur te/ de'i phyir kho bo ltard mo can zhes bya'o// gang la kho bo lhad mor mi 'gyur ba'i ye shes de gang yang med/ 'jug pa de gang yang med pas//
71a6(mdo sde): de'i phyir kho bo ltad mo tsan zhes bya'o// gang du kho bo lhod mor gyur pa der nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / bdud kyi las thams cad kyi skabs med// de'i phyir na kho bo ltad mo can zhes
71a7(mdo sde): bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ gnas brtan shA ro'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam pa'i ming 'di nyid las sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su/
71b1(mdo sde): brjod de/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad sngon kyang gang la'ang mi chags te/ chags pa ma mchis par sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang ston pa ni ngo mtshar to// de nas 'khor de nyid du byung drug
71b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' rin tshon dpal zhes bya ba 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzad la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis ting nge 'dzin rab tu bstan
71b3(mdo sde): pa las brtsams te/ gang ci 'dra bar ting nge 'dzin yongs su snang ba bya ba la spobs par gyis shig/ de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis// byang chub sem
71b4(mdo sde): dpa' rin chen dpal la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin byang chub kyi snying por thogs pa med par 'gro ba bsam pa dag pa zhes bya ba yang ngo //
71b5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa'i 'od zer ces bya ba yod de/ de bdag dang gzhan bsrung ba'i phyir/ gzhan gyi gnod pa tham/
71b6(mdo sde): cad las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur ro// dri ma med ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sems yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni dge ba'i chos tham/
71b7(mdo sde): cad rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// dge ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni rnyog pa med par 'gyur ro// mngon par 'phags zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong bar 'gyur ro//
72a1(mdo sde): rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni nyon mongs pa thams cad 'dul bar 'gyur ro// 'khyil pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni g.yas phyogs kyi lam yongs su
72a2(mdo sde): rdzogs par 'gyur ro// zlog pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni rgyu dang lta ba las rnam par zlog par 'gyur ro// dga' byed ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni chos kyi ku ri dga' la dga' zhing mos
72a3(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro// skar ma'i rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sbyin gnas yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// mthu drag po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sems mi 'jug par 'gyur ro//
72a4(mdo sde): mtshungs pa mnyam pa nyid la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sems can thams cad la sems mnyam par 'gyur ro// byed pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni las rnam par smin pa/
72a5(mdo sde): la 'jug par 'gyur ro// seng ge'i rtog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni 'jig pa dang spu zing zhes byed pa med par 'gyur ro// sems dpa' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni nyon mongs pa'i bdud thams
72a6(mdo sde): cad skrag par 'gyur ro// pad+ma dkar po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni 'jig rten thams cad kyis mi gos par 'gyur ro// pad+ma bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sems kyi rgyan du 'gyur ro// 'od bas
72a7(mdo sde): ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhing snang bar 'gyur ro// bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba spong bar 'gyur ro// rgyal mtshan gyi rtse
72b1(mdo sde): mo'i dpung rgyan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos la snang bar 'gyur ro// skar mda' ldan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni bag chags thams cad 'jom par 'gyur
72b2(mdo sde): ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni mun pa mun nag med par 'gyur ro// nyi ma 'khyil ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sems can thams cad kyi sems la rnam par lta bar 'gyur ro// yon tan
72b3(mdo sde): 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni yon tan gyi chos thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro bar 'gyur ro// sred med kyi bu lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni pha rol rgol ba thams cad 'joms par 'a
72b4(mdo sde): snying po'i rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni rdo rje'i lus mi phyed par 'gyur ro// snying po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni dam bcas pa thams cad nyams 'og tu chud par 'gyur
72b5(mdo sde): rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni mngon par shes pa las mi nyams par 'gyur ro// rdo rje'i snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar 'gyur ro// rdo rje lta bu zhes
72b6(mdo sde): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni chos thams cad rab tu rtogs par 'gyur ro// spyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa la 'jug pa'i ye shes su 'gyur ro//
72b7(mdo sde): sa 'dzin ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni chags pa dang zhe sdang med par 'gyur ro// bdud kyi dkyil 'khor 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni bdud bzhi las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur/
73a1(mdo sde): lus rnam par 'jigs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni gzugs thams cad rnam par 'jig par 'gyur ro// mi 'dzums pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni rtse gcig tu 'gyur ro// nam/
73a2(mdo sde): pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni dmigs pa thams cad yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni dmigs pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyuraro//
73a3(mdo sde): 'khor lo dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// glog 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sems kyi skad cig 'jig pa la rnam par lta bar 'gyur ro// legs
73a4(mdo sde): par byas pas rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spong bar
73a5(mdo sde): 'gyur ro// lus kyi rgyan ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// gang gi rgyan ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni tshangs pa'i sgra skad sgrags pas sems can
73a6(mdo sde): thams cad kyi sems mgu bar 'gyur ro// sems kyi rgyan ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni ting nge 'dzin las mi nyams par 'gyur ro// brtan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro//
73a7(mdo sde): mtshungs par gtong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sems can tha dad med par 'gyur ro// tshul khrims bsags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni smon lam thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro//
73b1(mdo sde): bzod pa'i go bgos pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni lus dang srog la mi lta bar 'gyur ro// brtson 'grus brtan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni mngon par shes pa myur bar 'gyur ro// tshad med pa
73b2(mdo sde): rnam par zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni tshangs pa la dbang byed par 'gyur ro// ci'ang med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni gzugs med pa'i khams yongs su sbyong bar 'gyur ro// lhun po'i rgyal mtshan
73b3(mdo sde): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzir ni sems can thams cad zil gyis gnon par 'gyur ro// lhun po'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni phyogs bcur rnam par lta bar 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi skar mda'
73b4(mdo sde): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sgrib pa dang / chod pa dang / kun nas ldang ba thams cad rnam par sel bar 'gyur ro// rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni las dang bya ba sna tshogs la 'jug
73b5(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro// mtha' yas 'khyil pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni lta ba thams cad yongs su gcod par 'gyur ro// stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ri mi dmigs pa dang lbu ba thams cad spong
73b6(mdo sde): bar 'gyur ro// mtshan ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / yongs su rtog pa thams cad spong bar 'gyur ro// smon pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
73b7(mdo sde): lam thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni g.yo ba dang sems pa thams cad 'joms par 'gyur ro// sgra dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni
74a1(mdo sde): spobs pa thogs pa med par 'gyur ro// kun 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni thos pa thams cad 'dzin par 'gyur ro// dran pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting
74a2(mdo sde): 'dzin ni tshad med pa'i snod kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad tshol bar 'gyur ro// mi zad pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sems can thams cad mgu bar 'gyur ro// rin chen bkod pa zhes bya ba'i
74a3(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin ni lag na rin po che rab tu rnyed par 'gyur ro// rjes su 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sems can thams cad kyi sems shes par 'gyur ro// 'gro ba la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
74a4(mdo sde): ni 'gro ba thams cad rtogs par 'gyur ro// blo gros la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sems drang yid rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// sprin dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni mos pa ji lta ba
74a5(mdo sde): bzhin du chos kyi char rab tu 'bebs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni bdud rtsi'i chos rnyed par 'gyur ro// chos rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni 'dod chags
74a6(mdo sde): dang bral ba'i chos mngon sum du byed par 'gyur ro// dge 'dun rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sangs rgyas kyi chos las mi ldog par 'gyur ro// gtong ba rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge lani/
74a7(mdo sde): ni phung po thams cad rab tu 'dor bar 'gyur ro// tshul khrims rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi rtsa ba la rab tu 'gong par 'gyur ro// lha rjes su dran pa zhes bya
74b1(mdo sde): ba ting ba dzin ni rnam par dag pa'i rnas la ba na mtha ba med par 'gyur ro// chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin na rgyas thams cad la sang dag par gnas bur 'gyur ba rnam
74b2(mdo sde): mkha'ang bcang ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin na chos thams cad la chags pa med par 'gyur ro// rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzad patho par 'gyur ba/ rlung
74b3(mdo sde): chags pa dang rgyud ma yin pa'i rjes su rtog pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni yi ge thams cad dang tshig rab tu dbye ba shes pa la mkhas pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// shin tu sbyangs pa'i dri ma med pa'i phyag rgya
74b4(mdo sde): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ni ting nge 'dzin gang dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' de sems kyi skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
74b5(mdo sde): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// rigs kyi bu de dag ni ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo brgyad du ste/ ting nge 'dzin de re re la'ang 'khor ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo lnga brgya lnga brgya yod do// de dag thams cad bsdoms na ting nge
74b6(mdo sde): 'dzin pa ni khrir 'gyur te/ de dag kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba'i ting nge 'dzin brgyad khrir 'gyur ro// de dag sngon gyi mtha' dang / phyi ma'i mtha' dang / da ltar byung ba mi zad pa'i ye
74b7(mdo sde): shes kyis ting nge 'dzin brgyad khri bzhi stong du 'gyur ro// ting nge 'dzin ji snyed pa chos kyi sgo mo'ang de snyed/ chos kyi phung po'ang de snyed de/ de'i phyir sems can gyi spyod pa brgyad khri bzhi stong la
75a1(mdo sde): rab tu 'jug pa'i phyir chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong de bzhin gshegs pas bshad ces bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang spyod pa la 'jug pa sem
75a2(mdo sde): can rnams shes par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi mdo'o// gang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mtha' dag dang / sems can gyi spyod pa mtha' dag bshad la 'jug pa de ni tshad med bsam gyi mi khyab ste/ bskal pa brgya//
75a3(mdo sde): stong gi mthar 'dug kyang bshad par sla ba ma yin no// sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'di yongs su bstan cing ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo 'di dag bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' khri drug stong ni ting nge 'dzin dang /
75a4(mdo sde): shes kyis mngon par bsgrubs pas/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur to// lha'i bu brgyad khri bzhi stong ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so// bcom ldan
75a5(mdo sde): 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ skyes bu dam pa khyod kyis ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo 'di bstan pa ni legs par smras te/ lus mngon sum pas gzhan gyi
75a6(mdo sde): dring la mi 'jog pa'i chos rnams la ji lta ba bzhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes yongs su brjod pa 'di shin du yongs su bstan pa ni legs so legs so//
75a7(mdo sde): bam po lnga pa/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la// byang chub sems dpa' rin chen dpal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gang gi
75b1(mdo sde): zung du byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis thog mar nam mkha' 'di las rin po che thams cad kyi char rab tu dab pa/ de gang ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byung chum
75b2(mdo sde): sems dpa' rin chen dpal la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ bskal pa bgrang ba las 'das pa'i pha rol gyi yang ches pha rol du gyur pa de'i tshe
75b3(mdo sde): dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/
75b4(mdo sde): bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dri ma med pa'i 'od mtha' yas 'od zer gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ ska rags zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams su yon tan
75b5(mdo sde): gyi 'od ces bya ba'i bskal pa la 'jig rten du byung ste/ yang rigs kyi bu ska rags zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de'ang 'byor pa/ bde ba/ lo legs pa/ rgyas pa/ skye bo mang po dang mis
75b6(mdo sde): gang bas rin po che sna bdun gyis brgyan pa/ 'jam zhing mnyen pa/ gos ka tsa lin di ka lta ri reg na bde ba/ 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser gyi pad+ma bkram pa/ rin po che gsal ba sna tshogs kyis rnam
75b7(mdo sde): bar smras pa/ mig mangs ris su bres pa/ lag mthil ltar mnyam ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams de 'di lta ste/ dper na gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi longs spyod dang kun skyong ba ltar
76a1(mdo sde): 'dug go// mi de dag thams cad kyang gzhal med khang dang khang pa brtsegs pa na gnas par gyur cing bsams pas zas gom rab tu 'byor to// de'ang rigs kyi bu de/
76a2(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i 'od mtha' yas 'od zer gyi rgyal po'i byang chub sems dpa' khrag khrig phrag drug cu'i byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po byung ngo // yang rigs kyi bu de'i
76a3(mdo sde): tshe de'i dus na/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bsod nams kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa zhig byung ste/ yang rigs kyi bu rgyal po bsod nams kyis brgyan pa de'i
76a4(mdo sde): khang pa 'dzam bu'i gling gi dbus su brtsigs par gyur te/ shar phyogs su'ang dpag tshad bzhi/ nub phyogs dang / lho phyogs dang / byang phyogs su'ang dpag tshad bzhi bzhi pa bkra ba~M/ bltan
76a5(mdo sde): sdug pa/ rin po che sna bdun las byas pa/ skyed mos tshul lnga brgyas rab tu brgyan pa'o// yang rigs kyi bu rgyal po bsod nams kyis brgyan pa'i btsun mo brgyad khri ba ni skyong yod de/ thams cad
76a6(mdo sde): kyang yul gyi bzang mo sha sdug go// khye byargya khri ba ni stong song do// thams cad kyang tshun chen po'i stobs dang drug yul 'chang ba ga skrag go// yang rigs kyi bu rgyal po bsod nams kyis ban+d+han
76a7(mdo sde): bal btsun ma rin po cha gnyis yod do// gcig gi ming ni dpal gyigazi brjid/ gcig gi ming ni dpal gyi 'ong ngo // rgyal ba bsod nams kyis brgyan pa de dga' bo ba song pa zhes bya ba'i skyed mo sa chis
76b1(mdo sde): duzhugs te/ btsun mo'i nang na 'dug pa'i tshe lha mo gnyis kyi bang pa nas lde' gnyis drung \u0f7f/ rdzus te skyes pa/ snron gyi sbyor ba phun sumatshogs pa/ smon lam rtogs pa/ dran med pa yang da/
76b2(mdo sde): bar rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par zhugs pa ste/ gcig gi ming ni seng ge zhes bya/ gcig gi ma ni sa li'i rtsal gyis 'gro ba zhes byaste/ de gnyis byung ma thag tu smra sad dbyangs gcig tu/
76b3(mdo sde): bsod nams kyis brgyan pa la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// sngon byas dge dang mi dge chung mi za// de bzhin gshegs la mchod byas chung mi za// bsam pa byang chub sems kyang chung mi za/
76b4(mdo sde): sgrub pa gtsor byed thos pa chud mi za// sbyin dang dul dang sdom pa chung mi za// bzod dang nges pa rnams kyang chud mi za// byas pa gzo zhing dge ba'i las bya'i phyir// brtson 'grus brtsams pa de yang
76b5(mdo sde): rgyud mi za// rje gcig bsam gtan dang ni rnam thar sems// nges par rtogs dang shes rab sems mi nyams// ye shes las byas rtag tu mi 'khrugs te// mi 'khrugs chos las byang chub rnyed
76b6(mdo sde): mi dka'// de ni nyon mongs pa yis mi gos te// de ni slar yang mngal du mi gnas shing // de ni pad+ma'i snying por rdzus te skye// mi gos pa ni pad+ma chu las ltar// shar phyogs logs kyi rgyal bsnun
76b7(mdo sde): pa'i rgyal// dus gsum mi chags ye shes dam pa yis// bde gshegs dri med 'od kyi gnanas su// chos 'di phyir ni de nas bdag cag 'angs// u dum wa ra'i me tog ji lta bar// de bzhin
77a1(mdo sde): gshegs pa 'byung ba rnyed par dkas// de la bsnyen bkur bgyi dang blta srung ngu// bde gshegs thad du yab kyang bzhung par bgyi// rgyal pos rjes su bstan pa 'di thos nas
77a2(mdo sde): bu dang btsun mo 'khor dang lhan cig tu// srog chags bye ba stong gis yongs bskor te// rgyal ba de yi gan du nye bar dong // me tog dri zhim byug pas bcas pa yis// de la tshul dang 'dra ba'i mchod byas
77a3(mdo sde): nas/ zhabs la phyag 'tshal rab tu bskor byas te// thal mo sbyar ba byas nas spyan sngar 'dug/ seng ge dang ni seng ge'i rtsal 'gro yang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la bzung nas su/
77a4(mdo sde): gtugs nas chos dang don ldan mkhas pa yi// 'phags pa des ni tshogs bcad 'di dag smras// khyod ni skyabs dang mgon dang dpung gnyen te// 'jig rten ldongs pa rnams kyi sgron mar gyur// sems
77a5(mdo sde): can rnams kyi bsam spyod gyur la mkhas// ji ltar mos pa de bzhin gnas par mdzad// rgyal po 'di ni phyug cing skyid pas myos// gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang bcas pas bcings// nam yang ston pa
77a6(mdo sde): la ni mchod phyir yang // nye bar mi mchi chos lta ga la nyan// mgon pos thugs rje rab tu skyed mdzod la// ji ltar de kun lhan cig thos nas su// theg pa mchog las ldog par mi 'gyur ba// byang chub
77a7(mdo sde): lam mchog de ni legs par ston// bcom ldan mgon po ta la brgyad cu srid// nam mkhar 'phags bzhugs mi dbang de la gsungs// nga yi chos mchog rgyal po khyod nyon la// thos nas de la
77b1(mdo sde): tshul bzhin nan tan gyis// 'dod pa mi rtag de bzhin rgyal srid srog/ srog ni rtswa yi zil pa'i thigs pa'ang // rno ba de bzhin 'dod de rmi lam 'dra// mkhas pa su zhig 'di la dga' ba bskyed
77b2(mdo sde): sems can gang yang 'dod pas ngoms med de// phyir yang de bzhin 'dod pas skom zhing rgyug/ byis pa ngoms mi shes shing yul la gnas// shes rab gang ngoms de dag shin du ngoms//
77b3(mdo sde): ma slu zhing snying po med pa ltar// de bzhin phung po lnga yang sgyu ma 'dra// khams rnams 'di dag sbrul gdug bzhin du bstan// dbang po drug ni stong pa'i grong dang 'dra// bu dang chung ma rgyal srid dul
77b4(mdo sde): 'khor yang // 'chi bar gnas pa'i grogs su 'gyur ba med// sbyin dul kun sdom tshul khrims phung po ni// de dag pha rol 'gro ba'i grogs yin no// nga yi gzugs dang yon tan spobs pa rdzog
77b5(mdo sde): rdzu 'phrul dag kyang ci 'dra rab ltos la// gal te 'di 'dra bar yang 'gyur 'dod na// byang chub dam pa 'di phyir sems skyed cig/ rgyal po bal glang des ni chos thos nas// srog chags bye ba sto
77b6(mdo sde): phrag bdun cu dang // sras dang btsun mo stobs bcas grong mi rnams// byang chub dam pa 'di phyir sems bskyed de// bdag cag mchog gi sems ni bskyed par bgyi// sems can thams cad
77b7(mdo sde): mgron du gnyer bar bgyi// byang chub spyod mchog yid 'ong spyad par bgyi// 'gro ba bla med sangs rgyas 'gyur bar bgyi// rigs kyi bu de ltar rgyal po bsod nams kyis brgyan pa des/ bcom
78a1(mdo sde): ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas pa la lo brgyad khri bzhi skyong gi bar du rung ba yid du 'ong ba kha na ma tho ba med pa'i bde ba'i yo byad dang / yongs su longs spyod pa thams cad kyi
78a2(mdo sde): rim gro byas so// khye'u seng ge dang seng ge'i rtsal gyis 'gro ba de gnyis/ bcom ldan 'das de'i bstan pa la khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo // de dag rab tu byung bas rgyal bu phyi mnyi
78a3(mdo sde): khri'ang khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung ngo // de nas seng ge dang seng ge'i rtsal gyis 'gro ba'i dge slong byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang / yo byad bsrungs pa dang / dben par spyod pa la
78a4(mdo sde): sbyor zhing brtson pas ring po ma lon par mngon par shes pa lnga bskyed do// de dag mngon par shes pa rnyed nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs dang // smon
78a5(mdo sde): lom gyi stobs kyis chos bshad nas de gnyis kyis sems can tshad med grangs med pa yongs su smin par byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu bkod par gyur
78a6(mdo sde): te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ltar lo brgyad khri bzhi stong 'das nas/ rgyal po bsod nams kyis brgyan pa de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i 'od mtha' yas 'od zer gyi rgyal po
78a7(mdo sde): ga la ba der song ba dang / des khye'u de gnyis rab tu byung bar mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang ngas ni lo brgyad khri bzhi stong gi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa la bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur
78b1(mdo sde): byas na/ 'di gnyis rab tu byung nas ngas ma byas snyam/ ci zhig byas snyam du brnyes pa'i sems skyes so// rigs kyi bu de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i 'od mtha' yas 'od zer gyi
78b2(mdo sde): rgyal pos/ rgyal po bsod nams kyis brgyan pa de lta bur sems pa mkhyen nas/ byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyis 'gro ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis
78b3(mdo sde): shes rab dang / mngon par shes pa dang / bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi stobs ston la 'khor thams cad dga' bar gyis shig/ bdud kyi gnas thams cad mog mog por gyis shig/ bya
78b4(mdo sde): chub kyi lam 'bar bar gyis shig/ sems can thams cad tshim par gyis shig/ pas kyi rgol ba thams cad tshar chod cig/ chos kyi sgron ma 'bar bar gyis shig/ nyon mongs pa thams cad
78b5(mdo sde): zha bar gyis shig/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par rol pa ston cig/ de nas de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyis 'gro ba'i de'i dus na/ nam mkha' la lag pas byugs nas/
78b6(mdo sde): des nam mkha' la lag pas byugs pa dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos so// des yang nam mkha' la lag pas byugs pa dang / de nas
78b7(mdo sde): de'i tshe bar snang las sil snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgyad stong ma dkrol bar sgra byung ngo // des yang nam mkha' la lag pas byugs pa dang / de nas bar snang las sngon ma mthong ma thos pa dri zhim/
79a1(mdo sde): zhing 'jam pa ka tsa lin di ka ltar reg na bde ba'i me tog rnams kyi char bab bo// des yang nam mkha' la lag pas byugs pa dang / de nas de ma thag tu bar snang las/
79a2(mdo sde): rin po che thams cad kyi char rab tu mngon par bab/ longs spyod kun spyod pa thams cad kyi char rab tu bab bo// ji lta bur stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams der yo byad thams
79a3(mdo sde): kyi char mngon par rab tu 'bab pa de de lta bu'i zas dang / skomo dang / bro'i char mngon par rab tu bab bo// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i 'od mtha' yas 'od zer gyi rgyal pos/
79a4(mdo sde): rgyal po bsod nams kyis brgyan pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen po khyod kyis sbyin pa yongs su btang ba dang / rin po che'i char 'bab pa 'di gang mang / gsol pa/ bcom
79a5(mdo sde): ldan 'das rin po che'i char 'di ni dper bgyi ba'ang smra ba ma lags te/ de tsam du tshad ma mchis so// bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyis 'gro ba/
79a6(mdo sde): 'di mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi stobs kyi 'dod na/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams su 'di 'dra ba'i rin po che'i char mngon par 'bebs so// gang 'jig rten gyi
79a7(mdo sde): khams de dag gi sems can de dag la ji lta bur 'dod pa bzhin du ngoms shing tshim par byed do// rigs kyi bu 'di ltar de'i tshe de'i dus na/ gang sa bra'i lha rnams kyi sa ma la 'di sems brkye
79b1(mdo sde): ma thag tu nam mkha' las rin po che thams cad kyi char mngon par rab tu 'bab pa las na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni nam mkha' mdzod du 'gyur ba snyam zhes spa byung ngo // ji ltar sa dra /
79b2(mdo sde): lha rnams kyis sgra byung ba de bzhin du/ bar snang dang / rgyal chen bzhi'i ris dang / sum cu rtsa gsum dang / 'thab bral dang / dga' ldan dang / 'phrul dga' nas/ 'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnam
79b3(mdo sde): kyis kyang ma la 'ang sems bskyed ma thag tu 'di 'dra ba'i rin po che'i char rab tu 'bab pa las na/ kye ma byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni nam mkha'i mdzod du 'gyur ba snyam zhes sgra byung bas/ ming de
79b4(mdo sde): la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa'i 'od mtha' yas 'od zer gyi rgyal po de rjes su yi rang ngo // gang la des rjes su yi rang ba de la gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma skad kyi sangs rgyas
79b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang rjes su yi rang ngo // rigs kyi bu 'di ltar rgyal po bsod nams kyis brgyan pa de byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyis 'gro ba'i mngon par shes pa dang /
79b6(mdo sde): bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi stobs de mthong nas/ khye'u rgyal ba'i blo gros zhes bya ba rgyal por bcug ste/ dad pas khyim nas khyim med par rab tu byung nas/ sbyin pa 'di ni sems
79b7(mdo sde): kun tu chags pa'o// rab tu byung ba ni sems yongs su dag pa'o// sbyin pa 'di ni lus dang ngag gi bgegs so// rab tu byung ba'i ni lus dang ngag yongs su sbyong ba'o// sbyin pa 'di ni
80a1(mdo sde): bya/ bgegs chen pa'o// rab tu byung ba ni bgegs thams cad nye bar zhi ba'o// sbyin pa 'di ni rtsa ba dang lo ma'o// rab tu byung ba ni snying po dang 'bras bur 'grub pa'o// sbyin
80a2(mdo sde): pa 'di ni nga'i ba dang bcas shing yongs su 'dzin pa dang bcas pa'o// rab tu byung ba ni yongs su 'dzin pa thams cad 'dor ba'o// sbyin pa 'di ni 'jog tshogs la lta ba las ma bskyod pa'o// rab
80a3(mdo sde): tu byung ba ni lta ba thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'o// sbyin pa 'di ni byis pa'i rtsed mo'i sbyor ba'o// rab tu byung ba ni dul ba dang / zhi ba dang / cang shes pa'i sa'o snyam du de de ltar tshul bzhin rab tu sbyor
80a4(mdo sde): zhing sems 'di lta bu dang bsam pa de lta bus de ltar rab tu byung ste/ gcig pu mi 'dre ba/ bag yod pa/ brtson pa/ rab tu dben par gnas pas ring po ma thogs par mngon par shes pa lnga
80a5(mdo sde): bskyed do// rigs kyi bu de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal po bsod nams kyis brgyan par gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod sems na de de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs
80a6(mdo sde): pa 'khor ba 'jig de de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bsod nams kyis brgyun ces bya bar gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod 'dri ni de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub
80a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' seng ge'i rtsal gyis 'gro ba zhes bya bar gyur to/ des thog mar nam mkha'i mdzod los rin po che'i char phab bo// de tshun chad bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu maud grangs
80b1(mdo sde): med par nam mkha' yang nam mkha' mdzod las rin po che'i char 'bebs pa'i mngon par shes pa las ma nyams so// rigs kyi bu nga ni de'i tshe de'i dus na byang chub sems dpa' seng ge zhes bya/
80b2(mdo sde): bar gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' byams pa ni de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal bu rgyal ba'i blo gros zhes bya bar gyur te/ gang rgyal po bsod nams kyis brgyan pas rgyal por bcug pa'o// rigs kyi
80b3(mdo sde): bu de'i gsung rab kyang 'di ltar dga' zhing yongs su dag par 'gyur te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'i sems can gyi gnas su gyur to// sems can ji snyed kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
80b4(mdo sde): byang chub tu sems bskyed pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// sngon byung ba dang ldan pa'i gtam 'di bstan pa na/ srog rag
80b5(mdo sde): khri nyis stong bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de nas bcom ldan 'angs la/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis 'di skad ces gsol to//
80b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang
80b7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lam zhes bya ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi
81a1(mdo sde): chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / zhi gnas dang / lhag mthong dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyom
81a2(mdo sde): par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga rnams te/ rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam zhes bya'o// 'jig rten zhes bya ba ni phung po
81a3(mdo sde): lnga'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' gzugs mi rtag par rig nas sbyin pa sbyin no// gzugs sdug bsngal bar rig nas sbyin pa sbyin no// gzugs bdag med par rig/ gzugs zhi bar/
81a4(mdo sde): rig/ gzugs stong par rig/ gzugs mtshan ma med par rig/ gzugs smon pa med par rig/ gzugs mngon par 'du mi byed par rig/ gzugs ma skyes par rig/ gzugs ma
81a5(mdo sde): byung bar rig/ gzugs rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar rig/ gzugs dben par rig/ gzugs gzung ba med par rig/ gzugs kun bzhi med par rig/ gzugs 'byung ba med
81a6(mdo sde): bar rig/ gzugs sgyu ma lta bur rig/ gzugs rmi lam lta bur rig/ gzugs smig rgyu lta bur rig/ gzugs chu zla lta bur rig/ gzugs brag cha lta bur rig/ gzugs mig
81a7(mdo sde): yor lta bur rig/ gzugs gzugs brnyan lta bur rig/ gzugs rtswa dang / shing dang / rtsig pa dang / lam lta bur rig nas sbyin pa sbyin te/ de gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyis sbyin
81b1(mdo sde): pa'i de bzhin nyid la 'jug go// sbyin pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis bsngo ba'i de bzhin nyid rjes su shes so// bsngo ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis// byang chub kyi de bzhin cid dang / byang chub kyi de bzhin
81b2(mdo sde): nyid kyis/ sems can gyi de bzhin nyid dang / sems can gyi de bzhin nyid kyis/ bdag gi de bzhin nyid dang / bdag gi de bzhin nyid kyis// chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su shes
81b3(mdo sde): so// gang chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid de ni de bzhin nyid med de/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin nyid rjes su shes pas sbyin pa de sbyin pa
81b4(mdo sde): 'di ni/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam mo// de bzhin du tsher ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag par rig
81b5(mdo sde): nas sbyin pa sbyin no// rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med par rig/ rnam par shes pa zhi bar rig/ rnam par shes pa stong par rig/ rnam par shes pa mtshan ma
81b6(mdo sde): med par rig/ rnam par shes pa smon pa med par rig/ rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du mi byed par rig/ rnam par shes pa ma skyes par rig/ rnam par shes pa ma byung bar rig
81b7(mdo sde): rnam par shes pa rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar rig nas sbyin pa sbyin ro// rnam par shes pa dben par rig/ rnam par shes pa gzung ba med par rig/ rnam par shes pa kun ga ni
82a1(mdo sde): ru bya/ med par rig/ rnam par shes pa mi 'byung bar rig/ rnam par shes pa sgyu ma lta bur rig/ rnam par shes pa rmi lam lta bur rig/ rnam par shes pa smig rgyu lta/
82a2(mdo sde): bur rig/ rnam par shes pa chu zla lta bur rig/ rnam par shes pa brag cha lta bur rig/ rnam par shes pa mig yor lta bur rig/ rnam par shes pa gzugs brnyan lta bur rig/ rnam
82a3(mdo sde): par shes pa rnam par rig pa med pa'i mtshan nyid du rig nas sbyin pa sbyin te/ de rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis/ sbyin pa'i de bzhin nyid rjes su shes so// sbyin pa'i de bzhin
82a4(mdo sde): nyid kyis/ bsngo ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / bsngo ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis/ byang chub kyis de bzhin nyid dang / byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid kyis// sems can gyi de bzhin nyid dang / sems can gyi//
82a5(mdo sde): de bzhin nyid kyis/ bdag gi de bzhin nyid dang / bdag gi de bzhin nyid kyis/ chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su shes so// gang chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid de ni de bzhin nyid do// /
82a6(mdo sde): ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin nyid rjes su shes pas sbyin pa de sbyin pa 'di ni/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
82a7(mdo sde): lam mo// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' gzugs mi rtag par rig nas/ tshul khrims bsrung ba nas/ gzugs rtswa dang / shing dang / rtsig pa dang / lam dang / gzugs
82b1(mdo sde): brtan lta bu'i bar du gnas tshul khrims srung ngo // de gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyis// tshul khrims kyi de bzhin zhing rjes su shes so// rdul khrims kyi bzhin nyid kyis/ sngo ba'i de bzhin nying /
82b2(mdo sde): da rdzi ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis// byang chub kyi bzhin nyid dang / byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid kyis// sems can gyi de bzhin nyid dang / sems can gyi de bzhin nyid kyis// bdag gi de bzhin
82b3(mdo sde): ting dang / bdag gi de bzhin nyid kyis/ chos thams cad kyi de bzhin kong rjes su shes so// pang chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid de ni de bzhin nyid med de/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /
82b4(mdo sde): gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin nyid rjes su shes pas tshul khrims de srung ba 'di ni// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam mo// de bzhin du tshor rab
82b5(mdo sde): dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag par rig nas/ tshul khrims bsrung ba nas/ rnam par shes pa rnam par rig pa med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi bar du rig nas// tshul
82b6(mdo sde): khrims srung ste/ de rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis// tshul khrims kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su shes so// tshul khrims kyi de bzhin nyid kyis// bsngo ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / bsngo ba'i de
82b7(mdo sde): bzhin nyid kyis/ byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid dang / byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid kyis/ sems can gyi de bzhin nyid dang / sems can gyi de bzhin nyid kyis/ bdag gi de bzhin nyid dang / bdag gi
83a1(mdo sde): de bzhin nyid kyis/ chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su shes so// gang chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid de ni de bzhin nyid med de/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma
83a2(mdo sde): yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / de bzhin nyid rjes su shes pas// tshul khrims srung ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam mo// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'
83a3(mdo sde): gzugs mi rtag par rig nas/ bzod pa bsgom pa nas/ de bzhin du sbyar te/ rjes su shes pa 'di lta bus brtson 'grus rtsom mo// bsam gtan mnyam par 'jog go// shes rab rnam par dpyod do//
83a4(mdo sde): des gzugs mi rtag par rig nas/ shes rab rnam par dpyod pa nas// gzugs rtswa dang / shing dang / rtsigs pa dang // lam dang / mig yor lta bu'i bar du rig nas/ shes rab rnam par dpyod do//
83a5(mdo sde): de gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyis/ shes rab kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su shes so// shes rab kyi de bzhin nyid kyis/ bsngo ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / bsngo ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis/ byang chub kyi de bzhin
83a6(mdo sde): nyid dang / byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid kyis// sems can gyi de bzhin nyid dang // sems can gyi de bzhin nyid kyis// bdag gi de bzhin nyid dang / bdag gi de bzhin nyid kyis// chos thams cad kyi de bzhin
83a7(mdo sde): nyid rjes su shes so// gang chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid de ni de bzhin nyid med de/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin nyid rjes su shes pas/ shes rab rnam
83b1(mdo sde): par spyod pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam zhes bya'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag par rig nas/ shes rab
83b2(mdo sde): rnam par dpyod pa nas/ rnam par shes pa rnam par rig pa med pa'i mtshan nyid du rig nas/ shes rab rnam par dpyod do// de rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid kyis/ shes rab kyi de bzhin nying rjes su shes
83b3(mdo sde): so/ shes rab kyi de bzhin nyid kyis/ bsngo ba'i de bzhin nyid dang / bsngo ba'i de bzhin nyid kyis// byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid dang / byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid kyis// sems can gyi de bzhin nyid dang / sems
83b4(mdo sde): can gyi de bzhin nyid kyis/ bdag gi de bzhin nyid dang / bdag gi de bzhin nyid kyis// chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su shes so// gang chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid de ni de bzhin nyid med de/
83b5(mdo sde): ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin nyid rjes su shes pas/ shes rab rnam par dpyod pa 'di'ang rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
83b6(mdo sde): lam mo// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpas gzugs mi rtag par rig nas/ lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bsgom pa nas/ gzugs rtswa dang / shing dang /
83b7(mdo sde): rtsig pa dang / lam dang sha mig yor lta bu'i bar du rig nas/ lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom mo// gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid kyis/ lus kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su/
84a1(mdo sde): shes so// lus kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su shes pa nas// chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid kyi bar du rjes su shes so// gang chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid de ni de bzhin nyid
84a2(mdo sde): med de// ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin nyid rjes su shes pas/ lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing dran pa nye bar gnag pa sgom ste/ lus dang ldan pa'i
84a3(mdo sde): rnam par rtog pas rnam par mi rtog pa 'di ni/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam mo// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par
84a4(mdo sde): shes pa mi rtag par rig pa nas/ rgya cher de bzhin du sbyin pa sbyin pa'i bar dang / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / sems dang / chos rnams kyang rgyas par byas te/ gzugs mi rtag par rig pa nas
84a5(mdo sde): chos la chos kyi rjes su rjes su lta zhing dran pa nye bar gzhog pa bsgom pa nas/ rtswa dang / shing dang / rtsig pa dang / lam dang / mig yor lta bu'i bar du rig pa nas/ chos la chos kyi rjes su lta
84a6(mdo sde): zhing dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom mo// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag par rig pa nas/ chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing dran pa nye bar
84a7(mdo sde): gzhag pa bsgom pa nas/ rnam par shes pa rnam par rig pa med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi bar du rig nas/ chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bsgom mo// de ltar phung po'i de bzhin
84b1(mdo sde): te dbang zin pa dran pa ta bar gzhag pa'i de bzhin nyid do// dran pa lta bar gzhug pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bsngo ba'i de bzhin med do// bsngo ba'i de bzhin rkang bang yin pa byang chub kyang
84b2(mdo sde): bzhin nyid do// byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de sems can gyi bzhin nyid do// sems can gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bdag gi de bzhin nyid do// bdag gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa chos
84b3(mdo sde): thams cad kyi de bani mnyed ngo // chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bzhin nyid med de/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin nyid rjes su shes
84b4(mdo sde): bas chos la chos kyi rjes su lba zhing dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sgom yang chos dang ldan pa'i rnam par rtog pas rnam par mi rtog ste/ gang de ltar rjes su shes pas 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig
84b5(mdo sde): rten las 'das pa'i lam zhes bya'o// de bzhin du sbyar te/ de ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la ji lta ba de bzhin du/ yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stong dang
84b6(mdo sde): byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / zhig nas dang / lhag mthong dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
84b7(mdo sde): bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga'ang de bzhin du rgyas par bya ste/ des gzugs mi rtag par rig nas mngon par shes pa'i ye shes sgrub par byed do// gzugs sdug bsngal ba dang / gzugs
85a1(mdo sde): bdag med pa dang / gzugs zhi ba dang / gzugs stong pa dang / gzugs mtshan ma med pa dang / gzugs smon pa med par rig/ gzugs mngon par 'du mi byed par rig
85a2(mdo sde): ma skyes pa dang / ma byung ba dang rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / dben pa dang / gzung ba med pa dang / kun gzhi med pa dang / mi 'byung ba dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / chu zla lta bu
85a3(mdo sde): dang / brag cha lta bu dang / mig yer lta bu dang / gzugs brnyan lta bu dang / gzugs rtsa dang / shing dang / rtsig pa dang / lam dang / mig yor lta bur rig nas/ mngon par shes pa'i ye shes
85a4(mdo sde): mngon par grub bo// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang / lam dang / mi rtag par rig nas/ mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par grub ste//
85a5(mdo sde): rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal bar rig/ rnam par shes pa bdag med pa dang / rnam par shes pa zhi ba dang / rnam par shes pa stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par
85a6(mdo sde): 'du mi byed pa dang / ma skyes pa dang / ma byung ba dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / dben pa dang / gzung du med pa dang / kun gzhi med pa dang / mi 'byung ba dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / rmi lam lta
85a7(mdo sde): bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / chu zla lta bu dang / brag cha lta bu dang / mig yor lta bu dang / gzugs brnyan lta bu dang / rnam par shes pa rnam par rig pa med pa'i mtshan nyid du rig nas/ mngon par
85b1(mdo sde): shes pa'i ye shes mngon par grub bo// 'di lta ste/ phung po'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de mngon par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid do// mngon par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bsngo ba'i de bzhin
85b2(mdo sde): nyid do// bsngo ba'i de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid do// byang chub kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de sems can gyi de bzhin nyid do// sems can gyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de bdag gi
85b3(mdo sde): de bzhin nyid do// bdag gi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid do// chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni de bzhin nyid med de/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan
85b4(mdo sde): ma yin pa de bzhin nyid do// de bzhin nyid rjes su shes pas mngon par shes pa'i ye shes rab tu sgrub ste/ gang de ltar rjes su shes pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam
85b5(mdo sde): zhes bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam de ni gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid rjes su shes pa ste/ gzugs 'jig pa ma yin/ chad pa ma yin/ rtag pa ma yin/ rten cing 'brel
85b6(mdo sde): par 'byung ba rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid rjes su shes pa ste/ rnam par shes pa 'jig pa ma yin/
85b7(mdo sde): chad pa ma yin/ rtag pa ma yin/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'o// gang phung po'i 'jig rten las rgal ba de ni/ 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa'i
86a1(mdo sde): 'jig rten la'ang mi chags te/ de ni chags pas 'gro ba lngar skyes pa'i sems can rnams la 'jig rten las bzla ba'i phyir chos ston te/ gang 'jig rten 'jig par mi byed pa de/
86a2(mdo sde): ltar chos ston to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten mi rtag pa'i mtshan nyid de/ de 'jig par mi byed do// 'jig rten ni sdug bsngal gyi mtshan nyid/ bdag med pa'i mtshan nyid/ zhi ba'i mtshan nyid//
86a3(mdo sde): stong pa'i mtshan nyid/ mtshan ma med pa'i mtshan nyid/ smon pa med pa'i mtshan nyid/ mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i mtshan nyid nas// de bzhin nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyi bar du ste/ 'jig rten de 'jig par mi/
86a4(mdo sde): byed pa 'di ni rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam yongs su dag pa'o// gang lam yongs su dag pa la rab tu gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la ma log pa la gnas/
86a5(mdo sde): pa'i sems can rnams la chos kyi snang ba chen po byed do// de dag snang ba rnyed nas/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam de nyid la bar du gnas so// byang chub kyi snying po 'thob par byed pa'i phyir/
86a6(mdo sde): lam 'di ni rab kyi mchog go// mi dge ba thams cad kyi sems med pa'i phyir/ lam 'di ni mchog go/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi rtse mo rnyed pa'i phyir/ lam 'di ni dam pa'o// chu bo thams cad
86a7(mdo sde): las sgrol ba'i phyir/ lam 'di ni bla na med pa'o// nyi tshe ba'i lam thams cad las 'das pa'i phyir/ lam 'di ni gong na med pa'o// gnyen po mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ lam 'di ni mnyam/
86b1(mdo sde): pa med pa'o// sngon gyi sangs rgyas kyi lam du yang dag par 'gro ba'i phyir/ lam 'di ni mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'o// bdud dang phyir rgol ba thams cad bcom pa'i phyir/ lam 'di ni bde bar/
86b2(mdo sde): 'gro ba'o// mngon par shes pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par rol pa'i phyir/ lam 'di ni mi thogs par 'gro ba'o// shes rab kyis snang ba'i 'od rnam par dag pa'i phyir/
86b3(mdo sde): lam 'di ni mun pa mun nag med pa'o// sgyu dang g.yo med pa'i phyir/ lam 'di ni drang po'o// sems gya gyu med pa'i phyir/ lam 'di ni gsal ba'o// sems can thams cad la sems
86b4(mdo sde): mnyam pa'i phyir/ lam 'di ni mnyam pa'o// sems can thams la go 'byed pa'i phyir/ lam 'di ni rgya che ba'o// phan tshun du gnod par mi 'gyur bas/ lam 'di ni yangs pa'o// yongs
86b5(mdo sde): su mi skyo bar 'gro bas lam 'di ni rnal du 'gro'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas lam 'di ni bsod nams kyis brtan pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol du phyin pas lam 'di ni gdung ba medapa
86b6(mdo sde): bzad pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas lam 'don 'jigs pa med pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas lam 'di ni mi zlog pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pas lam 'di ni rdul thams cad
86b7(mdo sde): dang bral ba'o// shos rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas lam 'di ni nam mkha' dang mnyam par 'gro ba'o// nga rgyal med pas lam 'di ni ye shes kyi rjes su 'gro ba'o// dge ba'i chos thams cad yang dag
87a1(mdo sde): par bsgrubs pa sa lam 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su sgom pa'i rjes su sgom pa'i rjes su 'gro ba'o// sngon thos pa mi slu ba'i phyir lam 'di ni chos kyi
87a2(mdo sde): 'khor lo rab tu skor ba'i rjes su 'gro ba ste// rigs kyi bu de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam yongs su dag pa ste ka lam yongs su dag pa gang la gnas
87a3(mdo sde): nas byang chub sems dpa' go cha chen po bgos te/ theg pa chen po de la zhugs nas byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba der 'gro ba'o// de la 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi go cha ste/ gru chen po//
87a4(mdo sde): yang dag par sbyor bas ma rgal ba sgrol ba'i go cha'o// nyon mongs pa dang / lta ba'i bcings pa thams cad las yongs su 'grol bas ma grol ba 'grol ba'i go cha'o// yongs su 'dzin pa'i
87a5(mdo sde): 'jigs pa thams cad 'dor bas dbugs ma phyin pa rnams dbugs 'byin pa'i go cha'o// med pa la phyin ci log tu gyur pa mnyam pa nyid du ston pas yongs su mya ngan las ma 'das pa mya ngan las
87a6(mdo sde): bzla ba'i go cha'o// bdag dang / sems can dang / srog dang / gang zug mi dmigs pas sems can thams cad yongs su dgrol ba'i go cha'o// lus dang srog la mi lta bas dam pa'i chos yongs
87a7(mdo sde): su 'dzin pa'i go cha'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba'i tshogs sogs pas ngoms mi myong bas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su skyong ba'i go cha'o// sbyin pa'i tshogs sna tshags sogs pas/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang
87b1(mdo sde): bo lus kyi rgyun gyi go rgya'o// mngon par shes pa thob pas bdud dang pas kyi rgol ba thams cad 'dul ba'i go cha'o// so so yang dag par rig pa'i ye shes kyis sems can thams cad shin tu tshim
87b2(mdo sde): pabar byed ba'i go cha'o// gzugs kyi ye shes kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad nyan pa dang tshol ba'i go cha'o// mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyis sems can thams cad kyi sems la lta ba'i go
87b3(mdo sde): cha'o// shes rab kyi ye shes kyis sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa'i go cha'o// shes rab dang ye shes kyi stobs yang dag par sgrub pas stobs bcu yongs su
87b4(mdo sde): slong ba'i go ra'o// thams cad du sems gong ba med pas mi 'jigs pa thob pa'i go cha'o// mi dge ba'i chos thams cad spangs shing dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pas/ sangs
87b5(mdo sde): rgyus kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su skyong ba'i go cha'o// chos thams cad sgyu ma dang / rmi lam dang / mig yor dang / brag cha dang / chu zla lta bur thos kyang / mi skrag/ me dang / dngang bar
87b6(mdo sde): mi 'gyur ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mi skrag pa'i go cha'o// sems can thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par shes kyang sems can yongs su mi gtong bar gnas
87b7(mdo sde): pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying rjes chen po'i go cha'o// chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du mi byed pa dang / ma skyes pa dang /
88a1(mdo sde): ma byung bar thos kyang tshe dang / 'chi 'pho dang / skye ba kun tu ston pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs la mkhas pa'i go cha'o// chos thams cad nges par gyur pa la nug/
88a2(mdo sde): pa'i mtshan nyid du shes shing / 'du byed thams cad skye ba med par rig kyang 'gog par mi ltung zhing 'bras bu mngon sum du'ang mi byed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sngon gyi byin gyi rlabs mi 'khrugs
88a3(mdo sde): pa'i go cha'o// go cha chen po nyi shu po de dag bgos nas/ de theg pa chen po la mngon par zhugs pa yin no// theg pa chen po de ni bsdu ba'i dngos pos phang lo bzhi dang legs par ldan par byas pa/ bsams pa/
88a4(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su bsngos pas rtsibs shin tu sbyar ba/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i ye shes lhag par che bas lte ba zab cing legs par byas pa/ sems can thams cad kyi khur skya ba'i srog shing
88a5(mdo sde): dang ldan zhing shing tu bzung ba/ byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen pos yang dag par zin pas/ shing rta'i mda' brtan par sbyar ba/ chos rin po che thams cad kyis legs par brgyan pas rin po che
88a6(mdo sde): thams cad kyi kha ran gyis bskor ba/ sngon dam bcas pa kha 'og tu lus 'khrus par byed pas/ lhag pa'i bsam pa'i 'breng bas bcings pa/ thabs dang shes rab zung du 'brel bas gnya' shing gi/
88a7(mdo sde): khur khyer ba/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong gi bu gar legs par sbyar ba/ bden pa bzhi yongs su shes pa'i stobs kyi 'gros can/ cang shes stong rab tu 'bad pa dang ldan pa/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhis
88b1(mdo sde): spangs rgyas kyi nang thams cad du 'grob/ dran pa'i 'dug rin pa rda'i 'bring ba'i slad bus bcangs pa/ sems can thams cad shang bas rgya ma ning dngas par rgyu ba dang / dab dung bad kyi ga 'dul ba/
88b2(mdo sde): legs par byababyas pa/ rig pa dang ye shes rab tu sbyor ba/ byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs pa/ seng gi'i khri shin du brtan pa/ lpa /
88b3(mdo sde): brgya byin dang / tshangs pa thams cad kyis mngon par bstod pa/ gzugs bzang zhing balbu bas ma ngoms pa/ blta na sdug pa// rdo rje ltar sra zhing mi shigs pa lhag pa'i bsam pa brtan pas dam bcus
88b4(mdo sde): pa las mi 'gyur ba/ kha lo sgyur bas shin tu bsdus shing bzung ba/ rtag tu byang chub kyi sems sngon du 'gro ba/ smon lam gyi yon tan yongs su rdzogs pa'i rjes su song bas gar dga' dgur 'gro ba/
