117a7(mdo sde): la zhugs pas/ chos kyi dbyings kyi yul 'khrug par mi byed par 'gyur ro// de dag chos kyi dbyings kyi rjes su song ste mnyam pa bye brag med pa thob pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye
117b1(mdo sde): shes rjes su thob par 'gyur ro// bsnun pa 'dri ba shad pan// byang chub sems dpa' mang po zhig las dang // nyon mongs pa dang / chos kyi sgrib pa kun nas ldang bu dang // brjod bkun
117b2(mdo sde): nas ldang ba thams cad dang bral te/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// // bam po brgyad pa// // de nas dge bsnyen dang la
117b3(mdo sde): sras zhes bya bas pa bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos rnam grol ba'i sgo chos kyi rnam grang
117b4(mdo sde): 'di ni bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag gi slad du bshad do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das la gsad pa'i slad du brtul zhugs kyis bstan par bgyis
117b5(mdo sde): te bshos kyang dug dang bsres pa sbyar ba des ka bcom ldan 'das las bdag gis chos meng du thos kyang 'gyod pa rab tu bsal bar nus kyi sa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos kyi rnam
117b6(mdo sde): grangs 'di thos nas// 'gyod pa de thams cad ma mchis par gyur te/ chos thams cad la snang ba 'ang skyes so// bcom ldan 'das bdag ni 'gyod pa ma mchis pa the tsom ma mchis te/
117b7(mdo sde): snang ba thob pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par dgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das dper na bdud sdig can lngar bdag kyang khyad par du mchi bar 'gyur ro//
118a1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyim bdag legs so legs so// ngas bshad pa'i don khyod kyis khong du chud de 'angs khyim bdag khyod lung bstan gyis
118a2(mdo sde): sems dang lhag pa'i bsam pa 'dis bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la bsti stang du byas/ bla mar byas/ ri mor byas te mchod nas de dag gi thad nas tshangs par
118a3(mdo sde): spyad pa spyod par 'gyur// de dag gi dam pa'i chos kyang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro// 'di'i 'og tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bgrang ba las 'das pa ji snyed cig mnyes par byas /
118a4(mdo sde): bskal pa grangs med pa bdun brgyan shin tu dri ma med pa'i bskal pa la/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun nas ldang ba thams cad rnam par sel ba zhes bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung ste/ rig pa
118a5(mdo sde): dang zhabs su ldan pa zhes bya ba na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba'i bar du 'gyur ro// de nas dge bsnyen dpal sras kyis bcom ldan 'das las bdag bla na med pa yang dag
118a6(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te/ rab tu dga' nas dga' ba dang yid bde ba skyes te/ rgyan ci thogs pa bcom ldan 'das kyi sku la gsol nas/
118a7(mdo sde): tshig 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi khyim na gter chen po bzhi mchis te / rin po che mang po dang / gser gyis yongs su gang ba'o// de dag las gter chen po gcig/
118b1(mdo sde): ni khyim bu smad dang / bran bro dang / bran mo dang / las bgyid pa rnams la stsal to// gter chen po gcig ni dbul po spong ba thams cad la sprul to// gter chen po gcig ni dge slong
118b2(mdo sde): phyogs bzhi nas lpags pa'i phyogs bzhirje dge slong gi dge 'dun la dbul lo// gter chen po gcig ni sangs rgyas la sogs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun rnams la dbul lo// bcom ldan
118b3(mdo sde): 'dras pa dag ni yang bar gyur te/ ganga'i ba mchis/ yongs su 'dzin pa'ang ma mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag legs par bshad pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ste/ bsnyen par rdzogs
118b4(mdo sde): shing dge slong gi tshul thob par bgyir gsol/ dge bsnyen dpal sbas legs par bshad pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ste/ bsnyen par rdzogs nas dge slong gi tshul thob bo// de nas
118b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la// byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das na// bskal pa grangs/
118b6(mdo sde): ma mchis pa bye ba yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i byang chub 'di su 'dzin par 'gyur/ de nas 'khor de nas byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag drug cu langs nas/ de dag thams cad
118b7(mdo sde): thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas/ sgra skad dbyangs gcig tu tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// bcom ldan rkang gnyis dam pa ni// mya ngan 'das spang bdag
119a1(mdo sde): cag rnams// lus dang srog tu bcas btang ste/ dam pa'i chos ni gzung bar spro// rnyed dang bkur sti spangs nas su// sten pa kun kyang rab spangs te// sangs
119a2(mdo sde): rgyas ye shes bstun pa yi// chos 'di rjes su mi gtang ngo // dam pa'i chos ni gzung slad du// gshe dang mi sman mchi ba dang // ngan du smra ba'i tshig rnams kyang // bzod pas de dag dang du
119a3(mdo sde): blang tshul 'di rab tu bzung nas su// co 'dri ba dang bsdigs pa dang // mi bsngags pa dang mi snyan pa// de dag thams cad bzod par bgyi// dmigs pa dgu la rab gnas pa/
119a4(mdo sde): bdud kyi po nya bdud kyi phyogs// dam pa'i chos la skur 'debs pa'i// dge slong dag ni 'byung bar 'gyur// tshul khrims 'chal pa sdig chos can// khyim pa dang ni sten cing gnas/
119a5(mdo sde): bkur sting ga dang rnyed la btam// chos 'di tshul bar mi bgyid do// 'jig rten rgyang 'phen rnams dang 'dre// bdag la rab tu stong bgyid cing // rab tu nges pa rnams la sdod// mi ma
119a6(mdo sde): nga rgyal can dag 'byung // dgon pa'i gnas ni spangs nas su// rtag tu 'du 'dzi rnams la dgar// 'jig rten gsung tshig rnams la brtson// 'jig tshogs la ni rab tu gnas/
119a7(mdo sde): mkhas pa dag dge 'dun las// zhal da byed la rtag tu brtson// bsam gtan bsam gtan byed spangs te// dkon mchog gsum dang 'dre mi bgyid// thos dang khrims kyis ma lags /
119b1(mdo sde): tshogs kyi nang nas rnyed pa rdol// sbyin pa dag la phyir sbyin brjon// rtog pa bcas shing mya pra banas// nga yir 'du shes bzung nas su// mngab srong ser khyim la dga'// de dag de du
119b2(mdo sde): rang 'jug cing // 'jig rten pa yi gtam rnams bgyid// zhing gi don dang khyim gyi don// de dga'o tshang bgyid la gnas// thong gshol shal ba rnams ldan yang // bdag cag dge slong
119b3(mdo sde): yin zhes 'dzer/ dmigs pa yi ni rab tu 'gyid// lta ba tha dad kun tu gnas// stong pa nyid kyi chos thos nas// de dag g.yungs bzhin du 'gyur// 'jig rten pha rol mi spyod
119b4(mdo sde): cing las kyi rnam par smin pa 'dor// brdzun du spu dang rab tu ldan// chos ma lags la chos su 'dzin// dge slong rgyal po rab 'khrug cing // de ltar rab tu ma rungs pa/
119b5(mdo sde): rnam par 'jig tshe sems can phyir/ bdag cag dam chos bzung bar bgyi// mdo sde rnams kyang phan tshun du// 'thun par dpyod par mi bgyid de/ ku rang rang gi ni sna rnams la/
119b6(mdo sde): de dag rtag tu mos par bgyid// mdo sde gang dag rab zab cing // rnam grol 'bras bur ldan pa rnams// rab tu 'dzin par mi bgyid de// de dag sna tshogs gtam rnams bgyid//
119b7(mdo sde): 'di 'dra ba mi dus 'di na// don bcas tshig 'brur ldan pa yi// legs par gsungs pa'i chos rnams ni// rab tu rnam par 'jig par 'gyur// de yi chen sems can yang // rab
120a1(mdo sde): tu rnam par 'jig par 'gyur// rgyal po'i las kyis bsdigs pa na// 'jigs shing skrag nas 'bros par 'gyur// 'jig dus rab tu mi bzad pa/
120a2(mdo sde): sdig pa'i dus ni 'di 'dra ste// sangs rgyas kyis ni gang bshad pa// chos 'di bdag cag bzung bar bgyi// tshul 'di rab tu bzung nas su// gang dgra chos la mi gnas pa'i
120a3(mdo sde): sems can rnams la byams par bgyi// de dag la ni snying rje'ang bgyi// sems can rnyed dang 'dod gnas pa// tshul khrims 'chal pa mthong nas su// de yi 'gro ba cir 'gyur zhes//
120a4(mdo sde): mchi ma'ang rab tu dbyung bar bgyi// dam pa'i chos la skur 'debs pa// de dgra 'a phral thug mthong na yang // de dag gshe bar mi 'gyur bar// ring nas byams pa btsal bar bgyi// rab
120a5(mdo sde): tu bsdams nas ngag gi las// nyams kyis ci nus bsrung bar bgyi// sdig pa la ni rab gnas pa// de la glo bur ga ta ma mi bgyi// nor sbyin de bzhin bsti sdang gis// mi rnams
120a6(mdo sde): yongs su smin bgyis nas// yang dag sdig med spyod yul gyis// slad kyis de dag bskul bar bgyi// khyim dang sten pa kun spangs te// don nyung ba dang bgyid nyung ba// bas mtha'i
120a7(mdo sde): dgon pa'i spyod yul ba// ri dgas bzhin du 'gyur bar bgyi// 'phags pa'i rigs la dga' ba dang // sbyangs pa'i tshul khrims gnas pa dang // mnyam pazhag shes rab ldan pa dang /
120b1(mdo sde): g.yel ba ma mchis 'gyur bar bgyi// dul ba dang ni ni ba dang // grol nas gong du zhugs nas kyang // sems can gang dag chos tshul ba// de la bdag cag chos bstan to// chos
120b2(mdo sde): 'dod par ni rtogs nas su// shin du ring du'ang mchi bar bgyi// chos la dga' zhing mos rnyed nas// sems can rnams kyi don yang bgyi// sems can rnams kyi 'khrul mang po//
120b3(mdo sde): de dag mngon par mthong nas kyang // chos dang nges par rab gnas nas// bdag la rtag tu brtags par bgyi// bsti sdang bgyis dang ma bgyis la// ri rab lta bur gyur nas /
120b4(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyis ni mi gos pa// 'jig rten 'dren par 'gyur bar bgyi// dge slong tshul las nyams rnams kyis// mi snyan pa dag rtogs nas kyang // las ni bdag gir bye bar bgyi//
120b5(mdo sde): de dag las ni smin ma 'gyur// chos rnams la ni gnas pa la// nged la de 'dra'i chos rnams ni// ji lta bu yang yod med ces// gshed ma dag ni 'gyed par 'gyur// bdag cag ming//
120b6(mdo sde): gi dge sbyong ste// dge sbyong yon tan med ngo zhes// yang dag bskul ba thos pa dang // mdo sde 'di ni spong bar 'gyur// sna dang sna chad de dag ni// me long dga' bar mi 'gyur ltag/
120b7(mdo sde): yang dag bskul ba thos pa dang // de dag dam chos spong bar 'gyur// dge slong gang dag dam pa'i chos// rab tu 'dzin pa 'byung 'gyur te// de dag bzhin du tshul 'chos kyang //
121a1(mdo sde): gang yang chos 'di mnyan to// rgyal po rnams kyang slu bar bgyid// sde bo chen po byed 'gyur yang // sangs rgyas kyis ni byin rlabs kyis// sems can de dag
121a2(mdo sde): chos nyan 'gyur// dus ngan de tshe bdag cag rnams// sems can dag la phan slad du// lus dang srog kyang rab btang ste// dam du'i chos ni gzung bar bgyi// 'jigs pa chen po'i dus de na// /
121a3(mdo sde): tshig tsam du ni ma lags kyi// sgrub pa snying por bgyid par yang // mgon pos bdag cag bsam pa mkhyen// dam chos 'di ni yongs bzung na// bsod nams tshogs ni ji tsam mchis//
121a4(mdo sde): chos kyi rgyal po 'od mdzad pa/ 'jig rten snang bar mdzad la zhu// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis// byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di lnga ste
121a5(mdo sde): dper na shar phyogs kyi stong sum cu'i 'jig rten gyi khams re re'ang rdul phran rab kyi char rdul phra rab kyi rdul du bshig la/ de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / steng dang / 'og dang / phyogs bcu
121a6(mdo sde): kun tu stong sum cu'i 'jig rten gyi khams re re rang rdul phra rab kyi char rdul phra rab kyi rdul du bshig sde/ de nas rdul phra rab de dag thams cad ji snyed pa ru shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing de
121a7(mdo sde): snyed 'das shing rdul phra rab kyi rdul gcig bzhag la/ tshul de lta bur shar phyogs su rdul phra rab de dag thams cad zad zad du banag kyang / shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi mthar
121b1(mdo sde): thug pa gang yang med do// shar phyogs su ji lta ba bzhin du phyogs bcu kun gyi phyogs re rerang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de snyed do// rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du rnams/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi
121b2(mdo sde): zhing de dag gi rdul phra rab rnams tshul de lta bus phyogs bzhag pA la tshad dam mtha' rtogs par nus sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi nus so// gzhan du na de bzhin gsheg
121b3(mdo sde): pas sangs rgyas kyi ye shes chags pa mi mnga' bas mkhyen pa ni ma gtogs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing ji snyed pa de dag las gang
121b4(mdo sde): du rdul phra rab de dag bzhag par gyur pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad grong khyer gcig tu gyur te rtsig pas bskor nas/ 'og gi chu'i phung po nas bzung ste/ srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar gyi grong khyer
121b5(mdo sde): de dag yungs 'bru mi rtsub pa 'bra' zhig gis yongs su gang bar gyur na rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems// yungs 'bru de dag mang ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
121b6(mdo sde): pas ji ltar dpe 'di brtsal ba ngo mtshur to// bcom ldan 'das gang dpe 'di thos nas dad par 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag kyang ngo mtshur rmad du byung ba'i chos dang ldan par 'gyur ro// bcom
121b7(mdo sde): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ka/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pas ni yungs 'bru de dag brgya phrag 'di snyed cig ce'am/ stong phrag 'di snyed cig ci'am ga brgya stong phrag 'di snyed cig ce'am
122a1(mdo sde): dkrigs pa dang / gtams pa dang // khyad phyin dang / mi 'khrugs pa phrag 'di snyed cig ce'am/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di snyed cig tu 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgyu
122a2(mdo sde): phrag 'di skyed cig ce'am/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong phrag 'di snyed cig ce 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya stong phrag 'di skad cig yod do zhes rab tu mkhyen to// rigs kyi bu byang chub pa dad
122a3(mdo sde): pa la la zhig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de snyed rin po che sna bdun gyis rab tu bkang ste sbyin pa byin pa byas/ ji ltar skyes bu dam pa dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa gang yon tan gyi chos
122a4(mdo sde): 'di lta bu la gnas pa de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi dam pa'i yongs su bzung na/ 'di de bas bsod nams ches mang du skyed do// yungs 'bru ji snyed pa de snyed kyi sangs rgyas
122a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das rnams gang la la zhig gis sti spyang du byas// bla mar byas/ ri mor byas te/ gang mchod pa byas/ gang zab mo'i chos la bzod pa thob pa de ni/ de bas bsod nams ches
122a6(mdo sde): mang du skyed do// yungs 'bru ji snyed pa de snyed kyi gtan pa med pa'i mchod sbyin byin pa bas// gang bzhin zhig sems can thams cad la khong khro ba med pa'i sems kyis chos la rab tu
122a7(mdo sde): dga' zhing bzod pas gom pa bdun bor na/ de bas de bsod nams ches mang du skyed do// yungs 'bru de dag ji snyed pa de skad du/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'khor los sgyur
122b1(mdo sde): ba'i rgyal po dang / byang chub sems dpa' snyed pa bas/ gzhan gang gis 'dus byas thams cad mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal bar rig cing chos thams cad la bdag med par rig pa
122b2(mdo sde): mya ngan 'das pa zhi par rig nas/ sems can rnams la snying rje chen po bskyed de// dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir/ bla na med pa yang dgu par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
122b3(mdo sde): tu sems bskyed na// de ni de bas ches bsod nams mang du bskyed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzad kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan
122b4(mdo sde): 'das slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na// ci nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzam bu'i gling du spyod cing // rgyas par yang 'gyur bar de bzhin gshegs pas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlab
122b5(mdo sde): tu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de'i phyir rgyal po chen po bzhi dgug pa'i tshig bshad par bya ste/ dgug pa'i chog de dag gis rgyal po chen po bzhi 'ongs
122b6(mdo sde): na sa chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ring du gnas par bya ba dang // rgya cher rnam par dbye zhing rab tu bstan pa'i phyir brtson par 'gyur ro// de la 'di dag ni dgug pa'i tshig go// 'di lta ste//
122b7(mdo sde): dru d+ha re/ d+hi da~M ri/ dA dz+wal ti/ dAdz+wa lang kA re/ A brtanau/ sha me sha ma ba ti/ shAn ti mu khe/ ni braha par bag \u0f89\u0fa4/ a nong+kar/ A na~M hA/ u dA bi gas
123a1(mdo sde): sa ma pa thA/ pa tha shud d+hi/ pa thA nu ga ma/ pa thA san d+hi/ prad dz+nyA mu khe Ar+ya ko ru le/ b+horu ta rak+She/ A me sa tsa/ me ne sa tsa tA ma satsa ka ta ta ma sa tsa/
123a2(mdo sde): budad+ha pA da d+harmA nu san d+hi/ Ar+ya ga N+De nu ga ma/ a nAr+ya ni ra g+he ta ni/ runy+dza pra sA da ni/ i shwa re pA da lo ka tsid tI kr-i ta/ a nu ra ka yun tu/ i mAn/ d+harma san d+hi/ bi b+ha dzana? du ni rug/
123a3(mdo sde): ti nr-ir de / pra ti rak+Shan tu/ d+he rmad+ha rA tra/ rigs kyi bu 'di dag ni rgyal po chen po bzhi dgug pa'i tshig go/ de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi 'jigs shing sbag ste/ spu zing zhes byed nas/
123a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag
123a5(mdo sde): rgyal po chen po bzhi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba dang / yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba dang / rjes su gzung ba'i slad du gnas par bgyi'o// gang na chos kyi
123a6(mdo sde): rnam grangs 'di spyod pa der/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang // lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci gang dag chos ma lags par 'tshal bar 'gyur ba de dag shin
123a7(mdo sde): tu tshar gcad par bgyi'o// gang dag chos 'tshal bar 'gyur ba de dag gi sems rab tu dga' bar 'gyur ro// chos smra ba de'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor yang yongs su legs par gzhag par bgyi'o//
123b1(mdo sde): tshig gi mtshams su tshig gi mtshams sbyar bar bgyi'o// spobs pa'ang stsal bar bgyi'o// dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rtogs pa dang / dga' ba'ang 'phel bar bgyi'o// de skad ces gsor
123b2(mdo sde): ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis// rgyal po chen po de bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// grogs po dag 'di lta ste/ khyed ni nga'i bu chos las chos kyis byung ba ste// khyed rnams nga'i dam pa'i
123b3(mdo sde): chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir spro ba ston pa ni legs so legs so// khyen rnams chos kyi rgyu 'thun pa 'dis/ 'jig rten du 'jig rten gyi bdag por 'gyur te/ 'jig rten thams cad las
123b4(mdo sde): yang dag par 'das nas/ 'phags pa mya ngan 'das pa'i dbyings su mya ngan las 'du' bar 'gyur ro// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis// byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la
123b5(mdo sde): 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu lha'i dbang po brgya byin dgug pa'i tshig bshad par bya ste/ rig pa'i gsang sngags kyi tshig de dag gis lha'i dbang po brgya byin chos kyi rnam
123b6(mdo sde): grangs 'di bsrung ba dang / yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir gnas par 'gyur ro// de la tshig ni 'dri rnams so// 'di lta ste/ shu d+he/ shu b+ha ma ti/ shu d+ha byA hi gA dang+ga ra/
123b7(mdo sde): da ri De ga tu ra Ne/ da ma/ sha me/ u pa sha me/ khu be/ ug khu re/ a so mu khe/ d+ha ra ni/ A rad Ne/ shu shru'u She/ sa hi te/ a b+ha de/ d+he da san d+hi sa me/ sa ma pa
124a1(mdo sde): ti sa ma ra sh+li ka a she ka hu hU ka he h+ye ka lu ru khu re/ an tI kra me/ de bak+Sha sa hi tem hA ba b+hA sa pra me/ A gda? tsha tu sha kro de ba nA min tra ka da shra ta na
124a2(mdo sde): ya na/ tha ra ma kuT d+ha ru i shwa ro ma rung b+ha ba na ni bA si/ rigs kyi bu 'di dag ni lha'i dbang po brgya byin dgug pa'i tshig gang gise lha'i dbang po brgya byin bkug nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ring
124a3(mdo sde): du gnas par bya ba'i phyir gnas pa'o// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin chos kyi shugs kyis dga' ba skyes nas sum cu rtsa gsum gnas kyi khang pa thams cad rab tu g.yos par byas te
124a4(mdo sde): g.yog lha brgya stong mang po dang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong nas lhags te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas ka bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
124a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bdag ni lha'i dbang po brgya byin te/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha la dbang bgyid de/ g.yog lha'i tshogs dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzam bu'i gling du rgyas par bgyi ba'i
124a6(mdo sde): slad du nan tan du bgyi'o// chos smra ba de dag dang / mdo sde 'di 'chang ba de dag la ji ltar mi gnod pa dang dga' bu dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang / mo sa pa rnyed cing chos kyi rgyan gyis
124a7(mdo sde): brgyan te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di grong dang / grong khyer dang grong rdal dang / yul 'khor dang / rgyal po'i pho brang du zhugs nas rab tu 'chad par 'gyur ba de ltar chos kyi sa
124b1(mdo sde): bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang / sba bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag chos mnyan pa'i srad du chos smra bde dag gi gan du mchi bar bgyi'o// khro zhing ga she'ang dang du blang bar
124b2(mdo sde): bgyi'o// bdud par chad bgyid pa'i gnod pa thams cad las kyang bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang / sdu bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa ba kro'u shi ka ji lta
124b3(mdo sde): bur khyod lnga'i dbang po thob pas chos kyi dbang por zhugs na sa/ nga dang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir/ seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa legs so legs so//
124b4(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka de bzhini gshegs pa gcig gi dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung na/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dam
124b5(mdo sde): pa'i chos yongs su bzung ba yin no// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod la bka' stsal pa de la rigs kyi bu mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dgug pa'i
124b6(mdo sde): tshig bshad kyis dgug pa'i tshig gang gis mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa chen po chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bsrung ba'i phyir gnas par 'gyur ba nyon cig/ de dag la dgug pa'i tshig 'di rnams
124b7(mdo sde): so/ 'di lta ste ka mai tr-i/ bu b+ha maM tri ka d+harma mai tri/ maM tru nu sa hi te/ sa ma mai tri/ san d+hi maM tri/ a nu ga ma me tri/ a nu ra krA mai tri/ a nud dru ra mai trisad t+ya mai tr-i d+harma maM tri
125a1(mdo sde): a nu gra ha maM ti/ a bi pra tri sArA metri/ u pa lo ka na mai tri/ bi lo ka na maM ti/ bo d+ha nu ga na me tri/ bo d+ha nu ga na ma tri/ bud d+ha ad+hiSh+ThA nA maM d+hi/ sa nu rak+Sha maM tri/
125a2(mdo sde): d+harma pra ti sA ra na mai tri/ mo k+Sha mai tri/ A na nu ro d+ha bi ro d+ha mai tri/ atA mo mai tri/ brah+ma pa thA maM trid+hA nA lang kA ra mi tr-i/ ta s+ya a nu san d+hi kA ru na me tri ta s+ya nu san d+hi muM di ta mai tri ta su a nu san
125a3(mdo sde): d+hi.u pe k+Sha mi tri brah+ma pa tha a nu ga ma na mai t+yaM/ tsid ta o rud bi la l+ya mai tri/ a nu sA ra nA mai tri/ ni stau ra Na mai tri/ sarba trA nu ga ma na mai tri/ a gang na tu/ brah+ma ud sid dz+yA/ drA naM sa lan
125a4(mdo sde): byAd tiSh+Tha/ swa sa mA d+hed+ha/ ni s+tha ma ma hA bi ma nad/ bya ba lo ka ya dza ma brU dI pAn/ ku ru shwa d+harma rak+Sha na/ mA ti kra ma bud d+hI d+hiSh+Ta na na/ na ma mkhra' mdzod 'di dag ni mi mjed kyi badrag po tshangs pa
125a5(mdo sde): dgug pa'i tshig go// de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa tshangs pa'i 'jig rten na 'dud pa/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i reg pa'i gsang sngags byams pa'i tshig 'di dreg sangs
125a6(mdo sde): rgyas kyi mthus lnga'i rje ba'i khams kyis thos te/ thos nas kyang tshangs pa brgya stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das gal ba de dong sde lpags nas/ bcom ldan
125a7(mdo sde): 'das kyi sa bas la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ mi mdzad kyi bdag po tshangs pas/ bcom ldan 'das pa 'di zhing
125b1(mdo sde): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pas/ bdag cag byams pa dang snying rjer ldan te/ chos kyi rnam grang/
125b2(mdo sde): 'di bsrung ba'i slad du nan tan du bgyi'o// gang chos smra ba de dag 'di lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi chos sdud cing mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa dadu ga 'chang ba drang klog pa dang / 'chad pa dang / thun
125b3(mdo sde): glegs bum du bris te 'chang ba de dag dgon par mchis sam/ lam gol bar mchis sam/ grong dang grong khyer ram/ grol rdul du mchis sam// yul 'khor tam/ rgyal po'i
125b4(mdo sde): po zung 'khor du mchis kyang rung chos kyi gtam bgyid kyang rung sde/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rgya cher 'chad na bsam par bgyi'o// bsrung ba dang / bsgrub pa dang sba bar
125b5(mdo sde): bgyi'o// de dag la spro ba stsal bar bgyi'o// stobs yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o// dran pa bsgrub par bgyi'o// blo gros yongs su gzung bar bgyi'o// rtogs pa'i
125b6(mdo sde): rjes su 'jug par bgyi'o// spobs pastsal bar bgyi'o// ma dad pa rnams dad par bgyi'o// dad pa rnams bsgral bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar de bzhin
125b7(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i chos kyi tshul bdag cag gis yongs su bzung ste/ rgya cher 'gyur ba de ltar bgyi'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ mi mdzad kyi bdag po
126a1(mdo sde): byabya/ tshangs pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// legs so legs so// tshangs pa dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung bas de bzhin gshegs pa khyod la rjes su yi
126a2(mdo sde): rung ngo // ji ltar ngas da ltar bskor ba bzhin du tshangs pa khyod kyis kyang ring por mi thogs par chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor bar 'gyur ro// ji ltar khyod kyis da ltar nga'i dam pa'i
126a3(mdo sde): chos yongs su bzung ba de bzhin du// tshangs pa gzhan dag gis khyod kyi dam pa'i chos 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
126a4(mdo sde): chen po byams pa la bkar stsal pa byams pa ji tsam du gzung ba dang / bcang ba dang / bklag pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstun par bya ba dang
126a5(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa la byas pa gzo zhing byas pa shes pa bskyed pa dang / bdag gis bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / sems can rnams kyi dge pa'i rtsa ba rnam par
126a6(mdo sde): drag par bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams chos snang ba thob par bya ba dang / bdud thams cad tshad gcad pa dang / mu stegs can thams cad gzhom pa dang dam pa'i
126a7(mdo sde): chos yongs su gzung ba dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mi 'chad par bya ba'i phyir bskal pa bye ba phrag grangs med par yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i bla na med pa yang dag par
126b1(mdo sde): rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di khyod la yongs su gtad do// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / bcom ldan 'dasal// byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces
126b2(mdo sde): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i slad du/ bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gi mdzod 'di bsrung bar bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/
126b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag dang / 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dam pa'i chos legs so// bcom ldan 'das
126b4(mdo sde): bdag dge' ldan gunas na mchis te/ 'di lta bu'i mudo sde dag kun tu bsrung ba dang / yongs su gzung ba dang / yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du nan tan du bgyi'o// bcom
126b5(mdo sde): ldan 'das slad ma'i tshe slad ma'i dus na/ 'di lta bu'i mdo sde rnams su'i rna bar grag par 'gyur ba dang / thos nas 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / gzhun dag la 'ang rgya cher
126b6(mdo sde): rab tu ston cing bdag nyid kyang sbyor bar bgyid pa de ni/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' byams pa'i byin gyi rlabs su rig par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe bdud kyi phyogs
126b7(mdo sde): kyang g.yos par 'gyur te/ 'on kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba gang gis bdag gi spu'i khu bu re re grub pa de la/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can de dag thams cad bdud sdig
127a1(mdo sde): #can du gyur kyang / de dag bdag gi lnga'i bug gcig gis yongs su gzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i brgya'i char yang tsA bar rim ni banas/ dpe'i bar du bar mi mchig/
127a2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bdag gi bsod nams kyi stobs dang / ye shes kyi stobs kyis bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu pham par bgyis pa/ de bzhin gshegs pus bskal pa byed rga
127a3(mdo sde): ma mchis par yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i byang chub 'di bsrung bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byams pa legs so legs so// byams pa bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub
127a4(mdo sde): sems dpa'i las te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdud dang nyon mongs pa thams cad tshar bcad pa dang / phas kyi rgol ba thams cad chos dang 'thun pas zil gyis gnan pa dang / sems can yod
127a5(mdo sde): su smin par bya ba dang / dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba ste/ byams pa bzhi po de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i las so// las bzhi po dag kyang las gcig gis yongs su bsdus so// gcig
127a6(mdo sde): po gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'o// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis gnas brtan 'od srungs chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa// 'od srungs/
127a7(mdo sde): dang kun dga' bo ji tsam du gzung ba dang / bcang ba dang / bklag pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya ba'i phyir/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
127b1(mdo sde): 'di yongs su gtad do// 'od srungs chen pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gi mthu dang / stobs dang / nus pa ji lta ba bzhin du// de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub 'di yongs su gzung bar/
127b2(mdo sde): bgyi'o// kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bdag gis gzung lags te/ de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyi rlabs kyis bdag gis yangs shing rgyas par bgyi'o// de
127b3(mdo sde): nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod nams kyis brgyan pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang 'di lta bu'i
127b4(mdo sde): mdo sde de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa zab mor snang ba/ rgyu ba chad pa/ nges pa'i don mthong bar dka' ba kra rtogs par dka' ba// don dam pa stong pa nyid dang ldan pa/ tshul khrims kyi rgyan gyis brgyan
127b5(mdo sde): pa/ dran pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang // nges par rtog pa dang / yid rab tu dga' bar byed pa/ shes rab kyi 'od snang bar byed pa// rnam par grol ba nges par ston pa// zhi bkra ma gos pu/ mkhas
127b6(mdo sde): shing rtogs pa rnams kyis rig par bya ba/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod cing bsngags pa/ gzungs dang mdo sde'i rgyal po'i phyag rgyas btab pa/ thogs pa med pa'i spobs pa
127b7(mdo sde): 'dzin pa/ dran pa dang / blo gros dang / rtogs pa dang / mos pa rnam par 'phel ba/ bdud dang phyir rgol ba rnams bcom pa/ pas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis zil gyis mi
128a1(mdo sde): non pa/ tshul khrims 'chal pa rnams spa 'gong ba/ sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang / yo byad bsrungs pa dang / sdom pa tshar phyin pa gtong ba'i yon tan gyi chos
128a2(mdo sde): rab tu gnas pa yon tan gyi chos mtha' yas pa las nges par byung ba/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos dang ye shes 'di 'dzin tam/ len tam/ 'chang ngam/ klog gam kun chub par
128a3(mdo sde): byed dam/ gzhan dag la yang dag par rab tu ston tam/ yi ger 'dri 'am/ yi ger 'drir 'jug gam/ tshig tu 'don tam/ sems sam/ rtog gam/ tshul bzhin nges sam/ nan tAn
128a4(mdo sde): la gnas pa de dag bsod nams ji tsam zhig skyed par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams kyis brgyan pa la slar tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so//
128a5(mdo sde): phyogs bcu'i rgya chen dpag tu med pa yi/ zhing rnams sangs rgyas spyan gyis gang gzigs pa// de dag thams cad rin chen rab bkang ste/ byang chub sems dpas
128a6(mdo sde): sbyin pa byin pa bas// gang gis sangs rgyas mang pos bshad pa yi// mdo 'di 'dra ba rab bzang ma gos pa// 'chang ngam klog gam gzhan la ston byed pa// de yi bsod nams
128a7(mdo sde): de ni ches mchog go/ me tog dri zhim byug pa gdugs rnams dang // ba dan rgyal mtshan lnga lding gos rnams kyis// zhing de thams cad yongs su gang byas nas// byang chub sems
128b1(mdo sde): dpas sangs rgyas mchod pa bas/ bde gshegs bstan pa dam chos rab 'jig cing // 'gag pa'i tshen gang zhig brag yod par// dam pa'i chos ni yongs su 'dzin byed pa/
128b2(mdo sde): yi bsod nams de ni ches mchog go phyogs bcu dgra na rgya mtsho gang yod pa// de dgra 'bru mar dri zhim rab bkang ste/ snying po ri rab tshad tsam byas nus su/ rgyal ba'i mchod
128b3(mdo sde): rtenA ma mur bus pa bas/ gang gis chos smon 'di ni rab 'dzin tshe// 'jig rten 'dri dag mun pas bsgribs shes nas// rgyal bas gsungs pa'i chos smon 'dzin byed pa/
128b4(mdo sde): de yi bsod nams de ni ches mchog go// sangs rgyas kyi ni byang chub mchog tshol zhing // zhing rnams bye bar 'dren pa gang mthong ba// de dag la ni bskal pa bye mang du// lha rdzas 'du
128b5(mdo sde): byed yid 'ong mchod pa bas/ gang zhig sangs rgyas byas pa gzo ba dang // dkon mchog gsum ni rjes su gzung ba dang // chos 'di la ni sems can gzung ba'i phyir// dam chos
128b6(mdo sde): 'dzin pa de ni ches mchog go/ ji ltar mgon po rnams kyi chos 'dzin lngar// sems can gang ngas sangs rgyas spyan gyis gzigs// de dag gang gis tshangs pa brgya byin bkod// de
128b7(mdo sde): yi bsod nams de snyed mi 'phel lo// sems can de kun dgra bcom bkod pa dang // rang rgyal theg par rab tu bkod pa bas// gang zhig byang chub tu ni sems bskyed nas// dam chos
129a1(mdo sde): 'dzin pa de ni khyad par 'phags// gal te bsod nams de la gzugs yod na/ phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams thams cad gang bur 'gyur// skyes gu d+ha/
129a2(mdo sde): mchog ye shesam gtogs par// bsod nams de yi snod ni yod ma yin// ji ltar bskal pa bye ba stong brjod kyang // sangs rgyas ye shes mtha' yod ma yin gyur// de bzhin ga sheg
129a3(mdo sde): kyi dam chos 'dzin pa yi// bsod nams de yang tshad yod ma yin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams kyis brgyan pas bcom ldan 'das las dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i//
129a4(mdo sde): bsod nams bshad pa 'di thos nas tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs te// rab tu dga' na sra dga' ba dang yid bde bskyes te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
129a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' gang dag dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa la brtson par mi bgyid pa de dag ni bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs legs so// bcom ldan 'das gung dag dam pa'o chos
129a6(mdo sde): yongs su 'dzin pa dang bral ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gzhan thams cad ni bdag la yungs 'bru tsam du gda' 'o// dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'i drag pa'i rtse ba ni/ phyogs bcu'i nam mal/
129a7(mdo sde): khams ji lta ba bzhin du bdag 'du shes gnas par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar bdag sems can thams cad la bde bar 'tshal ba'i slad du/ lus dang srog kyang bir te/ bde ba
129b1(mdo sde): thams cad mi btsal par dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i slang du go cha dgo bar bgyi'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshud pan/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod kyi bskyod nams kyi/
129b2(mdo sde): par smin pa'i rgyu 'thun pas/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dpag tu med pa nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' mdzod dang blo mnyam pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis chos kyi rnam grangs
129b3(mdo sde): 'dril mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/ nam mkha'i dkyil nas me tog gi char mngon par rab tu bab bo// bar snang las kyang sgra 'di skad ces byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'
129b4(mdo sde): mdzod kyis 'dus pa'i le'u 'di brgyad de// yongs su bzung ba'i bar du sangs rgyas kyi bya ba byas so// byang chub kyi sems dang ma bral ba'i sems can gang dgu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin par
129b5(mdo sde): 'gyur ba de dag kyang de bzhin du dam pa'i chos brgyan par 'gyur ro// de nus bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe sku las 'di lta bu'i 'od rab tu btang bas / 'od des phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing
129b6(mdo sde): thams cad rgyas par gang bar gyur to// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i thog ma dang / bar ma dang / tha ma bshad pa na sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa ni byang chub tu sems skyes
129b7(mdo sde): so// sems can dpag tu med grangs med pa dag ni bzod pa thob par gyur to// sems can la la dag ni sems rnam par grol lo// lal dag ni chos kyi mig rnam par dag go
130a1(mdo sde): lal dag ni 'dod chags bral ba rnyed do// lal dag ni lnga dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa yongs su bzung bar gyur te/ sangs rgyas gzhan dag bang ba
130a2(mdo sde): ba'i phyirargyu bsags par yang gyur to// de thams cad la'ang bcom ldan 'das rjes su thugs rang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa
130a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po nam mkha' mdzod dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa drang / byang chub sems dpa' ltad mo can dang / byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin po
130a4(mdo sde): tshe dang / byang chub sems dpa' rin chen dpal dang / byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rgyal po'i 'od dang / byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams kyis brgyan pa dang / byang chub sems
130a5(mdo sde): dpa' ngan song spong ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rgyal po dang / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang / tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen po dang / tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /
130a6(mdo sde): mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang thams cad dang ldan
130a7(mdo sde): pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lho mo yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//
130b1(mdo sde): 'dus pa chen po'i le'u las 'phags pa nam mnga' mdzod kyis zhus pa zhes bya batheg pa chen po'i ma rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi ma khan po bajas shi lad
130b2(mdo sde): shI len dra bo d+hi dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ban d+he ye shes sngas bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa//
130b3(mdo sde): rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yAn ga ra a ba la bi kA nA mA ma N+Da yAn s+'u r+tha/ bod skad du chu 'phags pa grong khyer gyis 'tsho ba zhes bya ba theg pa rkyen po'i mdo// sangs rgya
130b4(mdo sde): dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod na rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun
130b5(mdo sde): dga' ra ba nu lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang
130b6(mdo sde): 'jig rten skyong ba dang / rgyal po dang blon po dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams kyis bkur stir byas
130b7(mdo sde): bla mar byas mchod cing rjed de/ pad+ma chus ma gos pa bzhin du bzhugs so// de nas de'i tshe rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa'i phyir ston zla tha chung zla ba
131a1(mdo sde): bu'i tshes bco lngal 'brumar rjes zungs po che stong bkang ste dang ru nas mar me sbar ba'i 'od kyis khor khor yug tu dpag tshad bzhir snang bas khyab par
131a2(mdo sde): byas so// de nas yang de'i tshe gnyen yod kyi grong khyer chen po na dga' byed ma zhes bya ba grong khyer gyis 'tsho ba zhig 'dug go// des 'bru mar sran gre'u dang sbyar ba nyos nas gzhag pa ni
131a3(mdo sde): kha 'tshos te nyam chung bar gyur to// de nus 'bru mar de khyer te/ rgyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal du song nas/ khyams kyi nang logs su mar me sbar te bzhag nas 'di ltar sems bskyed de/ bcom
131a4(mdo sde): ldan 'das bdag dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di se ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ ji ltar da ltar gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dri lta ba bzhin du bdag kyang ma 'ongs
131a5(mdo sde): pa'i dus na ston par gyur te/ chos ston par gyur cig/ dge 'dun yang sdud par gyur cig ces byas so// 'di ltar yang sems bskyed de gal te bdag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ sangs rgyas su
131a6(mdo sde): 'gyur ba zhig na/ mar me 'di bdag phyir ma'ongs kyi bar du 'bar bar gyur cig ces byas nas/ mararu med sbar te grong khyer du song na/ mar me de'i 'od kyis 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad snang ba
131a7(mdo sde): gyur te ka nam nangs kyi bar du'ang mar me ma shi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos chos gos kyi mtha' mas mar me de bsad par byas na gsad par ma nus so// de nas
131b1(mdo sde): dang ldan pa mo ru 'gal gyi bu chen po sa rnam par 'thor rlung gis bsad par byas kyang gsang par ma nus so// de nas tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen pos tshungs pa'i 'jig rten du
131b2(mdo sde): 'dug nas/ stong gsum 'dire shing rtag srog shing tsam gyi char gyi rgyan dbub par byin gyis brlabs te/ mAr me do'i steng du btung yang gsad par mnus so// de nas bcom ldan
131b3(mdo sde): 'angs kyis bka' stsal pa/ mo'u 'gal gyi bu zong zhig/ mur me 'di ni byang chub kyi sems kyis sbar ba yin la// byang chub kyi sems ni nyan thos kyis zil gyis mun nu par mi nus
131b4(mdo sde): so// de ci'i phyir zhe na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis zil gyis mnan du med pa'i phyir ro// de nas re zhig na bud med de nyi ma sha ru te
131b5(mdo sde): grong khyer nas phyir 'ongs nas/ des mAr mai de shin tu 'bar ba mthong ba dang / de mchog tu dga' ba chen po rgyas par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad
131b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid na 'od yin te/ gang gi tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa de'i tshe/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi zhal gyi sgo nas
131b7(mdo sde): 'od zer kha dog sna tshogs kha dog dum 'di lnga ste/ sngon po dang / ser po dang dmar po dang / dkar po dang / btsod kha dang / shel dang // dngul gyi kha dog lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/
132a1(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa dgu snang bas khyab par byas nas/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du song ste/ zla ba dang nyi ma'i 'od kyang zil gyis
132a2(mdo sde): ma na na na sa yang slar log ste/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tor du nub par gyur to// de nas 'od zer de dag gis bcom
132a3(mdo sde): ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i gtsug tor du mi sdang bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos tshigs su
132a4(mdo sde): bcad de gsol pa/ rgyal mchog rnam par 'dren pa gang zag mchog/ rgyu med par ni 'dzum pa mi mdzad na// ci yi rkyen gyis zhal ni 'dzum mdzad pa// 'jig rten phan pa thugs bcos
132a5(mdo sde): bdag la gsungs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kunr-i dga' bo grong khyer gyis 'tsho ba 'di bskal pa nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi bar du ngan 'gro log par lhung bar 'gro bar mi 'gyur
132a6(mdo sde): te/ rtag tu lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa dag nyams su myong nus / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun tu snang ba zhes bya bar 'gyur ro//
132a7(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// stobs bcu ldan pa mchod phyir zangs chen phag stong gsal rgyal gyis/ mar me bzang po spang bas
132b1(mdo sde): dpag tshad bzhir ni kun tu snang / grong khyer 'tsho ba'i 'bru mar sran mgre'u sbyar ba sbar ba yis// 'dzam gling snang bas khyab gyur drini byang chub sems kyi mthus// mo'u 'gal gyis ni
132b2(mdo sde): mar me gsad 'dod rdzu 'phrul rgya chen bya so// rnam par 'thor ba'i rlung gau shugs btang gsad par yongs ma nus// tshangs pa'i 'jig rten 'dug nas chu rgyun shing rta'i srog shing tsam
132b3(mdo sde): phab kyang gsad par ma nus mar me nyi ma'i 'od bzhin snang // de ni zhag bzhi kha 'tshos rgyal byed dga' ba'i tshal du 'ongs// dga' ba'i sems kyis bde gshegs zhabs la
132b4(mdo sde): phyag byas thal sbyar 'dug/ mnyam med 'dzum pa mdzad pas kun dga' bo yang rab dga'u nas// gzi brjid mtha' yas 'dzum mdzad 'di yi 'bras bu ci 'dra gsungs// dga'
132b5(mdo sde): byed 'di ni bskal pa nyi shu brgyad na rgyal bar 'gyur// rang byung kun snang zhes bya 'od kyis stong chen bzhi snang byed// ma 'ongs dus na bde bar gshegs pa bye ba mnod par 'gyur// de ni
132b6(mdo sde): kun tu 'khor los sgyur 'gyur rgyal rnams bkur sti byed// sangs rgyas rtogs pa brjod pa'i ma ni dad rnams rab draga' byed// skye bo mkhas pa dag gis de thos sems kyang rab tu dga'//
132b7(mdo sde): de ltar rgyal ba bsam yas stobs bcu'i chos kyang bsam mi khyab// dga' ba bskyed na rnam smin mtshungs med bsam gyis mi khyab 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas
133a1(mdo sde): rdo dang ldan pakun dga' bo dang / zong khyer gyis 'tsho ba de dang / byang chub sem sung bab de dag dang / dge slong de dag du/ lang du/ ni dang / su sbyin du
133a2(mdo sde): dri zar bcas pa'i 'jin rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa grong khyer gyis 'tsho ba zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//
133a3(mdo sde): rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na ga b+ha dang lo tsA ba ban d+he klu'i dbang pos 'gyur ka rgya gar gyi mkhan po bid d+ya ka ra sing ha dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban d+he de ba tsan dras
133a4(mdo sde): zhus te gtan la bab pa// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya brah+ma pa ri prid tsha nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra / bod skad du'aphags pa tshangs
133a5(mdo sde): pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa rten pa'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems drapa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig nabacom ldan 'das
133a6(mdo sde): grong khyer yangs par tshal chen po'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas na/ dge slong khri nas stong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu mang po dang thabs
133a7(mdo sde): cig tu bzhugs te// den bcom ldan 'das minal tsam nam gyi gung thun la skyil mo krung bcas nas/ dran pa mngon du bon gyi ste/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa
133b1(mdo sde): 'dzi las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba man pasam gtan dang pol snyoms par zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das ya sa/ slong smad pa/ pyod pa da pa
133b2(mdo sde): 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis nga la snyoms par zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das de las kyang bzhengs nas dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral ba btang snyoms
133b3(mdo sde): pa dran pa dang ldan pa// bde bar gnas pa/ bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das de las kyang bzhengs nas/ bde ba'ang spangs te/ snga nas sdug bsngal
133b4(mdo sde): yang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang / yid mi bde ba'ang nus pas/ phyir sdug bsngal yang med pa la bde ba'ang med pa btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag pa bsam gtan bzhi pa la
133b5(mdo sde): snyoms par zhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das bsam gtan bzhi pa las bzhengs nas ka bsam ga tan gsum pa la zhugs so// bsam gtan gsum pa las bzheng sa nas
133b6(mdo sde): bsam gtan gnyis pa la zhugs so// bsam gtan gnyis pa las bzhengs nas/ bsam gtan dang po la zhugs so// bsam gtan dang po las bzhengs nas gdul bya ji lta ba
133b7(mdo sde): bzhin du sems can la gzugs kyi lus kun tu ston pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das gdul bya ji lta ba bzhin du// sems can la gzugs kyi
134a1(mdo sde): lus kun tu ston pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas skad cig de la bcom ldan 'das shin tu ldum me ldan ne ljang der bzhugs te
134a2(mdo sde): mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa tshangs pa'i gnas na 'dug bzhin du/ bcom ldan 'das shin tu lham me lhan ne lgang nge ba dang / skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis legs
134a3(mdo sde): pAr brgyan pa mthong ngo // mthong nas kyang tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i tshal chen po 'od kyis sdang bar byas te/ bcom ldan 'das
134a4(mdo sde): kyi spyan snga ra ha cang yang mi ring ba zhig tu 'dug go// de nas mi mdzad kyi bdag po tshangs pas 'di snyam du bsams te gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bsnyen par dka' ba rnam par
134a5(mdo sde): shes par dka' ba yin na/ bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa la bdag gis lung pa bsal ba'i sgra 'am/ spa ba tsam gyis bzhengs par gsol ba ni bdag gi cha ma
134a6(mdo sde): yin gyis bdag gis tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das bzhengs par gsol gor ma chag snyam ste / de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas bla gos phug pa gcig tu gzar
134a7(mdo sde): nas 'dug bzhin du / bcom ldan 'das ga la bde logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de mgo btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad pa dag gi bzhengs par gsol to// ma gos
134b1(mdo sde): dri mam mchis rnam par dag/ rtswa dang mi mchog rnams dang dri za dang // klu dang lha min rnams kyis legs mchod pa// sems can sman srang mgon po khyod la mchod// dper na ri ni ra/
134b2(mdo sde): tu mi g.yos dang // ji ltar rgya mtsho gting ni mi dpogs ltar// bdud rnams thams cad kyis kyang mi g.yos la// thub pa skyes bu mchig ni bsam gtan mdzad// zang zing rim pa mtshan ma mi
134b3(mdo sde): mnga' zhing // tha dad mi mngab rten pa mi mnga' la// gnas mi mnga' zhing snang ba mi mngab ba// thub pa skyes bu dam pa bsam gtan mdzad// rtog ge rnams kyi yul ni ma lags shing // byis pa
134b4(mdo sde): rnams kyi spyod yul ma lags la// sems dang sems las byung las rab 'dus pa// bsam gtan pha rol gshegs pa bsam gtan mdzad// mgon po seng ge bzhin du gsung yang sgrog
134b5(mdo sde): thub pa 'brug bzhin sgrog pa rab tu mdzad// dpa' bo zla ba bzhin du rab tu mdzes// sems can dkon mchog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi mdzad kyi bdag pa
134b6(mdo sde): tshangs pas bskul ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di lta bu dag gis bskul bar thugs su chud nas/ ji ltar skyil mo krung bcus pa de nyid kyis// ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs so// brdungs nas/ bcom ldan
134b7(mdo sde): 'das kyis mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la ldan pa'i phyir ka mgur bsal pa'i sgra mdzad pa dang / mi mdzod kyi bdag po tshangs pas/ bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te/ ji ltar gyir/
135a1(mdo sde): nga rnags / ga 'ang sus pa / sa su
135a2(mdo sde): byas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu bdug nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad
135a3(mdo sde): gsol to// gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs dbye bar snang na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
135a4(mdo sde): rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu lags so// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ mi mjed kyi badrag po tshangs pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// tshangs pa zhu ba
135a5(mdo sde): lung bstan pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pas rtag tu khyod la skabs byas/ tshangs pa khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa de bzhin gshegs pa la zhus shig dang / zhus pa de dang de nyid kyi lung
135a6(mdo sde): bstan pas ngas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs phye bas// mi mjed kyi bdag po tshungs pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
135a7(mdo sde): to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag chos du dang ldan na// myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya lags
135b1(mdo sde): de gad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis// mi mjed kyi bdag po tshungs pal 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// tshangs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag chos
135b2(mdo sde): gcig dang ldan na// myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// chos gcig gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ lus kyi rjes su song ba'i dran pa'o/
135b3(mdo sde): tshangs pa byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi rjes su song ba'i dran pa ji lta bu yin zhe na/ tshangs pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni 'gro'o snyam pa'i dran pa dang ldan pa yin zhing // yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab
135b4(mdo sde): tu shes so// ldog go snyam du dran pa dang ldan pa yin zhing / yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// nyal lo snyam pa dang / ldang ngo snyam pa dang / 'chag go snyam pa dang / 'dug go/
135b5(mdo sde): snyam du dran pa dang ldan pa yin zhing yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// de gcig pu dben par 'dug ste/ nang du yang dag bzhag nas 'khrug pa med pa'i yid kyis lus 'di nyid la
135b6(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ kye ma lus 'di ni mi brtan pa/ mi rtag pa/ rang bzhin gyis nyam chung ba/ snying po med pa// ther zug ma yin pa/ rnam par 'thor ba'i chos can// rnam par 'jig pa'i chos
135b7(mdo sde): can rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba sgyu ma dang 'dra ba zil pa'i thigs pa dang 'dra ba/ g.yo ba/ mi gnas pa/ mi gtsang ba/ rnag gi dri nga ba can/ rlung dang nyims mthar
136a1(mdo sde): gtugs pa/ mthar 'drul ba/ mthar rdul du 'gyur ba ngan skyugs kyi mthar thug pa/ nad mang ba/ gnod pa can / 'gro ba'i nad mang bkan pa// 'jig pa'i/
136a2(mdo sde): ngang can/ rus pa bsogs pa/ dri nga ba 'dzag pa can/ bsgrims te rim gro bya dgos pa yin par yang dag pa'i dran pas yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du so sor rtog go/ de de lta
136a3(mdo sde): yang dag pa'i dran pas lus kyi skyon rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pas// lus la chags pa dang / lu sa la kun tu 'dod chags dang / lus la bdag gi nyid yin pa mi skyed do//
136a4(mdo sde): de lus la mi lta bas srog la chags pa dang / srog la kun tu 'dod chags dang / srog la bdug gi nyid yin pa mi skyed do// de lus dang srog la mi lta bas/ chos gos ngan ngon dang / khwa
136a5(mdo sde): zas ngan ngon dang / mal cha dang / stan ngan ngon dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad ngan ngon tsam dag gis chog par 'dzin pa yin no// de tshangs pa mtshungs par spyod pa rnams kyi /
136a6(mdo sde): bya ba gang dag yin pa don dang ldan pa rnams sam pa dge ba dang ldan pa rnams kyang de dag la gtong bar byed de yongs su mi skyo zhing / yongs su yi nad pa med la/ yongs su skyo ba'i sems
136a7(mdo sde): mi skyed do// de mkhan po dang slob dpon gyi gan du 'gro na dran pa dang ldan zhing 'di snyam du sems te/ mkhan po dag ni bsnyen par dka' ba slob dpon dag ni bsnyen par
136b1(mdo sde): dka' ba ste/ bdag der song ba na// sdig pa mi dge bkun tu stong pa 'ag yig gis bdag pa glengs shing dran par byas nami rung ngogamanas// de da dang / can de dang / gnas/
136b2(mdo sde): bslab pa rnams la gus par byed par 'gyur te/ rten par byed pa dang / legs par bya ba byed pa dang / zhi ba rnal du byed pa dang shin tu yongs su mthar thug par byed pa can du 'gyur/
136b3(mdo sde): ro// de bslab pa rnams la gus par byed pa nyid dang / rtun par byed pa nyid dang / legs par bya ba byed pa nyid dang / zhi ba rnal du byed pa ni dang / shin tu yongs su mthur thug par
136b4(mdo sde): byed pa nyid kyis mkhan po dang / slob dpon gyi gan du 'gro ba na/ bag tsha ba med pa dang bag 'khums pa med par 'gro zhing mi 'jigs pa dang lhan cig tu byung ba'i rgod pa'ang mi
136b5(mdo sde): sbyin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gus pa dang bcas shing pa zhes dang bcas pa yin la/ rigs kyi bgra ma bzhin du 'dzes pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro// de 'dzum pa dang ldan pas lus kyi
136b6(mdo sde): sngon dang / lus kyi nyes par spyod pa gang dag yin pa de dag thams cad kyi thams cad du yongs su spong ngo // tshangs pa byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi skyon dang / lus kyi nus par
136b7(mdo sde): spyod pa de dag gang zhe na/ tshangs pa srog gcod pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi skyon dang / lus kyi nyes par spyod pa yin no// tshangs pa ma byin par len pa dang ga mi tshangs
137a1(mdo sde): byahA/ par spyod pa na / byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi skyon dang / lus kyi rjes par spyod pa yin no// tshangs pa byang chub sems dpa' ji ltar na srog gcod pa spong
137a2(mdo sde): pa yin zhe na tshangs pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dod chags kyi dbang gis srog chags kyi srog gcod par mi byed/ zhe sdang gi dbang dang / gti mug gi dbang gis srog gcod
137a3(mdo sde): par mi byed do// de sems can gzhan dag dang / gang zag gzhan rnams la bdag tsam du 'du shes par byed cing / sdug pa bu tsam du 'du shes par byed do// bdag nyid kyis
137a4(mdo sde): sams can gzhan dag dang gang zag gzhanu rnams kyi srog gcod par mi byed do// gzhan dag kyang srog gcod du mi 'jug go// gzhan dag srog gcod pa la'ang rjes su yi rang
137a5(mdo sde): par mi byed do// bdag gis kyang mi gcod do// gzhan dag kyang gcod du mi 'jug go gzhan dgra gcod pa la'ang rjes su yi rung bar mi byed do// bdag kyang mi rdeg go/
137a6(mdo sde): gzhan dag kyang rdeg tu mi 'jug go// gzhanu dag rdeg par byed pa la'ang rjes su yi rang bar mi byed do// ji ltar na ma byin par len pa spong ba yin zhe na/ tshangs pa 'di la byang chub
137a7(mdo sde): sems dpa' ni sems can rnams kyi 'tsho ba'i yo byad gang dag yin pa 'di lta ste/ gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai rUR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang byu ru dang
137b1(mdo sde): sa le snu ma dang dngul la sogs pa dang gos dang rgyun gyi rnam pa dag dang / nor dang 'bru dang / mdzod dang bang ba'i rnam pa de dag la chags pa mi skyed pa de dag la rnam
137b2(mdo sde): par rtog par mi byed cing rkung phrog mi byed do// rku 'phrog byed du mi 'jug go// rku 'phrog byed pa rnams la rjes su yi rang bar mi byed do// da grong na yod pa'am/ dbon pa na yod pa
137b3(mdo sde): ma yin zhing ga ma gnang ba rtswa'i 'dab ma tsam yang len par mi byed do// ji ltar na mi tshangs par spyod pa spong ba yin zhe na/ tshangs pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' dbang po rnams kyi sgo
137b4(mdo sde): legs par bsrung sra shing gnas pa yin/ legs par bsdams pa yin// 'thun pa'i gnas su rgyu ba yin/ shin tu bsrungs pa'i dran pa dang ldan pa yin/ rtag tu bsungs pa'i
137b5(mdo sde): dran pa dang ldan pa yin pa de dran pas yid kun tu bsrungs pa yin// lus dang ngag shin tu bsdams pa yin no// 'thun pa'i gnas su rgyu la dran pa dang ldan pa yin zhing 'di snyam
137b6(mdo sde): du'ang sems bskyed de ga mi zhig gis bye ma zhib mo shin tu bsregs pa lag pa gnyis kyi snyim par blangs te mig gnyis bkang ba ni bla'i// chags pa'i sems kyis yul gyi bzang mo
137b7(mdo sde): la lta ba ni de lta ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag yul gyi bzang mo la bltas pas// yun ring por phung zhing bcom la ma rung bar gyur pa'i phyir ro snyam mo// de de ltar lus la lus kyi rjes
138a1(mdo sde): du / byu da m+b+ha r+b+ba du rgyun nas su na pa sgrugs pa gan / la spyod
138a2(mdo sde): ro myang ba ma byed cing chags pa'i sems med pa yin no// gal ted yongs su skyed pan bde bskye rnyan kyings dus par brtag par bya/ pa byang byung
138a3(mdo sde): bzlog pa'i rgya nas thug bsngal sbyin te/ khams gsum pa 'di na 'dus byas kyi dngos po bde bgang nga med do// depo'i phyir rten / 'dus byung me ga phyi ro//
138a4(mdo sde): pa'i rang bzhin can dag dngos po mi rtag pa rnams la bde ba'i 'du shes ji ltar skyed snyam du badzag par bya'o// tshungs pa gal te byang chub sems dpa' yongs su spyod ngan/ sdug bsngal
138a5(mdo sde): kho na skye'i bde ba ni ma yin te/ sdug bsngal des kyang yongs su gnon cing nyon mongs na des de la sems 'di ltar nye bar gzhag par bya ste/ lus 'di ni bslobs te yongs su bskyang
138a6(mdo sde): dgos pa ga sug gis bsgrub dgos pa ste 'di ni sdug bsngal rtsom pas gzung bar mi nus kyi bde ba rtsom pas gzung bar bya ba yin// de la bdag gi lus brtan zhing 'tsho ba
138a7(mdo sde): 'dis dge ba'i chos rnams bsgrub par bya'o// dper na rnyed pa 'dod pa'i tshong pa khu ra khal rnams sdong bran byed/ bcos legs byed pa ni khur khal rnams brgyan pa'i phyir ma yin pa bde
138b1(mdo sde): bar bya ba'i phyir ma min gyi gzhan dun ji tsam phra lal bkal pa bskur ba 'byor ro// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' du zas buba'ang lus brtan pa'i phyir zas za pa sa mi
138b2(mdo sde): bde bar bya ba'i phyir ma yin te/ gzhan du na ji tsam du lus dang 'brel ba'i dge ba'i phyogs bsngal po'i phyir ro snyam du sems nye bar gzhag par bya'o// tshangs pa gal te byang
138b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i gnyen pos sems shes par byed mi nus na/ des 'di snyam du bsam par bya ste/ sems zhes bya ba 'di ni mthar
138b4(mdo sde): phyin par dka' ba mi mthun pa 'dzin pa / 'khor ba la mngon du phyogs pa/ dge ba'i phyogs la mi phyogs pa/ yul la mngon du phyogs pa/ dben pa la mi phyogs pa bde
138b5(mdo sde): ba la mngon du phyogs pa sdug bsngal la mi phyogs pa smra ba la dga' ba la mngon du phyogs pa spros pa la mngon du phyogs pa/ de kho na la rnam par lta ba la mi phyogs pa/
138b6(mdo sde): mi gtsang ba la mngon phyogs pa/ gtsang ba la mi phyogs pa/ gdul dka' ba/ gzung dka' ba gnas med pa rten med pa gsog/ gsob skad cig pa/
138b7(mdo sde): rgyu dang rkyen tshogs pa las byung ba yin na mkhas pa'i rang bzhin can su zhig 'di lta bu'i rang bzhin can gyi sems kyi dbang du 'gro zhing / rjes su 'jug snyam du bsam mo//
139a1(mdo sde): de de ltar sems la dran pa nye bar gnas pas sems gardul ba'i phyir nan tan byed do// de ser sna'i sems gdul ba'i phyir sbyin pa sbyin par byed do// ngan/
139a2(mdo sde): kham gcig tsam mam/ rgya shug tsam mam/ mon sran gre'u tsam ma mu til 'bru tsam yang rung / de'ang thams cad la sbyin par byed kyi/ sdug pa rnams la ma yin / 'dris pa
139a3(mdo sde): rnams la ma yin no// re ba tshul pa'i tshul khrims kyi sems 'dul ba'i phyir tshul khrims srung ste/ lus dang / drug dang / yid kyis skyon med par byed pa yin 'dren mur mi byed
139a4(mdo sde): pa yin/ nag nog can du mi byed pa yin te// tshul khrims des bdag la stod par mi byed/ gzhan la smod par mi byed do/ de gnod sems kyi sems gdul ba'i phyir bzod pa sgom
139a5(mdo sde): ste/ de grong ngam grong rdal du zhugs pa nu/ ga she'ang ci mi sdum par byed do// brgyad kyang rung / brdeg kyang rung / bsdigs kyang rung / rnam par 'jom yang rung // spyod kyang rung
139a6(mdo sde): ci mi snyam par bya'o// kye mi dge sbyong bde ni mgo reg ngan pa'o// kye ma dge sbyong 'drin mgo reg mi sdug pa ngan pa'o zhes 'jig rten gyis dpyas kyang ci mi snyam par byed do// yang dag
139a7(mdo sde): pa ma yin pas sur kyang bzod par byed cing dang du len la galas bdag dir bya ba nyid la rton te/ bzod pa des kyang bdag la stod par mi byed/ gzhan la smod par mi byed do// de le ler sems
139b1(mdo sde): gdul ba'i phyir dang / byang chub kyi phyogs pa'i chos mthob pa rnams thob par bya ba'i phyir dang // thob pa rnams 'phel bar bya ba'i phyir dang / 'phel ba rnams yongs su smin par bya ba'i
139b2(mdo sde): phyir dang / yongs su smin pa rnams yang dag par gzung bar bya ba'i phyir dang / yang dag par gzung ba rnams rnam par dbye ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rtsom mo// de sems can gyi ched
139b3(mdo sde): rnams dang shasems can gyi bya ba rnamasal yongs su mi skyo zhing // yongs su yi mi ched de / yongs su skyo ba'i sems mi skyed do// do gdol pa la phan gdags kyang rung / rgyal po la
139b4(mdo sde): pa na gdags kyang rung ga shin tu lam ring por yang 'gro ste/ tha dad par mi dmigs shing ka/ rgyun mo gcod pa yin no// gal te byang chub sems dpa' sdug bsngal zhing bkren pa'i
139b5(mdo sde): sems can gyi dngos po tha chu ngan pa zhig gis bstabs sam/ 'byor cing nor che ba grang yang rung ba zhig gis dngos po bzang po mchog gya nom pa zhig bstabs kyang / de la byang chub
139b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' snying brtse ba'i sems bzhug la/ gus par bstod cing yang dag par gzengs bstod la kra yang dag par 'dzin du gzhug cing dngos po ngan pa de blang bar bya'o// de ci'i phyir
139b7(mdo sde): zhe na/ 'di lta stegasdug bsngal ba'i sbyin pa 'di ni sbyin pa bya dka' ba yin pa'i phyir ro// de rnam par g.yeng ba'i sems 'dul ba'i phyir/ bsam gtan la bsam gtan byed de/ ji ltar
140a1(mdo sde): bsam gtan byed ce na/ tshangs pa 'di la byang chub sems dpa' ni thog ma kho nar lus legs par bsdams pa yin no// lus dben par gnas pa yin no//
140a2(mdo sde): lus kyi 'du 'dzi rnams kyang yongs su spong ngo // lu sa la lhag par chags pa'ang 'dor ro// lus lci 'am yang ba'ang shes so// lus dang 'thun pa dang / lus 'tsho ba dang / lus kyi
140a3(mdo sde): stobs kyang rab tu shes so// ngag legs par bsdams pa yin te/ smra ba nyung zhing brjod pa nyung ngo // don smra ba yin zhing / rigs par smra ba yin te/ bre mo gtam la dga' ba yongs su
140a4(mdo sde): spangs pa yin no// de yid legs par bsdams pa yin te/ mi dge ba'i rnam par rtog pa thams cad yongs su spangs so// de de ltar gnas gsum yongs su dag pas/ sngon po dang / ser po dang /
140a5(mdo sde): dmar po dang / dkar po'i gzugs rnams mi snang bar bya ba'i phyir nan tan byed de/ de dag la mtshan mar mi 'dzin/ mngon rtags su mi 'dzin to// rgyan dang gos kyi rnam pa sna tshogs dag
140a6(mdo sde): la'ang mtshan mar mi 'dzin cing / mngon rtags su mi 'dzin pa yin no// gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang // ro dang // reg pa sna tshogs dag la'ang mtshan mar mi 'dzin cing / mngon
140a7(mdo sde): rtags su mi 'dzin pa yin no// skyes pa dang / bud med dang ga khye'u dang pha bu mo rnams la'ang mtshan mar mi 'dzin cing mngon rtags su mi 'dzin pa yin no// de gcig pu dben par
140b1(mdo sde): bdug nas ka nang du yang dag 'jog cing sems gnas par bya ba'i phyir nan tan byed de/ mi sdug pa la dmigs pa'am/ byams pa la dmigs pa 'am ka snying rje la dmigs pa'am
140b2(mdo sde): yid 'byung bar 'gyur bu gang yang rung bas ji ltar lus khengs par mi 'gyur ba de ltar dmigs par byed de/ dbugs rngub pa dang 'byung ba mi 'gag go// rgyun rnams kyang mi 'chad do// rlung
140b3(mdo sde): 'khrug par mi 'gyur ro// sems log par rnam pa ra g.yeng bar mi 'gyur ro// de bachag gam gnyal lam 'greng ngam 'dug kyang dmigs pa de nyid kyis 'dug go
140b4(mdo sde): la sems gtong ngo // tshangs pa gang gi chu byang chub sems dpa' dmigs pa la sems brtan pa gyur pa de'i tshe sems la sems mnyam par 'jog ste ga sems kyis sems kyi
140b5(mdo sde): dmigs so// gang gis mnyam par 'jog pa de'ang mi dmigs so// gang gi phyir mnyam par 'jog pa de'ang mi dmigs so// de 'di snyam du sems te/ kye ma byis pa so so'i skye
140b6(mdo sde): po 'dri dgu ni gsog gi chos rnams dang / gsob kyi chos rnams la mngon par zhen to snyam du sems te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i lhag mthong zhes bya'o// de ltar rnam par mthong
140b7(mdo sde): bas nyon mongs pa rnams kun tu mi 'byung zhing mi 'jug pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i zhi gnas zhes bya'o// tshangs pa gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' gcig pu dben par 'dug sde
141a1(mdo sde): bya/ nang du yang dag bzhag nas ming dang yi ge ji ltar thos pa rnams nges pa'i tshig gis gdags pas kayang dag par 'jog cing / yi ge de dag la nye bar rtog ste
141a2(mdo sde): de de ltar nye bar rtog pa na yi ge rnams gsog dang gsob tu mthong ngo // de yi ge rnams gsog dang gsob tu mthong nas ming rnams kyang gsog dang gsob tu mthong ngo // gang la ming
141a3(mdo sde): de 'dogs pa de bang gsog dang gsob tu mthong ngo // de gzugs gang dang gang snang ba de dang de'ang gsog dang gsob tu snang ngo // des gsog dang gsob tu snang bas yang dag pa ji
141a4(mdo sde): lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes par 'gyur ro// yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su shes pas/ de la 'dus byas rmi lam dang 'dra bar snang ngo // de la byang chub sems dpa' so sor
141a5(mdo sde): brtags nas sems can la lta bas snying rje chen po'i sems nye bar bzhag nas gnas so// de 'chal pa'i shes rab kyi sems gdul ba'i phyir shes rab sgom par byed do// ji ltar
141a6(mdo sde): sgom par byed ce na// de kun rdzob kyi tshul du bshad pa'am/ don dam pa'i tshul du bshad pa'i mdo sde gang drag yin pa de dag brjod pa gsal zhing / zur phyin pa dag gis mngon par 'dzin
141a7(mdo sde): to/ ma nor bar chos ston pa las bzung nas kyang / ma nor ba'i bsam pas sems par byed do// bsgom pa'i rnal 'byor la'ang brtson par byed do// de ye shes kyi stobs dang shes
141b1(mdo sde): rab kyi bye brag gis sems can mi dmigs pa srog mi dmigs/ gso ba mi dmigs pa skye ba mi dmigs// gang zag mi dmigs ka shed lus skyes pa mi dmigs kashed bu mi
141b2(mdo sde): dmigs te/ thams cad kyi thams cad du chud par lta bar yang mi ltung ngo // btags pa'o tha snyad rnams la'ang legs par bslabs pa yin no// de zin pa'i sa'i khams dang gam zin
141b3(mdo sde): pa'i sa'i khams la yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis tshul gcig tu so sor rtog go gzin pa'i chu'i khams dang / ma'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / ma zinu pa la'ang yang drug pa'i
141b4(mdo sde): shes rab kyis tshul gcig tu so sor rtog ste de gnyis ka'ang gsog nyid dang gsob nyid du mthong zhing bems po nyid dang / snying po med pa nyid dang stong pa nyid du mthong ngo //
141b5(mdo sde): des de ltar mthong bas ji ltar phyi rol gyi khams rnams la mngon par chags pa med pa de ltar nang gi rnams la'ang ngo // mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / gzugs rnams
141b6(mdo sde): la'ang yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis tshul gcig tu so sor rtog go/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sgra rnams dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / dri rnams dang / lce'i rnam par
141b7(mdo sde): shes pa dang / ro rnams dang / lus kyi rna bar shes pa dang / reg bya rnams la'ang yang dag pa'i shes rab kyis tshul gcig tu so sor rtog go// des khams la ni sra ba
142a1(mdo sde): nyid du'ang rub tu shes la ga gsher ba nyid dang / tsha ba nyid dang / khong sdong nyid du'ang rab tu shes so// chu'i khams la gsher ba nyid du rab tu shes pa/
142a2(mdo sde): srang nyid dung // tsha ba nyid dang / khong stong nyid du'ang rab tu shes so// ma'i khams la tsha ba nyid du'ang rab tu shes la/ sra ba nyid dang / gu shur ba nyid dang / khong steng nyid du'ang rab
142a3(mdo sde): tu shes so// rlung gi khams la g.yo ba nyid du'ang rab tu shes la/ yang zhing g.yo ba nyid du'ang rab tu shes so// de nam mkha'i khams la khong stong nyid du'ang rab tu shes la/ thams
142a4(mdo sde): cad du song ba nyid du'ang rab tu shes so// rnam par shes pa'i khams la sgyu ma lta bu nyid du'ang rab tu shes la// phyin ci log nyid du'ang rab tu shes// phyin ci ma log pa nyid du'ang rab
142a5(mdo sde): tu shes so// de mig gi rnam par shes pa la stong pa nyid dang / gzugs la mi rtag pa nyid du'ang rab tu shes so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la stong pa nyid dang / sgral mi rtag pa
142a6(mdo sde): nyid dang sna'i rnam par shes pa la stong pa nyid dang / dri la mi rtag pa nyid dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa la stong pa nyid dang // rol mi rtag pa nyid dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa la stong pa
142a7(mdo sde): di dang / reg byal mi rtag pa nyid dung rab tu shes so// de de ltar shes rab la mkhas pas/ shin tu rtogs pa'i shes rab dang ldan cing / shes rab rdo ba dang ldan te/ mi dag par
142b1(mdo sde): chos rnams kyang rab tu shes/ dge ba'i chos rnams kyang rab tu shes/ nyan thos yang dag par 'grub par byed pa'i chos rnams kyang rab tu shes/ rang saspangs rgyas yang dag par 'thub pa ru
142b2(mdo sde): byed pa'i chos rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par 'grub par byed pa'i chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas nyid yang dag par 'grub par byed pa'i chos rnams kyang rab tu shes so// de mi
142b3(mdo sde): dge pa'i chos rnams kyis rnam par smin pa chung ngu dang // 'bring dang / chen po sems can dmyal ba rnams dang / dud 'gro rnams dang / yi dgas rnams su skye ba'ang rab tu shes so// der skyes
142b4(mdo sde): pa rnams kyi tshor ba chung ngu dang / 'bring dang / chen po'ang rab tu shes so// dge ba'i chos rnams kyi rnam par smin pa chung ngu dang / 'bring dang / chen po lha rnams kyi nang du 'am/ mi rnams kyi nang
142b5(mdo sde): du smin pa'ang rab tu shes so// der skyes pa rnams kyi 'bras bu chung ngu dang / 'bring dang / chen po'ang rab tu shes so// nyan thos yang dag par 'grub par byed pa'i chos rnams kyi rgyun
142b6(mdo sde): tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba dang / lan cig phyir bong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du bya ba dang / dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu mngon
142b7(mdo sde): du bya ba'i rnam parang rab tu shes so// shes rab kyis rnam par grol ba nyid dang / gnyis ka'i cha las rnam par grol ba'ang rab tu shes so// rang sangs rgyas yang dag par 'grub par
143a1(mdo sde): byed pa'i chos rnams kyi yang dag par 'grub pa'ang rab tu shes so// 'bras bu dang zhi ba nyid kyang rab tu shes so// byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par
143a2(mdo sde): 'grub par byed pa'i chos rnams kyi tshogs kyi lam yang rab tu shes so// ye shes kyi lam yang rab tu shes so// shes nas kyang tshogs kyi lam dang ye shes kyi lam la brtson par
143a3(mdo sde): byed do// sangs rgyas nyid yang dag par 'grub par byed pa'i chos rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul che ba nyid kyang rab tu shes so// mthu che ba nyid dang ga dam pa nyid dang / rab mchog nyid dang
143a4(mdo sde): phul du byung ba nyid drang / che ba nyid dang gnyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang thun mong ba'ang ma yin na/ gzhan sems can lta smos kyang ci dgro/
143a5(mdo sde): pa'i thun mong ma yin pa nyid kyang rab tu shes so// de de ltar chos rnams la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing // dran pa legs par nye bar gnas la/ sdig pa'i chos thams cad dang ni bral/ dge ba'i
143a6(mdo sde): chos ni yang dag par thob pa lus kyi gnod pa ni med// rnam par shes pa sra 'phangs pa ni med/ sems kyis 'phangs pa ni med la// chos rnams kyi rgyu'i tshogs dang / 'bras bu yang dag pa
143a7(mdo sde): ji lta ba bzhin du shes pas// dper na rgya mtsho'i rlabs bzhin du dge ba'i chos rnams kyis rnam par 'phel te/ ji ltar rgya mtsho'i rlabs 'bri zhing / yang 'byung ba ltar byang chub sems
143b1(mdo sde): dpa' ni chos rnams las de lta ma yin no// de dper na zla ba'i ser gyi ngo zla bu'i dkyil 'khor dang 'dra bar// dge ba'i chos rnams kyis mngon par 'phel te/ ji ltar mar gyi ngol
143b2(mdo sde): zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'bri ba'i chos can yin pa ltar/ byang chub sems dpa' ni chos rnams las de lha ma yin no// de dpar na dbyar gyi dus kyi phu chu brug pa ltar/ dge ba'i chos
143b3(mdo sde): rnams kyis mngon par 'phel te/ ji ltar phu chu brug pa dbyar gyis dus zad pa 'bri ba'i chos can yin pa ltar/ byang chub sems dpa' ni chos rnams las de lta ma yin no// tshangs pa
143b4(mdo sde): de ltar bslabs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su
143b5(mdo sde): bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to// lus kyi skyon rnams rab shes na/ lus yod skyon rnams mi sten to// lus la dran pa legs gnas na// skyon me zhi ba'i gnas 'thob bo//
143b6(mdo sde): lus kyi skyon rnams mi shes na// lus la yod pa'i skyon ma rtogs// lus la dran pa mo gnas na// sdug bsngal bzod dka' gnas 'thob bo// sems kyi skyon rnams rab shes na//
143b7(mdo sde): sems yod skyon rnams mi sten to// sems la dran pa legs gnas na// skyon med zhi ba'i gnas pa thob bo// sems kyi skyon rnams mi shes na// sems la yod pa'i skyon mi rtogs//
144a1(mdo sde): sems la dran pa mi gan swa na// sdug bsngal bzod dka' gnas 'thob bo// dge ba'i chos rnams sten byed cing // mi dge chos rnams mi sten pa/
144a2(mdo sde): chos rnams la ni mkhas pa'i mi// skyon meng zhi ba'i gnas 'thob bo// dge ba'i chos rnams mi ldan cing // mi dge'i chos rnams sten byed pa// chos rnams la ni mi mkhas mi//
144a3(mdo sde): sdug bsngal bzod dka' gnas 'thob bo// de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas// lha'i me tog man+da rab dug mngon par sprul te/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor to//
144a4(mdo sde): mngon par gtor nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par dga' zhing rjes su yi rang nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das
144a5(mdo sde): kyi thad nas song ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nam nangs par mkhyen nas/ dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi gung la gdun bshams pa la bzhugs so// bzhugs nas bcom ldan
144a6(mdo sde): 'das kyis/ dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/ dge slong dag mdangs 'dir mi nyal tsam gyi gung thun lang gcig pu dben par 'dug ste/ nang du yang dag bzhag na/ mi mjed kyi
144a7(mdo sde): bdag po tshangs pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i tshal chen po 'od kyis snang bar byas nas/ nga ga la ba der 'ongs te phyin nas// nga la mngon par bstod de/ lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/
144b1(mdo sde): phyogs gcig tu 'dug go// phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas ngal 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te nus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du//
144b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs dbye bar gnang na ga bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga'
144b3(mdo sde): zhig zhu legs so// dge slong dag de skad ces gsol pa dang ngas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// tshangs pa zhu ba lung bstan pa'i phyir/
144b4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pas rtag tu khyod la skabs phyes pa tshangs pa khyod ci 'dod pa zhus shig dang / zhus pa de dang de nyid kyi lung bstan pas/ dus khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// de nas
144b5(mdo sde): skabs phye bas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas/ nga la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag chos du dang ldan na// myur du bla na
144b6(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya lags / dge slong dag de skad ces gsol pa dang / dus mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la 'di skad ces bka'
144b7(mdo sde): stsal to// tshangs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag ches gcig dang ldan na/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//
145a1(mdo sde): chos gcig gang zhe nu/ 'di lta ste/ lus kyi rjes su song ba'i dran pa'o// dge slong dag ngas mi mjed kyi bu dgra po tshangs pa de la lus kyi rjes su song ba'i
145a2(mdo sde): dran pa'i rgyu dang // las dang 'bras bu'ang bstan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// legs so legs so// bcom ldan
145a3(mdo sde): 'das kyis mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la gang bstan pa de/ skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde ba dang // lha dang mi rnams kyi dron dang / sman pa dang / bde bar bgyi
145a4(mdo sde): ba'i slad du bshad du gsol/ dge slong gsar pa gsar pa rnams dang // chos 'dul ba 'di la rab byung nas// ring po ma lags shing mchis nas/ ring po ma lags pa rnams dang
145a5(mdo sde): theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i skyes bu dam pa 'di dag gis thos na dga' ba dang / dad pa thob par 'gyur/ bslab pu de la'ang sbyor bar brtson par gnas par 'gyur
145a6(mdo sde): lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa la gang bshad dude/ dge slong de dag 'ang bshad do// de nas bcom ldan 'dus la/ cha dang ldan
145a7(mdo sde): bkun dga' bas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcomaldan 'das legs par bka' stsal to// dang bar gshegs pa legs par bka' stsal to// mi mdzad kyi bdag
145b1(mdo sde): pa mdo sde 'di lnga bu dgra yongs su zhu ba'i slad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyi thang du mchis nasra/ zhus pa'ang lags par sbas pa legs so// bcom ldan 'das mi mjed kyi bdag po tsha
145b2(mdo sde): pas gal te dge ba'i rtsa ba gnan ma mchis na 'ang // zhu ba zhus pa'i mod las skyes pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de kho nas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
145b3(mdo sde): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di'i mtha' dang mu ni/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rtogs par rngo thogs
145b4(mdo sde): pa'i slad du'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas zhu ba 'di/ sems can thams cad kyi spyi'i don du zhus pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan
145b5(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de de bzhin te/ de de bzhin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam
145b6(mdo sde): grangs 'di'i ming ci lags/ 'od ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de'i phyir khyod kyis 'di tshungs pas zhus pa zhes bya bar zung zhig/ dran pa nye bar
145b7(mdo sde): gzhag pa'i tshul bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ bag yod pa'i tshul bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas
146a1(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang / dge slong de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang lnga dang / mi dang
146a2(mdo sde): lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa tshangs pas zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen
146a3(mdo sde): po'i mdo rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / zhu chen gyi ts+tsha ba ban d+ha ya shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//
146a4(mdo sde): rgya gar skad du/ Ur+ya rat+na ko Ti ra nA ma ma hA yA na su dra/ bod skad du'aphags pa rin po che'i mtha' zhes bya ba theg pu chen po'i mdo// sangs
146a5(mdo sde): rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong lnga brgya
146a6(mdo sde): tham pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te// de nus 'jam drapal gzhon nur gyur pa mtshun mi srod la bcom ldan 'das kyi bzhugs khang ga la ba der song rje byin
146a7(mdo sde): nas bzugs khang gi sgo drung na 'greng ste/ bcom ldan 'das la bstod do// de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas/
146b1(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das dran pa dang mkhyen bzhin du// ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs nas// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa skon 'dug pa gzigs so// gzigs nas kyang 'jam dngal khrod
146b2(mdo sde): nang du shig ces de skad bkar su tau// bcom ldan 'das legs so legs so zhes gsol te/ 'jam dpal gson nur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das kyi lngar mnyan nas/ bcom ldan 'ang
146b3(mdo sde): gal ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zha bsul mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'greng ngo // 'jam dpal gzhin nur gyur pa phyogs gcig tu 'greng ba dang
146b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis stan la 'dug ces gnang ba mdzad do// bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang bas// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal
146b5(mdo sde): pa de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das la// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di skad ces gso to//
146b6(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das du gdod ting nge 'dzin gang gis bzhugs bzhugs pa las bzhengasu lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad
146b7(mdo sde): ces bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal rin po che'i mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do// ting nge 'dzin de las ngad gdod gnas gnas pa las langs so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/
147a1(mdo sde): de la rin po che'i mtha' zhes bgyi lugs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ dper na nor bu rin po che shin tu dag cing shin tu byi dor/
147a2(mdo sde): byas pa/ sa phyogs mnyam pa la bzhag na/ de gang dang gang kho nar gzhag pa dri dang drer rin po che bye ba gnas par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpral de bzhin du nga ting nge 'dzin de la gnas nas/
147a3(mdo sde): shar phyogs su bltas te/ shar phyogs su bltas nas/ ngas ni 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med grangs med pa dug na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzos
