265a3(mdo sde): rnam grangs 'di thos sam/ smras bu/ tshangs pa thos pa med pa'i tshul gyis thos so// smras pa/ khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ji lta bur shes/ smras pa/ ji ltar shes pa med
265a4(mdo sde): pa dang / rnam par shes pa med pa de ltar ro// smras pa/ khyed kyis chos gang rab tu thob pas bzod pa rab tu thob par 'gyur// smras pa// chos thams cad rab tu thob pa med pa'i phyir
265a5(mdo sde): ro smras pa// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ji ltar rtogs par bya/ sbas pa// rtogs par bya ba med pa'i tshul gyis so// smras pa// chos bstan pa 'di khyed kyis mngon sum yin
265a6(mdo sde): nam/ sbas pa// tshangs pa chos thams cad bdag dang gzhan med pa'i phyir mngon sum yin no// de nas 'khor de nyid du lha'i bu dri ma med pa'i tog ces bya ba 'dus par gyur pa des
265a7(mdo sde): tshangs pa khyad par sems la 'di skad ces smras so// tshangs pa gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las rlung ngu na can par 'gyur ba de dag gal te de bzhin gshegs pas lung ma bstan kyang ro
265b1(mdo sde): bos de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshangs pa chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni 'bras bu dang sa bon chud mi gzon pa'o// 'phags/
265b2(mdo sde): pa yang dag par zhugs pa thams cad kyis yongs su gzung ba'o// dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par skyed pa'o// bdud dang phyir rgol ba tshar gcod pa'o// bar du gcod pa
265b3(mdo sde): thams cad dang bral ba'o// dang bskyed par byed pa'o// dad pa dang ldan pa rnams dga' zhing mgu bar byed pa'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyis shin tu yongs su gzung ba'o//
265b4(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis legs par bsrungs pa'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni gcig tu nges pa ste phyir mi ldog pa'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni
265b5(mdo sde): byang chub kyi snying po la mi sruba'o// chos kyi rnam grangs pade ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bden pa'i 'byung gnas so// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni chos kyi 'khor lo skor ba'o// chos kyi
265b6(mdo sde): rnam grangs 'di ni 'gyod pa rnams sel bar byed pa'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni 'phags pa'i lam rnam par sbyong ba'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni thar par 'dod pa rnams kyis legs par
265b7(mdo sde): thos pa'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni gzungs 'dod pa rnams kyis legs par gzung ba'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni bsod nams 'dod pa rnams kyis legs par rab tu bstan pa'o//
266a1(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni ros 'dod pa rnams kyis legs par srung ba'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'dini mya ngan las 'das par 'gro ba'i phyir grangs med pa'o//
266a2(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni pha rol rgol ba dmigs pa can gyi mi 'phrogs pa'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni sbyin par 'os pa rnams dang 'thun pa'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni mkhas
266a3(mdo sde): pa rnams dga' bar byed pa'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni lta ba ngan pa dang bral bas shes rab skyed pa'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni gti mug 'joms par byed pas ye shes skyed pa'o//
266a4(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs doni yi ge'i tshig nges pas shin tu nges pa'i rig go// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni 'bru 'brel bas legs par bstan pa'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni don dam
266a5(mdo sde): pa yang dag par ston pas don yang dag par skyed pa'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di na chos brjod pa rnams kyis yongs su ma btang ba'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'don shes pa dang ldan pa
266a6(mdo sde): rnams kyis mabor ba'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni nor 'dod pa rnams kyi gter ro// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni kun tu gdungs pa rnams yongs su bdud ba med par byed pa'o//
266a7(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni byas pa la gnas pa rnams kyi mnyam pa nyid myed pa'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni le lo can rnams kyi brtson 'grus skyed pa'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'din
266b1(mdo sde): brjed ngas pa rnams kyi bsam gtan byed pa'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni shes rab 'chal pa rnams la snang bar byed pa'o// tshangs pa chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la ni sangs rgyas kyi
266b2(mdo sde): chos thams cad shin tu legs par gnas so// de nas lha'i bu des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i bsngags pa bstan pa na// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam
266b3(mdo sde): pa drug tu g.yos so// bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang lha'i bu la legs so zhes bya ba byin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la// tshangs pa khyad par sems kyis 'di skad ces gsol
266b4(mdo sde): to/ bcom ldan 'das lha'i bu 'des sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dag las chos kyi rnam grangs sngon thos sam// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// tshangs pa
266b5(mdo sde): lha'i bu 'dis sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi las chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos te/ tshangs pa lha'i bu dri ma med pa'i tog 'di bskal pa brgya stong drag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis na/
266b6(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen ldan du de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che bkod pa zhes bya bar 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gang yang de'i bar du sangs rgyas 'byung ba de dag thams
266b7(mdo sde): cad la'ang mnyes par byed par 'gyur// bkur stir byed par 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'ang thos par 'gyur ro// tshangs pa dge slong
267a1(mdo sde): dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za gang dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la bzod
267a2(mdo sde): pa rab tu thob pa de dag thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che bkod pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen ldan du skye bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la
267a3(mdo sde): lnga'i bu drim med pa'i tog gis 'di skad ces gsod do// bcom ldan 'das gang bdag ni byang chub mi 'tshal/ mi ston// mngon par mi dga'// mngon par mchags/ mi dmigs
267a4(mdo sde): mi sems/ mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog na/ ci'i srad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la lung bstan/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu 'di ltar skyes bu la la
267a5(mdo sde): zhig gis rtswa dang / shing dang / yal ga dang // lo ma dang / bde ba ma dag mer bcug nas 'di skad du rtswa dang / shing dang / yal ga dang // lo ma dang // 'dab mdag mchog
267a6(mdo sde): cig ces sbas na// de de'i dbang gis mi 'tshig pa ma yin no// wa'i bu de bzhin du 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' byang chub la mngon par mi dga' mngon par ma chags
267a7(mdo sde): mi dmigs/ mi 'dod/ mi sngon/ mi sems/ rnam par mi rtog kyang sangs rgyas thams cad lung ston te/ lA'i bu 'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' gang byang chub la mngon par
267b1(mdo sde): mi dga' / mngon par ma chags mi dmigs// mi 'dod// mi smon/ mi sems// rnam par mi rtog pa de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams lung ston to// de nas 'khor der
267b2(mdo sde): lha'i bu lnga brgya tsam gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang byang chub la mngon par mi dga'/ mngon par ma chags/ mi
267b3(mdo sde): dmigs ming tshal// mi smon// mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog na/ ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung mi bstan
267b4(mdo sde): to/ de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus steng gi bar snang la sangs rgyas stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa ba ni mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
267b5(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la// lnga'i bu de dag gisra 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas 'di skad du byang chub
267b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' gang byang chub la mngon par mi dga'/ mngon par ma chags// mi dmigs/ mi 'dod// mi smon// mi sems/ mi rtog/ rnam par mi rtog pa de byang chub tu
267b7(mdo sde): lung bstan par 'gyur ro zhes legs par gsungs pa de ni ngo mtshar te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis steng gi phyogs na// sangs rgyas stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi mthong ste
268a1(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad bdag cag la bran med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung ston to// de nas badz+ram dpal gzhon nur gyur
268a2(mdo sde): pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang slad ma'i dus lnga brgya pa tha mal 'dzam bu'i grong 'dir chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu spyod pa dang // yun ring du
268a3(mdo sde): gnas par 'gyur ba dang / rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gor chen po dgos padag gi rna lam du gdab par 'gyur ba dang / rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag bdud kyi
268a4(mdo sde): las skyes shing byung ba rnams kyi dbang du mi mchi ba dang // de dag la bdud dam// bdud kyi ris kyi lha dag gis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ba dang / chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yongs su gzung
268a5(mdo sde): zhing go cha chen po bgos te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su ma nyams par byin gyis brlab par gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'jam dpal
268a6(mdo sde): de bas na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di byin gyis brlab pa dang / yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding
268a7(mdo sde): dang mibam ci dang // lto 'phyerachen po dang / grul bum 'bebs pa zhes bya ba'i reg pa dang / sngags kyi reg 'di bshad kyis nyon cig/ rig pa dang sngags kyi tshig de bcangs pas rigs
268b1(mdo sde): kyi bu 'am// rigs kyi bu mo ros spa bde lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang // lha ma yin dang // nam mkha' lding dang // mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang // grul bum
268b2(mdo sde): rnams kyis yongs su bsrung ba rab tu thob ste// rigs kyi bu bam// rigs kyi bu mo de dag lam mam// lam log par song ngam/ gtsug lag khang du song ngam/ gnas khang
268b3(mdo sde): du song ngam/ b.rag pa la zhugs sam/ 'khor gyi nang du song yang rung ste/ srung bar byed do// spobs pa skyed par byed/ dran pa dang / blo gros dang // rtogs
268b4(mdo sde): pa'i stobs bskyed pa nye bar sbyor te// de la pha rol gyi rgol ba bam/ phas kyi dgra grags tshol ba dag gis grags kyang rnyed par mi 'gyur ro// de dran zhing shes bzhin du ldang bar
268b5(mdo sde): 'gyur/ 'chag par 'gyur// 'dug par 'gyur// nyal bar 'gyur ro// 'ja dpal de la rig pa dang sngags kyi tshig de dag gang zhe na// 'di lta ste/ ud dru dru re/ ran+da da
268b6(mdo sde): tsa twe go tsa re shi la li/ hi li mi li/ thai li thi mi'o// hu lu hu lu hu lu/ e bad Te/ be ta Te/ kha kha re/ tha re/ kha ra ke/ A sAn ne/ ga ti ma hi le/ mA na sha ta ne mA na sa be ra
268b7(mdo sde): gan d+he/ sarba ru te ra dA ba ga te/ sin d+hu len mo bud d+he N+ya/ tsA rid dra/ na mo d+harnA ya/ narga ta ni/ na maH/ sang g+hA ya/ bA hi ta pA pe// b+hu pa shwan tra na/ sarba pA pA ne mai dr-i ma
269a1(mdo sde): sarba d+ha te bya/ sad d+h+ya ni de sho za sdang rdo// mahA ri'i ti pra shas+t+ra/ tad rba tiSh+ThAn te sarba tru ta tha ta/ nasaHsarba bud teb+h+ya/ sid d+han tu meman
269a2(mdo sde): tra pa dA swA hA/ 'jam dpal rig pa dang sngags kyi tshig 'di byang chub sems dpab gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la brtson pa/ rtag tu shes bzhin dang ldan pa mi rgod pa
269a3(mdo sde): khengs pa med pa// sems mi g.yengs pa/ kun tu spyod pa gtsang ba// sogs pa dang bral ba/ chog shes pa pas mtha'i gnas mal la mngon par dga' ba// 'du 'ji
269a4(mdo sde): nyung ba// lus dang sems dben pa/ byams pa dang snying rje la mngon par dga' ba// chos la dga' zhing mos pa/ bden pa'i tshig la rab tu gnas pa// mi slu ba/ nang du yang dag
269a5(mdo sde): 'jog la mngon par dga' ba/ tshul bzhin yid la byed pa la brtson pa// tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa dang bral ba/ sbyangs pa'i yon tan dang yo byad bsnyungs pa la mngon
269a6(mdo sde): par dga' ba// rnyed pa dang ma rnyed pa la sems mnyam pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon du phyogs pa/ 'khor bas 'jigs shing skrag pa sdug pa dang mi sdug pa la sems
269a7(mdo sde): mnyam pa// 'du shes sna tshogs dang bral ba// lus dang srog 'dor ba dngos po thams cad la mi blta ba/ spyod pa dang cho ga phun sum tshogs pa// tshul khrims dang sdom pa la
269b1(mdo sde): mngon par dga' ba/ bzod pa dang nges pa mang ba / ngan du zer ba bzod pa'i rang bzhin can brtson 'grus brtsams pa sems can thams cad kyi bya ba ci yod ces bya ba la brtson pa//
269b2(mdo sde): bzhin badzum pa khro gnyer dang bral ba/ gsong por smra ba// nga rgyal bcom pa/ des pa// 'grogs na bde ba/ de lta bu'i spyod pa la rab tu gnas pa'i rigs kyi bu'am// rigs kyi bu
269b3(mdo sde): mos 'jam dpal sngags kyi rig 'di rab tu gdon par bya'o// 'jam dpal de ltar na chos smra ba de tshe 'di nyid la stobs skyed pa bcu rab tu 'thob bo// bcu gang zhe na/ mi brjed pa'i
269b4(mdo sde): chos nyid pas dran pa'i stobs skyed pa dang // tshes rab tu 'byed pa la mkhas pas blo gros kyi stobs skyed pa dang / mdo sde'i tshul khong du chud pas rtogs pa'i stobs skyed pa dang
269b5(mdo sde): sdom pa dang spyod pa mi gtong bas dad pa'i stobs skyed pa dang / bdag dang gzhan srung bas ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa'i stobs skyed pa dang // shes rab yongs su rdzogs pas thos
269b6(mdo sde): pa'i stobs skyed pa dang // thos pa thams cad yongs su 'dzin pas gzungs kyi stobs skyed pa dang // sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis yongs su bzung bas spobs pa'i stobs skyed
269b7(mdo sde): pa dang / mngon par shes pa lnga rab tu thob pas zab ro'i stobs skyed pa dang / myur du thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs pas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa skyed pa ste/ 'jam
270a1(mdo sde): dpal spyod pa la zhugs pa'i chos sba ba gang rig pa dang / sngags kyi tshig 'di rab tu 'don 'a deni stobs skyed pade bcu rab tu thob par 'gyur ro// rig pa dang sngag
270a2(mdo sde): kyi tshig bstan pa 'di bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad pa'i tshe/ rgyal po chen po bzhi sreg cing baspu langs par gyur te/ g.yog brgya stong phrag du ma dang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der
270a3(mdo sde): dong nas phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ thal mo sbyar nas// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag
270a4(mdo sde): rgyal po chen po bzhi po 'di dag ni rgyun du zhugs pa// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' sgrub par bgyid pa ste/ gnyen bshes dang bcas// 'khor dang bcas pas rigs kyi bu dang /
270a5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu mo chos smra ba dang / chos ston pa dang / mdo sde 'di lta bu'i rang ba dang / klog pa de dag la bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang
270a6(mdo sde): sba bar bgyi'o// de dag grong ngam/ grong khyer ram// ljongs sam// ljongs kyi phyogs gang na gnas kyang rung // khyim pa'am/ rab tu byung ba'ang rung ste/ bcom ldan 'das bdag/
270a7(mdo sde): cag rgyal po bzhi stobs dang bcas// 'khor dang bcas pas// rigs kyi bu'am// rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi rim gro bgyi bar bdag cag spro'o// bsrung ba dang bskyab pa dang /
270b1(mdo sde): spong dang / spobs pa dang / gzhan gyis gnod par mi bgyi zhing mi gtse bar bgyi ba'i slad du bdag cag spo'o// bcom ldan 'das sa phyogs gang na chos kyis rnam grangs 'di rab tu
270b2(mdo sde): spyod par 'gyur ba'i sa phyogs der dpag tshad brgya kho ra khor yug tu lba'am/ klu 'am/ gnod sbyin nam// grul bum gyis grags mi rnyed do// de nas rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes
270b3(mdo sde): pos tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag la bu dang gnyen bshes dang // bran dang 'khor rnams ci mchis pa// de dang bdag cag grogs bcas pas//
270b4(mdo sde): bdag po de dag rim gro bgyid// de nas rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang gis rigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag ni chos kyi rgyal po'i sras// chos las skyes pa
270b5(mdo sde): chos kyi sprul// khyod kyi sras gang byang chub tu// zhugs pa de dag rim gro bgyid// de nas rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung gis rigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces gsol to//
270b6(mdo sde): sangs rgyas gsungs pa'i mdo sde 'di// gang dag 'dzin par 'gyur ba rnams// de dag phyogs bcu rnams su yang // bdag gis kun tu bsrung bar bgyi// de nas rgyal po chen
270b7(mdo sde): po rnam thos kyi bus rigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces gsol to// gang dag byang chub phyir brtson pa// de la ci 'dra 'os pa yi// de 'dra'i mchod pa bgyid par na// sems can
271a1(mdo sde): kun gyis mi nus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ rgyal po rin po rnam thos kyi bu bden pa'i zla ba zhes bya ba des rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i gdus
271a2(mdo sde): gsol nas// tshigs su bcad pa 'di skad ces gsol to// de bzhin gshegs las bdag nyid kyis// chos kyi rnam grangs gzung bar bgyi// pha rol la yang bstan par
271a3(mdo sde): bgyi// bdag gi bsam pa de 'dra'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag sems dang // sngon gyi spyad pa ci 'dra khyen// ji ltar bdag gis sems bdud pa// bdag ni 'jig
271a4(mdo sde): rten rnam 'dren 'gyur// sangs rgyas dpag med skyob pa la// bdag gis gdugs 'di phul ba yis// bdag ni thub pa khyod 'dra bar// spyi gtsug bltar yang mig dar
271a5(mdo sde): 'gyur// sangs rgyas skyes bu dam pa yang // bdag gis byams pas bltas pa yis// yongs su dag pa'i mig thob ste/ rgyal ba ma bum blta bar bgyi// ye shes pa rol
271a6(mdo sde): phyin pa yi// ston pas de nas lung bstan te// khyod ni 'di nas byi dus na// dga' ldan du yang skye bar 'gyur// dgra' ldan nas ni shi babos nas// rgyal ba byams pa mthong bar
271a7(mdo sde): 'gyur/ bskal pa stong phrag nyi shur ni// mchod pa byas nas 'byung bar 'gyur// khyed ni rab tu byung nas kyang // tshangs par spyod pa rab spyad de// bskal pa bzang 'dir gang
271b1(mdo sde): zung ba// bdag po de dag mthong bar 'gyur// thams cad la yang mchod byas te// tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas ni// bsal pa byed drug cun// de nas khyod ni sangs rgyas
271b2(mdo sde): 'gyur/ sangs rgyas zhing ni legs brgyan pa// rin chen gdugs zhes bya bar ni// byang chub sems dpa' sha stag la// khyod ni chos rnams ston par 'gyur// tshe mi tshad ni
271b3(mdo sde): bskal par 'gyur// sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir// mya ngan las 'das pa'i dam chos kyang // ma 'dres bskal pa byed du gnas// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ lha'i
271b4(mdo sde): dbang po brgya byin gyis g.yog brgya stong phrag du ma dang bcas pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos snga ba mdo sde 'di 'chang ba de dag bsrung ba dang
271b5(mdo sde): yongs su gzung bar bgyi'o// bsnyen bkur dang rim gror yang bgyi'o// gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yi ge ra 'dri ba'am/ klog pa der ci nas kyang chos slu ba de'i stobs dang // mthu
271b6(mdo sde): dang chos kyi mtshams sbyor ba spobs par 'gyur bar bdag 'khor dang bcas te chos nyan du mchi'o// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi bu sbed byed ces bya ba des// do shal rin po che//
271b7(mdo sde): thams cad kyis sbas pa de bzhin gshegs pa la phul nas rigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsol to// thub pa bdag 'dir mngon sum ste// ji ltar khyod kyis sngon spyad pa/
272a1(mdo sde): de bzhin bdag kyang sangs rgyas kyi// ye shes tshol bar bsgrub par bgyi// khyod kyis sngan chad ma sul bar// yongs su ma btang ci ma mchis// bdog/
272a2(mdo sde): pa thams cad gtong ba yi// bdag kyang rjes su bslab par bgyi// khyod kyis mdo sde 'di yang ni// 'jig rten mgon las mngon du blangs// yang dang yang du bshad par dgyi// bdag
272a3(mdo sde): po byed la bgyis pa gzo// mdo sde 'dril su dga' ba// de dag bdag gi ston pa 'dra// bdug ni sangs rgyas chos 'tshal bas// de la rtag tu rim gro bgyi// dam pa'i chos rnams yongs
272a4(mdo sde): srung ba// mgon po nyan thos mi nus te// phyi dus 'jigs pa rin po'i tshe// bdag gis yongs su bsrung bar bgyi// mgon po bdag kyang dbugs dbyung gsol// lha rnams the
272a5(mdo sde): tsam gcad du gsol// thub pa khyu mchog khyod badra ba// ji srid yun gyis 'grub par 'gyur// kun mkhyen ye shes mkhas pa yi// bde bar gshegs pas de lung bstan
272a6(mdo sde): nga ni ci badra de 'dra bar// khyod kyang rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'gyur// bskal pa bye ba phrag stong dang // bskal pa bye ba brgya yi che// 'jig rten du ni sangs rgyas 'gyur// ming ni ye shes
272a7(mdo sde): 'byung zhes bya// byang chub zhi bzob nas kyang // bdud rnams rab tu brtul nas ni// sems can bye ba phrag stong rnams// byang chub la yang bgod par 'gyur// de nas mi mjed kyi bdag
272b1(mdo sde): po tshangs pas// bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag bsam gtan la gnas pa'ang btang ste/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang chos kyi rnam grang
272b2(mdo sde): 'di yang dag par ston pa de la chos nyan du mchi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ brgya byin dang tshangs pa ni 'di las skyes te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag la
272b3(mdo sde): bsnyen bkur dang rim gro bgyi bar spro'o// de dag ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis rim gro bgyi ba dang // mchod par 'os pa lags so// de nas tshangs pa mi mjed kyi bdag pos / bcom
272b4(mdo sde): ldan 'das la rigs su bcad pas 'di skad ces gsol to// dge slong dang ni dge slong ma// dge bsnyen dang ni dge bsnyen ma// gang rnams mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa// skye bo kun gyi mchod/
272b5(mdo sde): rten de// gal te mdo sde 'di la ni// sems can gcig 'ga' brtsad na yang // 'gro ba'i mgon po bdag spo ba// chos smra ba ni de dag la// khri stan gang la de mchis te//
272b6(mdo sde): mdo sde 'di ni re bston par// tshangs pa'i 'jig rten man chad du// me tog dgram par bdag sngo'o// gang gi lag nas mdo sde 'dri// phyi ma'i dus na thos 'gyur ba// de la a
272b7(mdo sde): la la zhes ni// legs spras legs zhes brjod par bgyi// gang na mdo sde 'di mchis par// ma yi phung pos gang ba yi// bye ba snyed kyi zhing brgal nas// skyo mi 'tshal bar ma chi
273a1(mdo sde): bar bgyi// rin chen phung po ri rab tsam// dga' bzhin du ni dul nus kyang // sangs rgyas kyi yang la bskyong ba// mdo sde 'di yang mnyan par bgyi/
273a2(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe rdzu baphrul mngon par 'du bya ba 'di lta bu mdzad de/ rdzubaphrul mngon par 'du bya ba ji lta bu mngon par 'du byas pas// bdud sdig can dpung gi stobs pa ni
273a3(mdo sde): dang bcom ldan 'das ga la bder dong ste lhags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag dpung
273a4(mdo sde): dang bcas// g.yog dang bcas pa 'di dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan sngar dam bcas te/ gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu spyod par 'gyur ba'i ljongs kyi phyogs der chos nyan
273a5(mdo sde): pa dang / chos smra ba dag la bdud kyi las mi bgyi ba'i steng du bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa dang / sra bar yang bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'od zer gser gyi kha dog lta bus spangs
273a6(mdo sde): rgyas kyi zhing 'di khyab par mdzad de// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste/ skyes bu dab pa dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa de dag gis
273a7(mdo sde): dam pa'i ros yongs su gzung bar bya ba'i phyir/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di de bzhin gshegs pas byin gyis bslabs so// 'jam dpa la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yun ji srid du 'dzam bu'i
273b1(mdo sde): gleng 'dir spyod par 'gyur ba yun de srid du da pa'i chos nub par mi 'gyur ro// de nas 'khor de dag thams cad dga' mgu yi rangs/ rab tu dga' rangs// yid bde bar gyur nas spos
273b2(mdo sde): thams cad dang / 'phreng ba thams cad dang gabyug pa thams cad dang / me tog thams cad dang / phye ma thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la mngon par gtor nas// tshig kyang 'di
273b3(mdo sde): skad ces e ma ho chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzar bu'i gling na yun ring du gnas pa dang / rgyas par gyur cig ces 'dzer to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo
273b4(mdo sde): la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung ngam gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag gis gzung ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// kun dag
273b5(mdo sde): be de lta bas na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung ba dang / bcang ba dang / bklag pa dang / yang dag par rab tu bstan pa'i phyir/ khyod la yongs su gtad do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang
273b6(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin tama'arang ngam/ klog gam// gzhan dag la ston tam ga yi ger bris pa la mchod pa bgyid na/ de bsod nams ji tsam zhig skyed par 'gyur/ bcom ldan
273b7(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yi ge dang nges pa'i tshig ji snyed kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa de snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa la bde ba'i yo
274a1(mdo sde): byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas pa bas/ gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang / bzung nas kyang gzhan la ston pa dang / klog pa de ni de bas
274a2(mdo sde): kyang bsod nams ches mang du skyed do// kun dga' bo gang gis dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di grags bam du bris te mchod na de'i tshe 'di
274a3(mdo sde): nyid la gter ba thob pa bcu thob bo// bcu gang zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan rab tu thob pas sangs rgyas mthong ba'i gter dang / lha'i rna bas rab tu thos pas chos nyan pa'i gter dang
274a4(mdo sde): phyir mi ldog pa'i dge 'dun rab tu thob pas/ dge 'dun mthong ba'i gter dang / rin po che'i lag pa rab tu thob pas zad mi shes pa'i longs spyod kyi gter dang / mtshan dang dpe byad
274a5(mdo sde): bzang po yongs su rdzogs pas gzugs kyi gter dang / g.yog mi phyed pas g.yog gi gter dang / gzungs rab tu thob pas thos pa'i gter dang / spobs pa rab tu thob paras dran
274a6(mdo sde): pa'i gter dang / pha rol gyi rgol ba char gcod pas mi 'jigs pa'i gter dang / sems can thams cad 'i bar 'tshe bas bsod nams kyi gter ro// yang bcom ldan 'das kyis chos
274a7(mdo sde): kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa na// byang chub sems dpa' sa ya khrag khrig phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob par gyur to// sems can dpag tu med pa
274b1(mdo sde): byang chub la rab tu zhugs so// sems can tshad med pa'ang len pa med par rnam par grol lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsor to//
274b2(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'do'i ming ci lags/ 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de'i phyir khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grang
274b3(mdo sde): 'di'i ming ros thams cad yang dag par 'du ba zhes bya bar zung zhig/ sangs rgyas kyi rgyan bkod pa zhes bya bar zung zhig/ tshangs pa khyad par sems kyis kun dris pa zhes bya bar zung
274b4(mdo sde): zhigapa 'jam dpal gyis bstan pa zhes bya bar zung zhig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' ces bka' stsal nas// bajam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / tshangs pa khyad
274b5(mdo sde): par sems dang / bram ze shing sAl chen po lta bu'i bu mnyam pa 'di la gnas pa dang / byang chub sems dang 'dra ba can gyi 'od dang / gnas brtan bod srungs chen po dang / tshe dang ldan
274b6(mdo sde): pa kun dga' bo dang / phyogs bcu nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang // nyan thos chen po de dag dang // lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang // dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten
274b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rangs te mngon par bstod do// bapags pa tshangs pa khyad par sems kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// /
275a1(mdo sde): rgya gar gyi mkhan po shAkya prang+ga dang / d+harma pA la dang / dzin mitra dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban d+he d+ha.At+ma shI la dang bar lus kyi lo ts+tsha ba ban te de ben drA shI la dang /
275a2(mdo sde): ku ma ra shI la la sogs pas zhus te gtan la phab pa// / rgya gar skad du.Ar+ya dzu ma ki na na rA dza pa zad tsha nA ma ma hA mAn tu tra
275a3(mdo sde): bod skad du 'phags pa mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas nus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag
275a4(mdo sde): gi sa thos pa'i dus gcig na bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na ga bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong drug khri nyis stong gi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' sem
275a5(mdo sde): dpa' chen po pal rer phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan nas 'dus pa bdun khri nyis stong thams cad kyang mngon par shes pa/ gzungs thob pa / spobs pa chags pa med pa
275a6(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin thob pa / dran pa dang / blo gros dang ga rtogs pa dang mos pa dang / ngo tsha shes pa dang / khrel yod pa phun sum tshogs pa / bsam pa rdo rje ltar brtan zhing mi byed pa
275a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la sbyor ba phun sum rogs pa dang / lhag pa'i bsam pa khyad par du ba pags pa la zhugs pag bdag nyid byang chub kyi sems mi 'dor ba ka sems can
275b1(mdo sde): gzhan byang chub kyi sems yang dag par badzin du 'jug pa/ sbyin pa dang / dul ba dang / yang dag par sdom pa dang / bzod pa dang / nges pa dang / baphangs pa'i dngos po thams cad yongs su
275b2(mdo sde): gtong ba yongs su bsngo ba'i chog shes pa / lus dang / ngag dang gsems tshul khrims kyi rgyan gyis legs par brgyan pa sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa dang / bzod
275b3(mdo sde): pa dang dres pa'i stobs kyis go cha shin tu bgos pa/ bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du brtson 'grus shin tu brtsams pa/ bsam gtan dang ga rnam par thar pa dang
275b4(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par rtsen pa/ tshig thams cad rab tu dbye ba la spobs pa chags pa med pa'i rishes rab dang ye shes
275b5(mdo sde): la mkhas pa / lhun po'i ri ltar sems g.yo ba med pa / sa dang kachu dang ga me dang ga rlung dang / ri ltar rjes su rags pa dang / khong khro ba dang bral ba / byams pa chen po la gnas te
275b6(mdo sde): bod zer thogs pa med pa snying rje chen po la gnas te/ rtag tu sems can la blta bar brtson pa// dga' ba chen po la gnas te/ chos kyi kun dga' la dga' ba dang ldan pa
275b7(mdo sde): btang snyoms chen po la gnas te/ gnyis su med pa shes pa thob pa// 'jig rten gyi chos brgyad po rnyed pa dang / ma rnyed pa dang / grags pa dang / ma grags pa dang bstod pa dang
276a1(mdo sde): smad pa dang / bde bdung // sdug bsngal las rab tu 'das pa// pas kyi rgol ba ngan pa'i tshogs can gyi tshogs thams cad kun tu rab tu 'joms pa/ bdud dang /
276a2(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa'i rgol ba bcom pa/ u dum la rwa'i me tog mthong ba ltar shin tu 'byung bar dka' ba// gsor bar btab par sems can thams cad la dge ba'i bshes gachen byed pa// yongs su
276a3(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'das pa'i bar du gtan du mdza' bra/ seng ge'i sgra chen po rdzogs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo dang mi 'jigs pa sgrogs pa// de bzhin ga shegs pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa/
276a4(mdo sde): 'khrugs par byin par lung bstan pa/ ji ltar smras pa de bzhin byed pa/ de kho na'i ros kyi tshul la brtson pa/ bod kyis nyi ma dang zla ba mog mog por byed pa/ phyogs bcur smra bsgrags pa/
276a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis shin du byin gyis brlabs pa// chos dkon mchog gi mdzod yang dag par 'dzin pa/ dkon mchog gsum gyi rigs mi gcod par yid
276a6(mdo sde): la byed pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas par 'gro ba la mkhas pa/ shin tu rnam par phye ba rnam par 'byed pa la gnas pa'i blo dang ldan pa/ mthong ba dang thos pa don yod pas
276a7(mdo sde): rnam par gnon pa/ rtag par rgyun du sems can yongs su smin par byed pa la brtson pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang thabs la mkhas pa'i pha rol tu son pa/ sems can
276b1(mdo sde): thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pas ci rigs par chos ston pa// sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi bya ba la mkhas pas/ sems can thams
276b2(mdo sde): cad kyi sems kyi 'jug pa dang btags pa la bde drag tu mkhas pa/ mi 'jigs pa chen pos 'jigs pa med pa dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'dri ba dang / nyon mongs pa rab tu zhi bar byed
276b3(mdo sde): pa sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dpag tu med pa la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pas// mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po yongs su rdzogs pa'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs bsag
276b4(mdo sde): pa stong pa nyid dang // mtshan ma med pa dang / ston pa med pa'i chos thams cad la mos pa/ rnam par grol ba/ smon lam shin tu btab pa// sems can dang / chos thams cad
276b5(mdo sde): sgyu ma dang / smig rgyu dang / rmi lam dang / chu zla dang / mig yor dang / zug cha dang / nam mkha' dang mtshungs par mos pa/ sgra skad thams cad nges pa'i tshig gis ston pa'i ye shes
276b6(mdo sde): la mkhas pa/ chos dang / don dang / nges pa'i tshig dang / spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa// 'jig rten las 'das nga'i shes rab kyi dbang po la rtog pa rtogs par
276b7(mdo sde): khong du rud pa/ shugs chen po 'dzin pa'i stobs bcu la nye bar gyur pa/ sha'i mig dang / lha'i mig dang / shes rab kyi mig dang // chos kyi mig dang / sangs rgyas
277a1(mdo sde): spyan gyi snang ba thob pa/ lam gyi yan lag gi tshogs kyi shin tu bsags pa'i lam thams cad la 'jug pa'i ye shes la mkhas pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i
277a2(mdo sde): rje snod snang ba la 'jug pa'i cho ga shes pa/ phyir ri ldog pa'i ros kyi 'khor lo bskor ba// mtshan nyid kyi phyag rgya'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi ting nge 'dzin la 'jug
277a3(mdo sde): nga'i shes pa la mkhas pa// chos thams cad la dbang byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin mngon sum du gyur pa// ros dkon mchog gi smon ma 'dzin pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud
277a4(mdo sde): la rnam par blta ba sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa la rnam par lta ba shes pa la mkhas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la nye bar gyur pa// sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi
277a5(mdo sde): ye shes kyi bya ba so sor nye bar gnas pa/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i yon tan rin po re thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ bskal pa thams cad du bsngags pa yongs su rjod kyang
277a6(mdo sde): mthar mi byin pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' byed dang / dga' 'byung dang // lag na rin po che dang / rin po re me tog dang / rin po che'i trog dang
277a7(mdo sde): mthong dga' dang / dga' ba'i blo gros dang / mig gis mthong dga' dang / sa 'dzin dang / dga' zhing mchog tu dga' byed dang / spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / mthu chen
277b1(mdo sde): thob dang ga dpal chen dang / bdud thul dang / me tog pan+da ra ba'i dri dang / rlung lnga dang / bden dgrab dang / maHma lta dang / ma'am mi mnyam lha dang / kha lo sgyur dang / gsol/
277b2(mdo sde): ba ma btab par sems can kun gyi bshes gnyen dang / byams pa dang // 'jug sgra dang / lhun po'i rtse ro 'dzin dang / lhun po brtsegs pa dang / lhun po'i mchog dang / bod kyi tog dang
277b3(mdo sde): 'od dang la dang / sgron ma'i rgyal po dang / mngon sum blo gros dang / 'od kyis yang dag brgyan dang / sna tshogs cod pan dang / lha'i cod pan dang / lha yul ba'i con pan dang / mdzes
277b4(mdo sde): nga'i mig gis lta ba dang / lag bzangs dang // legs par bsams pa sems pa dang // 'khor lo gnas pa dang / mi g.yo rkang pas rnam par gnon dang / rdo rje rkang pas rnam pas
277b5(mdo sde): gnon dang / rkang pas 'jig rjen gsum rnam par gnon dang / dga' spobs dang / spobs myur dang / spobs pa mi rad pa dang // spobs pa byin gyi rlabs dang / 'jam spang
277b6(mdo sde): sems can thams cad tshims byed dang / dra ba can gyi 'od dang / rgyal ba'i blo gros dang / skye bar tshims byed dang // 'gro 'dzin dang / lha'i rgyal pos mnod dang / mchog gi zla
277b7(mdo sde): gros dang / thogs med sems dang / skya reng blo gros dang / mi bskyod pa dang / dpag med rin chen mdzod dang / byang chub blo gros dang // sna tshogs me tog dang / lba'i me tog
278a1(mdo sde): rgyal po dang / tshangs dbyangs dang / bzang skyong dang / dkon mchog 'byung gnas dang / ded dpon bzang po dang / mis byin dang / chu la dang
278a2(mdo sde): bajam dbyangs dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ajam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bdun khri nyis stong dang thabs cig tu bzhugs
278a3(mdo sde): so/ gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i brgya byin dang // tshangs pa dang // 'jig rten skyo pa dang // de las gzhan pa lha dang / klu dang // gnod sbyin dang /
278a4(mdo sde): dri za dang / lha ba yin dang nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang // lto 'phye chen po dang / mi ma mi ma yin pa rnams bcom ldan 'das lang lnga pa dang / phyag bya ba dang // bsnyen dkur/
278a5(mdo sde): bya ba dang // chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i cod pan zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid
278a6(mdo sde): du 'dus pa des/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor chen po de 'dus par rig nas/ stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la
278a7(mdo sde): mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas nas// pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bde logs su thal
278b1(mdo sde): mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'dasngal rigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// 'jig rten 'das pa 'jig rten sgron ma mdzad// khyod ni 'jig rten don
278b2(mdo sde): mdzad blo gros ldan// snang ba brnyes shing nyon mongs dri bsal ba// 'jig rten snang mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sbyin la dgyes shing stobs bcu'i mchog mnga' ba/
278b3(mdo sde): dul ba bdul ba gdul bya'i pha rol phyin// bcom ldan lha dang mi dang klus mchod pa// gdul ba mthar phyin khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// mtshan mchog 'gro ba mang po'i don mdzad
278b4(mdo sde): pa 'dom gang 'od ni gser gyi kha dog 'dra// dge ba'i mtshan gyis dam pa'i gzugs mnga' ba// srid gsum mtshungs med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// pha rol gshegs pa
278b5(mdo sde): gzhan gyi rogs 'joms shing // phas kyi rgol ba'i rgol 'joms mi g.yo ba// sems can gzhan gyi sems kyi spyod la mkhas// thugs rje marog ldan khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//
278b6(mdo sde): dgra bcom rgyal po nyon mongs rdul bsal ba// 'tshe ba dag cing brtul zhugs tshul khrims gnas// lha yi lha mo rog dri med dri ma bral// pha rol tshogs 'joms khyod la phyag 'tshal
278b7(mdo sde): lo// bde gshegs rin ren mchog tu dga' mdzad pa// dgon par rtag gnas rtag tu dgon par dges// rdul skyon gti mug rnyog pa mi mnga' ba// nam mkha' mnyam thugs
279a1(mdo sde): khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// chu bo bzhi rgal bden bzhi bka' mchid gsung // mig sbyin bdud rtsi chos kyi dka' mchid can// 'gro ba'i don mdzad 'jig rten
279a2(mdo sde): gsung rgyu ba// 'khor lo zhabs mnga' khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// lha dang mi yis mchod pa'i mthu bo che// mgon po lha yi dbang po bdud 'joms pa// mi dang lha klu rogs kyis
279a3(mdo sde): mchod pa yi// mi ma rod dam pa khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rtag tu bden sdud dam pa'i ros la dgyes// mnyam thugs 'gro ba kun la byams pa'i thugs// chos la mnyam gnas mi
279a4(mdo sde): rnams kha lo sgyur// yon tan mthar phyin khyod la phyag 'arol lo// snyan pa'i sgra dbyangs rnam par dag dang ldan// tshangs pa'i sgra dbyangs lta bur 'jam pa'i gsung // dbyangs kyi
279a5(mdo sde): yan lag rab tshul kun rdzogs pa// bden pa snyun gsung khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// stong pa mtshan ma med cing sngon dang bral// zab mo lta dka' shin tu rtogs par dka'// zar
279a6(mdo sde): la'ajug par mkhas pa blo gros ldan// zar po'i lamadzes khyod la phyag 'arol lo// rgyu la rten pa mkhas pa'i bcom ldan 'das// mtha' gnyis lnga bajug tu mi mngab pa// las rnam
279a7(mdo sde): rnam ldan kho na'i 'bras bu gsung // lta ba'i mun bral khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// gang nas mabyon gang dubang gshegs ma lags// rtag tu bden pa'i ros rnams rab gsung ba/
279b1(mdo sde): smig rgyu sna bzhin nga yir mi mngab pa// dge ba'i chos tshul khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// sde ba ni skye gang du'ang skye ma lags// skye dang 'jig dang gang du'ang mi bas pa// chos kyi gnas nyid /
279b2(mdo sde): ji lta'i gnas la gnas// gnas la mi gnas rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin kho na de bzhin yang dag gsung // rtag tu mi g.yo de bzhin nyid la zhugs// lhun po'i rgyal mtshan
279b3(mdo sde): rdo rje 'dra ba'i sku// mi g.yo ri rab mtshungs la phyag 'tshal lo// sU ni dben zhing mnyam thugs blo ldan pa// grags pa mtha' yas 'jig rten gsum du grags// skyes bu ma chog la
279b4(mdo sde): zhu ba zhus pa rnams// 'jig rten zla bas myur du skabs dbyer gsol// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rin po lha'i cod pan gyis tshul dang 'dra 'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis
279b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas// 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i rmad du/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la sapas phye na// de bzhin gsheg
279b6(mdo sde): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
279b7(mdo sde): chen po lha'i cod pan la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dang
280a1(mdo sde): byAbya/ ngas dri ba dris pa de dang do lung bstan pas/ khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// de sad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa ba sems dpa' chen po
280a2(mdo sde): lha'i cod pan gyis// bcom ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol te// bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar can cing / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub
280a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' spobs pa sna tshogs kyi rgyan dang ldan pa rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos zab mo rnam par nges pa la 'jug pang shes pa la mkhas pa rnams lags / ji ltar na byang
280a4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang / mchog ma lags pa shes pa la mkhas pa rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' so so ci rigs par ros ston pa la mkhas
280a5(mdo sde): pa rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa shes pa la 'jug pa la mkhas pa rnams legs// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rgyu dang bya ba dang /
280a6(mdo sde): las kyi rnam par smin pa la 'jug pa shes pa la brjed pa ma mchis par spyod pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sbyin pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams lags// ji ltar na byang
280a7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' tshul khrims kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bzod pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
280b1(mdo sde): brtson 'grus kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsam gtan gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi rgyan gyis
280b2(mdo sde): brgyan pa rnams lags / ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshangs pa'i lam la mkhas pa rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pa la mi nyams pa rnams lags// ji ltar
280b3(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dpa' g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' brgal nas pha rol thang la gnas pa rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
280b4(mdo sde): nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang // sems can thams cad kyi spyod lam yang ston la// ma brtags pa'i kun tu spyod pa dang yang ldan pa rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub
280b5(mdo sde): sems dpa' 'khor ba la'ang bltal ka mya ngan las 'das pa la bang mi gnas pa rnams lags ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' khams sna tshogs la'ang rnam par ngalta laka chos kyi dbyings
280b6(mdo sde): las kyang mi g.yo ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' don yang mi 'dor la gnod par yang kun tu dga' ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams
280b7(mdo sde): kyi nor dang ldan la thabs kyi nor med pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' a zhes bgyi ba'i sgos rnam par ma mchis pa'i sgor 'jug pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang
281a1(mdo sde): chung sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon sum du gyur pa rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos gtan la dbab pa rnams pa
281a2(mdo sde): rnam par bye ba shin tu rnam par 'byed pa rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi bya ba dang 'thun par zhugs kyang nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi gos pa rnams
281a3(mdo sde): ljags 'ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dag gis bltar mi mthong ba'i ros kyi dbang phyug rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpab de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mthong ba dang /
281a4(mdo sde): mi 'bral ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' shin tu dul zhing mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ros rnams blangs pa ma mchis pa'i/
281a5(mdo sde): slob dpon rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi ston par gyur pa rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor
281a6(mdo sde): mo rjes su bskor ba rnams lags// ji wAran byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi ros thams cad la dbang bskur bathob pa rnams lags// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis
281a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rma'i cod pan la legs so zhes bya ba byin te// rigs kyi bu legs so lags so// rigs kyi bu khyod skye mang po la phan pa dang / skye bo mang po la bde
281b1(mdo sde): ba dang / 'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang / skye bo bal po che'i don dang / lha dang mi rnams la phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir zhugs pa dang / rigs kyi bu khyod nga ltar gyi dang / ma'ongs pa'i byang chub sem/
281b2(mdo sde): dpa' rnams rjes su gzung ba dang / theg pa chen po 'di yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir// rigs kyi bu khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la gang don 'di 'dri bar yongs su sems pa ni legs so//
281b3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu de'i phyir rab tu legs par nyon la yid la zung zhig dang / ngas khyod la bshad do// bcom ldan 'das legs so zhes gsor nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rin po lnga'i
281b4(mdo sde): cod par bcom ldan 'das kyi lngar can pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na// spobs pa sna tshogs kyi rgyan
281b5(mdo sde): dang ldan pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la 'od zer thogs pa med pa rnams yin// rin po che dang 'phags pa'i dngos po thams cad yongs su gtong zhing yid
281b6(mdo sde): 'gyod pa med pa rnams yin// chos smra ba la gzhan dag gis bshad pa mi zlog cing rjes su yi rang ste dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / dang ba dang // mchog tu dga' bathob nas legs so zhes bya ba byin pa dang /
281b7(mdo sde): chos mtshan pa dang / chos bgro ba'am// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten gyi phyir ram/ mtshan mo 'dug par skul na mchog tu dga' ba dang ldan pa dang / byang chub kyi sems kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa dang
282a1(mdo sde): zang zing med pa'i sems kyis chos kyi sbyin pa sbyin pa ste / rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ros bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ spobs pa sna tshogs kyi rgyan dang ldan pa
282a2(mdo sde): rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan nag chos zab mo rnam par nges pa la 'jug pa shes pa la mkhas pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na gi rten cing 'brel par 'byung
282a3(mdo sde): ba dang rjes su 'thun pa dang / bdag gi rang bzhin ltar sems can thams cad kyi rang bzhin rtogs pa dang 'du byed thams cad gang yang mi 'gro/ gang nas kyang ma 'ongs par rab tu dashes pa dang
282a4(mdo sde): chos thams cad nam mkha'i phyag rgyas btab par mos pa ste rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ chos zab mo rnam par nges pa la 'jug pa shes pa la mkhas pa
282a5(mdo sde): rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na// sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa la mkhas pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe
282a6(mdo sde): na chos kyi dbyings kyi sgo shin tu blangs pa dang / sleb pa med pa'i sgo mngon sum du gyur pa dang mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse ba shes pa dang / sems las su rung zhing ting nge 'dzin
282a7(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs pa ste ka rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na// sems can thams cad kyi dbang po'i mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa la mkhas pa rnams
282b1(mdo sde): yin no// rigs kyis byang chub sems dpa' chos pazhi dang ldan na/ so so tsa rigs par chos ston pa la mkhas pa rnams yin te bzhi gang zhe na/ so so yang dag par rig pa shes pa dang / sems
282b2(mdo sde): can gzud par shes pa dang / chos rab tu rnam par 'byed pa shes pa dang / bdag gi sems sbyangs pas sems can thams cad kyi sems sbyangs par rab tu shes pa ste// rigs kyi bu byang chub
282b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na// so so co rigs par chos sdor ba la mkhas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na// sems can thams
282b4(mdo sde): cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa shes pa la 'jug pa la mkhas pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ shes rab kyi 'dzud pa dang // ye shes chags pa med pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa la zhug
282b5(mdo sde): pas sgrib pa thams cad rgyun chad pa dang / blo shin tu sbyangs pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa shes
282b6(mdo sde): pa la 'jug par mkhas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ros bzhi dang ldan na/ rgyu dang / bya ba dang / galas kyi rnam par smin pa la 'jug pa shes pa la brjed
282b7(mdo sde): pa med par spyod pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ chad par smra ba ma yin pa dang / rtag par smrab ma yin pa dang / rgyu dang bya ba dang las kyi 'bras bu la yang dag pa ji lta
283a1(mdo sde): ba bzhin du 'jug pa dang / chos la chos nyid du byed cing chos la chos su spa'i 'di bdag dang bdag gis mi smra ba ste/ de ltar bya bar 'jug pas chu dang / bya ba dang
283a2(mdo sde): las kyi 'bras bu chud mi gzon pa ste rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na// rgyu dang bya ba dang ga las kyi rnam par smin pa la 'jug pa shes pa la brjed pa med
283a3(mdo sde): par spyod pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na// sbyin pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams yin te ga ba ni gang zhe na ka mtshan gyis legs par ngargyan pa rnams
283a4(mdo sde): yin pa dpe byad bzang pos rnam par sbas pa rnams yin// gzugs blta bas mngoms pa rnams yin ga lag na rin po che thob pas longs spyod mi zad pa yin te// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'
283a5(mdo sde): chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na// sbyin pa'i rgyan gyi sa brgyan pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ros bzhi dang ldan na// tshul khrims kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams yin te
283a6(mdo sde): bzhi gang zhe na/ 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal por 'gyur zhing // byang chub kyi sems kyis brgyan pa dang / lha'i dbang po brgya byin du 'gyur zhing / byang chub kyi sems kyis brgyan pa dang / mi mjed kyi
283a7(mdo sde): bdag po tshangs par 'gyur zhing // byang chub kyi sems kyis brgyan pa dang // ngan 'gro thams cad yang dag par bcad na lnga dang mir skye ba yongs su 'azung bar gyur cing // byang chub kyi sems kyis
283b1(mdo sde): brgyan pa yin te// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'achos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na// tshul khrims kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams su rig par bya'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos
283b2(mdo sde): bani dang ldan na/ bzod pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams yin te ga bzhi gang zhe na/ tshangs pa'i skad dang sgra dbyangs lta bu dang ldan pa rnams yin ka ka la bing+ka'i sgra dang rnga sma lta bu dang ldan pa rnams yin/
283b3(mdo sde): skye bo mang pos mthong na dga' ba dang sdug cing yid du 'ong ba rnams yin/ dge ba'i chos rnams la yi dmal brtan pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang
283b4(mdo sde): ldan na// bzod pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams su rig par bya'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ brtson 'grus kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang
283b5(mdo sde): zhe nag dam bcas pa rnams 'og tu chud par bya ba'i cho ga shes pas dge ba'i chos rnams la yi dam brtan pa rnams yin/ pha rol gyis mnan pa med pas rdo rje'i lu sa rab tu thob pa rnams yin
283b6(mdo sde): bya ba ci yod ces bya ba la mos pas gsol ba ma btab par sems can tha ma sa la dge ba'i ba shes gnyen byed pa rnams yin// thos pa'i tshogs bsags pas mi ngoms pa'i phyir// yid yongs su
283b7(mdo sde): ri skyo ba rnams yin te// rigs kyi du byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ brtson 'grus kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams su rig par bya'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'
284a1(mdo sde): chos pazhi dang ldan na// bsam gtan gyi rgyan gyis btsun pa rnams yin te/ ga bzhi gang zhen pa mi god pa rnams min / ma khengs pa rnams yin// mu cor sru med pa
284a2(mdo sde): rnams yin gcang shes kyi sems mi 'dor ba rnams yin te// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag ldan na bsam gtan gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams su rig par bya'o//
284a3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan nag shes rab kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na ga 'di lta ste/ bdag dang sems can dang / srog dang / gso
284a4(mdo sde): ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag tu smra ba med pa rnams yin/ spobs pa rags pa med pa rnams yin/ tshig thams cad rab tu dbye ba bstan pa shes pa la mkhas pa rnams yin/
284a5(mdo sde): chos thams cad la som nyi med cing the tsom dang bral ba rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpab chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na// shes rab kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa rnams yin no//
284a6(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ros bzhi dang ldan na// tshangs pa'i lam la mkhas pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad kyi dpung gnyen bya ba'i
284a7(mdo sde): phyir mngon par bsgrubs pa'i byams pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ mngon par bsgrubs pa'i snying rje chen po dang / chos thams cad la dga'
284b1(mdo sde): bas mngon par bsrubs pa'i dga' ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi phyir mngon par bsgrubs pa'i btang snyoms te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'de dag
284b2(mdo sde): dang ldan na/ tshangs pa'i lam la mkhas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dang 'a chos bzhi dang ldan na// mngon par shes pa las mi rnams pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/
284b3(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ bsam gtan bzhi sdud pa'i shes pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi bsgrub pa'i thabs shes pa dang / rang gi sems la dbang sgyur ba'i chos shes
284b4(mdo sde): pa dang / sangs rgyas la blta ba'i phyir sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas par 'gro ba ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na// mngon par shes pa las
284b5(mdo sde): mi rnams pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nang nye bar
284b6(mdo sde): zhi ba dang pha rol tu mi rgyu ba dang / chos thams cad la sgyu ma lta bur rab tu rtog pa'i shes pa dang / ye shes kyi stobs can yin gyi nyon mongs pa'i stobs can ma yin pa
284b7(mdo sde): ste rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na// g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na
285a1(mdo sde): brgal nas pha rol thang la gnas pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod pa'i chu bo'ang rab tu shes la / 'dod chags dang bral ba'ang mngon sum du
285a2(mdo sde): mi byed pa dang / srid pa'i chu bo'ang rab tu shes la/ bsums bzhin du'ang skye ba dang / lba ba'i chu bo'ang rab tu shes la// lnga pa'i bcing bas bcings dbang mi 'dor ba dang / ma rig pa'i
285a3(mdo sde): chu bo'ang rab tu shes la/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i rjes su 'thun par yang byed pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na// brgal nas pha rol thang la
285a4(mdo sde): gnas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / sems can thams cad kyi spyod lam yang ston la/
285a5(mdo sde): ma brtags pa'i kun tu spyod pa dang yang ldan pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sgyu ma lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu yongs su bsgrubs pa dang / chos thams cad rnam par bsgrubs
285a6(mdo sde): pas so sor nye bar gnas pa'i mtshan nyid du shin tu brtags pa dang / mngon par shes pa lngas rnam par rtse ba shes pa dang ldan pa dang // yid kyi lus mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa ste/ rigs
285a7(mdo sde): kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / sems can thams cad kyi spyod lam yang ston la/ ma brtags pa'i kun
285b1(mdo sde): tu spyod pa dang yang ldan pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems chos bzhi dang ldan na/ 'khor ba labang skal/ mya ngan las 'das pa la'ang mi gnas pa rnams yin te
285b2(mdo sde): bzhig zhen/ 'di rje ste/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang / snying rje chen po'i sems dang / thabs la ma khas pa dang / sngon gyi yi dmani 'dor bste// rigs kyi bu byang chub
285b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na// 'khor ba 'bang sbrul/ mya ngan las 'das pa la'ang mi gnas pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos ba'i
285b4(mdo sde): dang ldan nu/ khams sna tshogs la'ang rnam par lngal// chos kyi dbyings las kyang mi g.yo ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can rang bzhin med pas ros rang ba zhin//
285b5(mdo sde): med par rdzogs pa dang // chos rang bzhin med pas sems can rang bzhin med par rtogs pa dang / sems can rang bzhin med pas sangs rgyas kyi chos rang bdun med par mom dang
285b6(mdo sde): mas can dang ba zhin med pa la maman med cing bco dang thal payin/ rigs kyi byang chub sems dang mtshan pa du dag dang ldan/ mas na tshogs pa
285b7(mdo sde): ched kya kyim pa kya mig 'o// rigs kyi byang chub sem dang chim pazhi dang na/ don gad padas mtha
286a1(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ bsam pa mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas pa rnams yin// sbyor ba 'khor ba la gnas pa rnams yin sangs rgyas kyi ros thams cad
286a2(mdo sde): yongs su bkang bar bsam pa gnas pa rnams yin/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi yul la'ang kun tu snang ba rnams yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ros bzhi po 'di
286a3(mdo sde): dang ldan na/ don yang mi 'dor la gnod par yang kun tu snang ngo // rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dang 'chos bzhi dang ldan na/ bsod nams kyis nor dang ldan la/ thabs kyi
286a4(mdo sde): nor med pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bde lta ste/ rgya chen po la mos pa'i sems can gdul ba'i phyir/ bsod nams kyis 'khor lo sgyur ba dang / brgya byin dang tshangs
286a5(mdo sde): pa'i bsod nams kyang nye bar ston pa dang / 'gro ba phal pa 'dul ba'i phyir/ dbul zhing dman par yang nye bar ston pa dang // slong ba mthong na bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong zhing
286a6(mdo sde): nor med par yang 'gyur ba dang / nor chen po dang ldan pa mthong na bsod nams kyis longs spyod zad mi shes par yang nye bar ston pa sde/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po
286a7(mdo sde): 'di dag dang ldan na// bsod nams kyis nor dang ldan pa yin lagathabs kyis nor med pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ a zhes bya ba'i
286b1(mdo sde): sgos rnam pa med pa'i sgol 'jug pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe nag 'di lta ste ga 'du byed thams cad mi rtag par shes pa sbyong ba dang / 'du byed thams cad gzod ma nas sdug bsngal lo//
286b2(mdo sde): zhes byang chub rab tu rnyed pa dang chos thams cad bdag med do zhes lta bar gyur pa yongs su sbyong ba dang // mya ngan las 'das pa ni gzod ma nas zhi ba zhes ye shes la 'jug pa sde
286b3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ a zhes bya ba'i sgos rnam pa med pa'i sgo la 'jug pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ros
286b4(mdo sde): bzhi dang ldan na sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon sum du 'gyur ba rnams yin no// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi mig shin tu rnam par dag pa rnams yin
286b5(mdo sde): chos kyi mig gis snang ba thob pa rnams yin/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan mngon sum du gyur pa rnams yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams yin te/ rigs kyi
286b6(mdo sde): bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon sum du gyur pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang
286b7(mdo sde): ldan na/ chos gtan la dbab pa rnams la rnam par phye ba shin tu rnam par 'byed pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ so so yang dag par rig pa shes pa sgrib pa med pa dang
287a1(mdo sde): bya/ bden pa bani rnam par dgod pa shes pa dang / rton pa la gnas su shes pa dang / gzungs la g.yeng ba med par shes pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems/
287a2(mdo sde): dpa' ros bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na// chos gtan la dbab pa rnams la rnam par phye ba shin tu rnam par 'byed pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan
287a3(mdo sde): nus 'jig rten gyi bya ba dang 'thun par zhugs kyang nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi gos pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'jig rten gyi chos mngon sum du gyur pa dang / 'jig
287a4(mdo sde): rten las sems can yang dag par sgrol ba dang / rjes su chags pa dang / khong khro ba spong ba dang // gzod ma nas rnam par dag cing 'od gsal bas rang bzhin gyis kun nas nyon mongs pa
287a5(mdo sde): can ma yin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chuchub sems sa chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na// 'jig rten gyi bya ba dang 'thun par zhugs kyang nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi gos pa rnams yin no/
287a6(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na// gzhan dag gis bltar mi mthong ba'i chos kyi dbang phyug rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems kyi dbang phyug dang
287a7(mdo sde): shes rab kyi dbang phyug dang // ye shes kyi dbang phyug dang / thabs kyi dbang phyug ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na// gzhan dag gis bltar mi mthong
287b1(mdo sde): ngo'i chos kyi dbang phyug rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ros bzhi dang ldan na// de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na 'di lta ste
287b2(mdo sde): sems can rnams sangs rgyas la lta ba yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / sems can rnams chos nyan pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang / sems can rnams byang chub kyi sems yang dag
287b3(mdo sde): par 'dzin du 'jug pa dang sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang mi 'bral ba yin te/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'dri dag dang ldan na// de bzhin gshegs pa mthong
287b4(mdo sde): pa dang mi 'bral ba rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na// shin tu dul zhing mi bzugs pa'i chos can rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'phags
287b5(mdo sde): pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab kyis rnam par grol ba ye shes mthong ba mngon sum du gyur pa dang // bden pa la nye bar brtags pas ros thams cad ji lta ba bzhin dang bag chags kyis
287b6(mdo sde): mtshams sgor ba thams cad yang dag par bajoms pa la srabs par gyur pa dang gnon mongs pas mi 'khrugs pa'i chos can yin te/ rigs kyi sa byang chub sems dpa' chos pa'i dro 'di dag dang rngan
287b7(mdo sde): na/ shin tu dul zhing mi bzugs pa'i chos can rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na// chos rnams grangs pa med par slob dpon rnams yin te// pani ga
288a1(mdo sde): zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i dngos po phun sum tshogs pa rnams yin// sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la brtan zhing bsam pa rgya che ba
288a2(mdo sde): rnams yin/ bdag gi bde ba la mi rags pa rnams yin// gang ye shes yongs su tshol ba de sems can thams cad kyi ched du yin gyi/ bdag 'bapa zhig gi phyir ma yin pa ste ka rigs kyi bu byang chub
288a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na// chos rnams blangs pa med par slob dpon rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sems can thams cad kyi
288a4(mdo sde): ston par gyur pa rnams yin te bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bdag gi don gtang zhing gzhan gyi don byed pa rnams yin/ bdag gi bde ba thams cad gtong zhing sems can rnams la chos kyi
288a5(mdo sde): bde ba sbyin pa rnams yin/ ji ltar thos pa'i chos ston pa la ngal ba med pa rnams yin// chos kyi 'tsho bas ba tsho'i gzang zing gi 'tshe ba ma yin pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' mos bzhi
288a6(mdo sde): po 'di dag dang ldan na/ sems can thams cad kyi ston par gyur pa rnams yin no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo rjes
288a7(mdo sde): su bskor ba rnams yin te ga bzhi gang zhe na ga 'di lta ste/ gzungs rab tu 'thob pa dang / spobs pa rgyun mi 'ard pa dang / sems can gyi bsam pa la shes pa 'jug pa dang // mya ngan las
288b1(mdo sde): 'das pa'i lam du khrid cing mi byed pa'i chos ston pa yin te ka rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba rnams yin/
288b2(mdo sde): no// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpab chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na pa 'di lta ste/ spyod pa thams cad las
288b3(mdo sde): rab tu 'das pa rnams yin// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa las phyir mi ldog cing mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa rnams yin te/ bsams bzhin du tshe dang / 'chib po dang / skye ba'ang sngon
288b4(mdo sde): la khyer mi ldog pa'i phyag rgyas kyang btab pa rnams yin// de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya la yang dag par gzhol zhing sa bcus nges par byung nas/ sa nas sa rab par ba la mkhas pa rnams yin te/
288b5(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' ros bzhi po 'a de dag dang ldan na// sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams yin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhi pa sgrub pa'i chos kyi
288b6(mdo sde): rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos nas/ snang ba chen pos kyang 'jig rten gyi khams khyab par gyur to// steng gi
288b7(mdo sde): bar snang las lnga bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis lha'i glu dbyangs blangs te/ lha'i me tog man+da ra ba'i char rab tu banas/ 'di skad ces kye ma bcom ldan 'das kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
289a1(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med par bsgrubs pa gang lags pa de bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhi pa sgrub pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di snyed
289a2(mdo sde): cing bshad de rab tu bstan to// bcom ldan 'das gang bzhi pa sgrub pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa dang / thos nas kyang mos pa dang / mos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang / 'arang ba dang / klog pa
289a3(mdo sde): dang kun chub par bgyid pa dang // gzhan dag la'ang ston pa dang / byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral ba'i sems can de dag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan pa ma lags te/ de dag ni ji ltar de
289a4(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas da ltar seng ge'i sgra sgrog pa bzhin du lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mdun du seng ge'i sgra spogs
289a5(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang bzhi bsgrub pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pas rnyed pa legs par rnyed do zhes ched du rjod pa ched du brjod do// bcom ldan 'das kyis bzhi
289a6(mdo sde): bsgrub pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'de bshad pa na// lha dang mi'i srog rags brgyad khri bzhi stong ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so// byang chub sems dpa' khri
289a7(mdo sde): nyis stong ni mi skye ba'i ros la bzod pa thob par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i cod pan gyi 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'dra/
289b1(mdo sde): gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di 'dzin pa dang / gaman dag la'ang rgya cher rab tu ston pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag ros du dang ldan par
289b2(mdo sde): 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mdo sde 'di lta bu 'dzin pa dang / gzhan dag la bang rgya cher yang
289b3(mdo sde): dag par ston pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni chos brgyad dang ldan par 'gyur ro// brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste ga de dag yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bsam pa nges te// bsam pa phun
289b4(mdo sde): sum tshogs par 'gyur ba dang / sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras pa'i sems med de/ shin tu byams pa sgom pa'i snyoms par 'gyur ba dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya/
289b5(mdo sde): ba la gnas te/ snying rje chen po la gnas par 'gyur ba dang // chos 'dod de/ chos don du gnyer bar 'gyur ba dang // thos pa tshol bas mi ngoms te/ mtsho chen rgya mtsho lta bur 'gyur ba dang
289b6(mdo sde): lus dang srog 'dor zhing / dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / bsod nams kyi tshogs bsags te/ dge ba'i rtsa bas bstan par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlab
289b7(mdo sde): kyis brlabs te/ sngon lam gyis yang dag par byung bar 'gyur ba dang / 'khor gyi nang du 'jigs pa med pas bdud dang phyir rgol ba bcom par 'gyur ba ste/ rigs kyi bu gang de bzhin ga
290a1(mdo sde): pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di 'dzin pa dang / gzhan dga'a'ang rgya cher ston pa'i byang chub sems dang 'di dag ni chos brgyad po 'di dag dang
290a2(mdo sde): ldan par 'gyur ro// de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos par gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
290a3(mdo sde): 'di na gang dag sa phyogs mtho dman can dang / ri nag po dang / chu mig dang / mtshe dang / mtshe'u dang // lteng ka dang / rgya mtsho chen po de dag thams cad mi snang bar gyur to// sa chen po 'di dag thar
290a4(mdo sde): cad kyang lag mthil ltar mnyam par gnas par gyur to// chu na gnas pa'i sems can rnams la gnod pa med par gyur to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na shing
290a5(mdo sde): skam gang dag lo brgya lon pade dag thams cad las kyang me tog dang / 'bras bu sna tshogs skyes par gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su btud / mngon par btud nas phyag 'tshal bar
290a6(mdo sde): gyur to// de ma yin pa shing gzhan thams cad las kyang me tog dang / 'bras bu sna rogs skyes nas bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su btud/ mngon par btud nas phyag 'tshal bar gyur
290a7(mdo sde): to// sa chen po las kyang brda tshad shing ta'i 'bang lo tsam sna tshogs bstan sdug pa kha dog dang ldan pa// dri dang ldan pa yid du 'ong ba dag mngon par 'thon to// snang ba chen pos kyang stong gsum gyi/
290b1(mdo sde): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di khyab par gyur to// mi snang zhing ma dkrol bar yang steng gi bar snang las lha'i sil snyan dang gru dbyangs kyi sgra byung ste grag par gyur to// ri'i rgyal po gangs
290b2(mdo sde): dang ri'i rgyal po spos kyi ngang ldang las kyang lha'i me tog sna tshogs sngon dri mi mnam pa rnams kyang mchog gi dring dbyung ste/ dri des stong gsum gyi stong chen po za 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir dri zhem
290b3(mdo sde): po mnam par gyur to// ri'i rgyal po gangs dang // ri'i rgyal po spos kyi ngad ldang de las me tog char chen po bab ste/ de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gang na ba der mngon par bab
290b4(mdo sde): nas sa chen po 'dir me tog gi char de dag gis pus nub tsam du gyur to// me tog gi shing de dag las lha'i me tog sna tshogs kyi char rab tu 'bab cing sil snyan dang glu dbyangs sna tshogs kyi
290b5(mdo sde): spa dag kyang byung ngo // steng ge bar snang la rin po che sna rnyogs kyi gdugs dpag tshad brgya stong phrag drug cu'i tshad tsam kun du gnas par gyur to// rin po ro'i gdugs de las mu tig gi rgyan 'phreng
290b6(mdo sde): dang rob po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dril bu sna tshogs kyi dra ba 'phyang bar gyur to// dril bu g.yer ka'i sgra yid du bong ba/ yid dga' bar byed pa/ chags par byed pa des stong gsum gyi stong
290b7(mdo sde): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di go bar byas par gyur to// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dga' bar bgyid pa
291a1(mdo sde): mgu bar bgyid pa'i mtshan ma rgya chen po 'di lta bu 'di dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams pade rkyen thams cad kyis brgyan par gyur pa gdab pa 'di su lnga
291a2(mdo sde): ltas lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa ka shA ri'i bu 'di na mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa ri'i rgyal po spos ngad ldang nas 'khor mi'am ci stong phrag du ma dang / 'khor stong phrag du ma dang ka'akhor lha
291a3(mdo sde): stong phrag du ma dang bcas 'ong ba de'i snga ltas so// de skad gsungs ma thag tu de nas skad cig de la mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa sil snyan dang / glu dbyangs len pa brgyad khri ba ni stong dang / 'khor brgya stong
291a4(mdo sde): du mas bskor nas/ steng gi bar snang la me tog gi chun po'i cher 'bebs shing / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der 'ongs te byin nas 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag
291a5(mdo sde): 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lar gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mi'am ci'i rgyal po sdong po bdag nyid kyis pi wang
291a6(mdo sde): gi khog pa'i DUR+Ya las byas pa/ 'dzam bu ru bo'i gser gyi bsam le'u can// sa le sbram dang / nor bu dang / rin po re duHsa sbas pa/ sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pas yongs su sbyangs pa blangs te/ sil
291a7(mdo sde): snyan brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag dang lhan cig tu grags par byed do// mi'am tso'i rgyal po sdong pos pi wang de blangs ma thag tu de nas pi wang gi sgra des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
291b1(mdo sde): khams dbyangs kyis go bar gyur to// pi wang gi sku des 'dod pa na spyod pa'i rgyud kyi sgra dang / gru'i skra dang / lba'i glu dbyangs kyi sgra rnams zil gyis gnan te migasal bar gyur to// de nas pi wang gi rma/
291b2(mdo sde): des bskul bas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag gis lha'i rol mo bor te/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba der lpags so// mi'amaci'i rgyal po sdong pos pi wang gang de blangs ma thag tu / de nas stong gsu
291b3(mdo sde): gyi stong chen po'i po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di shing dang / ri'i rgyal po ri re ba dang / gangs can dang / spos kyi ngad ldang dang / btang bzung dang / btang bzung chen po dang / de ma yin pa gzhan ri nag
291b4(mdo sde): po rnams dang / rtswa dang kashing grel badrang / sman dang / nags tshal ji snyed pa de dag thams cad ldeg rab tu ldeg/ kun tu rab tu ldeg go// g.yo rab tu g.yo ga kun tu rab tu g.yo/ 'gul rab tu 'gul
291b5(mdo sde): kun tu rab tu 'gul to// 'di lta ste/ dper na rang gisar ro ba'i ming khyor/ rab tu 'khyor/ kun tu rab tu 'khyor pa de bzhin du/ shing de dag thams cad dang / ri thams cad kyang 'dud ka rab tu
291b6(mdo sde): 'dud/ kun tu rab tu 'dud do// mibam ci'i rgyal po sdong pos pil ba khog pa bai DUR+Ya las byas pa blangs ma thag tu/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor der 'dus pa'i nang nas
291b7(mdo sde): phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ma gtogs par 'dod chags dang bral ba'i dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge snyen ma dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang
292a1(mdo sde): lha ma yin dang nam mkha' lding dang / mibam ci dang / lto phye chen po dang ka brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang // 'jig rten skyong ba dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa dang / rnam par
292a2(mdo sde): thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa'i dgra bcom pa dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis pi wang gi sgra de zos pa dang / pi wang gi sgra de ma bzod nas rang rang gi stan las langs te/ bdar rab tu 'dar
292a3(mdo sde): kun tu rab tu 'dar ro// 'dud rab tu 'dud kun tu rab tu 'dud do// gar byed rab tu gar byed/ kun tu rab tu gar byed do// nyan thos chen po de dag thams cad kyang rang rang gi stan la mi dga' ste/
292a4(mdo sde): 'gul rab tu 'gul zhing spyod lam yang 'khrugs nas/ byis pa chung ngu bzhin du gar byed pa lta bur ston to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan gyis nyan thos chen po de dag la
292a5(mdo sde): 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa nyan thos chen po dag nyon mongs pa dang bral ba/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa/ bden pa bzhi mthong bar gyur pa yin naci'i phyir rang gi lus
292a6(mdo sde): 'jog par mi nus shing / tshe dang ldan pa dag byis pa chung ngu bzhin du gar byed pa lta bur ston gnyan thos chen po de dag gis spras pa/ rigs kyi bu mi'am ci'i rgyal po sdong pos pi wa nga 'di zangs pa
292a7(mdo sde): dang / sil snyan dang glu dbyangs sbyar bas pi wang gi spa des bdag cag la dbang med par bdag gis lus rang rang gi stan la 'dug par mi dga' zhing 'dar// rab tu 'dar/ kun tu rab tu 'dar te/
292b1(mdo sde): sems rnam par gzhag par yang mnus so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan gyis/ gnas brtan 'od srungs chen po la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa 'od srungs
292b2(mdo sde): chen po rgas gtugasaka'akhogs pa// 'dod pa zung ba/ chog shes pa/ sbyangs pa'i yon tan 'dzin pa/ lba dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mchod rten du gyur pa yin na gtso'i phyir
292b3(mdo sde): rang gi lus 'dzin par mi nus shing gnas brtan du gyur kyang byis pa rlung ngu bzhin du gar byed pa lta bur ston// gnas gnas brtan 'od srungs chen pos spras pa/ rigs kyi bu dper na rlung rnam par
292b4(mdo sde): 'thor byed langs pa na shing drang gnags dang / ri thams cad 'di ltar bdag rnam par gzhag pa'i stobs med// mthu med de/ de dag thams cad mi 'dod bzhin du g.yo rab tu g.yo/ 'gul rab tu
292b5(mdo sde): 'gul lo// rigs kyi bu de bzhin du gang 'di mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas pi wang blangs pa de'i sgra thos pas// bdag cag rlung rnam par 'thor byed kyis ri chen po bdas pa bzhin du bdag 'dzin ma nus
292b6(mdo sde): par gyur to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ skyes bu dam pa 'di'i sngon lam dang / bsod nams dang / ye shes kyi khyad par ni 'di 'dra ste/ des nyan thos kyi bsod nams dang g.ye shes dang / gzi brjid
292b7(mdo sde): thams cad zil gyis gnon to// byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan gyis smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srungs chen po phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dpal dang gzi brjid dang
293a1(mdo sde): stobs la gang gi phyir pi wang gi spa des bskul ba'am/ bskyod par mi nus pas/ btsun pa 'od srungs chen po su zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems/
293a2(mdo sde): mi skyedade ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang nyi tshe ba'i ye shes dang ldan pa rnams kyi stobs dang / gzi brjid de ni pi wang gi sgra 'dis zil gyis non to// gang theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams kyi
293a3(mdo sde): stobs drang gzi brjid de la ni zil gyis gnon par mi nus pa la ltos/ de nas mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas pi wang gi sgra sgrog pa na/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang / mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa'i
293a4(mdo sde): sngon gyi smon lam gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis pi wang de dang sel snyan brgyad khri bzhi sdong po de dag las kyang rigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo // tha ma 'bring dang de bzhin mchog rnams kyis// ngos
293a5(mdo sde): rnams thams cad ma'am zhing chos rnams dben// zhi ba stong pa mi 'gyur 'khrug pa med// gzod nas dag sde dri med nam mkha' bzhin// gang dag da ltar gyi dang 'das pa yi// sems can
293a6(mdo sde): kun mnyam sems can sems can med// sems can skad du snga rnams 'byung ba yang // chos kyi sgra dang mtshungs te de yang med// zhing rnams thams cad zhing mnyam ning min te// bar snang dang ni
293a7(mdo sde): mtshungs shing mnyam par snang // 'phel ba ma yin mi zad ma skyes te ga gsog gsob nam mkha' lta bur rnam par dag/ sangs rgyas kun mnyam sangs rgyas sangs rgyas min// chos dbyings nges
293b1(mdo sde): pa rab dris pa med pa ste// tshul khrims shes rab ye shes rnam grol ma'am// mtshan nyid gcig ste mtshan mnyam mtshan nyid med// nyon mongs thams cad nyon mongs ma yin grol// rtog dang rtog pa
293b2(mdo sde): kun rtog rnam par rtog/ nang na rgyub ma yin phyi rol min// 'du shes mdud pa phyin ci log las gyur// rnam par rtog pas ros dbyings ming gtags pa// ming de nyid kyang gzhan min
293b3(mdo sde): de bzhin min// ming dang gzugs kyi rang bzhin rjes rtogs pa// de dag rtag tu mi rags 'jig rten spyod// gang rnams 'das pa'i bde gshegs grangs med pa// de dag gis ni
293b4(mdo sde): gang gsungs chos mang po// gzod nas zad cing dengs dang 'jigs las dben// de dag yul dang phyogs su 'gro ma yin// chos 'di dgra ni yi ge las byung ste// yi ge de dag sems
293b5(mdo sde): can zad pa'i chos// yi ge zad pa'i chos nyid shes pas na// chos rnams kun la rnam par rtog mi bye// sems kyi rgyud ni rgyud mnyam rgyud ma yin// rang bzhin gzhan dang gnan te rab
293b6(mdo sde): pa med// sems dang sems byung chos mtha' med shes pas// 'phags pa rnams ni mnyam pa'i chos la 'jug/ mtha' dang mtha' med kun chad rnam par chad// thog ma tha ma bar ma
293b7(mdo sde): mnyam par gyur// dus gsum dag ni dben pa shes pa mnyam// shes pa de yang mtha' yod ma yin no// skye bo rtag tu ming dang gzugs la chags// mtha' dang mtha' med lta bas gos pa rnams//
294a1(mdo sde): rgyu dang rkyen las byung bar shes pas na// bdag dang sems can rnam par rtog ma yin// bdag las ldang ba rtag tu ldang ma yin// ros de kun ni srang ba med pa sde/
294a2(mdo sde): gang dag ldang dang ldang ba med rtogs pa// de dag bzod pa mnyam nyid rjes su 'thun// chos kun rtag tu bdag med rang bzhin te// sprin dang grog dang nam mkha' lta bu ga sog/ bdag dang sems
294a3(mdo sde): can rtag tu rang bzhin stong // 'di ni gzungs kyi phyag rgyas 'jug pa yin// mtshan nyid gcig ste mtshan mnam mtshan med par// gang gis thar pa'i sgo gsum rnam rdzogs nas// thug pa med
294a4(mdo sde): pa'i chos rnams sngon byed kyang // chos la yongs su rtog pa mi byed do// tha ma 'bring dang de bzhin mchog rnams kyi// chos 'di dag ni yi ge rnams kyis brjod// yi ge rnams la rnam par rtog mi
294a5(mdo sde): byed// de lta bur ni don rnams bshad pa yin// don dang tshig 'bru gnyis la mi 'jug ste// gnyis med rtag tu don ni sgra dang bral// gang gis mtha' ni dben pa rang gis gyur pa// de yi sngon
294a6(mdo sde): gyi mtha' ni nye bar chad// gang dag sngon mtha' nye bar chad pa rnams// grol ba'i don du 'dus byas rnams la spyod// yang dag mtha' ni rtag tu mtha' med shes// de yi byams dang snying rje
