352b4(mdo sde): de dag rnams kyis bshad pa'i chos kyang bzung // thugs rje ldan zhing 'gro ba'i don gyi phyir// khyod la yongs su skyo ba'i thugs mi mnga'// rim gro ma bgyis zhum par mi 'gyur zhing /
352b5(mdo sde): rim gror bgyis pas mtho bar 'gyur ma lags// dog sa lta bur snyom sang shing mi g.yo ste// 'jig rten ros ga na sa ma gos pa dra bzhin// chos rnams stong pa mar na ma ma ma ris pa// chu zla
352b6(mdo sde): badra zhing sgyu ma lta bu dang // dbu ba rdos 'dra rmi lam grog 'dra dang // smig rgyu'i mtshan nyid lta bur rab tu mkhyen// ngo bo nyid kyis gang zag bdag ma ma ris// gdod nas stong zhing mi gas
352b7(mdo sde): rjes ma mchis// nam mkha' lta bur dag cing dri ma mchis// dngos po bas par dngos po ma mchis 'dra// las dang bya ba rgyu dang rkyen rnams las// bya ba lags kyi rjes ni ma ma ris par/
353a1(mdo sde): tshul 'a rnam par sbyang du mdzad pas na/ de phyir khyod ni rdzogs sangs rgyas zhes bgyi// gang dag 'den pa mthong zhing thos gyur pa// de dag pa ni ngan song 'jig
353a2(mdo sde): ma mchis// de dag bde 'gro dag tu mchog gzhol te// srog rags de rnams kyi ni rnyed pa lags// bdag cag rnams kyis gang zag dam pa khyod// kun tu mchod pas mchod pa bgyis
353a3(mdo sde): nas su/ byang chub tu ni sems kyang bskyed bgyis te// gang zag mchod 'drar thams cad 'gyur bar shog/ nam mkha' la ni dpag tu nus kyang gdang // rgya mtshob re ba ni bsar gyis nus
353a4(mdo sde): kyang gda'// nyi zla mkha' las sar ni lhung gda' yi// sangs rgyas yon tan bas par 'gyur mi gda'// de nas bcom ldan 'das shing rta la bzhugs te/ nam mkha'i dkyil gyi
353a5(mdo sde): lam nas gshegs pas gshegs shing gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i sku las 'od gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams khyab par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i 'od phyung ba dang
353a6(mdo sde): bo de des rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po dang / bya rgod kyi phung po'i re'ang rab tu khyab par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das shing rta des rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer dang / bya rgod kyi phung
353a7(mdo sde): po'o rig la bder gshegs so// de nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer na/ grong khyer gyi rgyal po pa skye sa dgra blon po dang rgyal bu dang / tshong dpon dang / grong rdal pa dang / khyim bdag tu
353b1(mdo sde): bcas pa dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams 'od des bskul nas ka phyi rdo'i dus kyi tshe me tog dang / bdug pa dang spos dang / 'phreng ba dang
353b2(mdo sde): byug pa dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das bsu ba'i phyir rengs pa nges par rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas byung ste/ bya rgod kyi bung
353b3(mdo sde): bo'i rol bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong ngo // ljon pa'i sras rnams shing rta 'dren bzhin du sem snyan brgyad khri bzhi stong byed do// mi 'am ci rol mo sel snyan gyi sgra des bya rgod kyi bung
353b4(mdo sde): po 'i ro thams cad du grags par gyur to// de ltar mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa dpung dang bcas 'khor dang bcas pas rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i dkyil
353b5(mdo sde): nas khyer te/ bya rgod kyi phung po'i ro la bzhag go// de nas bcom ldan 'das shing rta de las babs na saM rang gi gnas su gdan ba shams pa la bzhugs so// byang chub sems
353b6(mdo sde): dpa' de dag dang / nyan thos chen po de dag dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams kyang shing rta de las babs nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag batshal te
353b7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang nasabacom ldan 'das la kun nas bskor te/ rang rang gi stan la 'khod do// 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa dang / gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi
354a1(mdo sde): lha'i bu de dag kyang shing rta de las babs te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas rgyal po ma
354a2(mdo sde): skyes dgra blon po dang / rgyal po dang / rgyal bu dang tshong dpon dang khyim bdag dang / grong rdal pa dang bcas pa dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen
354a3(mdo sde): ma rnams kyis me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spos dang 'azeng ba dang byug pa dang bye ma dang cho sagos dang / gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ga ba dan ji ltar thogs pa de dag gis
354a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'ad sa la mchod pa byas nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag ba tshal te/ bcom ldan padas la sku ma mnyel tam bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes gsol
354a5(mdo sde): nas/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' lhab cod pan gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das mi'amatso ba rgyal po sngon
354a6(mdo sde): pa g.yog 'khor dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor dang bcas te/ shing rta la bzhugs pa nam mkha'i dkyi nas drangs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis mi 'am ci'i rgyal po sngon pa 'khor dang
354a7(mdo sde): bcas pas ci zhig 'thob par 'gyurabacom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa la pa dge ba'i rtsa ba des mi'amaco'i rgyal po ljon pa sras dang bcas bu dang bcas/ g.yog dang bcas pas 'dir
354b1(mdo sde): byang chub tu sems bskyed nas de dag thams cad nam byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du mngon par shes pa las mi nyams pa rab tu thob par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi
354b2(mdo sde): zhing du ngan tshun 'gro ba 'gyur/ sangs rgyas mthong ba dang / chos nyan pa dang / dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang ri 'bral bar 'gyur/ tshe rabs thams cad du skye ba dran par 'gyur/ lung bstan
354b3(mdo sde): pa thob par 'gyur/ dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba la brtson par 'gyur/ sems can yongs su smin par byang la spo bar 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal ngor skyes dgras mang maci'i bdag
354b4(mdo sde): po ljon pa la 'di skad ces smras so// mi bam ci'i bdag po bcom ldan 'das kyis khyod kyi yon tan yongs su brjod pa mdzad pas khyod kyis rnyed nga legs par rnyed kyis khyod kyi dge ba'i rtsa
354b5(mdo sde): bde las shas shig kho bos kyang 'thob par 'dod do// mi ba ma ci'i rgyal po ljon pas smras pa rgyal po rin po dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di thams cad bdag gis khyod dang sems can thams la dbul
354b6(mdo sde): lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rgyal po chen po byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ni sems can thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa de gang yang med do// rgyal po chen po byang chub sems
354b7(mdo sde): dpa' thams cad ni ser sna can ma yin te/ de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la ser sna mi skyed do// dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sems can thams cad la gtong yang yid mi bde bar mi 'gyur/
355a1(mdo sde): su sa rgyun su
355a2(mdo sde): phyug
355a3(mdo sde): bya
355a4(mdo sde): khyod dpar sgrib pa me dang thub cing gan sangasapa/ khyod kyis kya rnyed pa rigs par da // rnam badzin par sna sa byang chub sams dpa' pas sbyinan pas thas
355a5(mdo sde): nga ma myo ga dang / mi ga 'jug cig zas pa 'ang brjed par ma 'gyur ba dang / chung zangar 'gyur ba dang / kun tu gzung ba dang / sangs su
355a6(mdo sde): 'gyur bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' pa'i rtsod pan gyis 'di skad ces gsol so// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar kyang chub sems dpa chos kyi ning du ra
355b1(mdo sde): ba lags// de skad ces gsolang dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis// byang chung sems drang bas bcod pan la 'di skad ces bka/ bsul to// rigs kyi bu byang rung sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
355b2(mdo sde): chos sumacu rtsa gnyis dang ldan na// chos kyi snod du 'gyur te/ sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i snod sangs rgyas kyis byin gyi rlangs dang / lhag pa'i
355b3(mdo sde): bsam pa dang / byang chub kyi lamache bar rton pa'i snod sbyor ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba khyad par du 'gro ba'i snod lhag pa'i bsam pa dang / mang du thos pa'i snod dran pa dang / lam la 'jug pa'i snod blo gros
355b4(mdo sde): dang don rtogs pa rjes su rtogs pa'i snod rtogs pa dang / longs spyod chen po'i snod sbyin pa dang / bsam pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i snod tshul khrims dang / skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa
355b5(mdo sde): gnyis thob pa'i snod bzod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad 'grub pa'i snod brtson 'grus dang / sems las su rung ba'i snod bsam gtan dang / dogs pa thams cad las rab tu
355b6(mdo sde): 'das pa'i snod shes rab dang / sems can thams cad la sems snyoms pa'i snod byams pa dang / dbul zhing \u0f7fma thag pa thams cad bskyab pa'i snod snying rje dang / chos la dga' ba'i snod
355b7(mdo sde): dga' ba dang // rjes su chags pa dang khong khro ba spang ba'i sdod btang snyongs dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad 'dzin du 'jug pa'i snod dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu
356a1(mdo sde): byin pa'i snod thos pa rol pas ngoms mi myong ba dang / mi thos pa'i snod rab tu 'byung ba dang / don nung zhing byang chung ba'i snod dgon pa la gnas pa dang / bas
356a2(mdo sde): gtan dang mngon par shes pa'i snod dben pa la dga' ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i snod bsru 'i dngos po dang / chos snang ba'i snod dam pa'i ris yongs su 'dzin pa
356a3(mdo sde): dang thos pa'i chos thams cad 'dzin pa'i snod gzungs dang / sems can thams cad kyi the tsom gcod pa'i snod spobs pa dang / sangs rgyas mthong ba'i snod sangs rgyas rjes su dran
356a4(mdo sde): pa dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snod chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bsrung ba'i snod zhe 'gras pa med pa'i sems dang / lta bar gyur pa thams cad spong ba'i snod
356a5(mdo sde): stong pa nyid la mos pa dang // mthar 'dzin pa thams cad yongs su spong ba'i snod rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / mi 'khrugs shing phyed par lung ston pa'i snod mi skye ba'i ros la bzod pa
356a6(mdo sde): thob pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ros ma 'dres pa rnams kyi snod byer mo ldog pa'is ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos sum cu
356a7(mdo sde): rtsa gnyis po 'di dag dang ldan na chos kyi snod du rig par bya'o// bstan pa 'di bshad pa na thog rags khres bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas rig 'di skad/
356b1(mdo sde): ces bcom ldan 'das sems can thams can kyang bdi 'dra ba'i chos kyi sdong du gyur cig/ bdag cag kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad du bstan pa'i ros de lta bu'i snod du thar cig ces spas so//
356b2(mdo sde): de nas bcod ldan 'das kyis/ ri 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ming bco'i bdag po khyod kyi 'khor 'di skyo bar 'gyur du 'ong ga/ khyod rang gi gnas su song zhig
356b3(mdo sde): mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang yongs su skyo bde byang chub sems dpa' zhes mi bgyi ste/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' ni skyob bzod par bgyi'o//
356b4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yongs su skyo ba lags/ ji ltar na yongs su mi skyo ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems
356b5(mdo sde): dpa' chos pani dang ldan na yongs su skyo bar rig par byaste// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems can gyi khams tshad med pa thos na skrag pa dang / 'khor ba tshad med pa zos na thag pa
356b6(mdo sde): dang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rang med pa zos na skrag pa dang bsod nams tshad med pas mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po 'grub pa thos na skrag pa ste/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa'
356b7(mdo sde): ros bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ yongs su skyo bar rig par bya'o// mi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na// yongs su mi skyo bar rig par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na
357a1(mdo sde): 'di ltaste/ sems can gyi khams rad med pa debang bdag gis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar bya'o zhes thos na mi skrag pa dang / dge ba'i dra ba bsgrub pa'i byar
357a2(mdo sde): 'khor ba tshad med pa yongs su gzung bar bya'o zhes thos na mi sgeg pa dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes tshad med pa de bdag gis yongs su rdzogs par bya'o zhes thos na mi skrag pa dang
357a3(mdo sde): bsod nams tshad med pa bsags pas mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po bsrub ste/ bdag gis kyang bsgrub par bya'o zhes thos na mi skrag pa ste/ mi 'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa'
357a4(mdo sde): ros bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ yongs su mi skyo bar rig par bya'o// mi'am ci'i bdag po gnan yang byang chub sems dpa' ros bzhi dang ldan na/ yongs su skyo bar rig par bya ste/
357a5(mdo sde): bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ skabs skabs su nyan thos kyi theg pa 'dod pa dang / skabs skabs su rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'dod pa dang / dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig pa na yal
357a6(mdo sde): bar 'dor zhing yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / gzhan yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du mi 'jug pa ste/ mi'amatso'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di
357a7(mdo sde): dag dang ldan na/ yongs su so bar rig par bya'o// mi'amatsho'i bdag po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na// yongs su skye bar rig par byaste/ bane gang zhen
357b1(mdo sde): 'disase/ rab kyin kyang byang chub kyis pas mi gdong ba dang / na thos dang rang rangs rgyar gyis mibadod pa dang / sus dang pog kyang bdor gang dang bangs spang bdang / dpag dang srong du bzo da
357b2(mdo sde): gzhan dag byang chub yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa ste/ rib ma ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' ros bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ yongs su mi skyo bar rig par bya'o// mi' maci'o bdag po
357b3(mdo sde): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ros bzhi dang ldan na/ yongs su skyo bar rig par bya'o// bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ spong ba mthong na yongs su so ba dang / bsod rnams byed par
357b4(mdo sde): sbyor ba la brtson par gnas pa dang / mang du thos pa tshol ba la mi brtson pa dang / ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams gnan la mi ston pa ste/ mi 'amacog bdag po byang chub sems dpa' ros bzhi po
357b5(mdo sde): 'di dag dang ldan na/ yongs su skyo bar rig par bya'o// mi 'am ci'i dag po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi dang ldan na/ yongs su mi skyo bar rig par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na
357b6(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ slong ba la dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'du shes skyed cing / zhe 'gras pa'i sems med la bzhin 'dzum zhing khro gnyer med de/ tshur shog legs par 'ongs so zhes
357b7(mdo sde): bya bapo rig smra ba dang / bdag bde ba la mi rags shing sems can thams cad la bde ba rab tu sbyin pa dang / mang du thos pa rol bas mngoms shing / ji ltar thos pa'i chos rnams
358a1(mdo sde): kyang gzhan dag pargya rer rab tu ston cing / zang zing med pa'i sems kyis ros de gzhan la rab tu ston pa ste/ mi maci'i bdag po byang chungab sems
358a2(mdo sde): dpa' ros bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na yongs su mi skyo bar rig par bya'o// mi'am ci 'i bdag po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa ba ros bzhi dang ldan na// yongs su skyo bar rig
358a3(mdo sde): par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam yongs su mi tshol ba dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po la mi sbyor ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par
358a4(mdo sde): byed par brtson 'grus mi rtsom pa dang / yon tan chung ngu tsam gyis chog par 'dzin cing gong du mi rol pa ste// mi ba ma ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dang 'a chos bzhi po 'di dag dang
358a5(mdo sde): ldan na// yongs su skyo bar rig par bya'o// rab macib bdag po gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ros bzhi dang ldan na// yongs su ri skyo bar rig par bya ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di
358a6(mdo sde): lta ste/ mgo dang gos la meng bar ba bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam yongs su tshol ba dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po la rtag tu brtson pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par byed par brtson 'grus
358a7(mdo sde): rtsom pa dang / dge ba thams cad yongs su bskang ba'i phyir de la mi rags pa yin te/ mi'am ci'i bdag po byang chub sems dpa' ros bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ yongs su mi skyo bar rig par
358b1(mdo sde): bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ros bzhi po bsrub pa 'dis me'am ci'i bdag po ljon pa la lan bta nasargyal po ma skyes dgral 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal po chen
358b2(mdo sde): po khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yongs su skyo ba dang / yongs su mi skyo ba bzhi pa bsgrub pa la 'jug par 'de thos sam rgyal pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das thos
358b3(mdo sde): lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rgyal po chen po de lta bas na khyod byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la yongs su mi skyo bar spyad par bya'o// rgyal por skyes dgras
358b4(mdo sde): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa gang lags// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po bskyes dgra'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su bsang ba'i
358b5(mdo sde): phyir mi 'am tse'i rgyal po ljon pa la bka' stsal ba mi 'am ci'i bdag po khyod ji ltar sems can yongs su zin par byed pa'i rang gi thabs mkhas pa'i khyad par rgyal po ma skyes dgra 'di'i
358b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su bskang po'i phyir khyod kyis ston cig/ de nas meb ma ci'i rgyal po ljon pas rang gis pi wang de bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar blangs so// pi wa nga de blangs
358b7(mdo sde): ma thag tu de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang mi'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i gzi brjid kyis/ pi wang gi sgra de las seng ges bsgyings bltar shing sAl du ma g.yos pa'i sgrar byang
359a1(mdo sde): rlung sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rigs su bcad pa 'di dag byung ngo // phan pa spyod pa dag dang don spyod dang / ros zos nan tan byed pa spyod pa dang / byang rung mchog/
359a2(mdo sde): gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag yongs su skyo ba med par spyod// bde ba spyod dang skyed pa spyod pa dang // sems can kun la sems snyoms spyod pa dang / byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod
359a3(mdo sde): pa/ de dag rgya chen ma yin spyod pa med// brtan pa spyod dang bden pa spyod pa dang // bsam pa yongs su dag pa spyod pa dang / byang chub ma chogagi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag gang du'ang sgyu med spyod pa
359a4(mdo sde): yin// dul ba spyod dang sbyin pa spyod pa dang // dngos po thams cad yongs su gtong spyod dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag ser sna med par spyod pa yin// tshul khrims
359a5(mdo sde): spyod pa ma rnams spyod pa dang // lus dang ngag ni yongs dag spyod pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag tshul khrims 'a ral pa'i spyod pa med// brtul zhugs spyod dang bzod pa spyod/
359a6(mdo sde): pa dang // khro skyon yongs su gcod pa'i spyod pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag gnod sems med par spyod pa yin// brtson bgrus spyod dang mthu rnams spyod pa dang /
359a7(mdo sde): 'khor bar yongs su 'i lho spyod pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag le lo med par spyod pa yin// bsam gtan spyod dang ting 'dzin spyod pa dang // lus dang sems ni
359b1(mdo sde): rab tu dben spyod dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag g.yeng ba med par spyod pa yin/ shes rab spyod dang bro ba rog spyod pa dang / chos rnams thams cad ji bzhin/
359b2(mdo sde): spyod pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag shes rab 'a ral pa'i spyod pa med// byams pa spyod dang phan 'dod spyod pa dang // sems can kun la snying rje spyod pa dang /
359b3(mdo sde): byang chub pa rog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag zo ba'i the ba med par spyod// stong pa spyod dang rab tu dben spyod dang // mtshan med pa yongs su dag spyod dang / byang chub mchog gi sbyong
359b4(mdo sde): bgang spyod pa// de dag smon pa med par spyod pa yin// yang dag nyid dang de bzhin nyid spyod dang / shes pa thams cad yongs su dag sbyong dang // byang chub mchog ge spyod pa gang spyod
359b5(mdo sde): pa/ de dag gang du'ang rags pa med par spyod// dad pa spyod dang dang ba spyod pa dang // dran dang g.yeng ba med pa spyod pa dang // byang chub ma rog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag
359b6(mdo sde): yongs su spyod pa med par spyod// bsam gtan spyod dang rna mthar spyod pa dang // mngon shes lnga rnams yongs dag spyod pa dang // byang chub ma rnyog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag
359b7(mdo sde): chags pa med par spyod pa yin// sangs rgyas spyod dang dam chos spyod pa dang // dge 'dun dkon mchog nye bar brtan spyod pa// byang chub pa rog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag dkon
360a1(mdo sde): mchog mchog gi spyod pa yin// ros spyod pa dang shin tu rigs spyod dang // sems can thams cad yongs su smin spyod dang / byang chub mchog gi spyod pa
360a2(mdo sde): gang yod pa// de dag rgyun ri ba dad par spyod pa yin// bya ba spyod dang chos rnams spyod pa dang // mtha' kur yongs su gcod pa'i spyod pa dang // byang rlung mchog gi spyod pa gang
360a3(mdo sde): spyod pa/ de dag gang du'ang lta bar sdod pa med// dkang spyod dang rnam par dag spyod dang // nyon mongs thams cad yongs su gcod sdod dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang
360a4(mdo sde): spyod pa// de dag yongs su gdung bar spyod pa med// bde ba spyod dang shin tu rnam par spyod// sems can kun la 'jigs med ma chog spyod dang // byang chub ma chog gi spyod pa
360a5(mdo sde): gang spyod pa// de dag sngon lam spyod pa med pa yin// ci ma spyod dang zla ba spyod pa dang // pad+ma lta bur gos pa med spyod dang // byang chub ma rog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag rtsar
360a6(mdo sde): bcas 'jig rten phyag bya ba// brgya byin spyod dang tshangs pa'i spyod pa dang // dkar po'i chos rnams yongs su rdzogs spyod dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag/
360a7(mdo sde): bdud rnams sder bcas skrag par byed// mchog gyod pa dang khyad par 'phags spyod dang // 'dod rags nyes pa thab gcod spyod dang // byang chub mchog ge spyod pa gang spyod pa/
360b1(mdo sde): de dag gang dubang gti mug spyod pa med// lam spyod pa dang mu stegs spyod pa dang // shes rab mig ni yongs su dag spyod dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag kun tu rtog par/
360b2(mdo sde): spyod pa med// dul ba spyod dang rab tu 'i spyod dang // ming dang gzugs la mi rags spyod pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa dag pa dang // de dag wa dang mo ni dang pos bstod// 'phags
360b3(mdo sde): pa'i spyod dang shin tu mnam spyod dang // g.yon phyogs lam ni yongs su gcod spyod dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag rtag tu don la 'bab pa dang // dpa' po spyod
360b4(mdo sde): dang shin tu brtan spyod dang // bdud kyi sde rnams 'jig par byed spyod dang // byang chub ma rog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag byang chub snying por gzhol ba yin// gzung ba spyod dang don
360b5(mdo sde): yod spyod pa dang // gzungs la g.yeng ba med par spyod pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag gang du'ang pa rig spyod pa med// dgon pa spyod dang rab tu dbyen spyod dang //
360b6(mdo sde): rtag tu rab tu 'byung bar spyod pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag nan tan byed par spyod pa yin// gtso bo'i spyod dang khyad par 'phags spyod dang / 'jig rten thams
360b7(mdo sde): cad zil gnon spyod pa dang // byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag dman pa la ni spyod pa med// rigs pa spyod dang thabs la spyod pa dang // bsam gtan bde las rog par spyod pa dang //
361a1(mdo sde): byang chub mchog gi spyong pa gang spyod pa// de dag mi shes spyod pa med pa yin// ltang spyod dang rnam par lnga spyod dang / ming dang gzugs la mi rags spyod pa dang /
361a2(mdo sde): byang chub mchog gi spyod pa gang spyod pa// de dag 'jigs pa dad par spyod pa yin// thams cad spyod dang kun tu spyod pa dang // dbang po yongs su smin par byed pa dang / byang chub mchog gi
361a3(mdo sde): smod pa gang spong pa// de dag ye shes nang mnga'i mtha' dang 'dra/ byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa bstan pa'i rigs su bcad pa mngon parang grub pa 'di pa lang gi sgra de las byung ba na
361a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong mi skye ba'i ros la bzod pa thob par gyur to// rgyal po ma skyes dgra'i 'khor dang rgyal po'i khyed kyi bram ze dang / khyim bdag dang / mi bar ci dang
361a5(mdo sde): dri za dang // lto phye chen po dang // de dag gi 'khor gyi srog rags brgyad stong za na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed nas tshig 'di skad ces bcom ldan pa das
361a6(mdo sde): bdag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'di la bsrab par bgyi'o// ran tan gyis bsgrub par bya'o// sems can tshad ma mchis pa dag byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'di nyid yang
361a7(mdo sde): dag par 'dzin du stsal bar bgyi'o zhes sbas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis meb maci'i rgyal po ljon pa bgror gnang ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis snang bas ma'am ci rgyal po
361b1(mdo sde): ljon pa bu dang bcas// dpung dang bcas/ sras dang bcas// gnyen 'dab dang bcas ka 'khor dang bcas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das/
361b2(mdo sde): la lan gsum bskor ba byas te bzod pa gsol nas/ sem snyan dkrol me tog gi ra ra phab ga bod zer gyi dra ba phyung ste ga sa chen po rnam pa drug tu g.yos par byas nas bcom ldan
361b3(mdo sde): 'das kyi thad nas song ste/ de skad cig thang cig yud tsam do nyid la/ ri'i rgyal po spos kyi ngad ldang du rang gi khyim du phyin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das lag lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin
361b4(mdo sde): gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das me 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang / chos la mchod pas bdag zil gyis non to// bcom ldan
361b5(mdo sde): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ko 'u shi ka maM ba ma tse'i rgyal po ljon pas khyod 'ba' zhig zil gyis mnan pa ma yin gyi/ ko'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos thob pa
361b6(mdo sde): ma gtogs par/ gang dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas de dag thams
361b7(mdo sde): cad mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas zil gyis non to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka byang chub sems dpa' sems bskyed ma thag pas// nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang
362a1(mdo sde): brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten myong ba thams cad zil gyis non to// ko'u shi ka de lta bsar byang chub sems dpa' ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis/
362a2(mdo sde): zil gyis mi non to// gang byang chub sems dpa' zil gyis gnon par sems pa de ni// de bzhin gshegs pa la zil gyis gnon par 'dod pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems
362a3(mdo sde): dpa' las ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa las ninyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas 'byung ngo // de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis bstan pa 'di thos nas
362a4(mdo sde): thab mo sbyar te mchi ma grags nas// tshig 'di skad ces kye ra'ong bdag sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pa rags pa mi mnga' zhing spangang mi mnga' ba 'di lta bu las rnams so zhes smras so// de nas lha rnams kyi dbang
362a5(mdo sde): po brgya byin gyi bu lha'i bu 'od zer srung zhes bya ba 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des// lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces sbas so// yab 'di ltar gang dag rab tu dben pa
362a6(mdo sde): rnam par bsgrub par nye bar gnas pa'i mtshan nyid ma lags pa'i chos rnams la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems mi skyed pa de ni sems can thams cad la snying rje rnyed pa ma lags//
362a7(mdo sde): dge ba'i rtsa brgya chen po la mos pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen la sten pa ma lags te/ phyis 'gyod par 'gyur ba'o// yang skyon med pal zhugs te/ rgyu rig cings bon rig ste/ theg pa ren
362b1(mdo sde): po'i snod du ma gyur pa la da dpyir ci mchis/ bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ sum cu rtsa gsum ris kyi lha'i bu las stong tham padran med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do//
362b2(mdo sde): de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ lha'i bu 'od zer srung gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dka' ba spyad pa brgya stong
362b3(mdo sde): brag ji snyed pa/ bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chub sems dpa'i smad pa spyod par btang ba ni bdag la mngon sum du gyur to// bcom ldan 'das sngon byang chung sems dpar gyur pa na/
362b4(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas par me mdzad las mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod pa thob pa de la 'jug pa'i rnam par dbye ba bstan pa cung zad
362b5(mdo sde): cig bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi skye ba'i ros la bzod pa thob pa gang bdag gis thos nas de zhen gshegs pa nyid du
362b6(mdo sde): pa sgrubs pas chos de 'thob par 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha'i bu 'od zer srung la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'od zer su
362b7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ma skyed pa rnams kyis ni mi skye ba'i ros la bzod pa thob par mi 'gyur gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa rnams kyis mi skye ba'i
363a1(mdo sde): chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro// 'od zer srung byang chub sems dpa' ros bzhi dang ldan na/ mi skye ba'i ros la bzod pa thob par 'gyur te
363a2(mdo sde): bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi mnyam pa nyid dang chos kyi mnyam pa nyid dang / dge 'dun gyi mnyam pa nyid dang / gzhing mnyam pa nyid de lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i ros
363a3(mdo sde): bzhi po'adi dag dang ldan na mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro// ka wa'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dang 'a ros bzhi dang ldan na mi skye ba'i ros la bzod pa thob par
363a4(mdo sde): 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ bsam gtan pa zhes stong pa nyid la rnam par rtse ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis thabs mkhas pal rnam par rtse ba dang / mngon par shes
363a5(mdo sde): pa lngas ye shes la rnam par rtse ba dang / thogs pa med pa'i ye shes kyi rdzu 'phrul la rnam par rtse ba ste// 'od zer srung byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/ mi skye
363a6(mdo sde): ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro// 'od zer srung gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ros bzhi dang ldan na/ de skye bo'i ros la bzod pa thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na/
363a7(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ phung po rnams la byang rung rol yang phung po rnams la byang chub kyi rang bzhin du mos pa ma yin pa dang / khams rnams la byang chub tshol yang khams rnams la byang chub kyi rang bzhin du
363b1(mdo sde): mos pa ma yin pa dang / skye mched rnams la byang rung rol yang skye mched rnams la byang chub kyi rang bzhin du mi rtog pa dang / chos thams cad la byang chub rol yang ros thams cad la byang chub kyi
363b2(mdo sde): rang bzhin du mos pa ma yin pa ste/ 'od zer srung byang chub sems dang 'a ros bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na// mi skye ba'i ros la bzod pa thod par 'gyur ro// 'od zer srung gzhan yang byang
363b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' ros bzhi dang ldan na// mi skye bo'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur te/ bzhi gang zhe na// 'di lta ste/ mi g.yo ba'i tshul gyis ros thams cad yang dag pa'i mtha' la
363b4(mdo sde): gnas par shes pa dang / dus gsum mnyam pa nyid pas chos thams cad de bzhin 'di la gnas par 'jug pa dang // chos thams cad mtshan nyid 'dres pa med pas ros kyi dbyings su 'du
363b5(mdo sde): shes pa dang // chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song bas nam mkha'i rang bzhin du so sor rtogs pa ste// 'od zer srung byang chub sems dpa' ros bzhi po 'di dag dang ldan na/
363b6(mdo sde): mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro// mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa bstan pa 'di bshad na/ byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong ma skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// /
363b7(mdo sde): lha'i du 'od zer srung ni rjes su 'thun pa'i ros la bzod pa thob par gyur to// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i tha mar bcom ldan 'das kyis// tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa
364a1(mdo sde): kun dga' mo khyod kyis mi'amatsho'i rgyal po ljon pas nus pa ga pha rol tu phyin pas 'dur ba bstan pa'i sgo ba le'u'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung ngam kun dag
364a2(mdo sde): bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu nyid kyis bdag gis ngos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung lags so// bcom ldan 'das yal la ji tsar du ros kyi rnam grangs 'ang
364a3(mdo sde): zang mo rnam par nges pa dang don bzang po dang rig 'bru bzang pos brgyan pa ni mdzes te ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnar grangs 'dir/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ngos sgo ma brdzus
364a4(mdo sde): pa de gang yang ram nges so// bcom ldan 'das sngon bdag la ros snang bar gyur pa gang lags pa de'ang da ros kyi rnam grangs 'di la brten nas 'bu ma 'gyur du skyes so// bcom ldan 'das
364a5(mdo sde): bdag ni 'di snyam du bdag lta bu'i tshe ba'i 'tshal ba dang ldan pa/ jo chung ngu nyan thos kyi theg pa'i skyon ma ma chis patha chad la zhugs par gnas pas ros kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas kyang 'di
364a6(mdo sde): bu'i chos kyi snang ba 'di skyes par gyur na// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes tshang ma mchis pa'i snod du gyur pa/ rdo rtse che zhing rgya mtsho lta bu dang ldan pa chos rin po/
364a7(mdo sde): thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa gsol ba ma btab par sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen bgyid pa gang lags pa de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas/ chos kyi
364b1(mdo sde): snang ba ji snyed cig thob par 'gyur ba lta sngos kyang ci 'amab sdam bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das kyis dka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
364b2(mdo sde): kye me dang zla ba'i snang ba ji snyed pa de thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gcig gi 'od kyis mog mog por 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo de bzhin gshegs pa'i spu'i khung bu thams
364b3(mdo sde): cad nas bod ji snyed byung ba de dag ni shes rab kyi 'od kying rgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ste/ stong gi ra dang / stong phrag brgya'i rwa dang / bye ba'i cha dang / bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi cha dang
364b4(mdo sde): grangs dang tshad dang / bgrang ba dang / dpe dang rdzar yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ snang ba thams cad ni shes rab kyi snang ba las byung ba'i phyir ro// kun dga' bo de bzhin
364b5(mdo sde): gshegs pa'i shes rab kyi snang ba gang yin pa'i shes rab kyi snang ba de dang ldan na// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs
364b6(mdo sde): pa dang shAd ltar byung ba'i sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa dang / g.yong rnams ma byed pa'i shes rab kyis snang ba de lta bu dang / rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo dag dang ldan
364b7(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa dang / thos nas kyang mos pa dang / mos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang / 'arang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang
365a1(mdo sde): gzhan dga'a'ang rgya cher rab tu spyod pa dang / tshul bzhin du so sor rtogs pa dang / de bzhin nyid du grub pa de dag ni byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa dang / sems can/
365a2(mdo sde): yongs su smin par bya ba don du gcer ba dang / snying rje na po'i gor bgos pa dang / byams pa chen po'i gor bgos pa dang / bdud dang phyir rgol ba btsab pa dang / byang chub kyi snying por
365a3(mdo sde): gzhol ba'i skyes dam par rig par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcod ldan 'das gang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos
365a4(mdo sde): nas mos pa dang // 'dzin pa dang / ba rang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang rgya rer rab tu ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'amag rigs kyi bu mo de bsod
365a5(mdo sde): nams ji snyed gcig skyed par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am// rigs kyi bu mo gang gis snga dro'i dus kyi tshe/ stong gsum gyi stong chen
365a6(mdo sde): po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che sna bdun gyis rab tu bkang ste/ rdzun tu zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang /
365a7(mdo sde): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bco pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la sbyin pa byin pa dang / de bzhin du ni ma'i gung dang / bye ma red kyi dus dang / nam gyir stod dang / nam gyi gung
365b1(mdo sde): thun dang 'angs song gsung gyi stong rin pob 'jig rten gyi 'anas thams cad rin por sna bdun gyis yongs su dkang ste/ de bzhin gshegs par tha bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
365b2(mdo sde): rgyas kyi bar la sbyin pa dang / rnam grangs 'di lta bus lo gcig gam// lo brgyabam// mi stong ngas/ lo brgya phrag song du sbyin pa byin na/ kun dga' bo ji snyam du sems// rigs kyi bu
365b3(mdo sde): kham rigs kyi bu mo deg ni de las bsod nams mang du skyed dam/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ste/ rad pa ma nges so// bde bar gshegs pa dpag
365b4(mdo sde): tu ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das gdugs gcig bsags pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de'ang tshad ma mchis na/ dgung lo brgya phrag stong du bsags pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal
365b5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod mos par bya'o// khyod kyis khong du chud par bya'o// byang rung don du gnyer ba dang / ros kyi 'khor lo bskor ba don du gcer
365b6(mdo sde): ba dang / sems can rab tu thar par bya ba don du gcer ba gang ros kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas mos sam/ 'dzin tam 'arang ngam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed na/ rigs kyi
365b7(mdo sde): bu 'am na rigs kyi bu mo byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa de las bsod nams kyi phung po mang du skyed na/ gang de bzhin nyid du sgrub pa lta smos kyang ci dgos// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo
366a1(mdo sde): gang dag ros kyi rnam zangs 'di las zan tshig bzhi pa'i rigs su bcad pa tsam 'dzin tam 'chang ngam/ klog pa'am kun rub par byed dam
366a2(mdo sde): gzhan dga' rang ston na// de ni sbyin pa zhes bya ste// des ni sbyin pa thams cad zil gyis gnon pa'o// 'di lta ste/ chos kyi sbyin pa 'don sbyin pa thams cad kyi mchog go/ 'ang
366a3(mdo sde): lngaste/ chos kyis pan 'dogs pa de ni phan 'dags pa rnams kyi mchog go/ 'di rta / ros kyi gding bden gding ba rnams kyi ba rog sa 'di lta ste/ chos yongs su
366a4(mdo sde): pa don yongs su 'dzin pa rnams kyi mchog go// de ci'i byer zhe na/ kun dga' bo chos kyi sbyin pa byin pas ni nyon mongs pa 'bri bar 'gyur ro// zang zing gi sbyin pa byin pas na
366a5(mdo sde): lus brtan byas par 'gyur ro// kun dga' bo de lta bas na byang chub sems dpabartson mongs pa 'bri bar byed par 'dod pas sangs rgyas kyi gnang ba chos kyi phyin pa sbyin par
366a6(mdo sde): byas te/ chos kyi sbyin pa des ni yon tan gyi khyad par thams cad thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi sbyin pa byin pa ni/ yon tan gyis phan yon yang dag phul sum
366a7(mdo sde): cu rtsa gnyis rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur ro/ sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhen/ 'di ltas/ dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / tho gros dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / rtogs pa dang ldan/
366b1(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba dang / 'dod rags rung bar 'gyur ba dang / gzhe sdang rung bar 'gyur ba dang / gti mug rung bar 'gyur ba dang / bdag dang gzhan gyi nyon mongs par ragacod par 'gyur/
366b2(mdo sde): ba dang / skye bo mang po dga' bar 'gyur ba dang / de'i bsngags pa lha rnams kyis rjod par 'gyur ba dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za rnams kyis srung bar 'gyur ba dang /
366b3(mdo sde): las byas nas bsod snyobs za bar 'gyur ba dang / chos gos dang / bsod snyoms dang / ma lar dang / na ba'i gsos sman dang / yo byad rnyed par 'gyur ba dang / grags pa dang
366b4(mdo sde): sma dang / tshigs su bcad pa phyogs bcur grags par 'gyur ba dang / mi ma yin pa rnams kyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis bsngags
366b5(mdo sde): par 'gyur ba dang / dam pa'i ros yongs su srung ba dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dam pa'i chos 'gyur ba dang / ngan song thams cad kyis 'jig par mi 'gyur zhing /
366b6(mdo sde): de la lha dang mir skye ba dka' bar mi 'gyur bdang / sangs rgyas mthong ba dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba dang / chos can pa dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba dang / dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa
366b7(mdo sde): dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba dang / skye ba dran par 'gyur ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par skye bar 'gyur ba dang / nam du'ang dbang po ma mtshang bar mi 'gyur ba dang
367a1(mdo sde): skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis thob par 'gyur ba dang / gzi brjid can gyi gzungs kyi sa bor sgrub par 'gyur bdud / spobs brgyan mi da pa'i//
367a2(mdo sde): rgyu rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / skye bo mkhas pas g.yog bya bar 'gyur ba dang / shes rab chen po'i chu rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / myur du chos kyi snang ba thob par 'gyur ba dang /
367a3(mdo sde): de'i sems la tshul bzhin ma yin pa yid la byed pa kun tu mi 'byung ba dang / 'jig rten gyi zang zing gi sbyin pa thams cad zil gyis mnan nas/ de chos kyi gter zad mi shes pa yongs su
367a4(mdo sde): 'dzin par 'gyur ba ste// kur dga' bo byung chung sems dpa'i chos kyi spyor pa sbyid pade/ yon tan gyi khyad par yang dag dul sum cu rngu gnyis po 'di dag thog par 'gyur ro// de nas bcod
367a5(mdo sde): ldan pa das la// lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos kyi rnam zangs 'di bzung lags te/ bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya
367a6(mdo sde): ngan las 'das pa'i slad na/ sems can snod du gyur pa de dag gi rna lam du bsgrag par bgyi/ mos par bgyi/ kun bsrung bar bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni yon
367a7(mdo sde): tan phun sum tshogs pa 'di dang / bsod nams yongs su 'dzin pa don du gnyer ba'i srang du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la legs so zhes bya ba byin te
367b1(mdo sde): ko 'u shi ka khyod dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i phyir/ nga'i mdun du seng ge'i sba bsgrags la legs so legs so// ko pra shi ka dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di sa 'dam pa'i chos sun rje srid gcig tu gan
367b2(mdo sde): pa de srid du lga dang lha ma yin g.yul 'gyed pa na// lha ma yin rnams ni pham par 'gyur/ lha rnams ni rgyal bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ko'u shi ka chos kyi rnam grangs 'don chos yang dag phul
367b3(mdo sde): yin te/ ko'u shi ka 'di lta ste/ ros thams cad mi dmigs pa de ni 'jigs pa med pa'i sbyin pa'o// ko'u shi ka gang cung zad 'jigs pa skye ba de dag thams cad ni 'jigs tshogs la lnga ba la
367b4(mdo sde): dmigs shing rab tu gnas pa las byung ngo // ko'u shi kag mid rigs pa de dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas 'di skad
367b5(mdo sde): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag bsam gtan gyi bde ba la gnas pa tshad ma mchis pa btang ste/ zong dang // grong khyer dang / grong rdal dang / ljongs dang / yul 'khor dang /
367b6(mdo sde): rgyal po'i pho zang 'khor gang dang gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu spyod pa de nga de dag tu bdag chos nyan pa'i srang du nye bar mchi bar bgyi'o// mchis nas kyang ros spa ba de dag chos dang ldan pas
367b7(mdo sde): bsrung ba dang sra ba dang bskyab par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhen/ bcom ldan 'das nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang
368a1(mdo sde): 'jig rten myong ba dang / 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rnams ni 'di las 'byung ba'i slad du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la ga rgyal po chen po bzhis
368a2(mdo sde): 'ad skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgyal po bzhi po bdag cag dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos chen po de dag dang / bdag cag gis ros kyi rnam grangs 'di ring du gnas
368a3(mdo sde): par bgyi ba'i slad du bsrung ba dang / snga ba dang pa skyab pa la brtson par bgyi'o// bdag cag gis 'khor gang dag sangs rgyas dang sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la ma dad pa de dag kyang
368a4(mdo sde): ce nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa bsrung ba'i slad du brtson par 'gyur bar dad par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang
368a5(mdo sde): dge bsnyen ma gang dag sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la brtson pa dang gzhan yang bcom ldan pa das kyi bstan pa la mngon par dad pa srung ba ma ma nges pa de dag bsrung ba'i ched du gas
368a6(mdo sde): sngags kyi rig 'di dag kha ton du bgyi'o// gsang sngags kyi tshig de dag gis gnod sbyin dang srin po dang / dri za dang / mi'am ci dang / lto phye chen po dang / grul bum la sogs
368a7(mdo sde): pa dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa lags pa dang gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa la zhe sdang bar bgyid pa rnam shin du rar gcod par 'gyur ro// tad+ya thA ga ta ra be a ra be
368b1(mdo sde): a na bi ga sa bre hu lu na padz+ra tsu mu ka hu lu hu lu A bad Te/ bkad rje/ pa ri tsA d+ha ni ka ni b+h+r-ik+Sha ti ka pre g+hA ta ni/ id Ti yid ci bde Ti bde Te/ ang tshe tha tsA ka sA ra na gra hran
368b2(mdo sde): sarba pa ra pra bA dan gra han/ sarba med r+ya pra sA nA nan ni grahAn sarba b+hu ta ni ma ha na bung dran par ne/ drAd+hA ma no yin ta shwa ya / bud rta na bud d+ha ba ra ni ta na ka tsa tra ra mahA rA dza na re de
368b3(mdo sde): ban+da na man tra ba lan/ a badz+rar prik+Sha nAn gre hA ya / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis// byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan la bka'
368b4(mdo sde): stsal pa/ skyes bu dam pa dag ngas bskal pa mtha' yas grangs med par yang dag par bsgrubs pa'i byang chub 'di ci na sa yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ba dang nub par mi 'gyur bar
368b5(mdo sde): bya ba'i phyir/ khyed gnyis kyi lag tu bzhag go// gtad do// de gnyis kyis gsol pa / bcom ldan 'das kyi bdag cag gnyis kyis bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das
368b6(mdo sde): pa'i wad na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bgyi'o// rgyas par babya'o// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ros smra ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bsrun pa'i rigs kyi bub pa ga rigs kyi bu mo
368b7(mdo sde): de dag gi lag tu mare bar bgyi'o// de dag mdo sde 'di la mos par bgyi ba dang / yongs su 'dzin par bgyi ba'i slad du de dag gi yid rab tu gzung bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das
369a1(mdo sde): srad ma'i ra srad na'i dus na// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang dag gi rna lam du thos pa dang / thos nas 'dzin pa dang / 'arang ba dang klog pa dang / kun
369a2(mdo sde): chub par bgyid pa dang ga pa rad pa de dag ni byang chub sems dpa'i byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan gyi byin gyi rlabs lags par rig par bgyi'o// de nas bdud
369a3(mdo sde): sdig can 'khor der 'dus par gyur nas 'dug pa de gdong las ma rim zag cing nga ro byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan pa das gang bcom ldan
369a4(mdo sde): 'das kyis nyan thos kyi theg pa las badzums te ros bstan pa de la ni bdag tha na spu zeng zhes bgyid pa tsam yang ma ma chis so// gang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' phyag/
369a5(mdo sde): rgya de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi byang chub kyi lam la 'jug pa sems can thams cad kyi ston pa'i chos kyi rnam zang
369a6(mdo sde): 'di gsung ba des bdag mya ngan gyi zug rngu dang ldan zhing bdag rnyis par gyur par snyam bgyid do// bcom ldan pa das bdag la phyag brkyang bstsal du gsol/ gang thos pas bdag mya ngan gyi
369a7(mdo sde): zug rngu dang ldan par 'gyur ba'i ros kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu'ang me gsung bar gsol bco ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa sdig can khyod dang ba thun pa'i sems can chos zab mo 'di
369b1(mdo sde): rta phul po mos pa ni mngag gang dag mos pa'i sems can de dag ni zung gis mya ngan ma byed/ smre sngags ma 'don cig/ sdig can khyod 'di ste ste/ dper nasa'i steng nas rdul grangs pa med
369b2(mdo sde): kye sems can ni chos kyi rnam grangs zang ro 'di lta bu la mos so// sa'i rdul ji snyed pade snyed kyi sems can chos kyi rnam grangs zang mo 'di la mi mos te/ de dag thams cad ni khyod dang
369b3(mdo sde): bathun no// sems can gyi khams dad med pa khyod dang 'ardzun gyis de bas na sdig can dga' bar gyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ sems can dpag tu med pa ni byang chub
369b4(mdo sde): la yang dag par zhugs// byang chub sems dpa' dgu khro cos snong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// sog rags brgyad khro bani stong ni chos rnams la chos kyi srog rdul pad
369b5(mdo sde): cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go// dge slong brgyad spong na nye bar len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
369b6(mdo sde): 'di'ang rnam pa drug tu g.yos nas snang ba rin pos 'jig rten khyab par gyur te/ lha'i me dog gi char ni rab tu phab/ sil snyan brgyad stong dag ni me dkrol bar rang grol lo// lha bye ba
369b7(mdo sde): khrag khrig brgya stong rnams ni steng gi bar snang las kye ma bdag cag gis 'dzam bu'i grong du chos kyi 'khor lo lan gnyis bskor ba 'di mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis gang yang
370a1(mdo sde): chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan te bshad nas// sems can gyi don mdzad pa gang lags pa bden grong khyer pA rA nA sir chos kyi 'khor lo bkor te/ sems can yongs
370a2(mdo sde): su smin par mdzad pa pa de bas ches ma rog go/ gang ros kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chung par bgyid pa dang / gzhan dag la rgya rer ston pa dang / ba na
370a3(mdo sde): glegs dmal bris te' rang ba'i sems can de dag kyang ros kyi 'khor lo skor bar 'gyur ro zhes ched du brjod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / byang chub sems
370a4(mdo sde): dpa' lha'i cod pan dang // tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 'di skad ces gsor to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci lags// 'di ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcod ldan 'das kyis
370a5(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag de'i phyir khyed kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'dri ba 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pas zhus pa pha rol du phyin pa rnam par nges pa bstan pa dang / dam pa'i chos rin po che'i
370a6(mdo sde): zhes bya bar zung zhig bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas// byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' lha'i cod pan dang / tshe dang ldan
370a7(mdo sde): pa kun dga' bo dang / wa dang / ri dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// palags pa mi 'amacho/
370b1(mdo sde): zung smra mas pa chug chen pa / du ba
370b2(mdo sde): 'di gang 'das par rgyal bdums cad/ bcomadun 'das mnan du song par rgyas sa kyi mi 'am pa med pa gyi gan sa ga dge song la gdag du
370b3(mdo sde): dang 'jig rten gyi khams pazhan dganas 'das pa'i byang chub mams dpa' song phra bar ba tu mang po dang / bdod pan spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i rtsa'i lu
370b4(mdo sde): gsan pa'i wa'i su rnams dang / klu'i rgyal po rgya mtshol sogs pa sanod rten gyi 'khor mang po rnams dang // rnamam pa' nga gi rgyal ma songs na la sogs pa dam sa ba lding gi
370b5(mdo sde): rnams dang / lha mayin gyi dbang po zag can la lags pa lnga ma yi gyi 'i bar mang po rnams dang / mings kyi'i rgyal ba ldan pa mi lags pa mi mtsho'i 'khor mang po rnam me
371a1(mdo sde): chen po'i dbang po lag bzangs la sogs pa lto 'byerachen po'i 'khor mang po rnams dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi 'khor dang bcas pa rnams dang / lha'i dbang po
371a2(mdo sde): byin lha'i bu stong phrag mang po'i 'khor dang bcas pa dang // mi mjed kyi bdag po rangs pa rangs ris kyi wa re bub bum phrag du ra'i 'khor dang bcas padung rgyal po gas pa rgyal 'khor stong
371a3(mdo sde): phrag du ma dang bcas pa dang / khyim bdag mgon med zas sbyin 'khor dang bcas pa dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te// de dag la sogs 'khor bzhi po rnams kyis yongs su bskor cing mdun
371a4(mdo sde): gyis bltas de ros ston to// de'i tshe na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te 'dug go// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang
371a5(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa rab rtsal sems kyang 'dus par gyur te 'dug go/ de nas lha'i bu rab rtsal sems kyis 'khor dal po re de 'dus par rig nas/ snga na
371a6(mdo sde): las langs te hwagos phrag pa gcig tu gadrar nas/ pus po g.yas pa'i ldangs pa btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gal ba de logs su thal po sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'dam
371a7(mdo sde): sad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la gzhan gyi rdzing mi 'jog pa rnams lags// ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'
371b1(mdo sde): nga ba na pa rnam pa thams cad pa 'grus pa rnam pa gas pa/ ra byang chub mas dpa sems dang la bsod na dag par 'a pa
371b2(mdo sde): ra byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma shes kyis rags pa ma mchis par spyod pa rnams pas/ ji sar byang chub lams dpa' sem pa dang 'dzin pa shes rab kyas chu pa
371b3(mdo sde): brnams lags/ ji mar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor rnams kyi nang du 'jigs pa dang thal ba rnabs lags/ ji mar rabyang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen bza bas po
371b4(mdo sde): larton pa rnams lags/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gyi tshul kyi sachos la rtson du rnams lags/ ji sngar na kyang chu sems dpa' sengs dang bachen po sa
371b5(mdo sde): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs pa bzhin du sgrub rnams lags ji ltar na byang chub sems dpab sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams la ros lnga parnams lags/ ji ltar
371b6(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa rnams kyis mngon par 'phags pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdud thams
371b7(mdo sde): cad kyis thul bar dka' ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bros gting dpag dka' ba rnams lags ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
372a1(mdo sde): dpa' rin po 'jig rten gyi ros brgyad kyis be gos pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gting dpag dka' zhing zab
372a2(mdo sde): mo la spyod pa rnams lags ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ros ston pas dbang po la mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpab sems dpa'
372a3(mdo sde): chen po 'dus ma byas dang ma 'dres pas rnam par thar pa'i sgor gnas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lhag pa'i nga rgyal can tshar gcad pa'i srad
372a4(mdo sde): du sdel zhir bsgrub pa la mkhas pa rnams lags ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po las kyi bgyi ba thams cad kyi rgyu la mkhas pa rnams lags ji ltar na
372a5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dang ba sems dpa' chen po lta ba'i rnam pa dang bral zhing rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
372a6(mdo sde): chen po sems can yongs su smin par bgyi ba dag la thabs la mkhas pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam pa yongs su dag pas brtul zhugs
372a7(mdo sde): grub pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'chen po zhe 'gras pa'i sems ma mchis shing bzod pa'i stobs dang ldan pa rnams lags ji ltar na
372b1(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu son pa rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams cad kyi
372b2(mdo sde): nye bar 'a ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten thams cad mngon par 'dre bar 'gyur ba rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
372b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po srog rags thams cad kyis bsngags par 'gyur ba rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i spyod pa thams cad la rdzas
372b4(mdo sde): pa ma ma nges pa rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab dag la rgya maro lta bu rnams lags/ ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
372b5(mdo sde): po chos la dbang sgyur bas dbang phyug tu gyur pa rnams lags// ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bgyi ba thams cad la slob dpon du gyur pa rnams lags// ji ltar na
372b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad du kha na ma thob ma mchis shing yon tan rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa rnams lags// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das
372b7(mdo sde): kyis/ lha'i bu rab rtsa sems la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab rtsal sems legs so legs so// lha'i bu khyod byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten thams cad
373a1(mdo sde): las mngon par 'phags pa 'jig rten gyi yongs su 'dzin pa/ snying rje rin po dang ldan pa / bskal bgrangs med pa nas gor bgos pa / brtson 'grus shin tu brtan pa/
373a2(mdo sde): ded dpon chen po sems can dpag tu med pa'i don byed pa// sems can dpag tu med pa thang bde ba la rab tu 'god pa la mkhas pa yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi don du de bzhin gshegs
373a3(mdo sde): pa la yongs su zhu ba ni yang khyod legs so// lha'i bu de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang / ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yon tan gyi khyad par de dag dang
373a4(mdo sde): gzhan dag kyang 'thob par 'gyur ba ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o// lha'i bu rab rtsal sems kyis bcom ldan 'das de ltar batshal lo zhes gsol to// bcom ldan 'das kyi lhar nyan pa dang
373a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ros bzhi dang ldan na// theg pa chen po la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa rnams
373a6(mdo sde): yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ thabs la mkhas pas mngon par bsgrub pa'i shes rab dang / snying rje chen pos mngon par bsgrubs pa'i byams pa dang / don dang chos kyis mngon
373a7(mdo sde): par bsgrubs pa'i spobs pa dang // byang chub kyi yan lag gi rnam par mngon par bsgrubs pa'i mngon par shes pa lnga po dag ste/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa ba chen po
373b1(mdo sde): chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ theg pa chen po la gzhan gyi ngo ma 'jog pa rnams yin no// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ thabs la babs pa mngon par sgrub par byed pa yi// mngon sum shes rab
373b2(mdo sde): rtogs par khong du rud gyur cing // thams cad bskyab phyir snying rje chen po yangs pa la// gnas pa'i byams pa mngon par sgrub par byed gyur la// don dang ros la shin tu mkhas par 'gyur
373b3(mdo sde): ba yi// so so yang dag rig la spobs pa tho gyur lo// byang chub lar la mngon shes dag gis rnam rtsen// des na gzhan gyi drang la 'jog par mi 'gyur ro// lha'i bu byang chub sems
373b4(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na// brtsam pa thams cad la brtson 'grus brtan pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe nu/ phyir mi ldog pa'i brtson 'grus dang / bsam pa
373b5(mdo sde): dag pa'i rtul ba dang / byang chub la 'dun pa drag po dang ldan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ros yongs su bsgrub pa la yid yongs su mi skyo ba dang ldan pa ste// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
373b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na/ brtsa pa thams cad la brtson 'grus brtan pa yin no// de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ brtson 'grus brtan zhing rab tu gnas pa med
373b7(mdo sde): gyur cing / bsam pa rnyog pa med cing yongs su dag gyur la// sangs rgyas ye shes don phyir 'dun pa drag ldan zhing // sangs rgyas ros rnams 'dod cing rtag tu yongs mi skyod
374a1(mdo sde): gang la chos bzhi rgya chen khyad par de yod pa// de ni byang chub sems 'byung brtsam pa brtan 'gyur zhing // byang chub yan lag lag mthil bzhag pa bzhin 'gyur/
374a2(mdo sde): la/ ring po mi thogs 'jig rten gsum gyi chos rgyal 'gyur// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ros bzhi dang ldan na// bsod nams dag gis dngon par 'phags
374a3(mdo sde): pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na// byang chub sems dpa' rnams shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la 'doms par byed pa dang / sems can gang dag byang chub tu sems ma skyed pa de dag byang
374a4(mdo sde): chub tu sems bskyed du 'jug pa dang / sprul pa lta bur dus gsum yongs su sngo ba dang // byang chub kyi sems ma bral bas dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad skyed pa mngon par 'du byed pa ste/ chos bzhi
374a5(mdo sde): po de dag dang ldan pa'o// de la 'di skad ces bya ste// mkhas pa gang dag shes rab pha rol phyin 'doms shing // byang chub zhugs pas byang chub sems 'dzin 'jug byed la// gang dag byang
374a6(mdo sde): chu bzhugs pas dus gsum yi rang zhing // yid dang ma thal sprul 'ang byang chub 'dod byed la// dge ba gang yin cung zad byed pa thams cad ni// thams cad mkhyen nyid sems la rten par
374a7(mdo sde): byed pa yin// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rin po chos bzhi dang ldan na// ye shes kyis rags pa med par spyod pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ shes pas byas
374b1(mdo sde): pa'i bya ba rnams byed cing nga rgyal gyis bya ba rnams mi byed pa dang / chos thams cad rkyen la rag las shing byin gyis rlob pa med la gang zag dang bral bar shes pa dang / stong pa nyid kyi spyod yul
374b2(mdo sde): du gyur cing // sems can thams cad mi gtong ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pa dang / chags pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das shing skye ba jug yongs su shes pa srung ba ste/ chos
374b3(mdo sde): bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ shes pas las byed de dgang rgyal yod chen zhing // brtan la mkhas pa yin zhing de dag lta med la// stong nyid spyod yul de dag sepas
374b4(mdo sde): can mi gtong zhing // rags pa kun las 'das shing byi nang gnas pa med// ros mchog bzhi po de la shin tu rab gnas pa// shes pas pha rol phyin ci chags med spyod pa yin// lha'i
374b5(mdo sde): bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ shes rab kyi dun dang bral ba rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ thos pas ngoms pa med cing tshul bzhin la rab tu sbyor ba dang /
374b6(mdo sde): zang zing med pa'i sems kyis ros ston pa dang / chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa shes par bya ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa thams cad la sgyu ma lta bur so sor rtog pa dang / tshul gcig la 'jug pas
374b7(mdo sde): tshul thams cad kyi 'jug pa la 'jug pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ de dag zos rol ngoms meng tshul bzhin rtog byed cing / de mnya ston cing klog 'dzin
375a1(mdo sde): rnyed pa rol ma byed// nyon mongs sprin 'ang sbra mthil lnga bur lnga// chos cing tha dang mi byed de dag dul gcig 'jugare bdag ros bzhi de stem khyad par thob
375a2(mdo sde): 'gyur zhing // shes rab smon 'das mun bsapa zla ltar 'jig rten d+ha// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ros ba'i dang ldanan/ 'khor rnams kyi nang du 'jigs pa dang
375a3(mdo sde): za rang rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ thos pa thams cad 'dzin pa'i gzungs thob pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi the tsom gcod pa'i spobs pa thob pa dang / sems can thams la bdag med
375a4(mdo sde): pa ston pa'i snying rje chen po dang / bdud dang nyon mongs pa dang bral ba mngon par shes pa'i ye gas kyi gor dgos pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste gathon tu chud
375a5(mdo sde): mi za bar 'gyur ba'i gzungs thob cing // de dag spobs ldan sems can som nyi gcod par byed// snying rjes chos 'di thams cad bdag med ston byed cing // mngon shes shes pa'i go/
375a6(mdo sde): bgos nyon mongs bdud mang nyams// byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po dag gis 'jug na// 'khor kun nang du song yang de la 'jigs pa med// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
375a7(mdo sde): chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na / zos pas don la rton pa rnams yin te/ bzhi ga pa zhen/ thos pa thams cad mi 'dzin pas thos pa dang mi ldan zhing sgrub pa nyams pa'i byis pa thams cad yongs
375b1(mdo sde): su song ba dang / yi ge dang gaspa dang / skad dang / tshig gi lam thams cad mngon du rnam par shes par bya ba'i phyir za gar dang mtshungs pa nyid khong du chud pa dang / don 'dod pa nyid kyi phyir thos pa
375b2(mdo sde): yongs su rol zhing dga' mgur bya ba'i phyir ma yin pa dang / brjod pa med pa'i don la 'jug cing brjod pa'i don la ma yin pa ste/ ches bani po de dag dang ngo // de la bdi skad ces bya ste/ ji tsam mang
375b3(mdo sde): du thos kyang don la ni rtog pas// byis pa thos dang mi ldan rtag tu sgrub chos nyams// srid gsum sgra skad dbyangs dang rig lam gang yod pa// zagar 'drar shes de las don ldan sla thos nas//
375b4(mdo sde): don 'di rtog cing dga' mgur nyes kun phyir mi 'jug/ chos nyid 'di ni don mchog yin te brjod du med// 'din don dang sgra skad zos par gyur pa las// 'gro ba rnams su 'gro bar byed
375b5(mdo sde): cing 'gro bar 'gyur// wa'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ 'jig rten gyi tshwa skyes ngos pa rton pa rnabs yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na// je
375b6(mdo sde): gtang byed pa rnams la chos ston pa dang / skye bo phal poche 'dus pa dag la 'chi ba rjes su dran pa dang / gtong bachen po dag la rjes su mi rang zhing byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba dang
375b7(mdo sde): 'du 'dzi thams cad las dben par gzhol ba ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces byaste/ gang na skye bo mang ngo'i dbus su son gyur pa// der ni ma khas
376a1(mdo sde): pas chos kyi gtam la 'jug par bya// skye bo mang po 'dus par gyur pa'i tshogs rnams la/ ba bar 'gyur ba'i 'du shes rab tu bsgom par bya/
376a2(mdo sde): de nas bag yod gzhan gyi gtong ba rnam lnga yi// gtong la yi rang byas nas byang chub bsngo bya zhing // gang tshe 'du 'ji dag dang phrad par gyur pa'i ro// der ni dben par gzhol
376a3(mdo sde): rab tu 'dod par bya// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ros bzhi dang ldan nasangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs pa bzhin du spang rnams
376a4(mdo sde): yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba dang / thos pa sgrub pa snying por byed pa dang / ji skad sbas pa de bzhin du byed pa dang / rang bzhin gyis bdag med pa la 'jug
376a5(mdo sde): pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ nyam nga gnod par gyur kyang byang chub sems mi gtong // de dag skyob pa'i chos thos sgrub pa snying por byed// bka' blo bde/
376a6(mdo sde): 'thun ji skad smras pa de bzhin byed// mkhas pa de dag chos kun rang bzhin bdag med 'jug/ de ltar brtson pa'i shes ldan sbas bzhin byed 'gyur zhing // rtag brtson mi 'dor rjes
376a7(mdo sde): 'thun bdag med ci yang med// rtag tu snyan pa'i 'phreng ba phyogs bcur grangs 'gyur zhing // de ltar chos sbed dag chos kyi shes pas 'phags// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
376b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sems can rnams la ros spyang rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bdag nyid sgrub pa la gnas shing sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang
376b2(mdo sde): bdag nyid du yangab dang bsrung ba dang / sgrol ba dang / brtul ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das shing sems can gzhan dag dul bar bya ba dang / bsung ba dang / dgrol ba dang
376b3(mdo sde): gdul ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir chos ston par byed pa dang / bdag nyid yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsam pa nges par gyur cing // sems can rnams kyang theg pa
376b4(mdo sde): chen po la rab tu bgod par byed pa dang / bdag nyid chos 'dod cing ros 'dod pas gzhan dag la'ang ston par byed pa ste// ros bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ sgrub
376b5(mdo sde): pa snying por byed cing 'gro la ros ston la// dul ba sungs legs btul shin tu mya ngan 'das nas kyang // gang dag ma dul ma bsrungs pa btul mya ngan las// ma 'das de dag
376b6(mdo sde): chos kyi dkon mchog 'byor par 'dzud// de dag byang chub sems dpa' bsapa pa nges gyur cing // theg pa de la 'gro ba rnams kyang bgod par byed// rtag tu chos 'dod don ldan
376b7(mdo sde): tha ma gus byed cing // sems can rnams la'ang de dang 'thun pa'i chos rnams ston// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ros bzhi dang ldan na// mngon
377a1(mdo sde): par shes pa rnams kyis mngon par 'phags pa rnams yin te bzhi gang zhe na pa yang dang yang du tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhis gnas pa dang / rtag par rnar
377a2(mdo sde): du rab tu dben par gnas pa dang / ros zab ro la bzod pa dang / lus dang sems marnam pa nyid du shes pa ste/ ros bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de ya' de skad ces bya steg tshangs pa'i
377a3(mdo sde): gnas pa dag la rtag tu rab gnas shing // dben par gnas pa la yang dga' ba skyed byed la// shes pas zab ro'i bzod la nges pa thob gyur cing // mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sems
377a4(mdo sde): dang ldan par gyur pa ste// de ltar mngon par brtson pa'i 'jigs pa med pa rnams// mngon shes lnga po dag gis mngon par baphags gyur cing // de dag sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar 'dug/
377a5(mdo sde): 'dral// sems can mang po rnams kyang yongs su smin byed 'gyur// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ bdud thams cad kyis thul bar dka' pa rnams
377a6(mdo sde): yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ stong pa nyid kyi rnam pas mngon par bsgrubs pa'i bsam gtan bzhi dang / sems can thams cad ri gtong ba'i snying rje chen po dang / dkon mchog gsum gyi
377a7(mdo sde): gdung mi gcod pa'i brtson 'grus dang // thabs la mkhas pas mngon par bsgrubs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug ste// chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ mtshan med
377b1(mdo sde): thong bas nges pa'i bsam gangan bani sgom zhing / sems can yongs su bskyab phyir rtag tu snying rje ldan// dkon mchog gsum rgyan mi gcod brtsor 'grus thong gyur cing // kun tu thabs ldan
377b2(mdo sde): pha rol phyin pa drug la 'jug/ de ltar spyod pa khas bro ldan re bdag yid gzhungs pa// de dag bdud bzhi dag pas yang dag 'gyur cing // bdud kyi lcags kyus zin pa'i 'gro ba dgon med
377b3(mdo sde): rnams/ mya ngan ba dang bar 'gro ba'i lab la 'god par byed// lha'i nga byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nges bzhi dang ldan na/ zos gting dpag dka' rnangs yin te/
377b4(mdo sde): bzhi gang zhe na gachos zab mo'i tshul la 'jug pa dang ga rtag tu don dang ldan zhing bsnyen par dka' ba dang / rtag tu yid byung zhing chos sems par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes sgrib pa med
377b5(mdo sde): pa la sems kyis nges par rtog par byed pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ zab pa'i chos kyi tshul la zhugs par gyur pa dang // rtag tu don dang ldan zhing bsnyen par
377b6(mdo sde): dka' 'gyur la// rtag tu yid byung chos la bsam pa zhugs gyur cing // sems kyis nges par rtog par byed pa gang yin pa'i// mkhas pa theg pa de la brtan par rab gnas pa
377b7(mdo sde): bro rnams dag gis gting dpag dkab par rab 'gyur zhe// chags pa med pa'i ye shes yang dag srub byed pa// de phyir zo rnams dag gis gting dpag dka' ba yin// lha'i bu byang chub sems
378a1(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos pa'i dang ldan na// 'jig rten gyi ros brgyad kyis migos pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhen// rnyed pa dang / sba pa dang / brjod pa dang /
378a2(mdo sde): bde bar khengs pa med pa dang / ma rnyed pa dang / ma snyan pa dang / smad pa dang / sdug bsngal gyis zhur ba med pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir// phung po rnams la yongs su spyod par
378a3(mdo sde): byed pa dang phung po yongs su shes pa srung zhing dben par lta ba ste// chos pon po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste// rnyed dang snyan dang bstod dang bde bkur thod kyang // de dag la ni nams kyang
378a4(mdo sde): khengs par 'gyur ba med// marnyed mi snyan spang dang sdug bsngam tho 'gyur kyang // de dag pad+ma bzhin du rag med 'jig rten spyod// sems can smin pa'i bye byer phung po yongs spyod cing // rung
378a5(mdo sde): po rgyu ma gsog brda yang brlar shes pa// sems can phan bde'i don du 'jig rten spyod byed kyang // 'jig rten chos kyis mgos tshul khrims thos dang ldan// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
378a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ gting dpag dka' zhing zab mo la spyod pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ bdag la bdag med pa dang / sems can la sems can med pa dang
378a7(mdo sde): chos dben pa dang / shes pa rags pa med pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ bdag la bdag med nyid du yongs su shes gyur cing // sems can sems can
378b1(mdo sde): med par rjes su rtogs gyur la// chos rnams dben pa nyid du yongs su rdzogs gyur cing // ma da'al lag bzhin shes pa chags pa yod min pa'i// dpa' rnams zab mo dag la yongs
378b2(mdo sde): su spyong byed pa// spyod pa med la rtag tu spyod par byed gyur cing // 'dzin dang kun 'dzin kun dang rnams bral bas// sems can dag pa de dag de phyir gting dpag dka'// lho'i bu
378b3(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ chos ston pas dbang po la mkhas pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ mngon par shes pa thob pa dang / so so
378b4(mdo sde): yang dag par rig pa shes pa dang shes rab rdo ba dang / sngon gyi smon lam rnam par dag pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ mngon par shes pa
378b5(mdo sde): rnams ni rab tu thong gyur cing // shes pas so so yang dag rig pa mi zed 'gyur// rtag tu shes rab rnon por gyur cing sngon yang ni// yang dag bsags pa yongs su dag pa thob gyur
378b6(mdo sde): pa/ sems can rnams kyi dbang po yongs su shes byas nas// de dang 'dra ba'i chos rnams yongs su ston par byed// de dag bstan pa 'bras bu med pa ma yin te/ de'i phyir mya ngan
378b7(mdo sde): 'das nas mya ngan 'da' bar byed// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ 'dus ma byas dang ma 'dzes pas rnam par thar ngab skor zhugs pa rnams
379a1(mdo sde): yin teg bzhi gang zhe na stong pa nyid spyod yul du gyur cing lta ba'i 'aring bas bcings pa'i sems can rnams thar par byed pa dang / mtshan ma med pa la gnas shing
379a2(mdo sde): rnam par rtog pa spyod pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las bda' bar byed pa dang / ston pa med pa la gnas shing sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir bsams bzhin du skye ba len pa dang / thabs la
379a3(mdo sde): mkhas shing shes rab kyis nges par byung ba ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ stong nyid spyod yul de dag lhas bcings grol byed cing // mtshan med ga nas shing
379a4(mdo sde): sems can 'ded dag yongs smin byed// ston pa med pa gnas shing sems can spen bya'i phyir// bsams bzhin skye zhing gang du 'dod pa der skye 'gyur// shes rab thabs kyis nges byung rnamathar
379a5(mdo sde): skor gnas kyang // 'dus pa byas pa'i dbyangs ni dus min thob mi byed// lnga'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ros bzhi dang ldan na// lhag pa 'ing rgyal can tshar gcad pa'i phyir
379a6(mdo sde): sdelazhir bsgrub pa la mkhas pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na// chos kyi dbyings kun nas sgo yang dag par shes pa dang / chos thams cad sgrib pa med par mos pa dang / kun tu rtog pa'i rtsa
379a7(mdo sde): pa las byung ba'i nyon mongs pa rnams yongs su shes pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i rang bzhin can gyis ros thams cad la nem nur med pa ste ga chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad
379b1(mdo sde): ces bya ste/ sems mnyam chos kyi dbyings su nges par byung gyur cing // de dag rnams kyi sgrib pa bga' yang mthong mi 'gyur// nyon mongs kun tu rtog pa'i rtsa las rang byung bar// shes nas de
379b2(mdo sde): las sdel zhir kun tu ston mi byed// chos 'di thams cad rang bzhin mya ngan 'das pa dang // skyes ra 'gag song bo nyid kyis dag pa yin// de dag kun mkhyen yongs btsal mya ngan 'das
379b3(mdo sde): gyur nas// lhag pa'i nga rgyal can dag tshar gcod byed pa yin// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ las kyi bya ba thams cad kyi rgyu la mkhas pa rnams
379b4(mdo sde): yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ longs spyod chen po'i rgyu sbyin pa mi spong ba dang // mtho ris su skye ba'i rgyu tshul khrims mi thong ba dang / shes rab chen po'i rgyu thos pa mi spong ba dang / bral ba'i
379b5(mdo sde): rgyu sgom pa mi spong ba ste/ ros bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ longs spyod che rgyu sbyin pa mi thong de'i 'dras te// mtho ris skye ba'i tshul khrims thob cing de'i 'bras te
379b6(mdo sde): shes rab nyon mongs 'joms rgyu thos pa de'i 'azas te// rnam grol reg rgyu sgom par byed cing de'i 'bras te// rgyu bzhi de la rtag brtson mkhas pa de dag ni// byang chub snying por dbang bskur
379b7(mdo sde): 'bras phyir nyide mtshan spyod// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ lta ba'i rnam pa dang bral zhing rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa rnams yin te
380a1(mdo sde): bzhi gang zhe na/ chad par smra ba yin pa dang / rtag par sba ba ma yin pa dang / ma rig pa byung na rga sho'i bar du 'byung bar lta zhing bdag tu lta bar yang mi byed pa
380a2(mdo sde): dang nya ma rig pa 'gags na rga shi'i bar du 'gags par lta zhing srid pa 'gags par yang mi byed pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ nam yang rtag par ma lta
380a3(mdo sde): rad par ltung mi byed// des ni chos rnams rkyen byung byed pa po dang ni// tshor ba po med rang bzhin rnam par dag par shes// ma rig rtsa nas rga shi'i bar du 'byung 'gyur ba// rgyal ba kun
380a4(mdo sde): gyis gsungs te de 'gag rgyu dang ni// rkyen zad de phyir phyin rang skye mi 'gyur zhes gsungs// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sems can yongs su
380a5(mdo sde): smin par bya ba'i thabs la mkhas pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la rag las par lta ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba yang dag par bsags pa la skyo
380a6(mdo sde): med pa dang / 'khor ba'i sgo nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo yongs su rol pa dang / sems can rnams kyi mos pa ji lta ba de lta bu'i mos pa'i thabs kyis nyams su myong bar byed cing //
380a7(mdo sde): mongs pa rnams kyis ma yin pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste// sangs rgyas byang chub 'di ni sems can rnams la rten// dge ba sogs shing 'dod pas yongs su
380b1(mdo sde): skyob med/ 'khor ba'i sgo nas byang ngan 'das pa yongs rol zhing // sems can ji bzhin mos pa thabs kyis yongs su shes// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ros
380b2(mdo sde): bzhi dang ldan na sems can thams cad kyi rtse bar ba ba rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ longs spyod mi zad pa dang / chos ston pa ma zad pa dang / mngon par shes pa thob dang sems
380b3(mdo sde): sa dang mnyam pa ste/ ros bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'de skad ces bya ste/ de dag rnams kyi longs spyod rtag tu mi zad cing // rtag tu ros kyis mi zad rgya mtsho 'dra ba yin// de dag mngon shes
380b4(mdo sde): lnga po mi zad rtag pa g.yo// rtag tu dran ldan bsam pas dang 'dra bzhin// mnyam med byang chub phyir ni yang dag zhugs gyur cing // mya ngan ma 'das gang la ngos rnams de yod pa// de dag
380b5(mdo sde): bgro ba kun gyi nye bar 'tsher 'gyur zhing // byang chub mchog phyir myur du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na// 'jig rten
380b6(mdo sde): thams cad mngon par 'du bar 'gyur ba rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhis gnas pa dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa dang / bden pa bzhi shes
380b7(mdo sde): pa dang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi thob pa ste/ ros bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ tshangs pa'i gnas pa bzhi po dag gis gnas byed cing //
381a1(mdo sde): brdzu ba'i dngos po dgar rtag tu dga' byed la// bden pa bzhi po dgal 'jigs med dpa' ro rnams// 'gro nga sar ro byas shing mchod pa byas par 'brur/
381a2(mdo sde): so so yang dag rig pa'i pha rol son gyur cing // 'ched dang klog pa dag la rtag tu brtson gyur la// pha rol bde bar gyur pa'i bde bas mgu byed na// de phyir de dag srid du 'ong zhing sdug
381a3(mdo sde): par 'gyur// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang ldan na/ thog rags thams cad kyis bsngags par 'gyur ba rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ zas
381a4(mdo sde): pa dang / tshul khrims dang ldan zhing tshul 'chos pa med pa dang / des shing 'grogs na bde ba dang / dben pa la dga' zhing dbang po bsungs pa dang / bdag nyid bde ba la lhag par chags
381a5(mdo sde): pa med cing rtag tu kha na ma tho ba la lta ba ste// chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ thos pa'i yon tan thob cing tshul khrims pha rol son// tshul 'aros med cing rtag
381a6(mdo sde): tu des la brtul zhugs bzang // nags dang nags 'dab gnas shing dbang po sdo byed la// dran ldan bdag bde mi ltos pa na mtho lta// gang la rtag tu dge ba'i yon tan de yod
381a7(mdo sde): pa// de dag rtag tu sems can phan phyir brtson 'gyur zhing // de dag sems can don yang rtag tu byed 'gyur la// de dag rtag tu byang chub phyir yang yid gzhol 'gyur// lha'i bu byang chub
381b1(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpab ren po chos pani dang ldan na// dge ba'i spyod pa thams cad la sbas pa med pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhen pa dang pa phun sum tshogs pa dang / brtson bkrus
381b2(mdo sde): phun sum tshogs pa dang / snying rje chen po phun sum tshogs pa dang / theg pa chen por yongs su sngob la mkhas pa rnams te/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/
381b3(mdo sde): de dag dang dang ldan la rtul ba brtan zhing // de dag brtson 'grus mthu dang stobs dang ldan pa yin// 'gro ba kun la byams dang snying rje che ldan zhing / byang chub reng du yongs su sngob
381b4(mdo sde): mkhas pa rtse// daphyir dge ba kun la sbas pa yod min zhing // thu ban pa'i zlab pa'i'al skar pa yi/ tshogs kyi dbus na gnas pa rnam par mdzes pad+mar/ sang dang mang du
381b5(mdo sde): dge ba kun la rnam 'phel 'gyur// sa bes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa tshol pa 'i dang ldan na shes rabadag la rgya mchos bu rnams yin te bani gang sen
381b6(mdo sde): ji skad smras pa de bzhin du byed pa dang / grub pa snying por byed pa dang / tho rab tu gnas pa dang / lhag pa'i ngasam pa rdo rje ltar brtan pa ste/ ngos bzo po de dag dang ngo // de la
381b7(mdo sde): 'di kar ches bya ste/ mkhas pa de dag dzi ga da sbas pade bzhin byed// de dag sgrub pa sdong por byed cing tho rab gnas// gang dag brtson pa de dag rdo rje sta du li// lhag pa'i
382a1(mdo sde): bsam pa brtan pa dag dang ldan par 'gyur// ma bas pa gang dag chos bzhi de dag stor byed pa/ de dag rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen ston byed cing /
382a2(mdo sde): dam bcas rnams la snying por byed par 'gyur ba dang // rtag tu sangs rgyas gsung yang 'dzin par byed pa yin/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos bzhi dang
382a3(mdo sde): rngan na ngos la dbang sbyar bas dbang phyug tu gyur pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhen pa/ ye shes kyi stobs can rnams yin zhing nyon mongs pa'i stobs can rnams ma yin pa dang
382a4(mdo sde): sems la dbang sgyur ba rnams yin zhing bdud kyi dbang sgyur ba rnams pa yin pa dang gzungs dang spobs pa phran tshogs pa rnams yin pa dang / 'bras bu yod par chos ston pa rnams
