382a5(mdo sde): yin te/ ros bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ de dag ye shes stobs ldan nyon mongs dbang mi 'gro// shes rab stobs kyis thun spangs lha rnams
382a6(mdo sde): kun dang bral// sems la dbang sgyur byed cing bdud bzhi spangs gyur la// spobs pa brtan par gyur cing gzungs kyis 'khrugs pa med// de dag ston pa 'bras bu
382a7(mdo sde): med par mi 'gyur te// de phyir myur du dbang phyug nyid dang ldan par 'gyur// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpab ren po ros bzhi dang ldan na/ bya ba thams cad la
382b1(mdo sde): dpon du gyur pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ nga rgyal med pa dang / tha ma la gus pa dang / bgayod pa dang / 'dun pa drug pa ste/ chos 'azhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces
382b2(mdo sde): nga rgyal med cing bla mgus pas gnas gyur la// kun nas bag yod byang chub mchog la bdun drag cing // bsam pa zag pas sbron cing rtag tu drang gyur la// slob dpon dper khyud med pa
382b3(mdo sde): rtag tu slob dpon 'gyur// mkhas pa 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa'i don mkhas shing // tshul dang tshul ma yin la mkhas pa'i brtan pa rnams// 'jig rten kun mdza' thams cad rtogs
382b4(mdo sde): par khong du rud// de phyir 'gro bas spyi bor thal sbyar de la 'dud// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ros bzhi dang ldan na/ thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing yon tan
382b5(mdo sde): rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa rnams yin te/ bzhi gang zhe na/ mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par rtse ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs pa'i spobs pa dang / dge
382b6(mdo sde): pa thams cad dang mi 'bral zhing bag chags dang bral ba dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad dang ldan zhing dbang bskur bathob pa ste/ chos bzhi po de dag dang ngo // de la 'di skad ces bya ste/
382b7(mdo sde): sems can dag pa rgya chen mngon shes pas rtse// bde gshegs kun gyis dgongs pa mkha' 'ja'i spobs dang ldan// brtson 'grus thogs med mi dge ngag rags kun spangs shing //
383a1(mdo sde): dge dang ldan zhing dbang bskur thob par gyur pa ste// ros rnams de dag la ni rab tu gnas gyur pa// de dag kha na ma tho med pa'i yon tan ldan// bcom ldan 'das
383a2(mdo sde): kyis bzhi pa sgrub pa 'di bstan pa na lha dang mi rnams las srog chags sa yanyis 'bum gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// byang chub sems dpa' nyi khri
383a3(mdo sde): lnga stong gis ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// sgra dang mi rnams kyi skye dgu las srog rags 'bum ni chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go// stong gsum
383a4(mdo sde): gyi snong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'ang rnam pa drug rab tu g.yos shing / 'jig rten thams cad sdang ba rin pos khyab par yang gyur to// lha rnams kyis kyang lha'i me tog girar rab tu dbacing
383a5(mdo sde): lha'i sil snyan dag gi sgra yang phyung bar gyur to// klu rnams kyis kyang mu tig dmar po dang klu'i me tog gi char rab tu phab bo// lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang lto ba phye
383a6(mdo sde): chen po dang gnod sbyin rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la lha'i mchod pa dag gis b.rod pa byas so// thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams kyis kyang al la ros al la chos/
383a7(mdo sde): a la la ros zhes lan gsum ched du brjod pa ched du brjod nas mchod pa chen po dag kyang byas so// de nas b+ha'i bu rab rtsab sems kyis 'jam dpal gzhon
383b1(mdo sde): nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces sbas so// 'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das kyis chos sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag gi don dang / rig gis rnam par gtan la dbab pa bstan pa de bkar stsal gyis
383b2(mdo sde): 'jam dpal khyod kyang ros sum cu rtsa gnyis po de dag gi don dang tshig rnam par gtan la dbab pa de la spobs par gyis shig/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
383b3(mdo sde): chen po theg pa chen po la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa rnams yin// bajam dpal gyis smras pa lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems gzhan gyi rkyen
383b4(mdo sde): gyis mi 'gro ba de ldan lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'dzem dpal
383b5(mdo sde): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtsams pa thams cad la brtson 'grus brtan pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub
383b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ror mongs pa thams cad nges par 'job par byed pa de ldan lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtsam pa thams cad la brtson
383b7(mdo sde): 'grus brtan pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus spras pa/ bajam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod nams dag gis mngon par 'phags pa rnams yin/
384a1(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi ro byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos kyi dbyings mi g.yo ba rjes su rtogs pa de ldan ka lnga'i bu byang chub
384a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod nams dag gis mngon par 'phags pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus spras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpab sems dpa' chen po ye shes
384a3(mdo sde): kyis rags pa med par spyod pa rnams yin/ 'jad dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yul thams cad la rags par mi byed pa de ltar na
384a4(mdo sde): lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes kyis rags pa med par spyod pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
384a5(mdo sde): chen po shes rab kyis mun pa dang bral ba rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rin po rnams chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis
384a6(mdo sde): yongs su dag par shes par byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyis mun pa dang bral ba rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ badz+rad
384a7(mdo sde): dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rin po 'khor rnams kyi nang du 'jigs pa dang bral ba rnams yin// bajam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems//
384b1(mdo sde): dpa' rin po rnams chos thams cad rnam par phye na mi rnyed par byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor rnams kyi nang du 'jigs pa dang bral ba rnams yin no//
384b2(mdo sde): lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dngapa la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thos pas don la rton pa rnams yin / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa ga lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems
384b3(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad brjod du med par shes par byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thos pas don la rton pa rnams yin/
384b4(mdo sde): lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gyi tshul gyis chos la rton pa rnams yin / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa galha'i bu gang
384b5(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos kyi dbyings zhi ba nyid du shes par byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gyi tshul gyis
384b6(mdo sde): la rton pa rnams yin no// lha'i lus smras pa// 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs pa bzhin du smra ba
384b7(mdo sde): rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa// lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sgra thams cad la rten par mi byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems
385a1(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs pa bzhin spa rnams yin no// lba'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dngar ji ltar na byang chub/
385a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams la chos spa ba rnams yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams smra ba
385a3(mdo sde): thams cad las ldog par byed pa de ldan/ wa'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams la chos sgrub rnams yin no// lnga'i dus sbas pa/ 'jar dang la ji ltar na
385a4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa rnams kyis mngon par 'phags pa rnams yin// 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpab sems dpa'
385a5(mdo sde): chen po rnams chos thams cad las g.yo bar mi byed pa de ldan lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes rnams kyis mngon par 'phags pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus/
385a6(mdo sde): sbas pa ka 'jab dpa la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdud thams cad kyis thul bar dka' ba rnams yin/ 'jab dpal gyis spras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems
385a7(mdo sde): dngab sems dpa' chen po rnams stong pa nyid rjes su rtogs par bya ba'i phyir gcon mongs pa nyid byang chub yin par yongs su tshol bar byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
385b1(mdo sde): chen po bdud thams cad kyis thul bar dka' ba rnams yin no// lba'i bus smras pa 'jang dngapa la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bros gting dpag dka' ba rnams yin
385b2(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis spras pa lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi gting rtogs par byed pa de ldan// lngab bu byang chub sems dpa'
385b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po thos gting dpag dka' ba rnams yin no// lha'i bus sbas pa / 'jam dang la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gyi ros brgyad kyis bgos pa rnams
385b4(mdo sde): yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa lha'i bu gang gi ro byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'jig rten na spyod kyang 'jig rten gyi ros rnams kyis gos par mi 'gyur ba de lta na
385b5(mdo sde): lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten gyi ros brgyad kyis mi gos pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
385b6(mdo sde): dpa' rin po gting dpag dka' zhing zab rol spyod pa rnams yin pa'ajam dpal gyis sbas pa lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bdag la bdag med
385b7(mdo sde): pas sgyid lug par mi 'gyur ba de lta na// lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gting dpag dka' zhing zab mo la spyod pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa
386a1(mdo sde): bya bya/ 'ja dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos ston pas dbang po la mkhas pa rnams yin 'jam dpar gyis sdus pa lha'i bu gang
386a2(mdo sde): gi re byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rjes sa dbang po drug gis dbang po thams cad la lta bar byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ros ston pas dbang
386a3(mdo sde): po la mkhas pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dus ma byas dang ma 'dres pas rnam par thar pa'i sgor gnas pa
386a4(mdo sde): rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sgo thams cad nas thar pa ston par byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
386a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' chen po bdus ma byas dang ra 'dres pas rnam par thar pa'i sgor gnas pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus sbas pa/ 'jam dang la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
386a6(mdo sde): chen po lhag pa'i nga rgyal can tshar gcad pa'i phyir snrel zhir bsgrub pa la mkhas pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
386a7(mdo sde): po rnams 'khor ba las mya ngan las 'das pa rol zhing lta bar byed la mya ngan las 'das pa las kyang 'khor ba rol zhing lta bar byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
386b1(mdo sde): dnga' chen po lag pa'i nga rgyal can tshar gcad pa'i phyir sdel zhing bsgrub pa la ma khasang rnams yin no// wa'i bus smras pa / 'jab dang la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
386b2(mdo sde): chen po las kyi bya ba thams cad kyis rgyu la mkhas pa rnams yin// 'jab dpal gyis smras pa lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ros thams cad mi 'pho
386b3(mdo sde): par lta bar byed pa de ldan/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rin po las kyis bya ba thams cad kyi rgyul mkhas pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus spras pa/ 'jam dpal ji
386b4(mdo sde): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lta ba'i rnam pa dang bral zhing / rten cing 'brel par ra'abyung ba la bakhas pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpar gyis sbas pa/ lha'i bu
386b5(mdo sde): gang gi ro byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos thams cad bdag po med par shes par byed pa de lta na lnga'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lta ba'i
386b6(mdo sde): rnams dang bral zhing rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mkhas pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar ra byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rin po sems
386b7(mdo sde): can yongs su smin par bya ba dag la thabs la mkhas pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'jig rten gyi
387a1(mdo sde): tshul la sprod par mi byed pa de ltan lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dag pa thabs la mkhas pa rnams yin no//
387a2(mdo sde): lnga'i bus sbas pa 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rin po bsam pa yongs su dag pas brtul zhugs grub pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa
387a3(mdo sde): lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rin po rtogs pa nyid byang chub yin par shes par byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam pa yongs
387a4(mdo sde): su dag pas brdug zhugs grub pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus spras pa 'jab dpal ji ltar na byang chub byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhe bzas pa'i sems
387a5(mdo sde): med cing / bzod pa'i stobs dang ldan pa rnams yin/ 'jar dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa chen po rnams chos thams cad gtan du
387a6(mdo sde): yongs su mya ngan las 'das par shes par byed// lta bar byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhe 'gras pa'i sems med cing bzod pa'i stobs dang ldan
387a7(mdo sde): pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu son pa rnams yin/ 'jam
387b1(mdo sde): dpal gyis sbas pa lha'i bu gang gi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpab chen po rnams chos thams cad pha rol las mthong bar byed pa de ltan lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
387b2(mdo sde): chen po pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu son pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dang ba chen po sems can thams cad
387b3(mdo sde): kyi rtse bar 'tsho ba rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa lha'i bu gang gi ro byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos kyi dbyings mi zad pa rab tu rtogs par byed
387b4(mdo sde): bde ldan lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams kyi nye bar 'jo ba rnams yin no// wa'i bus sbas pa 'jab dpa la ji ltar na byang chub sems
387b5(mdo sde): dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten thams cad mngon par 'du bar 'gyur ba rnams yin 'jam dpal gyis smras pa lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa 'a ren
387b6(mdo sde): po rnams mi snang ba'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na snang ba de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten thams cad mngon par 'du bar 'gyur ba
387b7(mdo sde): rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po srog chags thams cad kyis bsngags par 'gyur ba rnams yin
388a1(mdo sde): 'jab dpal gyis smras pa lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos 'ga' yang len par mi byed spong bar mi byed pa de lta na
388a2(mdo sde): lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po srog rags thams cad kyis bsngags par 'gyur ba rnams yin no// lha'i bus spras pa 'jam dpa' ji ltar na byang chub
388a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i spyod pa thams cad la sbas pa med pa rnams yin 'jam dpal gyis smras pa lha'i bu gang gi ro byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
388a4(mdo sde): chen po rnams chos thams cad la nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa 'dra bar shes par byed pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i spyod pa thams cad la sbas
388a5(mdo sde): pa med pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa 'jam dang la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab dag la snying por gyur pa rnams yin/ 'jam dang la
388a6(mdo sde): gyis smras pa lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos kyi dbyings kun tu 'byed pa mi 'byed pa de ldan lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
388a7(mdo sde): chen po shes rab dag la snying por gyur pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ro sa la dbang sgyur ba sa dbang byug
388b1(mdo sde): tu gyur pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis spras pa / lha'i bu gang gi ro byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bsam du med pa sems pas sems thams cad shes par byed pa
388b2(mdo sde): de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos la dbang sgyur bas dbang phyug tu gyur pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus sbas pa 'jam dpa la ji ltar na byang chub
388b3(mdo sde): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bya ba thams cad la slob dpon du gyur pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
388b4(mdo sde): rnams tshul gcig gis tshul thams cad shes par byed cing tshul thams cad kyis kyang tshul gcig shes par byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bya ba
388b5(mdo sde): thams cad la slob dpon du gyur pa rnams yin no// lha'i bus smras pa 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing
388b6(mdo sde): yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa rnams yin/ 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ros thams cad gachen po med par
388b7(mdo sde): rtogs na sa ros 'ag pa yang sgrub par mi byed// ros 'ga' yang sel bar mi byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dang ba chen po thams cad du kha na ma tho ba med cing

389a5(mdo sde): pa mchod pa'ang thob par gyur cig ces rnams/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'jam pa gzhon nur gyur pas 'jam dpal khyod kyis chos rnam pa ku na sa 'ang pa bdun pa nga
389a6(mdo sde): legs par sbas te/ logs sa zhes legs so zhes bya ba phyir no// / bam po gnyis pa/ de nas rgya 'i bu baphrul mas
389b1(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur par 'di sad ces sbas so// 'jam dpal ci khyod kho bo las ros kyi dgang pa 'dod dam 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ lnga'i bu 'di skad du/ khyod ros kyi dgab pa
389b2(mdo sde): 'dod dam nas zer ba ni lha'i bu legs par gsungs pa'i ros 'dul ba 'di la ros kyi dgab pa zhes bya ba 'di ni sred pa dang 'dod pa spangs pa yin te ga chos 'di ni so sor rtogs pa med pa'i
389b3(mdo sde): phyir 'dod pa med pa yin no// ros 'di ni mig gi lam las yang dag par 'das pa'i phyir bltar mi snang ba yin no// chos 'di ni mngon par grub pa med pa'i phyir ma byas pa yin no//
389b4(mdo sde): chos 'don yul drug dang ma 'dres pa'i phyir mi mthong ba yin no// ros 'di ni sems dang yid dang rnam par shes pa dang bral ba'i phyir bdag gi ba med pa yin no// chos 'don
389b5(mdo sde): gtan yongs su ma grub pa phyir gzung ba med pa yin no// chos 'di ni yul med pa'i yul du 'gro ba'i phyir gzhi med pa yin no// chos 'di ni rang bzhin gyis dben pa'i phyir zag pa
389b6(mdo sde): med pa yin no// chos 'di ni sngon gyi mtha' rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'ong ba med pa yin no// chos 'di ni phyi ma'i mtha' rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'gro ba med pa yin no// chos 'do na da
389b7(mdo sde): ltar byung ba rnam par dag pa'i phyir gnas pa med pa yin no// chos 'di ni brtag cing sel ba'ang bral ba'i phyir rtsol ba med pa yin no// ros 'don nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i phyir mnyam pa
390a1(mdo sde): med du ma // chos 'don brten po med pa'i phyir mimarnam pa dang mnyanam payin no// chos 'don bdud kyi sum thams cad las kyang dag par 'dus pa
390a2(mdo sde): gas ba med pa dang / rdzob sems med pa dang / mya 'jugs pa da / nang par ma btags bdung / rnam par ma bsgrubs padrung ga kun tu bstan pa med do// ras bdon ba dang
390a3(mdo sde): 'jig pa dang bral ba'i phyir zang ba med pa dang // dor bameng pa yinano// chos 'don chos kyi dbyings su mang dag par gsol ba'i phyir gnas med par gnas pa yin no// chos 'don yang
390a4(mdo sde): dag par ma byung ba'i phyir dbyer med pa yin no// chos 'di ni spros pa dang bral ba'i phyir rab tu spyod pa med pa yin no// ros 'don rang bzhin gyis nye bar zhi ba'i phyir spros pa dang drab pa
390a5(mdo sde): yin no// chos 'din rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir nye bar zhi ba yin no// chos 'dini pas kyi gos pa thams cad nges par bcom pa'i phyir rnam par rtog pa med pa yin no//
390a6(mdo sde): chos 'di ni 'dod pa'i 'dod chags kyi rdul dang thal ba phyir shin tu ba pags pa yin no// chos bdon stong pa nyid kyi phyir stong pa yin no// ros bdon nges par ma brtags pa'i d+har
390a7(mdo sde): mtshan ma med pa yin no// chos padi ni rnam par shes pa mi gnas pa'i phyir smon pa med pa yin no// chos 'don rtsa yongs su chad pa'i phyir mi gnas pa yin no// chos 'din grogs/
390b1(mdo sde): med pa'i phyir mi rten pa yin no// chos bdon marten pa'i phyir mi g.yo ba yin no// chos 'din gzod ma nas rnam par dag pa'i phyir bdag med pa yin no// ros padonani gang na mngon
390b2(mdo sde): par grub pa med pa'i phyir sems can med pa yin no// chos 'di ni gzod ma nas ma byung ba'i phyir rtag pa med pa yin no// chos 'di ni gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i phyir ma byung ba yin
390b3(mdo sde): ro// chos 'don mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i phyir ma skyes pa yin no// chos 'di ni mtshan nyid thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir mtshan nyid med pa yin no// ros 'di ni gzod pa nas yang
390b4(mdo sde): dag par rgyun rad pa'i phyir zhi ba yin no// chos 'di ni gzod pa nas che bar zhi ba'i phyir yang dag par rgyun chad pa med pa yin no// chos 'doni ma byed pa dang mi snang ba'i phyir nam
390b5(mdo sde): mkha'i mtshan nyid lta bu yin na/ lha'i bu ros de lta bu de la chos kyi dgab pa ji lta bu zhig yin/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal chos 'do'i dgab pa ni kun tu 'phro ba med pa
390b6(mdo sde): yin no// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu legs so legs so// ji skad sbas pa de bzhin te/ chos 'dib dgab pa ni gang la lus dang ngag dang / sems
390b7(mdo sde): kyis rdul ba med pa de lta bu yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos 'don gsal ba rnyog pa med pa yin pas de ni sems rnyog pa can gyis mchod par mi nus pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bus smras

391b2(mdo sde): spong ba'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// lus dang sems la rten pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// dbang po drug la rten pa'i dbang po lnga
391b3(mdo sde): sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// lta ba'i stobs dang ldan pa'i stobs lnga'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// chos su 'du shes pa la gnas pa'i byang chub kyi yan lag gi sems
391b4(mdo sde): ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// 'du byed yid la byed pa la brtson pa'i lam bsgom pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// sdug bsngal la yongs su rtog pa'i 'du shes can gyi
391b5(mdo sde): sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// kun 'byung ba la bsgom pa'i 'du shes can gyi sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin no// bgog pa zad par 'du shes pab sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin
391b6(mdo sde): no// lam bsgom pa la bsgom pa'i 'du shes pa'i sems ni sems rnyog pa can yin te/ lba'i bu ji tsam du rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa nyid la spro 'dogs par byed pa de tsam du sems rnyog pa can
391b7(mdo sde): yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal sems rnyog pa med pa dag gang yin// 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa/ lha'i bu gang dag gi sems nam mkha' dang mnyam pa dag go/ lha'i dus spras pa/
392a1(mdo sde): 'jam dang la nam mnga'al sems cung zad kyang yod dam/ 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa/ lba'i bu ji ltar nam mkha' la sems med pa bzhin du sems de'ang de dang badz+ra ste
392a2(mdo sde): gang gi sems de 'dra ba de ni sems nam mkha' dang mnyam pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa// 'jam dpa la gnas de la su zhig mos par 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu
392a3(mdo sde): lhag par byed pa la brtson pa rnams kyis mos par dka' ba yin no// zhwa'i bus sbas pa/ 'jam dpal lhag par byed pa mes bya ba de ji lta du yin ka 'jam dpal gyis smras pa
392a4(mdo sde): lha'i bu gang gi sems nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir lhag par byed pa'o// lha'i bus smras pa// 'jam dpal ci zhig lhag par byed pa yin/ baja ma dpal gyis smras pa
392a5(mdo sde): lha'i bu rtag par byed pa ni lhag par byed pa yin no// mi rtag par byed pa ni lkug par byed pa yin no// de bzhin du bde ba dang / sdug bsngal dang / sdug pa dang / mi sdug pa dang
392a6(mdo sde): bdag dang bdag med par byed pa ni lhag par byed pa yin no// stong pa zhes bya ba dang / gang zag ces bya ba de ni lhag par byed pa yin no// mtshan ma med pa zhes bya ba dang / smon pa med pa
392a7(mdo sde): zhes bya ba de ni lhag par byed pa yin no// sgyu ma dang / rmil pa dang / mig yor dang / gzugs brnyar dang / zagar dang / ru zla dang / theg rgyu dang / sprul pa'i dbenye bar dgod pa dag
392b1(mdo sde): gAs chos rnam par 'jog par byed/ mngon par byed/ 'jug par byed// ston par byed pa de ni ldog par byed pa yin no// ji tsar du ngos rnam par 'jog par byed pa de tsam du sdug par byed pa
392b2(mdo sde): yin te/ kun nas nyon mongs pa la sngon du byed pa dang / rnam par byang ba la skyon med par byed pa de ni ldog par byed pa yin no// 'khor ba la skyon du lta bar byed pa dang / mya ngan las 'das
392b3(mdo sde): bal phan yon du lta bar byed pa de ni lhag par byed pa yin te/ lha'i bu de dag ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal can rnams kyi lhag par byed pa dag yin no// lha'i bus sbas pa/ 'jab dpal ji ltar na
392b4(mdo sde): lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gis nges par 'byung ba'i dbyings rtogs shing nyon mongs pa thams cad bgog pa bsgrubs te gnas kyang
392b5(mdo sde): 'gog pa 'gog par yang mi byed la// skye ba med pa skyed par yang mi byed cing / sgra thams cad kyis skrag par yang mi byed la/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin gang yin pa de nyid rnam par
392b6(mdo sde): byang ba'i rang bzhin yin pa de ltar shes shing ros thams cad la gnyis dang bral ba dang / brang ba med pa dang / dor ba med pa thob pa de ni lha'i bu lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yin no// 'jam
392b7(mdo sde): dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ lha'i bu'i khro nyis stong ros rnams la ros kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ dge slong lnga stong ni len pa med par
393a1(mdo sde): zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// byang chub sems dpa' tshe khri nis stong gis ni mi skye ba'i ros la bzod pa thob par gyur to// srog rags stong phrag
393a2(mdo sde): rab tu mang po dag gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// dge bsnyen stong yang ros rnams la ros kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/
393a3(mdo sde): khyim pa dang rab tu byung ba las bud med cis sdong yang chos rnams la ros kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang thal pa rnam par dag go/ de nas lha'i bu rab rtsal sems kyis nyan thos chen
393a4(mdo sde): po de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa dag khyed cag kyang the tsomatso mod padag bajab dpal gnon nur gyur pa la rjes shig/ de nas gnas brtan 'od srungs chen
393a5(mdo sde): pos 'jam dpal gnon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jab dpal dge slong rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan byed pa tso ni gal bsam gdan byed pa yin
393a6(mdo sde): bajam dpal gyis spras pa/ btsun pa 'od srungs chen po dge slong rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan byed pa ni rtsa ba med pa dang / mtha' med pa dang / gnas med pa
393a7(mdo sde): la bsam gtan byed pa dang / ri 'khrugs pa la bsam gtar byed pa dang / yang dag pa la ngasam gtan byed pa yin no// 'od srungs chen pos sbas pa// 'jam dpas kyil ma bsams/
393b1(mdo sde): tede kang swa/ 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa/ btsun pa 'od srungs rin po rtsa ba ni rang gi lus yin/ mtha' ni ngar 'dzin pa yin// gnas ni khams gsum yin// 'jugs pa ni
393b2(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa rnams yin// mi mnyam pa ni gnyis yin te/ de la des lus ni rtsa ba med par shes/ ngar 'dzin pa ni mtha' med par shes/ khams gsum ni gnas med par shes
393b3(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa rnams ni mi bakhrugs par shes/ bsam gtan rnams ni gnyis su med par shes pas na/ btsun pa 'od srungs chen po kho bos de las bsams nas dge slong rnam
393b4(mdo sde): par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan byed pa ni rtsa ba med pa dang / gnas med pa la bsam gtan byed pa dang / mi 'khrugs pa la bsam gtan byed pa dang / yang dag pa la bsam
393b5(mdo sde): gtan byed pa yin no zhes smras so// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chags pa med pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras
393b6(mdo sde): pa brdzun pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' gang rags pa thams cad la spyod par byed kyang / rags pa thams cad kyis gos par mi 'gyur zhing // nyor mongs pa thams cad la mngon sum
393b7(mdo sde): du byed kyang sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir nyon mongs pa de dag gi rang bzhin gang yin pa'i nyon mongs pa de dag kyang spong bar mi byed na/ de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' rags
394a1(mdo sde): pa med pa'i shes rab dang ldan pa yin no// mo 'u 'ga' gyi bu na pos sbas pa/ 'jam dpa ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rdzu 'phrul re ba yin// 'jam dpal gyis/
394a2(mdo sde): smras pa/ btsun pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po byang chub sems dpa' gang 'dus byas kyang mthob/ 'dus pa byas kyang mthob la/ slob pa dang mi slob pa rnams kyang 'dul bar byed na/ de tsam
394a3(mdo sde): gyis na byang chub sems dpa' rdzub phrul che ba yin no// rab 'byor gyis sbas pa// 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dang banyon mongs pa med par gnas pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis
394a4(mdo sde): smras pa/ btsun par rab 'byor gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad sgrib pa med par shes par byed la/ pha rol dang / tshu rol dang bral zhing byang chub kyi sgrib pa'ang mi spong la
394a5(mdo sde): ting nge 'dzin las kyang mi ldang zhing // bya ba thams cad kyang ston par byed na/ de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa yin no// byams ma'i bu gang pos smras pa
394a6(mdo sde): 'jam dang la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos smra ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa/ btsun pa gang po gang gi tshe byang chub sems dngapa 'a dbang po thams cad kyis spobs par byed
394a7(mdo sde): cing 'du byed thams cad mi rtag go zhes 'bras bu yod par chos ston par byed la/ bskal pa stong phrag rnams su don dang / rig dang / yi ge ston pa rnams kyis rgyas par ston par byed kyang
394b1(mdo sde): mthar sdug par mi 'gyur na// de tsab kyis na byang chub sems dang 'chos ston pa yin no// nam grus smras pa/ 'jam dang 'a ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa ba bsam gtan pa yin// 'jam/
394b2(mdo sde): dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa rnam gru gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis mnyam par gzhag pa nyid yin par shes par byed la/ sems rnam par g.yengs
394b3(mdo sde): pa rnams la snying rje chen po bsdad de/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug pa'i bar du spyod par byed kyang / bsam gtan la gnas pa las g.yo bar mi 'gyur// de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa'
394b4(mdo sde): bsam gtan pa yin no// nye bar 'khor gyis smras pa// 'jam dang la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'dul ba 'dzin pa yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa nye bar 'khor
394b5(mdo sde): gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos rnams gtan dul ba nyid du'ang shes par byed cing / ltung ba dang nyon mongs pa dang bral la// ltung ba dang nyon mongs pa gdul ba'i phyir chos ston par yang byed
394b6(mdo sde): cing ba de ltar nyon mongs pa rnams rtogs par yang byed la/ byang chub kyang tshol bar byed na// de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' 'dul ba 'dzin pa yin no// ma ngagags pas smras pa
394b7(mdo sde): 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lha'i mig dang ldan pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa ma 'gags pa gang gi ro byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu'i gzugs
395a1(mdo sde): snang ba thams cad kyang mthong bar byed la/ gzugs dben par mthong bas ros thams cad dben par mthong ba rjes su rtogs par byed na/ de tsar gyis na byung chub
395a2(mdo sde): sems dpa' lha'i mig dang ldan pa yin no// bku las spras pa/ 'jam dngal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dbang po bsrungs pa yin/ 'jar dpal gyis sbas pa/ gang gi ro byang
395a3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' yul thams cad sangs rgyas kyi yul yin par blta zhing / sangs rgyas kyi yul yang yul med par bltan// de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa'adabang po bsrungs pa yin no//
395a4(mdo sde): sor mo'i 'phreng bas sbas pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dbang po rno ba yin// 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa/ btsun pa sor mo'i 'phreng ba gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' byang chub
395a5(mdo sde): rang bzhin gyis pa skyes pa'i byer/ mtshams med pa dang mnyam par lta bar byed na/ de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' dbang po rno ba yin no// ka t+ya'i bu rin pos smras pa/ 'jam
395a6(mdo sde): dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mdo sde rnam par 'byed pa la mkhas pa yin/ 'jang dpal gyis spras pa/ btsun pa ka t+ya'i bu chen po gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' so so yang dag
395a7(mdo sde): par rig pa mi zad pa pa ni thob cing tshig gcig gis kyang bskal pa 'bum gyi bar du rgya cher rnam par 'byed cing ston la/ ci nas kyang kun nas nyon mongs pa spong bar ma byed pa dang
395b1(mdo sde): rnam par drang ba len par mi byed pa de ltar ston par byed pa dang / chos nyid gnas pa las kyang mi g.yol/ gnas thams cad labang mi rten pa de ltar ljon par byed na/ de tsab gyis
395b2(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dpa' mdo sde rnam par 'byed pa la mkhas pa yin no// gsus po che chen pos smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' so so yang dag par
395b3(mdo sde): rig pa thob pa yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa gsus po re gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' brjod du med pa'i don gyis don so so yang dag par rig pa ston pa dang
395b4(mdo sde): ros kyi dbyings gnas pa nyid kyis ros so so yang dag par rig pa ston pa dang / ming dang mtshan ma med pa nyid kyis nges pa'i reg so so yang dag par rig pa ston pa dang / zagar dang
395b5(mdo sde): mnyam pa nyid kyis spob pa so so yang dag par rig pa ston par byed na/ de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' so so yang dag par rig pa thob pa yin no// skrag can zin gyis smras pa
395b6(mdo sde): 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims dang ldan pa yin// 'jam dpal gyis smrasbas pa/ btsun pa sgrag can zin gang gi tshe byang chub sems dang ba tshul khrims dang /
395b7(mdo sde): brtul zhugs yang dag par blangs shing / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir tshul khrims 'aral pa'i 'gro ba gang yin par 'gro bar byed na// de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa'
396a1(mdo sde): rgyas sems dang ldan pa sa ku duga'adus smras / nga yang du na cung dubasas /
396a2(mdo sde): das pakun dkas thog pa byang chub sems dang pa sangs rdzas bams cad kyis gsungs pan par byed kyi thos pathams cad kyi na kyang rdzog par byed / ji mar pos dang 'dzin
396a3(mdo sde): par byed cing // ji ltar gzung ba bzhin ston par yang byed na/ de tsam gyis na byang rab sems dpa' mang du thos pa yin no// de nas ma'i bur ba thul sems kyis/ can thos chen po de dag
396a4(mdo sde): la bde skad ces ldas so// ro dang ldan pa dag khyed cag 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas pade skad bldan pa des su'i chos 'ga' dang ldan nas/ de dag gis sbas pa/ rbab du 'dag/
396a5(mdo sde): cag lani chos de dag las bge ba tsam yang med do// skra'i bus sbas pa ro dang ldan pa dag de ldan khyed cag can thos rin po mchog tu gyur pa ma yin par mi 'gyur ram badz+ra ro'i bus
396a6(mdo sde): spras pa ga lnga'i du 'di lta te/ dper na gnag rjes las brtenan rdzing du mchog yin pa de bzhin du can thos gzhan dag las brtan na kho bo cag kyang mchogayin no// 'di rje ste
396a7(mdo sde): dper na rgya mtsho rin po las brten na 'og gi ru'i phung po mchog yin pa de bzhin du ga can thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad la brten na/ byang chub sems dpa' mchog yin no//
396b1(mdo sde): lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yin no// byang chub sems dpa' ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa rnams kyis bstan pa yin te/ legs so legs so// 'jar dpal gyis smras pa/ lnga'i bu de de bzhin te//
396b2(mdo sde): na thos ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal med pa yin no// byang chub sems dpa' ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal can yin no// lha'i bus smras pa / 'jam dpal tse las bsams te de skad sba/ 'jar dpal gyis
396b3(mdo sde): smras pa ga lha'i bu 'di ltar nyan thos rnams ni rang sangs rgyas las brten na nga rgyal spangs pa yin gyi byang chub sems dpa' ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal can yin la/ nga rgyal des sangs rgyas
396b4(mdo sde): kyi ros rnams yang dag par sgrub par byed pas na de'i phyir byang chub dang 'a ni lhag pa'i nga rgyal can yin no// lha'i bu sa smras pa / 'jam dpal lhag pa'i nga rgyal can ni bdag la
396b5(mdo sde): stong par byed cing gzhan la sdod par byed pa yin na byang chub sems dpa' yang de lta bur mi 'gyur ram/ 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin te/ byang chub
396b6(mdo sde): sems dpa' ni bdag la stod par byed cing ga gzhan la smod par byed pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jamed pal ci las bsams te de skad spa/ 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa/
396b7(mdo sde): lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ni rnam grangs du mar theg pa chen po'i bsngags pa rjod par byed cing gnyan thos kyi theg pa'i bsngags pa ma yin pa rjod par byed pa dang // ji ltar sems
397a1(mdo sde): can rnams byang chub tu sems bskyed par 'gyur snyam nasaka/ bdag nyid kyi yon tan gyi ro brjod par byed cing 'di la dga' pa'i sems skyed par mi 'gyur bar bya'o/
397a2(mdo sde): snyam nas / theg pa dman pa la rnam par sdang bar byed pa yin pas// lha'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ni theg pa chen po la stod par byed pa dang / gnyan thos kyi theg pa la smod par byed pa
397a3(mdo sde): yin no// lha'i bus sbas pa/ 'jam dang la de lta na byang chub sems dpa' ltung ba dang bcas par mi 'gyur ramaka'ajam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gis nor bu mching bu'i bsngags
397a4(mdo sde): ba ma yin pa brjod cing // nor bu rin po re bai DUR+Ya'i bsngags pa brjod par gyur na/ de'ang ltung ba dang bcas par 'gyur ram ga lha'i bus smras pa ka 'jam dpa la de ni mi 'gyur ro// 'jam
397a5(mdo sde): dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' theg pa chen po'i bsngags brjod par byed cing / nyan thos kyi theg pa'i bsngags pa ma yin pa rjod par byed pabang phyung ba dang
397a6(mdo sde): bcas par mi 'gyur ro// kwa'i bu'adzi/ dper na gyes bu shin tu stobs dang ldan pa gang srog gis kho las sbyar ba'i rgyal ba'i bsngags pa 'arjod cing / khams kyi rgyam pa yin
397a7(mdo sde): ma yin na de spang ba'i 'os su 'gyur bamin snyam ma/ tshwa'-i bus sbas pa/ 'jam dpa lede lA ma yin no// 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'atheg pa chen po
397b1(mdo sde): marjod par byed cing gcan thos kyi theg pas spyod par byed pa'ang ldad pa'i khos su mi 'gyur ro// de nas bco ldan 'das kyis bajam dngal gnon dur gyur ngal legs sonas kyang gyur do//
397b2(mdo sde): 'jam dpal legs so legs so// khyod kyi reg de ni legs par sbas te/ 'jam dpal rjeg chen po'i bsngags pa brjod pas dri ni theg pa thams cad kyi bsngags brjod par 'gyur
397b3(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal theg pa thams cad ni de las nges par byung ba yin pa'i phyir ro// gzhan yang lha'i bu brtsal sems kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad
397b4(mdo sde): ces smras so// 'jam dang la byang chub sems dpa' gang las brten nas byang chub tu sems skyed par byed/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa lha'i bu byang chub sems dang 'a ni
397b5(mdo sde): sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa las brten nas byang chub tu sems skyed par byed do// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci'i phyir na byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams
397b6(mdo sde): cad kyi nyon mongs pa las brten nas byang chub tu sems skyed par byed// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gal te sems can rnams kyi nyon mongs pa dag byang chub kyi theg pa ma yin du
397b7(mdo sde): zin na ni byang chung sems dpa' yang byang chub tu sems bskyed nas go cha gyon par mi 'gyur ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub kyi sems ci zhig la rten/ 'jam dpal gyis
398a1(mdo sde): sbas pa/ wa'i su byang chub kyi sems ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad 'arten to// de ci'i phyir rben/ wa'i bu sangs rgyas mo chos thams cad ni byang chub
398a2(mdo sde): sems kyi rtsa ba las brten nas skye bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// rtswa'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dang la ros thams cad ci la rten/ 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa/ lha'i bu chos thams
398a3(mdo sde): cad ni rtsa ba med pa'i gnas la rten pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu chos thams cad ni mtha' yas pa'i phyir rtsa ba med pa dang / mngon par skabs yod pa dang nam mkha'
398a4(mdo sde): la rten pa yin pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jab dpal sangs rgyas kyi ros rnams ji snyed yod/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu ros thams cad ji snyed pa de snyed pa yod
398a5(mdo sde): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos thams cad sangs rgyas pas na/ lha'i bu de'i phyir chos thams cad ji snyed pa sangs rgyas kyi ros rnams kyang de snyed do// lha'i
398a6(mdo sde): bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'on ci 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug rnams kyang sangs rgyas kyi ros yin nam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de de bzhin te// 'dod rags
398a7(mdo sde): dang / zhe sdang dang gti mug rnams kyang sangs rgyas kyi ro so yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ nyon mongs pa de dag gi rtsa ba'i gnas rjes su rtogs pa ni sangs rgyas yin no zhes ston pa'i phyir ro//
398b1(mdo sde): wa'i bus smras pa// 'jab dpal gang gis sems can thams cad sangs rgyas su 'gyur ba'i rnam zangs yod dam/ 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa/ lnga'i bu rnam grangs med pas
398b2(mdo sde): sems can thams cad sangs rgyas su 'gyur gyis/ rnam grangs kyis ni ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pas ni sems can thams cad rtogs par thugs su
398b3(mdo sde): chud pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dang la ji ltar rtogs par thugs su chud/ 'jam dngal gyis sbas pa/ lha'i bu sems can med pa'i rnam pa dang / stong pa nyid kyi
398b4(mdo sde): rnam pas so// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal stong pa da kyis ci zhig rtogs par byed/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ wa'i bu gal te cung zad rjes su rtogs par byed na ni de stong pa
398b5(mdo sde): nyid du mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu stong pa nyid ni rnam par rtog pa med pa dang / rtsol ba med pa yin pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dang la de bzhin gshegs
398b6(mdo sde): ngas stong pa nyid rjes su rtogs pa ni byang chub yin no zhes ma gsungs sam/ bajam dpal gyis sbas pa/ lha'i bu stong pa nyid gang yin pa de nga byang chub yin pas na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
398b7(mdo sde): kyang stong pa nid rjes su rtogs pa khon byang chub yin no zhes gsungs so// rtswa'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal stong pa 'i de la gnas pa co zhig la gnas pa yin// 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa/
399a1(mdo sde): lha'i bu stong pa nyid la gnas pa ni/ 'dod pa dang / gzugs dang / gzugs med pa la gnas pa ma yin// phung po dang / khams dang / skye ma rnyed la gnas pa ma yin//
399a2(mdo sde): lus dang sems la gnas pa ma yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu de gnas pa gang gis gnas par 'gyur ba'i gnas pa de'ang stong pas nastong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid la mi gnas pa'i
399a3(mdo sde): phyir ro// lha'i bus smras pa// 'jam dngapa la de bzhin gshegs pa don dam pa stong pa nyid kyis gnas pas gnas par mi mdzad dam/ 'ja dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin gshegA
399a4(mdo sde): pa nyid stong pa nyid yin la// stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gnyis su med pa yin pas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni gnyis su med pa'i gnas pas gnas par mdzad do// lnga'i bus smras pa/
399a5(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gnyis su med pa'i gnas pa gang yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lba'i bu gnyis su med pa'i gnas pa ni gnyis su med pa 'di yin gyi/ de la gnas pa gzhan med de/ de'i gnas
399a6(mdo sde): pa gnyis su med pa de las gzhan med pa de nyid kyang gnyis su med pa nyid yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal gnyis zhes bya ba ni gang / gnyis su med pa zhes bya ba ni gang
399a7(mdo sde): bajam dpal gyis smras pa/ wa'i bu 'dod chags dang / bdod rags thal bar byed pa ni mchis so// 'dod chags kyi rang bzhin ni gnyis su med pa'o// zhe sdang dang / zhe sdang med par
399b1(mdo sde): byed pa den gzin so// de sdang gi rang bzhin gces sa med pa'o// gti dug dang / gti mug med par byed bdon gnyis so// gang mug sa rang bzhin gnas su med pa'o// rangs/
399b2(mdo sde): pa dang / nyon mongs pa med par byed pa de ni gces so// nyon mongs pa'i rang bzhin ni gnyis su med pa'o// bdag dang bdag med par byed pa de ni gnyis so// bdag gi rang bzhin ni gnyis
399b3(mdo sde): su med pa'o// lnga'i bras sbas pa/ 'jam dpalang dag gi rang bzhin gang yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lba'i bu bdag gi rang bsan ni gzod ma nas dag pa'i phyir bdag med pa
399b4(mdo sde): nyid yin no// bdag gi rang bzhin ni gzod ma nas dag pa'i phyir gzod ma nas dben pa nyid dang / gzod ma nas ma skyes pa nyid dang // gzod ma nas ma byung ba'i yin no// lha'i bus
399b5(mdo sde): smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci'i phyir rang bzhin zhes bya// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de ni 'gyur ba med pas de bo phyir rang bzhin zhes bya'o// de ni gzod pa nas gsapa zhing
399b6(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa car ma yin pas de'i phyir rang bzhin zhes bya'o// de ni nam mkha' dang mnapa pa nyid kyis mnyam zhing tshad med pas de'i phyir rang bzhin zhes bya'o// de ni spros pa dang dral
399b7(mdo sde): pa dang / de ni rgyu ba dang bral ba dang // de ni 'od gsal bas de'i phyir rang bzhin zhes bya'o// de ni drang ba med pa dang dor ba med pas ngo'i kyir rang bzhin zhes bya'o// wa'i bus sbas pa/
400a1(mdo sde): 'jad dpal rang bzhin mi shes pa dag gang yin// 'jad dpal gyis smras pa lha'i bu gang dag chos rnams kyi rang bzhin mi shes pa dag go/ lha'i bus
400a2(mdo sde): smras pa 'jam dpal rang bzhin shes pa dag gang yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pakalha'i bu gang dag de dag gi rang bzhin shes pa dag go// lha'i bus smras pa ga 'jam dpal dad pa
400a3(mdo sde): dang ldan pa'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa 'jam dpal gyis spras pa ga lha'i bu dad pa dang ldan pa'i mtshan nyid ni chags pa thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa
400a4(mdo sde): 'jam dpal dge slong dad pa dang mi ldan pa ji ltar dad pas byin pa la dad par byed/ 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ lha'i bu dad pa dang mi ldan pa zhes bya ba ni gang mngon sum du gyur pa'i chos thams
400a5(mdo sde): cad la gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog cing / gzhan gyi dad pas yang dang yang du mi 'gro ba yin pas de'i phyir dad pa dang mi ldan pa zhes bya ste/ de ni dad pas byin pa sbyong bar mi byed do// de ci'i phyir
400a6(mdo sde): zhe na/ gzod ma nas dag pa'i phyir ro// lnga'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal dge slong gang dge 'dun dang lhan cig mi gnas pa de la ji skad ces bya/ brda ba dpal gyis smras pa ga lha'i bu dge slong
400a7(mdo sde): gang dge 'dun dang lhan cig mi ga nas bde ni des na 'jig rten gyi sbyin gnas su 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu dge 'dun ni 'dus ma byas pa yin la/ byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dus ma
400b1(mdo sde): byas dang lhan cig mi gnas pas de'i phyir de ni 'jig rten gyi sbyin gnas su 'gyur ba yin pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bus sbas pa/ 'jam dpal gal te byang chub sems dpa' 'dus pa byas dang lhan cig/
400b2(mdo sde): gnas par gyur na ces pa cir 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa lha'i bu 'dus ma byas thob na sems can rnams skyo bar mi byed cing ga nyan thos su 'gyur bas de'i ches pa ni der 'gyur ro//
400b3(mdo sde): lha'i bus sbas paka 'jam dpal 'dus byas ni so so'i skye bo'i sa yin la/ 'dus ma byas ni 'phags pa rnams kyis yin no// 'o na ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa'i sa spangs shing so sa
400b4(mdo sde): skye bo'i sal gnas pa 'jig rten gyi sbyin gnas su 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ni 'dus byas la'ang mi gnas/ 'dus ma byas la'ang mi gnas pas de'i
400b5(mdo sde): phyir de ni 'jig rten gyi sbyin gnas su 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ni 'du byed las yid bskyod pa dang / bdus ma byas la mi gnas pa yin pas 'dus byas kyi
400b6(mdo sde): dang bral ba dang / 'dus ma byas shes pa rtogs pa pa yin te/ de 'dus byas kyi skyon dang bral bas ni 'dus byas la mi la/ 'dus ma byas shes pa rtogs pas ni 'dus ma byas su mi
400b7(mdo sde): lhung ba'i phyir ro// lha'i bu 'di lta ste/ dper na tshan po che chen pos steng gi bar snang la mdapa 'phangs par gyur la/ de nas mda' de nam mkha' la mi gnas par 'dug cing sa labang
401a1(mdo sde): mi ltung na/ lnga'i bu de la dka' ba cung zad yod dam/ lba'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dang la dka'a'o// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de bas kyang
401a2(mdo sde): byang chub sems dngapa 'a sems dpa' chen po gang dag 'dus byas kyang mi spong zhing ba dus ma byas kyang thob par byed la 'dus ma byas su'ang mi ltung zhing 'dus byas thob pa rnams kyang
401a3(mdo sde): yongs su smin par byed pa ni ches dka' ba yin no// lnga'i bus smras pa 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'i 'jigs pa 'dus byas sam/ bon te 'dus pa byas samapa gang las 'byung
401a4(mdo sde): par 'gyura'ajab dpal gyis smras pa/ lnga'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i 'jigs pa ni 'dus byas las kyang 'byung bar 'gyur// 'dus ma byas las kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir
401a5(mdo sde): zhe na/ lha'i bu 'dus byas las ni nyon mongs pa'i 'jigs pa 'byung la/ 'dus ma byas las ni nyon mongs pa med pa'i 'jigs pa 'byung ba'i phyir ro// lha'i bus smras pa ga 'jam pa la
401a6(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa med pas 'jigs pa ci yod/ 'ja dpal gyis sbas pa/ lha'i bu khams gsum na ni nyon mongs pa'i 'jigs pa yod la/ byang chub sems dpa' gang khams gsum du nyon mongs
401a7(mdo sde): ngar mi byed na de ni phan thos su 'gyur ro// lha'i bus spras pa / 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chu sems dpa' 'jigs pa med pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa ka lha'i bu byang chub sems
401b1(mdo sde): dpa' gang shes rab kyi shes pas 'dus byas la smod par byed cing thabs kyi shes pas 'dus pa byas su mi ltung ba de lta na ga lnga'i du byang chub sems dpa ba 'jigs pa med pa yin na/
401b2(mdo sde): 'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems can la lta bas 'dus byas spong bar mi byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos la lta bas 'dus ma byas su ma ltung bde ldan / byang chub sems
401b3(mdo sde): dbab bajigs pa med pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams kyi tshogs nye bar bsags pa'i phyir 'dus byas la sbyor bar byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi
401b4(mdo sde): ye shes kyi rogs nye bar bsags pa'i phyir/ 'dus ma byas su mi ltung ba de lta na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa med pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dang ba
401b5(mdo sde): 'dus ma byas la gnas te bsam gtan rnams skyed par byed cing / thabs la gnas te bsam gtan rnams las ldog par byed pa de lta na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa med pa yin
401b6(mdo sde): ro// lha'i bu gzhar yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems la gnas te dge ba'i rtsa banye bar bsogs par byed cing // snying rje rin po la gnas te sems can rnams yongs
401b7(mdo sde): su smin par byed pa de ltar/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa med pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' dben pa la gnas te bdud kyi las rnams rtogs par
402a1(mdo sde): / thangs sa pan sa te du kyil sa rnas sa spong bar byed de na kyang rgyangs pa smrab ba gas dmed papa'o// rnasas dang nga nga
402a2(mdo sde): chung sems dpa' byams pa chen po la gnas te chos ston par byed cing // snying rje na po la gnas te zang zing gi sbyin basbyin par byed pade rten// byang chub sems dang ba bajigs pa mdu bya
402a3(mdo sde): yin to// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba la gnas te mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su srung ba'i las byed cing / mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas te 'khor ba 'ongs
402a4(mdo sde): su sbyang ba'i las byed pa de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa med pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' skye ba med pas skye bar byed cing / 'pho ba med
402a5(mdo sde): pas 'byung bar byed pa dang / chos la lta bas snang bar byed cing / phung po dang / khams dang / skye mared kyis rab tu phye ba ma yin pa dang / thams cad dang rjes su 'brel cing zhi ba dang
402a6(mdo sde): nye bar zhi bar gyur pa dang / 'bar bar byed cing 'bar bas rig par mi byed pa dang // nyon mongs pa thams cad la yongs su spyod par byed cing / nyon mongs pa'i skyon rnams kyis mgos pa dang
402a7(mdo sde): slob pa dang mi slob pa rnams 'dul bar byed cing / nyan thos kyi rnam par grol ba la reg par mi byed pa dang / sems can rnams kyi bsam pa la 'jug cing // chos kyi bsam pa spong bar mi byed pa dang
402b1(mdo sde): bdud gyi lugs su shes par byed cing chos kyi lcags bya thong bar mi byed pa dang / shes pas 'jug par byed cing thabs kyis ldog par byed pa dang / 'angags pa num brjod pa
402b2(mdo sde): byed cing // 'phags pa ma yin pa yongs su smin par bya ba la spro bar byed pa dang / sangs rgyas mthong ba la mngon par dka' bar byed cing / chos mthong ba la kun tu 'dod par byed pade tsam gyis
402b3(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa med pa yin no// 'jab dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ lha'i bu lnga ze chos rnams la ngos kyi mig rdub med cing dri ba dang bral ba
402b4(mdo sde): rnam par dag go// lha'i bu'i khri lnga stong ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// byang chub sems dpa' sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa lnga khron mi skye bo'i chos pa
402b5(mdo sde): bzod pa thob par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' nyi khri ni spobs pa thogs pa med pa skyes so// lha dang mi rnams kyi skye dgu las srog rags stong phrag rab tu mang po dag gis ni
402b6(mdo sde): byang chub tu sems bskyed nas// de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'jam dpa lnga gzhon nur pA la lha'i mchod pa dag byas so// gzhan yang lha'i bu rab rtsal sems kyis/ bajam dpal gzhon
402b7(mdo sde): nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces sbas so// 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas pa yin/ 'jab dpal gyis sbas pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'dod
403a1(mdo sde): chags spangs pa'i phyir yang chos ston par byed la 'dod rags dang bral ba mngon du'ang mi byed pa dang / zhe sdang spang ba'i phyir yang ros ston par byed la/ zhe sdang
403a2(mdo sde): spong ba mngon du'ang mi byed pa dang / gti mug spang ba'i phyir yang ros ston par byed la gti mug spong ba mngon du bang mi byed pa dang / gnyon mongs pa spang ba'i phyir ros ston par yang byed lag nyon mongs
403a3(mdo sde): pa spong ba mngon du'ang mi byed pa de tsam gyis na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems can rnams la stong panyid
403a4(mdo sde): ston par yang byed la stong pa nyid mngon du'ang mi byed pa dang / sems can rnams la mtshan ma med pa ston par yang byed la/ mtshan ma med pa mngon du'ang mi byed pa dang / sems can rnams la
403a5(mdo sde): smon pa med pa ston par yang byed la/ smon pa med pa mngon du'ang mi byed pa dang / de bzhin du sems can rnams la mngon par 'du byed pa med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang /
403a6(mdo sde): dngos po med pa dang / 'dod rags dang bral ba dang mi ldan pa dang / 'gog pa'i chos ston par yang byed la gabagog pa mngon du'ang mi byed pa de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas
403a7(mdo sde): pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' yongs su mi gtong bas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa dang / tshul khrims las yang dag pa ra ba da' bas tshul khrims
403b1(mdo sde): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa dang / gnod sems kyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa dang / le los brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa dang brjed
403b2(mdo sde): nges pas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa dang / ber sa po dang lug ltar rmugs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa de tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' lam
403b3(mdo sde): la gnas pa yin no// lha'i bus spras pa/ bajam dpal ci las bsams te de skad snga/ badz+ra dpa gyis smras pa/ lha'i du bzhi po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs
403b4(mdo sde): su mi gtong ba yin te/ bani gang zhe na/ sems can yongs su mi gtong ba dang / chos yongs su mi gtong ba dang / byang chub kyi sems yongs su mi gtong ba dang dge ba'i ros thams
403b5(mdo sde): cad yongs su mi gtong ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa' ni chos bzhi po de dag yongs su mi gtong bas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed do// lha'i bu tshul khrims las yang dag par
403b6(mdo sde): bdab ba zhes bya ba de ni de'i rang bzhin ma yin pa'i tshig rnga dgas yin te/ tshul khrims las yang dag par 'da' bas ting nge 'dzin dang ting nge 'dzin las yang dag par bdab pas she pa
403b7(mdo sde): rab dang rishes rab las yang dag par 'dab bas rnam par grol ba shes pa sgrub par byed de/ lha'i bu khyod kyis rnam grangs des gang tshul khrims las yang dag par bdab bde tshul khrims
404a1(mdo sde): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa srub par byed pa yin par rig par bya'o// 'a'i du byang chub sems dngapa 'a gang gnod sems la zhugs pa ni nyan thos kyi theg pa las log par zhugs/
404a2(mdo sde): pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa las log par zhugs pa yin pas de ni theg pa chen po la legs par zhugs pa yin te/ gang theg pa rin po la legs par zhugs pa de ni bzod pa'i
404a3(mdo sde): pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa yin no// lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' lus kyis rdul bar mi byed cing ngag dang sems kyis rtul bar mi byed pa de ni le lo can yin la
404a4(mdo sde): gang de ltar chos la mngon par brtson pa de ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni rmi lam na'ang las gnyis po dag
404a5(mdo sde): la dga' ba'i sems skyed par mi byed pas de ni brjed ngas pa yin la/ gang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis theg pa la brjed ngas pa de ni theg pa chen po la mnyam par gzhag pa yin pas
404a6(mdo sde): des ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa yin no// lha'i bu ros thams cad ni bems po sde/ rtsa dang / shing dang / rtsig pa dang / lam dang gamig yor dang
404a7(mdo sde): lug ltar lkugs pa dang brda bar ba nga bzhin gyis nus pa med pa yin pas/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' shes rab dang / ye shes kyis de ltar ros thams cad bems po dang lug
404b1(mdo sde): ltar lkugs pa lta bus byang chub sgrub par byed pa de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub par byed pa yin te/ de ltar zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpab ni lam sgrub par byed pa yin no//
404b2(mdo sde): lnga'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba'i lam yang mi spong la la mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam yang tshol bar byed pa dang / lam gyi las kyi rgyun yang mi gcod cing
404b3(mdo sde): lam gyi bya ba'ang sgrub par byed pa dang // lam ngan par zhugs pa'i sems can rnams kyang lam la bgod par byed pa de lta na byang chub sems dang ba lam la gnas pa yin no//
404b4(mdo sde): lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad dang ros thams cad btsal na mi rnyed pa dang / byang chub kyi lam spong bar mi byed pa dang / 'bras bu
404b5(mdo sde): yod par bsam gtan byed pa de lta na/ byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi lam thob pa yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi ro byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos kyi lam yang rab tu shes
404b6(mdo sde): la nyan thos kyi lam gyis nges par 'byung bar yang mi byed pa dang // rang sangs rgyas kyi lam yang rab tu shes la rang sangs rgyas kyi lam gyis nges par 'byung bar mi byed pa dang / byang
404b7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i lam yang thob par byed la// lam des kyang dbang po yongs su ma rdzogs par nges par 'byung bar mi byed pa de lta na byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas pa
405a1(mdo sde): yin no// lha'i bu gzhan yang gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad mngon par 'du byed pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba'i 'bras bu don du mi
405a2(mdo sde): gnyer ba dang / mngon par 'du byed pa'i sngon gyis bgos pa dang // dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'du bya ba thams cad byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed pa dang / byang chub kyi phyir 'phel ba yang
405a3(mdo sde): dag par rjes su mi mthong ba dang / 'azi ba yang dag par rjes su mi mthong bde ldan/ byang chub sems dpa' la la gnas pa yin no// wa'i dra gzhan yang gang gi byang chub sems dpa'
405a4(mdo sde): lam ngan pa las la ba yongs su rol bar byed pa dang // lam yongs su btsal nas kyang nges par 'byung bar mi byed pa de lta na byang chub sems dpa' lam la gnas pa yin no// lha'i bus
405a5(mdo sde): smras pa / 'jam dang la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lam ngan pa las lam yongs su tshol bar byed/ 'jan dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu la mngan pa zhes bya ba ni 'khor ba ste/ byang chub
405a6(mdo sde): sems dpa' ni de la gnas nas sems can nges par 'byung ba'i phyir lam yongs su tshol bar byed kyi/ bdag nyid nges par 'byung ba'i phyir ni ma yin no// lnga'i bus smras pa/ 'ja
405a7(mdo sde): dpal byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ni 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthur pa yin no// 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa/ lha'i bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpar rnams ni 'jig rten na tshun/
405b1(mdo sde): kyang 'jig rten gyi chos rnams kyis mgos pa dang // 'on mongs pa dang // nyon mongs pa med pa ston par byed kyang // nyon mongs pa med pa nyid du mi ltung ba dang / rga ba dang / bar bston par
405b2(mdo sde): byed kyang // ros thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med par shes shing skyon med pa mngon du mi byed pa dang / phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched yongs su spyod par byed kyang /
405b3(mdo sde): phung po dang / khams dang / skye rached don du mi gnyer ba dang // phung po dang khams dang / skye mched yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir/ sems can rnams la chos ston kyang / yongs su
405b4(mdo sde): shes de dag yongs su shes par mi byed pa dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dag mngon par sgrub par byed cing sems
405b5(mdo sde): rnam par g.yeng ba rnams nye bar 'jog par byed kyang // nye bar 'jog pa la 'byung bar mi byed pa dang / bdud kyi yul nye bar ston par byed kyang / bdud kyi las rnams kyis ma 'phrogs
405b6(mdo sde): pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi yul spong bar mi byed pa dang / bdud kyi yul gyi rjes su mi 'jug pa dang / chos kyi dbyings kyi yul las ldog par mi byed pa dang / sems can gyi khams kyi yul nye bar len
405b7(mdo sde): par byed pas na/ de'i phyir sems can chen po de dag gi spyod pa ni 'jig rten thams cad dang mthun pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dang la khyod byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa la
406a1(mdo sde): spobs par gyis shig/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu bsam pa yongs su dag cing nang dang phyi rol dben pa nyid kyis lhag pa'i bsam pa la spyod pa dang / rab
406a2(mdo sde): tu spyod pa med pa nyid kyis sbyor ba la spyod pa dang / sems mi brjed pa nyid kyis byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa la spyod pa dang / sems dul ba nyid kyis sbyin pa la spyod pa dang / sems zhi ba nyid kyis//
406a3(mdo sde): tshul khrims la spyod pa dang / smras pa med pa nyid kyis bzod pa la spyod pa dang / lus dben pa nyid kyis brtson 'grus la spyod pa dang / chos kyi dbyings rnam par g.yeng ba med pa nyid kyis bsam gtan
406a4(mdo sde): la spyod pa dang / spros pa med pa nyid kyis shes rab la spyod pa dang / sems can la bdag med pa nyid kyis byams pa la spyod pa dang / nyon mongs pa yod pa ma yin pa rab tu zhi ba nyid kyis snying rje la spyod pa dang / rang
406a5(mdo sde): bzhon gyis rnam par grol ba'i phyir dga' ba la spyod pa dang / mtha' gnyis dang bral ba'i phyir btang snyoms la spyod pa dang / gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'i phyir mi rtag pa la so sor rtog pa la spyad pa dang/
406a6(mdo sde): yongs su rtog pa sdug bsngal ba'i phyir sdug bsngal la so sor rtog pa la spyod pa dang / phyin ci log rang bzhin med pa'i phyir bdag med pa la so sor rtog pa la spyod pa dang / 'du shes yongs su shes
406a7(mdo sde): pa'i phyir zhi ba la so sor rtog pa la spyod pa dang / phung po sgyu ma lta bur yongs su shes pa'i phyir sdug bsngal yongs su shes pa la spyod pa dang / ma rig pa sngon du 'gro ba'i phyir kun 'byung ba shes pa
406b1(mdo sde): ma spyod pa dang / rang bzhin gyis 'gags pa'i phyir 'gags pa shes pa la spyod pa dang / 'dus byas la mngon par zhen pa med pa'i phyir lam shes pa la spyod pa dang / 'bras bu yongs su shes pa
406b2(mdo sde): nyid kyis rgyu shes pa la spyod pa dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i phyir rkyen shes pa la spyod pa dang / du ma'i phyir tshogs pa la spyod pa dang / brjod du med pa'i phyir don so so yang dag par rig
406b3(mdo sde): pa la spyod pa dang / chos kyi dbyings dbyer med pa'i phyir chos so so yang dag par rig pa la spyod pa dang / ming dang gzugs 'byung ba med pa'i phyir nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa la
406b4(mdo sde): spyod pa dang / sgra brag cha dang mtshungs pa'i phyir spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa la spyod pa dang / tshig 'bru gsal ba nyid kyis don la rton pa la spyod pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i spyod yul ma
406b5(mdo sde): spangs pa nyid kyis ye shes la rton pa la spyod pa dang / las kyi rnam par smin pa ston pa nyid kyis nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde la rton pa la spyod pa dang / gang zag yongs su smin par bya ba nyid kyis chos la rton//
406b6(mdo sde): pa la spyod pa dang / las rnam par dag pa'i phyir lha'i mig la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims rnam par dag pa'i phyir lha'i rna ba la spyod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnam par dag pa'i phyir pha rol gyi sems shes pa
406b7(mdo sde): la spyod pa dang / dus gsum mnyam nyid kyis phyir sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa shes pa la spyod pa dang / sems la dbang sgyur ba'i phyir rdzu 'phrul mngon par sgrub pa la spyod pa dang / mi byed/
407a1(mdo sde): pa'i phyir spyod pa brtan pa la spyod pa dang / mi lhod pa'i phyir spyod pa sra ba la spyod pa dang / bskyod du med pa'i phyir gnas pa med pa la spyod pa dang / tha dad pa med pa nyid kyis spyod pa/
407a2(mdo sde): mnyam pa la spyod pa dang / thams cad du rjes su ma brtags pa'i phyir sa dang / chu dang / me dang / rlung dang / nam mkha' lta bur spyod pa dang / rnam par bsgrubs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis sgyu ma lta bu la spyod/
407a3(mdo sde): ba dang / yang dag pa ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid kyis rmi lam lta bu la spyod pa dang / rnam par rmongs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis sdig rgyu lta bu la spyod pa dang / bdag mi srid pa'i mtshan nyid kyis stong pa nyid la spyod pa
407a4(mdo sde): pa dang / sems rang bzhin med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis mtshan ma med pa la spyod pa dang / khams gsum rang bzhin med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis ston pa med pa la spyod pa dang / 'dus byas rang bzhin med pa'i
407a5(mdo sde): mtshan nyid kyis mngon par 'du byed pa med pa la spyod pa dang / sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa 'jug pa med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis bdud tshar gcad pa la spyod pa dang / spyod pa thams cad rnam par
407a6(mdo sde): sgrubs pa'i mtshan nyid kyis dkon gacho ga gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi gcad pa la spyod pa ste/ lha'i bu de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa la spyod pa yin no// @
407a7(mdo sde): bam po gsum pa ste tha ma'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa de ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa yin no// 'jam dpal
407b1(mdo sde): gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu de de bzhin te/ lha'i bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa' gang dad pas rjes su 'brang ba ma yin pa dang / chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba ma yin pa dang / gang brgyan pa ma yin pa dang / rgyun du/
407b2(mdo sde): zhugs pa ma yin pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba ma yin pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba ma yin pa dang / dgra bcom pa ma yin pa dang / gang nyan thos ma yin pa dang / rang sangs rgyas ma yin pa dang /
407b3(mdo sde): gang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ma yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das ma yin pa dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma yin pa dang / ston pa ma yin//
407b4(mdo sde): pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' yin par mi smra'o// lha'i bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa' gang so so'i skye bo'i chos can ma yin pa dang / 'dod chags kyi chos can ma yin pa dang / zhe sdang gi chos
407b5(mdo sde): can ma yin pa dang / gti mug gi chos can ma yin pa dang / gang 'khor ba'i chos can ma yin pa dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos can ma yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' yin par mi
407b6(mdo sde): smra'o lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci las bsams te de skad rtswa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dang pas rjes su 'brang ba dang / chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang / brgyad
407b7(mdo sde): pab dang / rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang / de bzhin
408a1(mdo sde): #gshegs pa dang bcom ldan 'das dang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang / ston pa dang / so so'i gyi bo'i chos can dang / 'dod chags kyi chos can
408a2(mdo sde): dang zhe sdang gi chos can dang gti mug gi chos can dang 'khor ba'i chos can dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos can yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu
408a3(mdo sde): gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la dad par byed pa dang / chags pa thams cad la dad par byed kyang de la chags par mi 'gyur ba dang / gzhan gyi dad pas mi 'gro ba dang /
408a4(mdo sde): rol tu phyin pa drug gi lam la dad pa bskyed cing 'dzin par byed pa dang / chags pas chags par gyur pa rnams thar par byed pa dang / chags pa med pa'i ye shes yongs su tshol bar byed pa
408a5(mdo sde): dang / 'khor ba la chags par mi byed pa dang / mya ngan las 'das par mi ltung ba de tsam gyis na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' dad pas rjes su 'brang ba yin no// lha'i bus smras pa
408a6(mdo sde): 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gsungs pa
408a7(mdo sde): 'dzin par byed pa dang / kun 'dzin par byed pa dang / chos kyi zas dang ldan zhing zang zing gi zas med pa dang / chos la gnas shing nyon mongs pa la mi gnas pa dang / chos kyi stobs can
408b1(mdo sde): sin gyi/ ngargyal gyi stobs can ma smin pa dang / chos smra ba yin gyi/ 'jig rten rgyang 'phen pa'i gtam smras ma yin pa dang / chos kyi dbang phyug yin gyi/ nyon mongs pa'i dbang phyug
408b2(mdo sde): ma yin pa dang / chos la rton pa yin gyi/ gang zag la rton pa ma yin pa dang / chos smra ba yin gyi/ chos ma yin pa mi b+hA ba dang / chos kyi rjes su 'thun pa'i chos la rton pa yin gyi/
408b3(mdo sde): brtson pa btang ba'i chos la mi gnas pa dang / chos skyon med pa nyid du chos thams cad shes par byed pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo chags pa med pa dang sman pa dang / nor bdun dang ldan pa dang /
408b4(mdo sde): dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par byed pa dang chos kyi khyad par la gnas pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba yin no// lha'i bus spras pa/ 'jam dpal ji
408b5(mdo sde): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' brgyad pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' log pa nyid brgyad las yang dag par 'das pa dang / yang dag pa nyid brgyad la rab
408b6(mdo sde): tu gnas pa dang / lam yan lag brgyad pa rnam par sbyang ba la mkhas pa dang / sbyor ba yongs su ma rdzogs par lam nges par 'byung bar mi byed pa dang / mi lom pa brgyad du skyes pa'i sems can rnams
408b7(mdo sde): dal ba phun sum tshogs pa dag la 'god par byed pa dang / skyes bu dam pa'i rnam par rtog pa brgyad la gnas pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan byed pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i
409a1(mdo sde): sdug pa'i bsam pa mi spong ba de ldan/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' brgyad pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rgyun du
409a2(mdo sde): zhugs pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems can rgyun phyogs su ded pa rnams rgyun la zlog par byed pa dang / 'khor ba'i rgyun thams cad
409a3(mdo sde): gcod par byed la/ 'khor ba mi gcod pa dang / ngan song thams cad kyang gcod par byed pa dang / sems can rnams bde 'gro dang / mya ngan las 'das pa mngon du bya ba'i lam la 'god
409a4(mdo sde): par byed pa dang / mtshams gcad pa dang / lha dang / mi la gzhol ba dang / bden pa ston par byed pa dang / rlom sems su mi ltung ba dang / the tsom dang bral ba dang / nges pa dang /
409a5(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi chos la gzhol ba dang / so so'i skye bo'i lam las yang dag par 'das pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi lam la rab tu gnas pa dang / 'khor ba'i gting rnyed pa dang /
409a6(mdo sde): ngan las 'das pa la mngon du phyogs par gyur pa dang 'jig rten gyi sbyin gnas su gyur pa dang / 'dus byas la snang ba dang 'dus ma byas pas rab tu bye ba dang phyir ldog par mi 'gyur/
409a7(mdo sde): ba dang / dge 'dun la yang dag par gzhol ba de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rgyun du zhugs pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' lan
409b1(mdo sde): cig phyir 'ong ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad 'ong ba med pa dang / 'gro ba med par shes nas sems can yongs su smin par/
409b2(mdo sde): bya ba'i phyir bsams bzhin du 'ong ba dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed pa dang / 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba ston par byed pa dang / chos nyid la 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba med par
409b3(mdo sde): mthong ba dang / 'ong ba'ang nyon mongs pa med pas 'ong ba dang / rang gi las yongs su dag pas 'gro ba dang 'ong ba mnyam pa nyid mi spong ba dang / bdud kyi dbang gis mi 'gro ba dang / byang chub
409b4(mdo sde): kyi lam nye bar ston pa'i phyir 'ong ba dang / nye bar blangs pa'i sems can bsgral ba'i phyir 'ong ba dang / byang chub kyi lhag pa'i bsam pa sra zhing mi byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
409b5(mdo sde): lan cig phyir 'ong bayin no// su'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ri skar na byung chub sems dpa' phyir mi 'ong ba yin 'jam dpal gyi smras pa zhwa'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems
409b6(mdo sde): dpa' lta ba rnams dang / byin ci log rnams dang / sgrib pa rnams su'ang mi 'ong ba dang / 'dun pa dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / 'jigs pa dang gti mug gis yang
409b7(mdo sde): 'ong ba dang / 'gro bar mi 'gyur ba dang / byas pa nges par ma gyur cing / sangs rgyas chos rnams ma rdzogs par mi 'ong ba dang / 'ong ba med pa dang / 'pho ba med pa la mkhas pa dang
410a1(mdo sde): shi med pa la thob pa dang / mthar gnas dang / byas pa nges pa dang / lung bstan pa thob pa dang / dmigs pa med pa dang / rnam pa med pa thob pa dang / shes
410a2(mdo sde): pas gzhan la rag ma las pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi 'ong ba yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' dgra bcom pa yin/
410a3(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chags pa med cing 'dod chags gdul ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / sdang ba med cing che sdang gdul ba'i phyir
410a4(mdo sde): can rnams la chos ston pa dang / rmongs pa med cing gti mug gdul ba'i phyir sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / chos thams cad la nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa dang / sems can thams
410a5(mdo sde): cad la sems ma btang ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la brtson 'grus brtsams pa dang 'dod pa'i longs spyod thams cad la dga' ba med pas dga' ba dang / dgra bcom pa dang / pad+ma
410a6(mdo sde): bzhin du nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mgos pa dang / shes pas 'phags pa dang mnyam pa dang / thabs kyis 'phags pa ma yin par gnas pa dang / nye bar len pa thams cad la bdag gi med
410a7(mdo sde): cing yongs su 'dzin pa med pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la bdag gir byed cing yongs su 'dzin pa dang / rang gi sems kyi rgyud dag la zag pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / gzhan
410b1(mdo sde): sems kyi rlung dag sa bag pa med pa gnas par byed pa dang / sngon dam bcas pa dag sa brnag pa yongs su rdzogs pa dang / tshung ba dang pa yong la gnas pa rnams kyi pha rol tu ston pa dang /
410b2(mdo sde): rol gyi gnas ma spangs pa dang / gzhan gyi sems can gzhan thar par byed pa de ldan/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' dgra bcom pa yin no// kwa'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpas ji lar/
410b3(mdo sde): na byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad la ma thos pa'i chos sgrogs par byed cing yul rnams la spyod par
410b4(mdo sde): mi byed pa dang / yang dag pa'i dam pa'i chos dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa'i chos sgrogs par byed pa dang / chu dang / rkyen dang / bdag med pa dang / sems can med pa dang / rang bzhin gyis
410b5(mdo sde): g.yo ba med pa sgrogs par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa dang / nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i chos rnams sgrogs par byed pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang / ye shes chen po la chos
410b6(mdo sde): thams cad chus nye bar 'gro bar rtsom shig ces sgrogs par byed pa dang sgrogs pa'ang gnan gyi dring mi 'jog pa dang / thos pas kyang rlom sems car mi byed pa dang / spogs pa thams cad kyi
410b7(mdo sde): sngon dang phyi ma'i mtha' mi 'chad pa yongs su shes pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa mi zad pa thob pa dang / don dang / tshig dang / yig 'bru mi zad pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi sem
411a1(mdo sde): dang / spyod pa dang / shes pa ston par byed pa dang / sa sa ci rigs par chos gyon par byed pa dang / zhi ba'is la gnas pa dang / spros pa med pa dang / don
411a2(mdo sde): smon lam la spyod pa de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rang sangs rgyas yin/ 'jam dpal gyis spras pa
411a3(mdo sde): lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad rkyen la rag las pa dang / sems can med pa dang / srog med pa dang / gang zag med pa dang // bdag po med pa dang / rnam par bsgrubs
411a4(mdo sde): pa nye bar gnas pa'i mtshan nyid du shes pa dang / des rkyen rnams legs par mthong ba'i phyir byang chub 'dren par byed pa'i rkyen 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi phyogs dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams
411a5(mdo sde): kyi phyogs dang / bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi'i phyogs dang / tshad med pa bzhi'i phyogs dang / mngon par shes pa'i phyogs yang dag par sgrub par byed pa dang / de rkyen nye bar sgrub par byed cing / gzhan gyi dring mi 'jog
411a6(mdo sde): pas byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar byed pa dang / sa ngan pa dag las sems skyo bar byed pa dang / nyi tshe ba'i shes pa 'dul ba la mkhas pa dang / theg pa chen po la legs par rab tu gnas pa dang /
411a7(mdo sde): chos thams cad la mngon du gyur pa de ltan/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' rang sangs rgyas yin no// lha'i bus spras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas yin/ 'jam das
411b1(mdo sde): gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad gzod ma nas dben pa nyid du rtogs par byed pa dang / sems can thams cad gzod ma nas bdag med pa nyid du rtogs par byed pa dang /
411b2(mdo sde): ming mngon par rtogs par bya ba'i phyir spyod pa dman pa dang / mchog dang bar ma thams cad rtogs pa'i byed pa dang / rang gi nyon mongs pa stong pa nyid kyis nyon mongs pa thams cad rtogs par byed pa dang / gang cig
411b3(mdo sde): gcig la rjes su rtogs pa'i rim gyis sa dang spyod pa na tshogs ston par byed pa dang // sems can gyi dbang po dang mos pas chos ston par byed pa dang / 'bras bu yod par chos ston par byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu
411b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas yin no// lha'i bus spras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems
411b5(mdo sde): dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i lam du 'gro ba dang / de bzhin nyid mi brjed pa dang / de bzhin nyid la rab tu gnas pa dang / de bzhin nyid kyi sbyin pa dang / de bzhin nyid kyi tshul khrims dang / de bzhin nyid kyi
411b6(mdo sde): bzod pa dang / de bzhin nyid kyi brtson 'grus dang / de bzhin nyid kyi bsam gtan dang / de bzhin nyid kyi shes rab dang / de bzhin nyid kyi thabs dang / de bzhin nyid kyi smon lam dang / de bzhin nyid kyi stobs dang / de bzhin
411b7(mdo sde): nyid kyi ye shes dang ldan pa dang / de bzhin nyid kyi sems can med pa dang / sems can yongs su thar par byed pa dang / sems can gyi gnas 'khor ba na'ang spyod la/ spyod pa thams cad las kyang
412a1(mdo sde): yang dag par 'das pa dang / spyod pa las sgrol bar byed pa dang / de na'ang yin la/ de na'ang ma yin pa dang / 'di na'ang yin la/ 'di na'ang ma yin pa dang / gnyis ka las dag pa dang /
412a2(mdo sde): mun pa dang bral ba dang / rtag tu gsal ba dang / mun pa med pa dang / mun pa'i ling tog dang bral ba dang / de bzhin nyid kyi rjes su song ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa'i rjes su song ba de lta na/ sgra'i bu
412a3(mdo sde): byang chub ses sa dang de bzhin gshegs pa zhes bya'o// wa'i dus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das zhes bya/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang /
412a4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa bcom pa dang / chu bo las brgal ba dang / srid pa mthong ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi khur dang / srid pa 'joms pa dang / srid pa'i 'du shes dang bral ba dang /
