412a5(mdo sde): bdud bcom pa dang / khur bor ba dang / srid pa'i 'gro bar 'chi 'pho ba dang / skye ba dang / bya ba shes pa dang / srid pa'i 'dod chags bsal ba dang / lus dang sems bsgoms pa dang / tshul
412a6(mdo sde): khrims dang / shes rab bsgoms pa dang / srid pa'i skyon legs par mthong ba dang / srid pa'i sred pa dang bral ba dang / sems can la bsam pa ma btang ba dang / srid pa'i rgya mtsho la sa sgrol ba
412a7(mdo sde): dang chu lon dang bam pa legs par byas pa dang / mi gnas pas legs par mthong ba dang / rtag tu bsgom pa la yid kyis brtsond pa dang / sems can gyi srid pa zad par byed pa dang / srid
412b1(mdo sde): pa thams cad las rnam par log pa dang / thabs la mkhas pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad thal bar rlog par byed pa dang / srid pas rnam par rtse ba la mkhas pa dang / srid pa gsum na yod pa rnams/
412b2(mdo sde): kyis mchod pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' bcom ldan 'das zhes bya'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin
412b3(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' mtshams med pa gang dang mnyam pa byang chub kyang de dang mnyam pas mnyam pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par byed pa
412b4(mdo sde): dang / lta ba'i rnam pa rnams dang / rkyen ci log rnams dang / sgrib pa rnams dang / chod pa rnams dang / kun nas ldang ba rnams gang dang mnyam pa byang chub kyang de dang mnyam pas mnyam pa nyid du
412b5(mdo sde): mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par byed pa dang / 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gang dang mnyam pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad gang dang mnyam pa byang chub kyang de dang mnyam
412b6(mdo sde): pas mnyam pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par byed pa dang / so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams dang / slob pa'i chos rnams dang / nyan thos kyi chos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam
412b7(mdo sde): dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams gang dang mnyam pa byang chub kyang de dang mnyam pas mnyam pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par byed pa dang / mnyam pa nyid du rnam par 'jug
413a1(mdo sde): par mi byed pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa nyid du lta bar byed pa dang / chos thams cad gzod ma nas dag pa'i phyir rkyen la ra/
413a2(mdo sde): las pa dang / yod pa ma yin pa'i yongs su rtog pas kun nas blang ba nam mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid du mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par byed pa de lta na/ lha'i su byang chub sems dpa' yang das
413a3(mdo sde): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' ston pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dab
413a4(mdo sde): gang la ston pa dang / rab tu ston pa dang / rjes su ston par byed pa de dag thams cad mi g.yos pa'i chos can du 'gyur ba dang / bstan pa yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / stong gsum gyi stong chen
413a5(mdo sde): bo'i 'jig rten gyi khams su ston pa dang / rab tu ston pa dang / ston pa gcig pur 'gyur ba dang / sems can thams cad kyi skyabs dang / gling dang / dpung gnyen du 'gyur ba dang / mtshan ma thams
413a6(mdo sde): cad zhi ba dang / rab tu zhi ba dang / nye bar ni bar 'gyur ba dang / me tshom dang zas pa dang / sems can thams cad kyi the tshom gcod pa 'a mkhas bdud/ ngam byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jog ce/
413a7(mdo sde): skyong gis phyag byas pa dang / yang dag par smra ba dang / khams gsum pas phyag byas pa dang / sems nam mkha' dang mnyam zhing khengs pa med pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' legs par/
413b1(mdo sde): mthong ba'i phyir smad pa dang / brdeg pa dang / dgor ba dang / gshung ba dang / khro ba dang / spyo ba dang / bsdigs pa thams cad dang / rlom sems thams cad kyis zhum par mi 'gyur ba dang
413b2(mdo sde): sems can gyi rang bzhin legs par mthong ba'i phyir sems can thams cad la phan zhing snying brtsa ba dang / 'jig rten la ston par grags par 'gyur ba de lta na lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' ston pa
413b3(mdo sde): yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' so so'i skye bo'i chos can yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' thabs kyis so//
413b4(mdo sde): so'i skye bo'i spyod pa thams cad kyang ston par byed la/ shes pas so so'i skye bo'i spyod pa thams cad la chags par yang mi 'gyur ba de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' so so'i skye bo'i chos can/
413b5(mdo sde): yin no// lha'i bus spras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 'dod chags kyi chos can yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu sa
413b6(mdo sde): rgyas kyis chos rnams la rjes su chags par 'gyur ba dang / rtag tu sangs rgyas kyi sku la kun tu chags par 'gyur ba dang / bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa sgrub pa'i
413b7(mdo sde): phyir rtag tu dgon par gnas pa la rjes su chags par 'gyur ba dang / sems can rnams bsdu ba'i dngos bsdu ba la rtag tu rjes su chags par 'gyur ba dang / sems can thams cad la zhe 'gras
414a1(mdo sde): pa'i sems med par 'gyur bde lda na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i 'dod chags kyi chos can yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji skar na byang chub sems dpa' den
414a2(mdo sde): gi chos can yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'dus byas rnams la gcig tu nyes pa'i skyon chags par lta bar byed pa dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa yang
414a3(mdo sde): bar byed pa dang / nyon mongs pa thams cad drang / 'du byed thams cad la skyon du'ang 'du shes la/ nyon mongs pa rnams dang / 'du byed rnams spong bar yang mi byed pa dang / sems can yongs su smin pas
414a4(mdo sde): bya ba'i phyir brtson 'grus rgyun mi gcod par byed pa dang / snying rje chen pos yang dag par zin pa'i yid kyis snying brtse ba rgya chen po yang dag par skyed par byed pa dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir sem
414a5(mdo sde): can rnams nyon mongs pa'i 'dam rdzab las 'byin par byed pa dang / sems can zhe sdang can rnams la bzod pa nye bar sgrub par byed cing / nyon mongs pa rnams lanyes pa sbyin par byed pa dang / 'chi 'dra
414a6(mdo sde): thabs thams cad dang 'khor ba sun 'byin par byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' zhe sdang gi chos can yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gti mug gi
414a7(mdo sde): chos can yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gti mug ces bya ba ni gang cung zad kyang mi shes pa yin pas/ de la gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi ngo bo nyid la snyoms par zhugs pa de
414b1(mdo sde): shes par mi byed/ rnam par shes par mi byed/ kun tu shes par mi byed/ leg par mi byed/ spong bar mi byed/ 'byung bar mi byed/ 'jig par mi byed/ g.yo bar mi byed/ rlom sems su mi byed/
414b2(mdo sde): skyo bar mi byed cing / chos kyi rang bzhin gyis 'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' gti mug gi chos can yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang
414b3(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' 'khor ba'i cho ga can yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba las kyang mi g.yo la/ de nyid las sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams tshol bar
414b4(mdo sde): yang byed pa dang / bdud thams cad dang thun mong ma yin zhing spyod pa dman pa rnams dang ma 'dres pa dang / sems can rnams spyod pa dman pa las phral zhing spyod pa rgya chen po la 'god par byed pa dang /
414b5(mdo sde): don 'thun par byed pa dang / mi dge ba thams cad la mi bsngags pa rjod par byed cing 'dun pa zlog pa dang / phyir zlog par byed pa dang / byang chub 'khor ba la gzhol bar shes par byed pa dang / 'khor bam
414b6(mdo sde): ba nyid kyis sangs rgyas mnyam pa nyid du lta bar byed pa dang / 'khor ba las mi g.yo zhing gnas par yang mi byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 'khor nga'i chos can yin no// lha'i rus
414b7(mdo sde): smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos can yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems can rang bzhin
415a1(mdo sde): gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'das par lta bar byed pa dang / chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis nye bar zhi bar shes par byed pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las/
415a2(mdo sde): bzla ba dang / nye bar zhi bar bya ba'i phyir chos ston par byed pa dang / sems can dpag tu med pa me gsum gyis 'bar bar gyur pa rnams nye bar zhi bar byed cing yongs su mya ngan 'da' bar byed pa
415a3(mdo sde): dang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa la'ang spyod par byed la/ gtan du yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar yang mi byed pa de lta na/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
415a4(mdo sde): yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i chos can yin te/ thabs mkhas pa dang / thabs shes pa la nges par skyes pa dang / sems can thams cad la phan pa dang / rjes su snying brtse ba dang ldan pa
415a5(mdo sde): yin no// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ srog chags 'bum lhag tsam chos rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ srog chags drug bri ni
415a6(mdo sde): len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed cing sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa'i sems can rnams kyis ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to//
415a7(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' nyi khri lnga stong gis ni mi zad pa'i rnam pa'i mdzod ces bya ba'i gzungs so sor thob par gyur to// srog chags sa ya phrag gnyis dang lnga 'bum gyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i/
415b1(mdo sde): byang chub tu sems bgyid do// steng gi bar snang las kyang bcom ldan 'das dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la mchod par bya ba'i phyir me tog gi char dag mngon par rab tu dang 'o// de nas na
415b2(mdo sde): bu rab rtsal sems kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' thabs dang shes rab kyis nges par 'thung po yin/ de nas 'jam
415b3(mdo sde): dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ lha'i bu rab rtsal sems la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ gang tshe sems ni chags med pa// bla med byang chub sems yin te// sems kyi rang bzhin mngon sum pa/
415b4(mdo sde): de ni shes rab mtshan nyid do// sems rnams bskyed pa thams cad ni// byang chub tu ni yongs sngo zhing // byang chub sems las rab rtas pa// de ni thabs kyi mtshan nyid do// sems can thams
415b5(mdo sde): cad bdag med cing // mi bden ya ma brla gsog tu// gang tshe shes pas shes byed pa// de ni shes rab mtshan nyid do// gang phyir sems can thams cad dag/ byang chub phyir ni sbyin byed cing /
415b6(mdo sde): bsam pa thag pas skud byed pa// de ni thabs kyi mtshan nyid do// gang tshe bdag dang byang chub dag/ gtan du mthong bar mi byed cing // 'khor gsum yongs su dag gyur pa// de ni shes rab
415b7(mdo sde): mtshan nyid do// nang dang yang ni phyi rol dag/ thams cad yongs su gtong byed cing // sems can kun la yongs bsngo ba/ de ni thabs kyi mtshan nyid do// zhi zhing rab ni gtsang dag cing // tshul
416a1(mdo sde): khrims rlom sems mi byed la// lus dang ngag yid zhi gyur pa// de ni shes rab mtshan nyid do// tshul khrims la ni zhugs gyur cing // gzhan yang tshul khrims sngor rjed la//
416a2(mdo sde): sangs rgyas tshul khrims sngo byed pa// de phyir thabs shes bya ba yin// chos rnams thams cad rab stong zhing // bdag med bzod pa sgom byed la// lus dang sems kyis ma smras pa// de ni shes
416a3(mdo sde): rab pha rol phyin// lus kyis sbyor bar mi byed cing // rag dang sems kyis ma yin la// chos sems kun la dben gyur pa// de ni shes rab pha rol phyin// sems can kun gyi khro ba dang // gsod dang //
416a4(mdo sde): 'ching ba bzo byed cing // sems can de dag mi spong ba// de ni thabs kyi pha rol phyin// sems can yongs su smin bya'i phyir// bsam gtan bde ba rab spangs nas// grong dang yul 'khor snang byed/
416a5(mdo sde): pade ni thabs kyi pha rol phyin// tshul rol ma yin pha rol min// mthun pa'i pha rol rab gnas shing // spros pa'i lta ba rgyun bcad pa// shes rab pha rol phyin rtogs yin// gang gis stong nyid rtog/
416a6(mdo sde): gyur nas// de ni btang snyoms mi byed cing // sems can stong nyid sbyor byed pa// de ni thabs kyi tshul yin no// sangs rgyas gzung med mkha' 'dra bar// chos kyi sgo nas lta byed cing // de tshe gzug
416a7(mdo sde): la zhen med pa// de ni shes rab mtshan nyid do// sangs rgyas mtshan nyid mchod 'dod cing // sangs rgyas bye ba mchod byed la// 'dren kun mchod tu 'jug byed pa// de phyir thabs shes bya ba yin/
416b1(mdo sde): chos rnams rdul med rdul bral zhing // mkha' dang mnyam pas mnyam gyur la// chos 'ga' yang 'dzin par mi byed pa// de ni shes rab pha rol phyin// chos ni yongs su gzung ba'i phyir/
416b2(mdo sde): lus dang srog ni 'dor byed cing // 'jig rten kun gyis dben gyur pa// de ni thabs kyi sgo yin no// chos dbyings gnas pa nyid kyi phyir// yang dag mtha' la rab gnas shing // de bzhin nyid
416b3(mdo sde): las mi g.yo bas// de ni shes rab sgo yin no// gang gis chos nyid ci 'dra ba// sems can de 'drar shes byed cing // de ltar rtogs par byed pa'i mtha'// de ni shes rab pha rol phyin//
416b4(mdo sde): chos kun 'chi 'pho yod min zhing // skye ba med par shes byed la// mig 'gro rgyug par mi byed pa// de ni shes rab pha rol phyin// sems can yongs su smin bya'i phyir// mkhas pa 'dod
416b5(mdo sde): dang gzugs rnams su// bsams bzhin du ni skye byed pa// de dag thabs kyi yon tan yin// dgon pa gnas rab gnas byed cing // nyon mongs med la rab gnas la// bsam gtan rnam thar
416b6(mdo sde): snyen byed pa// de dag shes rab mtshan nyid yin// grong dang yul 'khor rnams su ni// song nas snyan gtam ston byed cing // mi zad zhum pa yod min pa'i// mkhas pa thabs la mkhas pa yin//
416b7(mdo sde): 'jig rten gsum po thams cad las// skrag cing 'du 'dzi rten med la// bdag nyid dul zhing zhi gyur pa// de ni shes rab pha rol phyin// 'gro ba dag na 'dus chen dang // tshogs dang 'du 'dzi ji snyed
417a1(mdo sde): pa kun na snang ba de dag ni// thabs kyis smras pa med pa yin// brtan pa chags med spyod byed cing // yi ge don gnyer mi byed la// brjod med nges don don gnyer ba
417a2(mdo sde): de ni shes rab pha rol byin// mkhas pa chags pa thams cad na// snang zhing chos rnams ston byed la// dkon mchog gsum gyi bsngags brjod pa// de ni thabs kyi pha rol phyin// mngon shes
417a3(mdo sde): shes pa mkhas gyur cing // zhi zhing dul la zag pa med// gdag med bzhag pa yod min pa// de ni shes rab pha rol phyin// mngon shes dag la rnam 'phrul zhing // zhing rnams bye bar 'gro
417a4(mdo sde): byed la// sangs rgyas bye ba mchod byed pa// de ni thabs kyi mtshan nyid yin// phung po sgyu ma 'drar shes shing // nyon mongs dngos med shes byas nas// de dag bdud bzhi zhi mur pa/
417a5(mdo sde): des ni shes rab pha rol phyin// bdud rnams thams cad ston byed cing // bstan nas rgyal bar byed gyur la// de las sems can thar byed pa// de ni thabs kyi sgo yin no// stong nyid mtshan ma
417a6(mdo sde): med pa dang // smon par byed pa yod min pa'i// rnam thar sgo la sten byed pa// de ni shes rab mtshan nyid yin// chags med sdang ba yod min zhing // rmongs med shes pa'i spyod yul dang // blang
417a7(mdo sde): med dor ba yod min pa// de ni shes rab mtshan nyid yin// rnam pa kun gyi mchog ldan zhing // stong nyid rab tu bsten gyur la// kun gyi pha rol son gyur pa// mnyam med 'gog pa'i mtshan cad/
417b1(mdo sde): yin zag med brtul ba ma yin pa// de dag shes rab ldan 'gyur zhing // 'khor ba'i spyod yul de dag ni// sems can kun gyi grogs su 'gyur// bsod nams tshogs kyis mi ngoms pa'i/ ma
417b2(mdo sde): pa thabs la mkhas pa yin// shes rab thabs la mkhas pa yin// yan lag gnyis ldan lam de ni// shes ldan byang chub sems pa'i ste// des ni 'dren rnams nges par 'byung // thabs dang mi
417b3(mdo sde): ldan shes rab kyis// ma byung 'byung bar 'gyur ba med// shes rab med pa'i thabs kyis ni// mkhas pa rab tu zhi mi 'gyur// shes rab dang ni thabs shes pa// de gnyis kun tu 'dres gyur cing /
417b4(mdo sde): gnyis ka zung du 'jug 'gyur na// de ni dam pa rtogs par 'gyur// gang dag bgrod pa 'dir 'gro ba// sangs rgyas kun gyis rab bsngags shing // ye shes pha rol phyin gyur te// de ni chos rnam
417b5(mdo sde): chos nyid do// de dag sangs rgyas spyod yul gyis// chos dbyings dbyer med dga' byed cing // sangs rgyas byang chub bla med pa'o// rdul med byang chub rtogs par 'gyur// lha'i bu rab rtsal sems kyis//
417b6(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la gzhan yang 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal byang chub kyi yul gang yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub kyi yul ni rang gi yul dben pa nyid yin no// /
417b7(mdo sde): lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub kyi mtshan nyid gang yin/ 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub ni nam mkha'i mtshan nyid do// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub kyi mtha'
418a1(mdo sde): gang yin// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub kyi mtha' ni stong pa nyid yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub kyi gnas gang yin/ 'jam dpal gyis sbrus
418a2(mdo sde): pad lha'i bu byang chub kyi gnas ni chos thams cad kyi gnas yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub kyi sgo gang yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub kyi sgo ni kun nas
418a3(mdo sde): yin da lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub kyi rtsom pa gang yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub kyi rtsom pa ni sems can thams cad bdag med pa'o// lha'i bus smras pa/
418a4(mdo sde): 'jam dpal byang chub ci dang mnyam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub ni chos thams cad mi skye ba dang mnyam mo// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub kyi bgrod pa gang
418a5(mdo sde): yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub kyi bgrod pa ni sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa yin no// byang chub kyi bgrod pa ni 'gro ba med par 'gro ba dang / rgyu ba med par 'gro ba
418a6(mdo sde): yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub gang gi rgyu 'thun pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub ni snying rje chen po'i rgyu 'thun pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal snying
418a7(mdo sde): rjechen po gang gi rgyu 'thun pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu snying rje chen po ni sems can thams cad rab tu thar par bya ba'i rgyu 'thun pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chubs
418b1(mdo sde): las btsal bar bya/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub ni sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rjes su rtogs pa las btsal bar bya'o// zhwa'i bus sbas pa/ 'jam dpal nyon mong/
418b2(mdo sde): ba rnams galas btsal bar bya/ 'jam dang mi gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu nyon mongs pa rnams ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa las btsal bar bya'o// su'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci 'badas
418b3(mdo sde): pa'i lam nyon mongs pa rnams dang lhan cig gnas sam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gal te 'phags pa'i lam gnyis su nur pa zhig yin na ni/ 'phags pa'i lam nyon mongs pa rnams
418b4(mdo sde): lhan cig gnas par yang 'gyur ba zhig na/ lha'i bu 'phags pa'i lam ni gnyis su gyur pa med pa ste/ nyon mongs pa tshol ba gang yon de nyid 'phags pa'i lam yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'ja
418b5(mdo sde): dpal ji ltar na lam gyis lam gyi bya ba byas pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe btsal na nyon mongs pa rnams mi rnyed cing 'khor ba'ang mi rnyed/ mya ngan las 'das pa'ang mi rnyed pa de
418b6(mdo sde): g+ha na lam gyis lam gyi bya ba byas pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa'i lam gang yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa'i lam ni lta ba'i
418b7(mdo sde): rnam pa drug cu rtsa gnyis dang / byin ci log bzhi dang / sgrib pa lnga dang / mi dge ba'i phyogs kyi chos thams cad do// lha'i lus spras pa/ 'jam dpal ci las bsam te de skad smras/ 'jam
419a1(mdo sde): dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i dra byang chub sems dpa' ni sems can la sbyor ba yin pas/ sems can rnams kyang lta ba'i rnam pa dang / phyin ci log dang / sgrib pa dang / mi dge ba'i
419a2(mdo sde): chos rnams ma gtogs pa gzhan las btsal bar mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' ni gang gis sems can rnams rab tu phye ba'i lta ba'i rnam pa dang / phyin ci log dang / sgrib pa dang /
419a3(mdo sde): nyon mongs pa de dag nyid tshol bar byed de/ de tshol bar byed pa na/ sems can yang mi rnyed/ nyon mongs pa rnams kyang mi rnyed do// ma rnyed na sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la skyo bar mi 'gyur te/
419a4(mdo sde): lha'i bu rnam grangs des na nyon mongs pa tshol ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i lam yin la/ sems can tshol ba'ang byang chub sems dpa'i lam yin/ phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / nyon
419a5(mdo sde): mongs pa tshol ba'ang byang chub sems dpa'i lam yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po dag byang chub sems dpa'i lam ma yin nam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/
419a6(mdo sde): lha'i bu stong pa nyid ni btsal bar mi nus la/ mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'ang btsal bar mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu de la ni sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes
419a7(mdo sde): pa 'jug par mi 'gyur la/ gang la sems dang / yid dang / rnam par shes pa 'jug par mi 'gyur ba de ni btsal bar mi nus pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal lam ji ltar
419b1(mdo sde): mngon par rtogs par bya/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa lha'i bu yang dag par lta ba gang dang mnyam pa log pa'i lta ba'ang de dang mnyam pa de ltar mngon par rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni lam mngon par
419b2(mdo sde): rtogs pa yin no// yang dag pa'i rtog pa gang dang mnyam pa log pa'i rtog pa'ang de dang mnyam pa dang / yang dag pa'i ngag gang dang mnyam pa log pa'i ngag kyang de dang mnyam pa dang / yang dag pa'i
419b3(mdo sde): las kyi mtha' gang dang mnyam pa log pa'i las kyi mtha' yang de dang mnyam pa dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba gang dang mnyam pa log pa'i 'tsho ba'ang de dang mnyam pa dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba gang dang mnyam
419b4(mdo sde): ba log pa'i rtsol ba'ang de dang mnyam pa dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa gang dang mnyam pa log pa'i dran pa'ang de dang mnyam pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang dang mnyam pa log pa'i ting nge 'dzin
419b5(mdo sde): kyang de dang mnyam pa de ltar mngon par rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni lam mngon par rtogs pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal yang dag pa'i lta ba gang dang mnyam 'jam dpal gyis sgra/
419b6(mdo sde): pa/ lha'i bu yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / log pa'i lta ba ni stong pa nyid dang / dben pa nyid dang mnyam pa yin no// lha'i bus smras pa 'jam dpal stong pa nyid dang dben pa nyid la tha dad du bya ba
419b7(mdo sde): yod 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu mkha' dang na mkha' la tha dad du bya ba ci yod/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal tha dad du bya ba cung zad kyang med do// 'jam dpal gyis
420a1(mdo sde): smras pa/ lha'i bu de bzhin du stong pa nyid dang / dben pa nyid la'ang tha dad du bya ba cung zad kyang med do// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal tha dad du bya ba gang las rab tu phye
420a2(mdo sde): ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyi smras pa/ lha'i bu tha dad du bya ba ni mtshan ma dang / dmigs pa dang / 'du shes dang / spros pa las rab tu phye ba yin te/ mtshan ma dang / dmigs pa dang / 'du shes dang //
420a3(mdo sde): spros pa gang yin pa de'i ngo bo nyid kyi mtshan nyid rjes su rtogs pa gang yin pa de la ni tha dad du bya ba med do// lha'i bu 'di lta ste/ dper na rgya mtsho chen por ma zhugs pa'i chu la ni tha dad du bya ba yod
420a4(mdo sde): kyis rgya mtsho chen por zhugs pa'i chu la ni tha dad du bya ba med pa de bzhin du/ lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings yongs su ma shes pa la ni chos la tha dad du bya ba yod kyi/ chos kyi dbyings yongs su shes pa la
420a5(mdo sde): ni chos la tha dad du bya ba med do// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci chos kyi dbyings yongs su shes par nus sam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu chos kyi dbyings ni yongs su shes par mi//
420a6(mdo sde): nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ lha'i bu chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings su yang dag par 'du ba yin la/ chos kyi dbyings ni chos kyi dbyings yongs su mi shes pa'i phyir/ chos kyi dbyings su yang dag par/
420a7(mdo sde): 'du ba'i chos de dag la gnyis su med par shes pa gang yin pa de ni yongs su shes pa zhes bya ste/ sems gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa nye bar zhi bar byed pa'i phyir de ni yongs su shes pa zhes bya'o//
420b1(mdo sde): gzhan gyi rnam par rig pa la gnas pa'i phyir de ni yongs su shes pa zhes bya'o// lha'i bu 'di lta ste/ dper nA nam mkha' gzugs med pa'i snang ba la gzugs thams cad snang yang kagazugs de dag ni/
420b2(mdo sde): nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid yin pa de bzhin du/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpas rang gis smras pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi sgo nas chos thams cad mthong yang / chos de dag ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ngo bo nyid kho na yin no//
420b3(mdo sde): lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mgo smos pas go ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ lha'i bu mgo smos pas go ba'i rang gi lta bas sems can thams cad kyi sta ba sra
420b4(mdo sde): ba'i phyir chos ston par byed na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnam par spros pas go ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu dben pa'i phyir bdag kyang gzhan du mi byed la/ bdag
420b5(mdo sde): bdag med pa'ang gzhan du mi byed na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' mi bkri ba yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos 'gal
420b6(mdo sde): yang khrid par mi byed/ mi khrid par mi byed pa na'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' gnas lhur len pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems
420b7(mdo sde): mtshan ma med pa'i gnas las g.yo bar mi byed na'o// lha'i dus smras pa/ 'jam dpal gang gis byang chub sems dpa' tshogs gsum po nges pa nyid dang / ma nges pa nyid dang / log pa nyid
421a1(mdo sde): du nges pa'i tshogs dag la snang bar 'gyur ba'i rnam grangs yod dam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu yod do// lha'i bus sbas pa/ 'jam dpal ji lta bu yin/ 'jam dpal/
421a2(mdo sde): gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu byang chub sems dpa' nges pa ni sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la'o// ma nges pa ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la'o// log pa nyid du nges pa ni de las sems can bsgral bar bya ba
421a3(mdo sde): la'o// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal gang gis byang chub sems dpa' mi 'om pa thob cing / 'om pa ma thob pa'i rnam grangs yod dam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu yod do// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpa
421a4(mdo sde): 'o na ci'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' mi 'om pa thob pa rnams la snying rje chen po skyed par byed cing / sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ khom pa thob pa de dag kyang yal bar 'jog par byed/ 'jam
421a5(mdo sde): dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang rnam par grol ba'i tshogs de dag ni khom pa thob pa yin pas/ de la ni byang chub sems dpa' mi snang ngo // lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal khyod mi khom pa thob pa
421a6(mdo sde): yin nam/ 'on te khom pa thob pa yin/ 'jam dpal gyis spras pa/ lha'i bu kho bo ni khom pa thob pa'ang ma yin/ mi khom pa thob pa'ang ma yin no// lha'i bus spras pa/ 'jam dpal
421a7(mdo sde): ci'i phyir/ 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa/ lha'i bu kho bo ni thob pa'ang ma yin/ yang dag par thob pa'ang ma yin/ khom pa'ang ma yin/ mi khom pa'ang ma yin la/ 'om pa dang / mi lom pa la chag/
421b1(mdo sde): bar yang mi byed pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal chos kyi rnam grangs 'dis ni bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad tshar bcad do// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu
421b2(mdo sde): 'di ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la ni phung po yongs su shes pa'ang med/ nyon mongs pa sel ba'ang med/ bdud las yang dag par 'das pa'ang med pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bus smras pa/
421b3(mdo sde): 'jam dpal nye bar sbyar bas gzhan mu stegs can rnams pham par byas so// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu 'di ltar 'di la mu stegs thams cad kyi spyod pa med pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bus
421b4(mdo sde): smras pa/ 'jam dpal chos kyi tog btsugs so// 'jam dpal gyis sbas pa/ lha'i bu snang ba med pa dang / mun pa med pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'dis ni chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu
421b5(mdo sde): bskor to// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu lta ba'i mtha' thams cad yongs su bcad pa'i phyir ro// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal chos bstan pa 'dis chos kyi snang ba ji skad cig byas
421b6(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang dag la snang ba'ang med la/ mun pa'ang med pa de dag chos kyis snang bar byas so// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal sems can gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs
421b7(mdo sde): 'di thos nas/ mos par 'gyur ba de dag ni dkon no// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'di la su dag mos par 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu
422a1(mdo sde): gang dag 'ching bas rnam par 'khrugs par mi 'gyur ba rnams so// lha'i bus smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'ching bas rnam par 'khrugs par mi 'gyur ba dag gang yin/ 'jam
422a2(mdo sde): dpal gyis smras pa/ lha'i bu gang dag 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nyon mongs pa bsal ba'i sgo nas thar pa tshor bar mi byed pa dang / gang dag 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang /
422a3(mdo sde): gti mug dang / nyon mongs pa mnyam pa nyid kyis rnam par grol ba mnyam par gyur pa dag ste/ de dag gi ni 'ching ba ma dmigs pas rnam par 'khrug par yang mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro// 'jam dpal gzhon
422a4(mdo sde): nur gyur pas bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ srog chags lnga 'bum tsam gyis byang chub tu sems bskyed nas tshig 'di skad ces/ bdag cag gis kyang ji ltar 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang / de bzhin
422a5(mdo sde): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos 'di dag brnyas pa de bzhin du thob par gyur cig ces kyang smras so// lha dang mi rnams kyi skye dgu las srog chags 'bum lhag tsam ni
422a6(mdo sde): chos thams cad la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go// gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu drug khri ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// 'dod pa na spyod
422a7(mdo sde): pa'i lha'i bu brgyad khri yang len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// srog chags dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma nyi khri yang len pa med par
422b1(mdo sde): zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo// byang chub sems dpa' sngon dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa bdun khri nyis stong gis ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'dor/
422b2(mdo sde): rnams kyang dga' ba dang / mgu ba dang / yi rangs pa dang / rab tu dga' ba dang / dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/ ched du rjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o kun nas yongs su grol ba yi// dmigs med
422b3(mdo sde): chos ni legs par bshad// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yis// shin tu legs par bshad pa byas// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma
422b4(mdo sde): yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa de dag gis lha dang mi'i mchod pa dag byas te/ steng gi bar snang las kyang lha'i me tog gi char dag kyang zab/
422b5(mdo sde): rin po che'i char dag kyang phab/ gos kyi char dag kyang phab/ bdug spos kyi char dag dang / spos chu'i char dag dang / phye ma'i char dag kyang phab bo// lha'i bu rnams kyis steng gi bar snang las lha'i sil
422b6(mdo sde): snyan brgya stong dag kyang rab tu gsil bar gyur to// dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen ma rnams dang / rgyal po gsal rgyal gyis kyang rang rang gi 'byor pa ci bdog pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das dang /
422b7(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la mchod pa byas so// thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor rnams kyis kyang thal mo sbyar te tshig 'di skad ces bcom ldan 'das gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la dad par/
423a1(mdo sde): #mi bgyid pa de dag la ni sangs rgyas 'byung ba ma mchis lags so// gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di spong bar bgyid pa de dag la ni rab tu 'byung ba ma mchis lags so// gang dag chos/
423a2(mdo sde): kyi rnam grangs 'di bsgrubs te gnas par mi bgyid pa de dag la ni bsnyen par rdzogs pa ma mchis lags so// de dag la ni 'phags pa'i bsnyen par rdzogs pas bsnyen par rdzogs pa'ang ma mchis lags/
423a3(mdo sde): song nga gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bgrod par mi mchi ba de dag la ni dge sbyong gi tshul ma mchis lags so// de dag la ni bram ze'i tshul yang ma mchis lags so// gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di//
423a4(mdo sde): la skrag par 'gyur ba de dag la ni thob pa'ang ma mchis/ mngon par rtogs pa'ang ma mchis lags so// gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan par bgyid pa dang / thos nas kyang mos par bgyid pa dang // /
423a5(mdo sde): len par bgyid pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa dang / 'dzin par bgyid pa dang / klog par bgyid pa dang / yi gar 'dri bar bgyid pa dang / snod 'tshal bar bgyid pa nas/ gzhan dag la'ang
423a6(mdo sde): ston par bgyid pa dang / skyo ba ma mchis pa'i yid kyis 'doms par bgyid pa dang / rjes su ston par bgyid pa dang / 'di la nan tan sgrub par bgyid pa dang / gzhan dag kyang nan tan gyis
423a7(mdo sde): sgrub tu sgrol ba dang / nyams par mi bgyid pa de dag ni sems can dam pa dang / sems can chen po dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bsrungs pa dang / sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur bgyis pa dang /
423b1(mdo sde): gting rnyed pa dang / log par ltung ba'i rgyun bkum pa dang / ngan song dang ngan 'gro'i sgo bkum pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su zin pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la shin
423b2(mdo sde): tu gus pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la bgyis pa gzo zhing bgyis pa tshol ba lags shing / de dag ni 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
423b3(mdo sde): rnams kyi dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba'i slad du zhugs pa lags te/ skyes bu dam pa de dag la ni sangs rgyas 'byung ba'ang mchis lags so// de dag la ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'ang
423b4(mdo sde): mchis lags so// de dag ni 'bras bu mchis pa dang / khom pa dang ldan pa lags so zhes kyang gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag la legs so//
423b5(mdo sde): zhes bya ba byin nas/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/ lha dang mi rnams kyi skye dgu las srog chags nyi khri nyis skyong ni chos
423b6(mdo sde): rnams la chos kyi mig rdul med cing dri ma dang bral ba rnam par dag go/ lha dang mi rnams kyi skye dgu las srog chags 'bum phrag brgyad ni len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems
423b7(mdo sde): rnam par grol lo// lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / dge slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang / dge bsnyen
424a1(mdo sde): ma sa ya phrag gnyis kyis ni byang chub tu sems bskyed do// 'di na gnas pa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag nas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' lnga 'bum gyis ni
424a2(mdo sde): mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' bsam pa tha dad pa nyis stong tsam gyis ni gzungs sna tshogs so sor thob par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' 'bum gyis
424a3(mdo sde): ni gzungs dri ma med pa so sor thob par gyur to// de dag las byang chub sems dpa' mang po dag byang chub sems dpa' byams pa khyod kyis byang chub thob pa'i dam pa'i chos yongs su 'dzin par
424a4(mdo sde): 'gyur zhing mdo sde zab mo 'di lta bu dag nod pa dang / ston pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / klog par yang 'gyur te/ de dag ni byams pa khyod nyid kyis byang chub tu lung ston par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das
424a5(mdo sde): la byang chub sems dpa' byams pas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang dag mdo sde 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / ston pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba
424a6(mdo sde): dang / dam pa'i chos yun ring du gnas par bgyi ba'i slad du/ glegs bam du bgyis te 'chang ba dang / tha na lan 'ga' zhig nyan par bgyid pa dang // rna lam du grags par bgyid pa de dag bsod nams
424a7(mdo sde): ji tsam skyed par 'gyur lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// byams pa khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di
424b1(mdo sde): yongs su 'dri bar sems pa ni legs so legs so// byams pa de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung zhig dang / ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o// byams pa nan gyis dper na/ lha dang /
424b2(mdo sde): mi rnams kyi skye dgu las lha 'am/ mi gang zhig gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'khor gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang bcas pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed cig la bskal pa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed
424b3(mdo sde): du bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bsnyen bkur byas par gyur pa de bas ni/ gang gis mdo sde legs par gsungs pa 'di yi ger bris te 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / de bzhin nyid du grub par byed pa
424b4(mdo sde): dang / gzhan dag la smon par byed pa de ches bsod nams mang du skyed par 'gyur te/ byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i phyir ring po mi thogs par byang chub kyi snying por nye bar 'gro bar yang 'gyur ro//
424b5(mdo sde): byams pa nga ni gang dag gis mdo sde 'di thos nas spong bar mi byed cing / mos par byed pa dang / tha na glegs bam du 'dri bar byed pa de dag kyang mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du phyir mi ldog pa nyid du lung ston to// byams
424b6(mdo sde): ba ra ni gang dag gis mdo sde zab mo 'di lta bu 'di'i ming tsam thos pa de dag kyang 'bras bu yod par lung ston par byed na/ gang dag mos pa dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / klog pa dang / gzhan dag la'ang ston par byed pa dag
424b7(mdo sde): la lta smos kyang ci dgos/ gang dag mdo sde 'di yi ger 'dri ba dang / lung nod pa dang / kha ton byed pa dang / klog pa dang / de bzhin nyid du sgrub par byed pa de dag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang lhan
425a1(mdo sde): cig tu gtam 'dre bar byed pa dang / phebs par smra bar byed par 'gyur te/ de dag ni rtag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur zhing / 'jig rten gyi khams/
425a2(mdo sde): gzhan dag na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis kyang de dag la ston par mdzad cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
425a3(mdo sde): tu lung ston par yang 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa// kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa de ni sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang 'dra ba yin gyi/ kun
425a4(mdo sde): dga' bo khyod kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di zung zhig/ gzhan dag la'ang rgya cher ston cig/ kun dga' bos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos rnam grangs 'di'i ming ci zhes bgyi/ 'di ji ltar gzungs par
425a5(mdo sde): bgyid 'di'i ming ji skad bstan par bgyi lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lha'i bu rab stsal sems kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba dang / 'jam dpal gyis bstan pa
425a6(mdo sde): chos thams cad rnam par gtan la dbab pa bstan pa zhes bya bar yang zung zhig/ de nas 'khor de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming thos nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
425a7(mdo sde): ldan 'das bdag cag gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas chos bstan pa mang du thos lags na/ ji ltar chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu rnam par phye ste rgya cher bstan pa dang / de lta bu'i chos ni nam yang ma byung lags so//
425b1(mdo sde): bdag cag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs la dga' ba 'di lta bu thob pa ni sngon ma myong lags te/ de lta lags pas/ bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang / skye bo mang po la sman pa dang / ma/
425b2(mdo sde): 'ongs pa'i skye bo rnams kyi slad du/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ci nas sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bgyid par 'gyur ba dang / sems can mos pa tha dad pa rnams kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du theg pa
425b3(mdo sde): tha dad pas nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / de dag bde 'gror mchi bar bgyi bar bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di legs par byin gyis brlab tu gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor bzhi po de dag
425b4(mdo sde): gis gsol ba btab par thugs su chud nas phyogs bcur rnam par gzigs so// bcom ldan 'das kyis phyogs bcur rnam par gzigs ma thag tu de nas de'i mod la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
425b5(mdo sde): khams 'di'i sa bzhi chen po rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos par gyur cing / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po rnams kyang dga' ba dang / mgub
425b6(mdo sde): dang yi rangs pa dang / spro ba dang / dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/ ci nas kyang phyi ma'i dus na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nub par mi 'gyur bar byin gyis brlab par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dang / byang
425b7(mdo sde): chub sems dpa' sems can la dga' ba rnams dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun la lha'i mchod pa dag byas shing / steng gi bar snang las me tog gi char dag kyang rab tu bag lha'i sil snyan dang glu dbyangs dag kyang
426a1(mdo sde): rab tu gsil cing blangs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la 'di skad ces dang brdad dpal gzhon nur
426a2(mdo sde): gyur pas ngos kyi rnam grangs 'di rkyen gyis brlabs so zhes go par yang mdzad do// de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / kyang drung sems dang 'di dag dag
426a3(mdo sde): ba dang / mgu ba dang yi rangs pa dang / rab tu dga' pa dang / dga' ba dang / yid bde ba skyes nas/ bcom ldan 'das dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la
426a4(mdo sde): ma rod pa byas te rang rang gi gnas su dong ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang // tshe dang
426a5(mdo sde): ldan pa kun dga' po dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//
426a6(mdo sde): baphags pa lha'i bu rab rdul sems kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po pradz+nyA bar ma dang /
426a7(mdo sde): zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba ba na d+he ye shes sdes pasgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//
